citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mgbe ndị Igbo Radio kpọrọ ndị niile anyị ma bi na mpaghara Lagos dị ịche ịche, anyị chọpụtara na ọkụ anaghị adị otu Jonathan siri kwu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Christiane jụkwara Jonathan maka ndị minista ala Nigeria na-ezugbe Nigeria n’oshi. Maka ndị na-ezugide zuo ma mmanụ akụ chi nyere. Ọ jụkwara ya maka nrụrụ aka ndị ọrụ gọọmentị na-eme. Mana Jonathan azaghị ya ọfụma.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ jụrụ Jonathan ihe mere na ụmụ afọ Nigeria na-anwụ n’aka ndị uwe ojii, karịrị ndị na-anwụ site n’aka ndị Boko Haram. Jonathan azaghị ajụjụ a ọfụma.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Pịtụ mkpụrụ aka kọmputa gị ebe a, ma ị chọọ ịle ajụjụ ọnụ a na CNN.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị egwu bọọlụ na-amasị na Nigeria, chere na Nigeria ga-ejisi ike merie ndị Zambia. Ọ bụ ihe anya-mmiri mgbe ndị Zambia mechara sata otu ọkpụ ahụ oge bọọlụ na-akwado ịbịa n’isi njedebe. Nigeria na Zambia gbaziri onye lawa onye lawa.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na ya nakwa ajụ onwe ya ajụjụ sị:
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Kedu mgbe anụmanụ ndị a na ụmụ mmadụ ga-ele ya anya were mụrụ akọ? Kedu ihe ya ga-emezị iji kụziere ha na nwayọ nwayọ bụ ije? Na ọ pụtara na ha enweghị echiche, ka ọ bụ na anya kpọrọ ha iji hụ na ya anaghị alụ ndụ mgbe ya na eje ije?
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ jụkwara mụ ma ọ bụ amaghị ihe na-eme ha? Ọ sị na ọ bụ na ha amaghị na ebe onye ọsọ ruru ka onye ije na-eru? Ọ jụrụ mụ ka ọ bụ na ha amaghị na o ji ọsọ agbakwu ọgụ amaghị na ọgụ bụ ọnwụ?
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ajụjụ ndị a tara akpụ. Ọ bụrụ na ị nwere asịsa ị nwere ịsa banyere ajụjụ ndị a, biko depute ha na ọgbakọ ụmụ Igbo bụ Igbo ka anyị gụa, were nwee ike zigara Mazị Mbediọgụ ozi, ka obi were zue ya ike.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Biko ka anyị leba anya na ndụmụọdụ Mazị Mbediọgụ, dịka o kwuru na ebe onye ọsọ ruru ka onye ije na kwa eru. Ka anyị were nụ ya ka egwu, maka na akụ fechasịa ọ dara awọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ihe oriri Igbo na-eri bụkwa omenala Igbo: ụkwa, akị, akpụ, garị, ụtara, azụ ndụ, azụ ọkpọ, sungu, okporoko, ayịya, mangala, anụ ewu, anụ nchị, ọkụkọ Igbo na ọkụkọ agịrịkọlchọ, anụ nama, anụ ele, anụ awala, anụ ọgazị, akwa ọgazị na akwa ọkụkọ, kanda, isi ewu ngwọngwọ pepesupu, ofe olugbu, ofe ụgụ, ofe ọhara, ofe nsara, ofe ọkwụrụ, aṅara, ọjị, ose ọjị, ube, ọpọpọ, akị, akwụ, ụdara, kashu, mmịmị, ụkpaka/ụgba, achịkwụagba, bụ omenala Igbo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọfọ na ogu bụ ekpere anyị na Chineke Igbo ji ekwurịkọta okwu, ma ndị nna nna anyị ha ma ndị nne nne anyị ha bụ ndị anyị na-agọ ọfọ ka ha were ọfọ anyị che Chukwu ụmụ Igbo n’ihu kwa ụbọchị nile. Ihe nile Igbo na-atụ n’aka na nke ha na-ese na akwụkwọ, na nke ha na-akpụ dị ka ụzụ na ite, bụ omenala Igbo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ihe ndị a bụ ihe jikọrọ ụmụ Igbo bụ Igbo ọnụ. Ha nwere ebe a na-amụta ihe ndị bụ ụmụ Igbo kwesiri ịna-eme na ihe a na-asọ nsọ. Ezi na ụlọ bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ anyị nọ site na akụkọ ifo, ka anyị na amụta ihe bụ omenala Igbo na ihe bụ omenaelu. Na mbara ka ọha na eze na-agbakọ were ma iwu ihe ala na-asọ nsọ, na otu a ga-esi rie onye mere ihe ala na-asọ nsọ nha. A na-ada onye merụrụ ala Igbo nha. A na-eri onye ahụ iwu, iji me ka ọ ghara ime ya ọzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Igbo na-eti mmanwụ were eje iri ndị dara iwu obodo nra! Ndị na-ese okwu nwere usoro ndị okenye họpụtara ha ji emezi ya bụ okwu, na onye ukwu na onye nta ga-eme n’ude. Ndị okenye nwere ụzọ ha si ekpebi ikpe ka udo dị na-erighị ngo. Maka na o metụta imi, o metụtala ọnụ. Nwanyị na di ya na-ese okwu, ndị okenye mara onye ikpe mara, marakwa ụzọ ha ga-esi tinye okwu ahụ ọnụ ka di na nwunye ya laa be ha ga birikwa n’udo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị na-azọ ala, ndị okenye nwere osisi ogirishi e ji amata okere ala. Ha bakwa agba aka ebe onye nwe ya bụ ala, na onye na-akọ ji na-ede na yabụ ala. Ha makwa ndị ha na ha gbara obi/ ha makwa ndị ha na ha na-akpa okere ala.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ihe ndị a na-eme ka esemụ okwu ghara ịba ka ọnya bara mmadụ na ọkpa na-anaghị ala ala. A nakwa agba ndị mmadụ iyi ma ha na-esi agụgọ na ihe ekwuru abụghị ka o siri me.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: E nwekwara usoro e ji alụ di na nwayị n’omenala Igbo. Ịgba njụ, ịpa mmanya ngwụọ na ọjị, ka jụa ese nwanyị nwoke chọrọ ịlụ. E nwere ụzọ ịpa mmanya. E nwere abọ ji ole eji alụ nwanyị. E nwekwara ụzọ e si ele ọmụgwụọ ma nwanyị mụọ nwa. E nwere usoro e si aga mgba erụ. E nwere ụzọ e si amụ ọlụ aka, na afọ ole onye na-amụ ọlụ aka ga-anọ tupu e duo ya ụlọ, ka ọ gazịa zụba ahịa nke ya. E nwekwara ụzọ e si agwa onye onye ya nwụrụ okwu maka ka aghara ili ozu abụo. A na-ezipụ ndị okenye mara ihe ka ha je ya bụ ozi.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Igbo nwekwara ụzọ e si akwa ozu. Igbo nwekwara oge nwanyị na-erumkpe kwesiri irucha mkpe. Ọ dịghị ihe kọrọ akọ n’omenala Igbo. Igbo kwetara na ihe ọ ga-abụ e me gị ọ gaghị adị gị mma, ka ị gharakwa ime ya onye ọzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Omenala Igbo gbagidere ụkwụ n’eziokwu, egbe bere ugo bere nke sị na ibe ya agaghị ebe ka nku kwa ya n’ike. Omenala Igbo bụ eziokwu bụ ndụ. Ụmụ Igbo bụ ụmụ Chukwu, kpọm kwem!
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye osote onye isi ala mba ahụ, Nicholas Maduro, kwuputere taa na Chavez nwụrụ n’ịhe dịka elekere anọ n’ọkara, nke mgbede na mba ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: A mụrụ Hugo Chavez n’abalị 8 nke ọnwa Julayị afọ 1954. Nna ya bụ onye nkuzi n’otu obere obodo e nwere na Venezuela. Mama nke ukwu Chavez zụrụ ya, tupu ọ baa amị mgbe ọ dị afọ 17. N’afọ 1992, ya na ndị otu ya nwara ike ha iwere ọchịchị n’ike. Mana aka mechara kpara ya. A tụrụ ya mkpọrọ. Ka afọ abụọ gafere, ọ pụtara na mkpọrọ were malite ịso azọ ọkwa onye isi ala na 1998.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Kemgbe ọnwa ole n’ole ka Chavez nọ n’akwa ọrịa kansa. E nwere mgbe anyị nụburu na ọ malitego ịgbake n’ọrịa. Taa, ndị Venezuela na-eru uju maka onye isi ala ha nwụrụ anwụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Chaị, echetala m n'oge anyị gụrụ Things Fall Apart, No Longer at Ease, Arrow of God, A Man of the People, na ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ Chinụa Achebe deere mgbe anyị nọ na sekọndịrị sukulu. Oge elu wụ ala ọsa, n'oge ụmụ akwụkwọ maa ihe ha na-eme, n'oge onye nkuzi kpọrọ ọlụ nkuzi ihe, n'oge agu nmuta na-achi!
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Professor Chinụa Achebe; Odogwu Nwoke, Nwoke obi ọma, Enyi ọha dum, O ji nwayọọ ejee! Ọchị agha! Nwoke na-eme ihe mgbe ihe siri ike. Chaị, onye ga-asị na Chinụa Achebe kwujọrọ ya? Ndị enyi m, ihe ọma anaghị ekwe ka ejide ya n’aka. Ọnwụ, egbuole Agụnaeche-Mba ndị Igbo ji a gaa mba!
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Chinụa, Nwoke udo zuru ahụ! Nwoke ọnụ ya jupụtara n’ekele! Omee mgbe ihe siri ike! Otu onye na-achụ ọgụ! Onye nduu ụmụ Igbo! Nwoke a nadịghị esi n’iru ya a paa mmanya! Chai, onye wetara mma e jiri gbue agụ? Ụmụnna m, ihe tagburu nkịta ataala arụ! Ọnwụ anaghị atụ ụjọ!
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Chinụa, hapụ n’ihi na Chi gị maara ihe mere gị. O nweghị ihe ụmụ Igbo pụrụ imee n’ihi na ọnwụ ka ike. Ndị CISA kwadoro itu gị akara ugo na Igbo Village dị na Staunton, Virginia taa na mmemme Retreat ha n'izu ụka a. Ọ wụrụ ihe ọgụ gaara igbochi, ndị CISA gbakoro n'Igbo Village gara eburu mma, egbe na ụta wee lụwa ya. Ụmụnwanyị na Ụmụada gbakọrọ n'ebe a gara eburu mkpara na aka odo ha ji-asụ nri wee lụwa nke ha. Ọnwụ gara ahụ ọgụ na mgba anya! Chai, egbe e burule nwa ọkụkọ n’iru nne ya! Anyamiri ejula anyị anya. Ụkwụ e jiela agụ, mgbada abịala ya ụgwọ!
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Chinụa, ọkụ ị mụnyere n’ụwa agaghị anyụ anyụ! Mba nile akwụkwọ gị ruru gaa necheta ọlụ nile ị lụrụ n’ụwa. Chinụa, akwụkwọ Things Fall Apart ị deere agaghị anwụ anwụ. Ihe ncheta gị agaghị agwụ agwụ!
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụmụ Igbo, anyị matara n’ugbo abụa ka ekwe na-akpọ dike - Ọ kpọ ya otu na ndụ, ọ kpọ ya nke ọzọ n’ọnwụ. Ọrịa gbue onye ọ tụrụ, ya ezuru ike! Chinụa, hapụcha! Ụjọ atụkwala gị n’ije gị n’ihi na onye ya na chi ya kwụụ n'ije, ụjọ ekwesịghị ịtụ ya! Anyị na-asị gị gbawa ọsọ gị, gbakwuru Chi kere gị, ebe ị ga-ezu ike maka ọlụ ọma nile ị lụrụ n’ụwa. Laa n’ụdo!!
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị omekome jere lie mgbọ ogbunigwe abụọ n’ogige ebe e mere maka ịkwụsị ọsọ. Ogbunigwe ahụ gbawara n’ebe elekere abụọ nke ehihe na Boston were chụjuo ndị mmadụ ọhịa n’ụzọ. Mgbe anwụrụ ọkụ gafechara, a chọpụtara mmadụ atọ nwụrụ anwụ, gụnyere otu obere nnwa a na-akpọ Martin, onye ndị mmadụ daara abalị na Boston ụnyahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Kemgbe Mọndee ahụ, ndị uwe ojii na ndị FBI na-agbakeri ala na-achọ onye nyụrụ ụdịrị nsị a n’igbudu ahịa. Ụnyahụ, ha gosiputere photo okpokoro ite igwe na nkirika akpa ojii e jiri rọchi nsị egbe mgbọ ogbunigwe ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mmadụ 3 nwụrụ anwụ, ebe mmadụ 176 merụrụ ahụ. Ndị dibịa bekee n’ụlọ ọgwụ Boston kwuru na ha hụrụ ụdị mmerụ ahụ dị iche iche, ma ndị e bere ụkwụ, ma ndị e bere aka.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị uwe ojii na ndị FBI kpọrọ oku ka onye ọ bụna matara, m’ọ bụ, hụrụ onye merụrụ ala a mee ka ha mata. Ha kpọrọ ndị niile setere photo m’ọ bụ ihe nkiri vidio zitere ha ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Taa bụ Nwenezdee, ndị uwe ojii kwuru na, site n’ihe vidio ndị rutere ha aka, ha ahụtagorị mgbe otu nwoke dọwara akpa ebe ahụ ogbunigwe ahụ gbawara, kama na ha achọpụtabeghị onye ọ bụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụwa nke a dịkwa egwu. Ụmụ mmadụ ọgazị akpọchibido onwe ha ụzọ ka enwe na adaka a kpọchiri na zuu (Zoo)? Keduzị nke bụ na ụmụ mmadụ agaghịzịkwa agbakọ ịnara ikuku? Kedụzị nke na ụmụ mmadụ agaghịzịkwa apụta nyara anwụ ghara ịna achịrị mkpụrụ obi ha n’aka? Kedụzị nke na ụmụ mmadụ agaghịzịkwa aṅụ miri tọgbọ iko n’ụwa nke a ugbu a? Keduzị nke na ụmụ mmadụ apụghịzịkwa ịgbakọ ghara ịna ele anya n’azụ ukombụ ha, ịmata ma ọ dị ndị pa egbe ịgba ha?
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụdịka ndụ gịnị bụzị ndụ ndịa anyị nazịkwa ebi na mmadụ ahụghịzịkwa mmadụ ibe ya n’anya cha cha! Ụwa nke a sefụ! Ụwa enweghị isi, nke o ji enwe ọdụ cha cha!
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mkpụrụ abalị ise gara aga, ụmụ nne n’abọ, Tamerlan Tsarnaev, gbara afọ 26, na Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, gbara afọ 19  tụrụ ogbunigwe n’ogige ebe  a na-eme mmemme ịgba ọsọ Boston maratọnụ. Kemgbe ahụ ka ndị uwe ojii na ndị FBI na-achọ ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N’abalị nwanne ụnyahụ, ụmụ nne n’abọ ahụ jere na Watertown nara otu onye ụgbọala ya n’ike. Ha gburu otu onye owe ojii, Sean Collier, na-arụ ọrụ na Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT), merụọ onye uwe ojii ọzọ, Richard Donahue, ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị ọrụ nchekwa mechara gbaa ha gburugburu, ha na ha were malite ịkwarịta mgbọ. Ndị uwe ojii gburu otu n’ime ụmụ nne n’abọ ahụ, nke obere, Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, jiri ụgbọ ala ahụ ha zuru n’oshi gbanarị ndị uwe ojii. Ndị uwe ojii chọjuru ya afọ na mpaghara Boston.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N’oge uhuruchi, otu onye hụrụ ebe Dzhokhar zoro n’ụgbọ mmiri  dị n’azụ ụlọ ya, were gbara ndị uwe ojii ama. Mgbe ha rutere ebe a ahụ ha malitere ịkwarịta mgbọ. E merụrụ Dzhokhar ahụ were jidezie ya. E bujere ya n’ụlọ ọgwụ na Boston.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mgbe ọ na-agwa ndị nta akụkọ okwu n’ụbọchị Mọndee, osote onye isi ndị uwe ojii, James Malizia, kwuru na ha jidere ụmụ nwoke abụọ, Chiheb Esseghaier, gbara afọ 30, ya na Raed Jaser, gbara afọ 35. Chiheb bi na Montreal ebe onye ogbo ya bu Raed bi na Toronto.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị uwe ojii na-ekwu na, site na enyemaka ndị otu Alkaida na mba Iran, mmadụ abụọ ndị ahụ na-akpa nkata maka iji egbe na mgbọ ogbunigwe wakpo ụgbọ oloko si Toronto aga New York.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Malizia gwara ndị nta akụkọ n’o tego aka ndị uwe ojii ji eso ụmụ nwoke abụọ ahụ, na-enyocha akparama agwa ha, na-akpara ha ọnya. Ọ gbakwụnyere sị na Chiheb na Raed akpachagorị nkata, ma dịzie njikere igbu ọtụtụ ndị njem ụgbọ oloko si Toronto aga New York. Ndị uwe ojii malitere ịnyocha akparama agwa mmadụ abụọ ahụ n’ọnwa August afọ 2012.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Taa bụ Tuzdee, a gbara Chihed na Raed akwụkwọ n’ụlọ ikpe na Toronto. E kpebiri ịhapụ ha n’ụlọ nga na Toronto ruo n’abalị 23 nke ọnwa Mee, oge a ga-amalite ikpe ha ikpe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: A na-ekwu na e jidere ya oge ọ na-achọ ụzọ ọ ga-esi aga mba Somali maka isonyere ndị agha isi ekwe ọnwụ al-Shabab nke mba Somali. A gbaara ya ụgbọ nwa mkpị na Kenya, ka e kpechara ya ikpe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N’izu ụka gara aga, Michael na onye ogbo ya buru agha iyi egwu na Woolwich. Ha jiri ụgbọala kụtuo otu onye soja mba Britain na-agara onwe ya. Kama ha ga-enyere onye amị ahụ na-anwụ anwụ aka, Michael na onye ogbo ya mịpụtara mma were gbukasịa nwoke onye soja ahụ. Ọ nwụrụ ebe ahụ n’ike, n’etiti okporo ụzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị uwe ojii rutere ebe ahụ ka o mechara ihe dịka nkeji 20. Ha gbara Michael na di nna ya egbe, tupu e jido ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Taa bụ ụka, ndị nwe onye soja ahụ gbakọtara ebe ihe a mere maka ịkwanyere ya ugwu ịkpazụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N’abali abụọ gara aga, gọọmenti Barack Obama na White House kwuru sị na ha adịgo njikere ịgbado ndị otu agha nnwere onwe nke mba Syria ụkwụ n’azụ. Ha kọwara na ihe butere mgbanwe a bụ na ha achọpụtago na ndị agha mba Syria jiri nkwa agha sarin gas were busa ndị otu rebel ahụ ọgụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N’ambido ọgụ a, Amerịka kwuru sị na ha ga-etinye aka ma ọ bụrụ na gọọmenti Al-Assad nwaa anwaa were ngwa agha kemịkal wipọn were busa ndị rebel ahụ chọrọ ịchụpụ ya n’ọchịchị agha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị ahụ na-eme ngharị iwe malitere na-akpa aghara. Onye Prime Minista mba Turkey, Tayyip Erdogan, zigara ndị uwe ojii ka ha chụsasịa igwe mmadụ ahụ gbakọrọ n’ogige Taksim Square na-eme ngagharị iwe n’Istanbul.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nke a butereziri nnukwu ọgba aghara. Ndị ngagharị iwe malitere tụwa ndị uwe ojii okwute. Ndị uwe ojii na-atụzị ngwa ọgụ tia gasị aghara aghara. Ha chịpụtara akara ngwa katapila ndị e ji agba mmiri, were mmiri na-agba ndị ahụ na-eme ngagharị iwe. Ihe e nweziri ugbu a n’Istanbul bụ ọnọdụ ọkụ sị ite pụọ ite sị ọkụ pụọ n’etiti ndị uwe ojii na ndị ahụ na-eme ngagharị iwe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọnụ ọgụ ndị agha riri na-arizi elu kemgbe ọnwa ole n’ole ndị soja na ndị uwe ojii kwesiri ina-amụta ihe na-aka ndị agha mba Amerịka maliteziri gbuwe ndị Amerịka na-akụziri ha ihe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Taa bụ sọndee, gọọmenti Amerịka ekwuona na onye agha ahụ ndị soja Afghanistan gburu na nso a bụ onye Amerịka.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Najib Razak kwuru na, site n'ozi ha nwentere n'igwe nnyocha satalaịtị, agwa ụgbọ-elu ahụ kpara, mgbe o na-efu efu, na-egosi ịhe aka mmadụ mere.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụgbọ-elu MH370, bu mmadụ 239, si Kụala Lụmpọ na-aga Beijing gbagidere n'elu bụrụzie ịhe a na-achọ achọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Anya ịkpeazụ igwe nnyocha njem ụgbọ-elu hụrụ MH370 bụ mgbe MH370 na-efe na mpaghara oshumiri ndịda Chaịna. Ụwa niile ka na-achọ MH370 ruo taa.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N’abalị iri n’isii nke ọnwa Eprelụ, ụgbọ mmiri ndị South Korịa bu mmadụ narị anọ n’iri asaa n’isii kpuru ekpu. Ndị ọrụ nchekwa gụtara otu narị mmadụ n’iri asatọ n’asaa ndị nwụrụ anwụ. Ọtụtụ n’ime ha bụ ụmụ akwụkwọ na ndị nkụzi, ndị na-aga njem nlere anya. A ka na-achọ ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ achọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mana ụfọdụ ndị nta akụkọ na-ekwu na ịhe na-ese okwu bụ mmeri ahụ Umaru Tanko Al-Makura nwetere, nke mere ka ọ lọghachite n’ọkwa ọchịchị. Gọvanọ Al-Makura, onye Gwandere, na Sinetọ Solomon Ewuga, onye Eggon, na-ese okwu, nke mere Sinetọ Ewuga na ndị na-eso ụzọ ya jiri hapụ APC banyezie na PDP. Ndị Guardian nwetere ozi na mba abụọ ndị a jiri ngwa agha gụnyere AK 47 egbu onwe ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị Channels Television na-akọwa na ndị ntọ atọrọla Asime Sekibo, nwunye onye omebe iwu bụ Sinetọ George Thompson Sekibo. George Sekibo na-anọchite anya ndị mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ Steeti Rivers bụ Rivers East Senatorial District.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị o ji egbe atọrọ tọọrọ Asime Sekibo n’ụbọchị Tọzdee na Port Harcourt. Nwanyị a si mahadum (University of) Port Harcourt, ebe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ, ala be ya mgbe ndị ntọ a wakporo ya. A tọọrọ Asime na mmadụ abụọ ndị ọzọ. Ihe a mere ebe elekere asaa nke mgbede na Obiri Ikwere Bridge.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Anyị nwetere ozi na ndị ntọ ahụ na di nwanyị a amalitego ikpa nkata, mana anyị amabeghị ego ole ha si ya kwụọ maka igbapụta nwunye ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Otu onye ọkaikpe na mba Amerịka atụọla nwa afọ ala Nigeria nga mkpụrụ. Dịka a na-ewere otu ogbe ọka na-atụpụ nanị otu mkpụrụ ọka nay a kwa afọ, nga mkpụrụ ọka bụ nga ebighi ebi, nke onye a tụrụ ya ga-anọgide n’ime ya were ruo n’ụbọchị ọnwụ ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Gịnị kpatara e jiri tụọ ya ụdị nga a? Umar kwetere na ikpe mara ya n’ebubo ahụ eboro ya na ọ kpara nkata ma nwakwaa ike ya ịtụ ogbunigwe n’ụgbọelu bu ndị njem aga Amerịka.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N’ụbọchị ekeresimesi, abalị 25 nke ọnwa disemba, afọ 2009, Umar kwara mgbọ ogbunigwe yiri ya n’iba ya, were banye n’ụgbọelu na-aga Amerika. A na-akọwa na ndị otu Al-Kaịda koro Umar. O kwenyere ha were nyiri ogbunigwe n’iba ya were banye n’ugboelu bu ihe ruru mmadụ 300 si Amsterdam aga Detroit. Mgbe ha ruteweziri n’ebe ụgbọelu ha ga-ada n’Amerịka. Umar nwara ike ya ime ka obugbigwe ya gbawaa, ma gbuo ma ya ma ndị ọzọ so eme njem n’ụgbọelu ahụ. Mana aka apụghị ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị njem ibe ya jisiri ike jikpaa Umar ahụ, were meghụọ ogbunigwe ahụ nke Umar munyegoro ọkụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: E mechara kpee Umar ikpe n’Amerika. Umar jiri ọnụ yak were na ikpe mara ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị okenye sịna agbịsị gbaa nwata ọmụrụ akọ. Ihe nile ndịa mere ma n’emerịrị anyị bụ agbịsị n’agba anyị. Ajụjụ bụrụzie, anyị bụ ndị Igbo amụrụgo akọ? Ole mgbe anyị geji mụrụ nyabụ akọ?
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọbụ ya mere na, adịghị n’otu ndị Igbo dịka ọbụ anyị ka ọkacha. Ihe mmegbu nile neme anyị tata mekwara obodo anakpọ Japanị mgbe ụwa nile kpọrọ ha asị/ọnụ site nọ ọgụ ụwa nke abụa anụrụ mgbe tere aka. Nyabụ agbịsị gbara Japanị mere ka ha nile jikọta aka ọnụ dị n’otu. Ihe izizi Japanị mere bụ na ha siri ụmụ ha nile nọ na obodo ndị ọcha dị iche iche lọta bịa were ọnọdụ na Japnị, ka ha jikọta aka were mee ka obodo gaa n’ihu. Ha nyere ndịa nile lọtara ihe ọbụna ha chọrọ k’obi dị ha mma ịlụrụ obodo Ọlụ. Nnabataa nke a juru ndị a jepuru ejepu afọ nke uku kpatara na ha ji obi ọcha ma enebeghị ihe ha gerịta rụbara obodo Japanị ọlụ. Ndị bii ebi nyekwaraa ndịa ezigbo nkwado pụrụ iche, n’enweghị anya ukwu. Ọbụ ya mere na taa, Japanị n’agba izizi n’ihe gbasara ịrụ ụgbọ ala, ihe igwe ọbụna eji emee ka ndụ dị mma obibi, ngwa ọlụ nile ndị ọka mmụta ji alụ ọlụ n’ụlọ ọgwụ ma ebe ana’alụ ọlụ aka. Ndị be anyị, ọbụ onye n’agba mbọ ka Chineke na anọnyere. Ọbụghị sọsọ ikpe ekpere ụtụtụ, ehihie, n’abalị. Chineke abụghị Chineke n’anụ ekpere mgbe anyị adịghị agba mbọ na n’emekwa ihe ọchọrọ. K’anyị nebakwa anya na umunne anyị bụ ndị Izrel. Ụwa bụrụ ha ọnụ ma kpọkwa ha asị kpatara na ebe Pharaoh na Eze Herod kwụsịrị ka ụmụ Mohammed bidoro gaba were rue tata. Eze Hitila jiri anwụrụ ọkụ n’egbu egbu kpochapụ imirikiti umunne anyi ndịa na obodo Jamịnị maka anya ụfụ ọganịrụ ndị Izrel. Ihe a bụkwa ihe mere anyị na ugwu awụsa na 1966-1967.Nke a mere ụmụ Izrel jikọtara aka ọnụ nihe nile ha na eme, mere ha jiri bụrụ otu nime obodo sikarịchara n’ike n’ụwa nile. Ha anaghị anara ikike onye ọzọ ma ha chọ ime ihe. Chineke sitere n’ututu nọnyere ha makana ha n’agba mbọ dị egwu.Unu ahụna na Chineke anaghị arapụ ndị Ya n’agba mbọ ma nwee okwukwe na Ya aka. Nke a bụ ihe mmụta.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Tupu anyị adị n’otu ka ndị Japanị na Isrel, anyị ga achọpụtagodụ ihe ndị n’eme ka anyị n’agbasasị agbasasị ka atụrụ n’enweghị onye na azụ ha. Ihe ndị mụ cheputara ugbua bu:
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Anyị n’agba mbọ anụ mara ọwa ya ma chefuo ọganiru ọha,onye na nke ya onye na nke ya. Onwe mụ diri mụ mma, achọkwaghị mụ ịma maka onye ọzọ. N’ala Igbo taa, ụmụ anyị nọ nebe dị iche iche n’eme ọfụma karịchaa ndị anyị nọ na be ha. Anyị na emekarị mkpọtụ ịnya isi ego. Omume dị etua dịkwa nọ obodo oyibo ebe ndị Igbo nọ neme ka ndị ọcha n’enyocha anyị oke nyocha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Anyị aghọtaghị Chineke anyị n’efe.Ekpere anyị anaghị eru Chineke ntị maka na anyị anaghị eme ihe kwesiri ime dịka ịgba mbọ na ibii ndụ ụmụ Chineke kwesiri ka ha n’ebi site na idobe iwu ya nile.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Anyị amaghị ahọpụta ezigbo ndị ndụ anyị, kpatara na ndị amaghị ọchịchị n’ezu ego ekwesiri iji rụpụtara obodo ọlụ. Ha n’ewere onwe ha ka chukwu, were npakọ n’emegbu ndị ogbenwe na ụmụ nwanyị. Ha n’echefu na onye ọchịchị abụghị ya n’anọ n’isi oche. Ha chefuru na Jizọsụ Kraist/Jeso Chriti bụ onye isi kachasị ndị isi nile weturu onwe ya n’ala were rụa ihe nile Chineke zitere ya ka ọrụa n’ụwa. Jisọsụ bụ Eze kachasị Eze enweghị mgbe ojiri mpakọ chịa ọchịchị. Ọbụkwaghị ndị ma ihe n’achị. Ọbụ sọsọ ndị ji ego. Nke a mere na ọbụ sọ ndị nwere ego ka ụmụ anyị n’enomi. Onye ose foto anakwaghị esegị foto maka na ịdịghị ka onye ji ego ma ọbụ onye amara ama.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Anaghị egekwa olu ndị ana achịchị ,ma ọbụ mee ihe ha chọrọ. Imirikiti ụgbọ ala abụghị ihe ndị g’enye ụmụ ogbenye mmiri, ọkụ, okpolo ụzọ na ezigbo ụlọ ọgwụ. Ndị na chị achị n’eme ihe otu osiri masị ha. Mgbe ọha sịrị na ha achọkwaghị ịsụ asụsụ ọzọ ma ọbụghị Igbo n’ọgbakọ Ndị Igbo, ndị isi kwesiri ime otu ahụ n’enweghị mgbaghasị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Anyị anaghị akpọkụ otu nile di iche iche mgbe anyị neme nzukọ, m’ọbụ kọwara ọha n’eze ihe anyị neme ka onye ọbụna mara ebe anyị na eje.Otu karịrị akarị maka na onye ọbụna chọrọ ịbụ onye isi. Azọ ọchịchị, onye ọdabaghịrị agbakapụ nwee otu nke ya, kama ọga ejikọ aka onye ahọpụtara ka ihe gaa nke ọma, m’ọbụ chere mgbe ọzọ ka ọzọ kwa ọzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị ọchịchị eburule ndọrọ ndọrọ bubata n’ime ụlọ Ụka na n’ime Obi ndị Eze na Igwe kpatara na ọgbaghara dị n’ ime obodo ọbụna. Ndị Eze na Igwe hapụ inekọta obodo ha anya, ha agbara gaa na nke ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ikete oke nke ha. Ọtụtụ n’ime ha n’achọkwa oke ụmụ na nwunye ha, ndị n’enweghị ike ịchọta ọlụ na ike aka ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ịhụ onwe anyị n’anya g’ame ka anyị bulie onye nke anyị elu mgbe ọna eme ọfụma ma nyekwara onwe anyị aka mgbe anyị nọ n’mpka. Anya ụfụ kpatara na abalị dị egwu na ịtọ ntọ abụrụ na aka ọlụ ndị anya ọkụ na ndị enweghị aka ọlụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ahụ ihe ọjọ, ma sị ekwuna. Nke a bụ ihe gbasara ndị okenye anyị. Ekwupụtaghị ihe ọjọ n’oge na eme ka ihe mebie. Unu mara na ihe mebie ọna ahịa ahụ ndozi. Ndị okenye anyị n’asọ anya nke ukuu so emebi ịdị n’otu Ndị Igbo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọpụtara na anazịghị ebido n’ulo mara mma wee pụa ezi? Gịnị kpara ụmụ anyị jiri ego na akụ ha mepee cha obodo ndị ugwu na ndị ofe mmanụ mana beanyị atọgbọrọ chako? Ọ gịnị kpatara na anyị n’agbafusi agbafusi nke bụ na ana ewere onu ogu anyị tinyere ndị awụsa na ndị ofe mmanụ?
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Oke nkewa nke osu na uka so ebute adịghị n’otu. Mgbe mmadụ Chukwu kere eke gụpụrụ mmadụ ibe ya, mepu kwa ya obi, nghọtahie abata, obi mmadụ aghasaa, aṅụrị agaghị adịkwa ịlụrụ obodo ọlụ n’obi ọcha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ịgụ akwụkwọ bara uru, mana anyị ga eme ka ụmụ anyị nwe ezigbo ụlọ akwụkwọ nke nne na nna ga akwunwu ụgwọ ya, ebe aga n’akụzi ihe ọma gbasara Ndị Igbo, asụsụ Igbo, na ịtụ egwu Chineke.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Asụsụ anyị mara mma, ogeme ka anyị n’ekwu otu olu. Sụba nụ Igbo bụ ezigbo ihe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị Igbo anọghị n’otu ndọrọ ndọrọ egwuregwu ọchịchị pụtara na ikwekọrịta n’otu ihe hịara ahụ. Kedu ka onye APGA, onye PDP, onye APC na onye Labor ga ekwekọrịta iwepụta otu onye Igbo ka ọzọọ ọchịchị obodo Naịjirịa n’aha Ndị Igbo? Kedu ka otu abụghị nke Ndị Igbo bụ ndị ahụghị anyị n’anya n’ekwu ihe neme ga esi weputa onye Igbo ka ọchịa Naịjirịa? Nwoke ọna amu nwa?
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọbụrụ na ndị Chukwu nyere onyinye nkwuputa ga enye aka kwuputa ihe ndịa, Ndị Igbo ga agbanwe omume ha n’ụzọ kwesiri ekwesi.Anyị agaghị eru nyabụ ije n’isi n’otu ụbọchị, mana Chineke Ndị Igbo ga aza ekpere anyị. Mgbe n’eteghị anya, anyị ga enwe mmeri, anyị ga ahụ ihe anyị n’achọ n’uko elu n’uko ala.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka Chineke mezie okwu mụ!
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị Channels Television na-ekwu n'aka na-achị Steeti Edo, bụ Adams Oshiomole, enyela ndị uwe ojii nanị mkpụrụ ụbọchị 14 ka ha were chọpụta ndị gburu Oyerinde Olaitan, onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche Oshiomole, yana akawe ukwu ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Gọvanọ Oshiomole nyere ndị uwe ojii iwu ka ya na ndị isi otu ndọrọndọrọ ochịchị Steeti ahụ mechara ngaghari iwe na Benin.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Oshiomole gwara ndị isi otu ndọrọndọrọ ndị n’agba ya ụkwụ ka ha wepu aka n’ihe ọjọọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị abalị dị egwu anọ a na-eche na ha riri ngo jere be Oyerinde gbuo ya, n’ihe dịka elekere abụọ nke isi ụtụtụ Fraịdee. Ha gbara ya ọnụ mgbọ atọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Otu jikọtara ndị ọrụ, bụ Nigeria Labour Congress akọtọgo ụdị akparamagwa a. Ndị NLC kpọrọ gọọmenti etiti ka o tinye aka mee nnyocha were chọpụta ebe mmiri siri ba n’opu ụgbọgụrụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọnwụ mgbabi emeela n’usekwu Akanchawa ụmụ Igbo bi na Michigan jieme ọnụ - Mazị Chris na Oriakụ (Dọkịnta) Indira Ọnwụzurike! Okorobịa na Dimkpa Agụ ha ji akpa nganga – Ikechukwu Ọnwụzurike - etibiri n’ike nwụọ! Chaị, gịnị kpatara ihe ọma ji naghị ekwe ka ejide ya n’aka? Chaị, ewu ataala anyị igu n’isi!
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ikechukwu, Ikechukwu, Ikechukwu Ọnwụzurike – ebe ka ị gara ị jiri naghị anụkwa akwa nne gị? Ụmụnne gị na-eche ka ị lọọta ebe ị gara! Nna gị na-atụ anya ka ị lọọtakwa! Ndị enyi gị na-achọ gị. Ụmụ Igbo na-atụ anya ka Odogwu okorobịa ha lọta! Chaị Ikechukwu, ọ bụ otu a ka ị jiri bịa njem gị n’ụwa? Anya mmiri ejule anyị anya. Ụwa ebelere nne na nna gị akwa n’ihi na mmadụ ekwesịghị ịkwọcha aka wee tiere ọkụkọ akụ. Ekpere onye ọbụla n’ala Igbo bụ ka nwa lie nne na nna n’ihi na onye nwa liri bara ụba!
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ikechukwu, mgbe anyị nọọ n’ụlọ akwa gị n’abalị, ụwa nile gbakọtara! Ọ dịka ebe a na-eli onye gbara narị afọ! Igbo bụ Igbo pụtachara n’ụlọ! Ndị Igbo Cultural Association of Michigan gbakọrọ n’igwe. Ndị Igbo Women Association of Michigan kwụụkwa chịm-chịm. Ndị ORA si na Steetị dị iche iche si n’ụgbọ-elu na n’ụgbọ-ala wụchasịa. Ụwa kwuru ụka! Ụmụnne na ụmụnna gị tinyekwere ndị enyi na ndị ụlọ akwụkwọ gị gbara ama gị! N’ihe ha kwuru, tụụmadị otu ị jiri bitụ ndụ ha aka, ọ dịka ị matara na ndụ gị n’ụwa ga-adị mkpụmkpụ. Dịka otu onye edemede kwuru: “Atụrụ m anya ịgafe n’ụwa nke a n’otu mgbe; Maka ya, o nwee ihe ọma m nwere ike imere, ma ọ bụ enyemaka m ga-egosị mmadụ ibe m, ka m mee ya ugbụ a; ka m ghara ị sị mgbe o ruru echi ma ọ bụ leghara ya anya, n’ihi na agaghị m agaafe n’ụzọ a ọzọ.” (“I expect to pass through this world but once; any good thing therefore that I can do, or any kindness that I can show to any fellow creature, let me do it now; let me not defer or neglect it, for I shall not pass this way again”). Ike, ndewo maka nlepụ anya gi!
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ike, Ugo nwa, Enyi ọha, Nwata udo zuru ahụ, O ji nwayọ ejee, Nwata ụbụrụ ya na-acha ọkụ n’akwụkwọ dịka baatịrị, Dimkpa agụ ụmụ Igbo; Chaị, onye wetara mma ejiri gbue agụ? N’ezie a, ihe tagburu nkịta ataala arụ! Ọnwụ, ebe ka ike gị dị? Olee ebe mma agha gị dị? Ọnwụ, gịnị kpatara ị ji egbu nwoke, egbukwa nwanyị; egbu okenye, egbukwa nwata? Ọnwụ, ị nwekwara enyi? Ọnwụ, ị na-emekwa ebere? Dịka Akwụkwọ Nsọ na-ajụ gị na Ndị Korịnt: “Ọnwụ, ole ebe mmeri gị dị? Ọnwụ, ole ebe ihe ọgbụgba gị dị?” Ọnwụ, biko gaazuru ike n’ihi na onye emeriri emeri ka ị bụ!
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ikechukwu, hapụ n’ihi na Chi gị maara ihe mere gị! Ọ bụrụ na ihe bịakwutere gị ọgụ bụ ihe ego ma ọ bụ ihe ije ụkwụ ga-ebi, Aka na-akpa ego bụ Chris nna gị ma ọ bụ nne gị bụ Dọkịnta gara ajọta gị. Ọ rawa ha ahụ, ụmụ Igbo na ndị ORA na ndi IWAM na ndi enyi gara eburu mma na egbe na ụta na osisi na aka-odo ha gbatara ha ọsọ enyemaka n’ịjọ gị. Ọnwụ gara ahụụ ike na ọgụ! Chaị, egbe eburule nwa ọkụkọ n’iru nne ya! Ikechukwu, ihe bịakwutere gị ọgụ karịrị mmadụ! Anyamiri ejula anyị anya! Ọnwụ anapụla anyị okorobịa anyị ji akpa nganga. Ya dịwa!
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Akanchawa Chris Ọnwụzurike na ezi n’ụlọ ya, biko unu kara ọma! Chukwu maara ihe mere Ikechukwu ebe unu mụrụ ya kpọọ ya Ikechukwu! Onweghị onye ga-aba Chukwu ọgụ! Onweghịkwa onye ga-ajụ ya ihe O jiri gbaa nkịtị mgbe mmiri na-erughị eru a jiri zoo! Ekpere ndị nile kwere ekwe bụ ka “E mee uche Chukwu na ndụ anyị.” Chris, biko unu ebekwala akwa ka ndị na-enweghị okwukwe na olileanya. Chetakwanụ na mmadụ ekwesịghị ifu n’afọ ihe ya furu! Ụmụ Igbo, unu ghara! Ọnwụ si n’azụ bịa ọgụ! Chukwu ma ihe merenụ!
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

A naghị agbalarị Chi gị n’ọsọ. Onye gbakarịrị Chi ya n’ọsọ, ga agbagbu onwe ya. Chineke adịghị agbanwe agbanwe. text: N’agbanyeghị n’ebum n’uche ya na Barack Obama, onye isi ala Amerịka, abụghị ofu n’ihe gbasara mmekọrịta mba ụwa na mba Iran, Netanyahu kelere Obama maka nkwado ndị Amerịka na-akwado mba Izrel. Netanyahụ kwuru si na mba Amerịka na mba Izrel bụ enyi oma. Netanyahụ kọtọrọ mkparị ụbụbọ ahụ na-aga n’ihu ugbu a n’etiti Iran na mba ụwa maka ịchọta ụzọ a ga-esi eme ka Iran ghara inwete akara ngwa ogbunigwe nuklia.

text: Ọtụtụ ndị ọnụ na-eru n’okwu n’ihe gbasara mmekọrịta mba Amerịka na mba Izrel na-ekwu na otu Netanyahụ siri bịa njem a abụghị ihe ziri ezi, n’ihi na nanị ya na ndị isi otu Rịpọblikan bụ ndị kwekọrịtaranụ. Ọtụtụ ndị otu Demokrat na-agba abụbụ, ha ekweghị aga n’ogige ebe Netanyahu kwuru okwu ahụ, nke ha na-ege ya ntị. Nke a bụ maka na Netanyahu na onye isi ndị Demokrat, bụ Obama, ejighị otu obi.

text: Ndị Golden Eaglets gbara onye nke anọ n’asọmụmpi bọọlụ ụkwụ African U-17 nke e mere na mba Nije. Amunike kwuru n’ọ bụrụ na a hazigharịa Golden Eaglets, yanwa nwere olile anya na ha ga-eme ọfụma na Chile.

text: Gọọmenti steeti ahụ na-akpọ ndị dị otu a ka ha were ya nwayọ; ka ha kpachara anya ha. Onye kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ebe obibi, yana ọkụ latrik, bụ Haruna Mishelia, gwara ndị nta akụkọ na Maiduguri, na gọọmenti na-adọ ndị niile na-alọghachị aka na ntị maka na a na-atụ ụjọ na, tụpụ ha bọrọ ọsọ, o nwere ike ịbụ na ndị Boko Haram liri mgbọ ogbunigwe n’ebe ndị iche iche.

text: Gọọmenti ala Naịjiria ekwuputego mkpebi ya maka ịkwụsị kpam kpam akparamagwa ọ bụna na-ewete mmegbu ma ọ bụ ịkpa oke megide ụmụ nwanyị. A na-agba mbọ ịhụ n’iwu na usoro ọchịchị nke ala Naịjirịa gbadoro ụkwụ n’iwu na usoro ọchịchị nke mba ụwa gbasara ọnọdụ ụmụ nwanyị. Onye minista na-ahụ maka mmepe na agam n’ihu ụmụ nwanyị, bụ Zaniab Maina, kwuputere nke a n’Abuja.

text: Maina kwuru si na na-agbanyeghị n’ala Naịjirịa na-agbalị n’ihe gbasara ịnye ụmụ nwanyị oke nke ruuru ha, a ka nwere ọtụtụ ọlụ e kwesiri ịlụ n’ịnye ụmụ nwanyị ezigbo ọnọdụ obibi, yana ịkwụsị mmegbu na ịkpa oke megide ụmụ nwanyị.

text: Maina gbakwụnyere na ya nwere olile anya na Naịjirịa ga-abụ obodo ebe ịkpa oke na-adịghị, ebe ụmụ nwanyị ga na-enwete ezigbo agụm akwụkwo, na-ekwu uche ha, ma na-esonye n’usoro ọchịchị obodo, na-enweghị ịkpa oke ọ bụna megide ha.

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark

text: Gọọmenti ala Naịjiriịa ekwuona na ya na-agba mbọ ịrụtọpụ ọrụ niile ya ji n’aka ugbu a maka ịhazigharị ngalaba njem ụgbọelu. Onye minista na-ahụ maka njem ụgbọelu, Osita Chidoka, gwara ndị nta akụkọ na ngalaba njem ụgbọelu na-ahọrọzi ọlụ ndị kachasị mkpa n’ime ọlụ niile dịịrị ya. Nke a bụ maka n’ego mmawapụta na-abịa na ngalaba ahụ gbadara agbada kemgbe ọnụ ego mmanụ akụ chi nyere dara.

text: Chidoka kpọrọ ndị isi ọlụ, ndị ọ bụ ọlụ ha ịkenye ọlụ ngo, ka ha tinye anya n’ọlụ ndị kachasị mkpa, tụmadị ọlụ ndị ahụ a na-akwadozi ịrụtọpụ arụtọpụ.

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark

label: igbo

text: Na mbido, ode akwụkwọ otu ndị mmepụta akwa bụ comrade Issa Aremu kwuru mkpa Ọ dị ibu agha megide mpụ. O kwuru n’agha abụghị nanị nke A ga-ahapụrụ ndị EFCC, ICPC na ndị uwe ojii.

text: Aremu gakwara n’ihu kwuo na Ọ bụ mpụ mere na ọtụtụ steeti enweghị ike ịkwụ ụgwọ ọnwa. Ọ kpọkuru onye isi ala ka O leba anya n’ihe E kwekọtara n’ọgbakọ ezumezu nke afọ 2014 ka E nwe ike ibu agha megide mpụ.

text: Onye isi ala mba Kongo,  Joseph Kabila, achịala yabụ mba kemgbe afọ puku abụọ n’out. Iwu mba ahụ gosiri na Ọ ga-arịtu n’ọnwa  December. Mana otu ndọrọ ndọrọ na-achị mba ahụ nakwa ụfọdụ ndị na-agba ya ụkwụ kwekoritara ka Ọ nọrọ n’ọkwa ruo n’ọnwa  April afọ puku abụọ n’iri na asatọ. Mgbe ahụ ka A ga-ahọpụta onye onye isi ala ọhụrụ.

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dọturu akụkọ a.

citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na mbụ n'okwu ya banyere mwakpo ahụ, onye ụkọchukwu nke ụlọ ụka ahụ, bụ Rev. Fr. Jude Ọnwụasọ sịrị na ya bụ mkpamkpa kpara n'ọnụ ụtụtụ n'ụka aja mass dị nsọ ka o jiri ọkara gata elekere isii nke ụtụtụ ahụ. Ọ sịrị na oge aja mass ahụ na-aga n'ihu, ka otu nwoke a na-amaghị onye ọ bụ batara n'ime ụlọ ụka ahụ, gaa waa n'otu akụkụ ka nwamkpi ma ụzọ ọba wee gbaa otu onye a na-akpọ maazị Akụnwafọr Ikegwụọnwụ egbe gbagbuo ya, wee malitezie gbanyebe ya bụ egbe aghara aghara n'ebe ndi mmadụ ndi ọzọ nọ, n'ime ụlọ ụka ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Otu onye aka ebe, bụkwa onye nọ n'ụlọ ụka ahụ oge ihe ahụ mere sịrị na ndi ahụ bu ụgbọ ala abụọ wee bata ma kwụsịdebe n'ọnụ ụzọ ama nke ụlọ ụka ahụ, ebe ndi nọ n'ime ha rịtusịrị ma bụrụkwa ndi yikọsi uwe ndi agha ala anyị (Army Uniform), kpuchie ihu ha ma burusikwa ihe dịka egbe n'aka. Ọ sị na ihu eluigwé gbara ọchịchịrị oge ahụ, nke mere na ahụchaghị ihe ha bu anya nke ọma, ma sịkwa na ihe ọzọ a hụrụ bụ ka ndi ahụ wụbatara n'ebe ahụ a na-achụ aja mass dị nsọ wee kwughepu egbe, ngbọ wee daba aghara aghara. Onye ọzọ kọwara onwe ya dịka onye ọbụ abụ sịkwara na ụgbọ ala ahụ ndi ahụ dochiri n'ọnụ ụzọ ama mezịrị ka ndi mmadụ ghara inwe ike ịbata abata ma ọ bụ ịpụ apụ, nke mere na ha gbutere ọtụtụ ndi mmadụ, ebe ọtụtụ bụkwa ndi natara mmerụ ahụ. Ọ kwukwara na ndi omekoome ahụ makpurusiri n'ime ụgbọ ala ha ma nyaa ọnwụ ọnwụ ma fee ka nnụnụ, ngwa ngwa ha kpachara arụ ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu nke ya, onye isi ndi uwe ojii na steeti ahụ, bụ maazị Garba Umar, onye kpọrọ ndi ọrụ ya wee wucha n'ebe ahụ ka ọ gachara ihe dịka otu awa ndi ahụ ji wee pụọ, katọkwara ya bụ agwa ọjọọ ma sịkwa na ozi ha natagoro na nnyocha ha mere na-egosi na ọ bụ esemokwu dapụtara n'etiti ụfọdụ ụmụ afọ si obodo ahụ si n'ime ogbe Ụmụezekwe Ofufe Amakwa bụ ndi bi na mba ofesi butere ya bụ mwakpo. O kwukwara na ọ dịghị onye ọbụla abụghị nwa afọ obodo ahụ nke ga enwe ike ịkpanwu ụdị agwa ahụ, maka na ọ bụ naanị nwa afọ obodo ahụ pụrụ ịma onye bụ onye nke ha chọrọ bịa n'ụlọ ụka ahụ, nakwa n'akụkụ ebe onye ahụ na-anọ ma ọ bịa ụka, nke mere na onye ahụ batara ozigbo gaa waa ka nwamkpi ma ụzọ ọba wee ga buru ụzọ gbawanye egbe n'ebe ahụ onye ahụ na-anọ, tupuu kesabazie ya n'igwe mmadụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwukwara na aka ga-akpatarịrị ndi ahụ aka ha dị na ya bụ akụmakụ ma were iwu nke ala anyi nyụchaa ha anya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Gọvanọ Willie Obianọ nọzịkwara n'oge ahụ kasie ndi niile nke ahụ metụtara obi ma nyekwa ha owuwe anya na a ga anwụchikọrịrị ndi kpara arụ ahụ n'oge adịghị anya. Oṅsikwa n'ebe ahụ ozigbo gbarakwara gaba n'ụlọ ahụike mahadum Nnamdị Azikiwe dị na Nnewi ebe ọtụtụ n'ime ndi ahụ nwetara mmerụ ahụ nọ anara ọgwụgwọ, ma kwuokwa na gọọmenti steeti ahụ ga-akwụ ụgwọ niile e jiri nye ha ọgwụgwọ. Ọ sị na e zigawoorị ndi ọrụ nlekọta ahụ ike bụ dọkịnta dị iri ise n'ọnụ ọgụgụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ ahụ ozigbo maka inye aka n'inye ndi ahụ ọgwụgwọ. Gọvanọ ahụ sizịkikwa n'ebe ahụ wee gbara gaba na ụlọ ụka Our Lady of Assumption dị na Nnewi, ebe ọ nọrọ wee gwa igwe mmadụ nọ n'ulọ ụka okwu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọtụtụ ụmụ afọ steeti ahụ nakwa ndi ọzọ sitere n'ebe dị iche iche n'ụwa gbaa gburu gburu katọrọ kpamkpam ya bụ akparamagwa ọjọọ. Ndi ahụ gụnyere aka na-achị steeti Delta bụ Gọv. Ifeanyị Okowa, ogbo ya nke steeti Ekiti bụ Gọv. Ayodele Fayose, onye na-anọchite anya ọgbọ nta nkwado ndịda anyanwụ nke steeti Anambra (Anambra South) n'ụlọ ọgbakọ ukwu sineetị bụ maazịAndy Uba, onye jibụ ọkwa onye isi ngalaba na-ahụ maka ọdụ ụgbọ elu n'ala anyị n'oge gara aga bụ maazị Osita Chidịọka, ode akwụkwọ ukwu nke steeti Anambra n'oge gara aga bụ maazị Henry Oseloka Ọbaze, nakwa ọtụtụ ndi ọzọ, bụkwa ndi kpọrọ oku ka e mee nnyocha miri emi maka ya bụ ajọ ọdachi.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ha sịrị na osote onye isi ala bụ Maazị Yemi Osibanjọ, bụ onye ka jigodi ọkwa dịka onye isi ala kemgbe ọnwa atọ enwebeghị ike ime ihe ụfọdụ, bụ ihe ndi dịịrị onye isi ala ime, ma kpọkuokwa ụmụ ala Naịjiria ka ha doo gwa ya bụ nwoke ka ochighata malite ọrụ ma ọ bụ gbaa alụkwaghị m, ka ala Naịjiria wee gaa n'iru.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ nọkwara n'oge ahụ kwuo hoohaa na o dochaghị anya etu ndi uwe ojii siri mee nyocha nke ha ọsọsọ ma tie aka n'ike sị na ọ bụ nsogbu dapụtara n'etiti ụmụ afọ Ọzụbụlụ bi na mba ofesi kpatara njinji ahụ jiri.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Maazị Kanụ kpọkuzịrị ndi ọ dị n'aka ka ha mee nnyocha ghe anya oghe banyere ajọ ọnọdụ ahụ ma gbalịakwa hụ na anwụchikọrọ ndi kpara ya bụ arụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụmụ nwanyị a, bụ ndi sitere n'okpuru ọchịchị Isoko North nke steeti ahụ mere ngagharị iwe ahụ site na njikọaka nke ụmụ ntorobia nke obodo ahụ, wee mechie ya bụ ụzọ awara awara ma jụ na onweghị ụgbọ ala ma ọ bụ ọgba tum tum ọbụla ga-aga ebe ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ha kwuru na ndi Fulani ahụ na ehi ha emebisiena ọtụtụ ihe n'obodo ahụ, ma sịkwa na nke kacha njọ bụ otu ndi gọọmenti siri raa ntị mmanụ ma gba nkịtị na-agbanyeghị mkpesa niile he wetagoro n'aka ha banyere arụ ahụ ndi ahụ na-akpa na ya bụ obodo.
label: igbo

text: {instantpaypal}action=donate,price=10{/instantpaypal} Izunna Okafor is a lover of the Igbo language. He joined the Igbo Radio in August 2017. text: Ya bụ mmemme nke afọ a n'Abagana dọtara imirikiti mmadụ, ndi a maara aha ha nakwa ọtụtụ ndi e ji okwu ha agba izu, ndi sitere n'ebe dị iche iche n'ala Naịjiria nakwa na mba ofesi.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka ọ na-ekwu okwu na mmemme ahụ, Maazị Nwachukwu Anakwenze, bụ onye isi otu jikọtara ndi Anambra bi na mba Yụnaịted Steeti nke Amerika (USA) ma bụrụkwa onye ọrụ dọkinta bi na mba ahụ, kwuputara na ebumnobi ya bụ mmemme bụ iji gosi ụwa na ndi Igbo bụ agbụrụ Chukwu gọziri ma bụrụkwa ndi nwere ọnatarachi na omenala bụ ọka ibe na mba ụwa. O kwuputara na ndi Igbo bụ ndi na-agbasi mbọ ike, na-ejepụ ejepụ, na-akpa nwanne, ma na-elerukwa ndi ọbịa anya nke ọma.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Maazị Nwachukwu, bụkwa Onoowu nke Abagana sị na ọ bụ ndi Igbo a tọọrọ n'oge a na-azụ ahịa óhù (slave trade) bụ ndi tọrọ ntọ ala mmepe nke mba Amerika ma sikwa na ọ bụ nke a mere ndi Amerika jiri rụọ ebe ndebe ihe ọkpụ (museum) na mba ahụ iji wee kwanyere ndi Igbo ugwu. Mmemme ahụ ka o kwupakpara n'ezie na ọ bụ oge iji nọkọọ ọnụ dịka ụmụnne wee kpaa ma kpee ekpere maka uto na ọganihu nke obodo ahụ, steeti Anambra, ndi Igbo nakwa ala Naịjiria n'izugbe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu nke ya, eze ọdịnala nke obodo ahụ, bụ igwe Patrick Mbamalị kelere n'ụzọ pụrụ iche ndi niile bịara ya bụ mmemme, ọkachasị ya Onoowu banyere ezi mbọ ha niile iji wee kwalite ọdịmma nke obodo ahụ na nke ndi Igbo na mba ụwa. Ọ nọkwazịrị n'oge ahụ kpee ekpere maka ahụ isike na ọdịmma nke igwe mmadụ ahụ na ụmụ afọ igbo nọ na mpaghara ebe dị iche iche n'ụwa gbaa gburugburu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Eze ọdịnala Ifite Dunu, Igwe Emeka Iloụnọ bụ onye bịara ya bụ mmemme kwuputara n'ezie na omenala bụ ejiri mara ndi, ma rịọkwa arịrịọ ka ndi Igbo n'ụwa niile jigidesie omenala ha ike ma na-akwalitekwa ọkachasị asụsụ Igbo iji hụ na ọ nwughị ma ọ bụ funahị ha dịka òtu UNESCO buru n'amụma.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndi ọzọ kwuru okwu na ya bụ mmemme gụnyere maazị Ben Ụgha, bụ onye isi otu na-ahụ maka ọdịmma nke Abagana, onye D.P.O ndi uwe ojii n'Abagana bụ Ọkaiwu Dan Uke, onye gabụrụ ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu steeti Anambra n'oge gara Họnọrebụụl George Ike-Okoye nakwa ụfọdụ ndi ọzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark

text: Ịgba egwu ọdịnala dị iche iche nakwa igosi ihe ngosi dị iche iche e jiri mara Igbo so n'ihe pụtakarịchara ìhè na mmemme ahụ. Ihe ndi ọzọ merekwara ka mmemme ahụ zaa aha ya bụ: iwa na ikesa ji ọhụụ ahụrụ ahụ, bụ nke e jiri mmanụ akwụ, ụkpaka, ose nakwa akwụkwọ ụtazị mara abụba wee chọọ mma, tinyere mmanya ngwọ jụrụ oyi, nke e jiri gbanyere ya ụgbọ nwamkpi.

text: Ndi ụka Katọlik ka o nyere ego dị otu narị nde Naịra, iri ise na iteghete, na ụma ise (N159.5m), ebe ndi ụka Anglican na ụka ọgbara ọhụụ (Pentikostal) nwetara nde Naịra iri asatọ na anọ (N84m) na nde Naịra iri na ise (N15m) n'otu n'otu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka ọ na-enye ha akwụkwọ ịdọrọ ego (cheque) ahụ, Gọvanọ Obianọ kwuru na e kesara ego ahụ dịka usoro ọnụ ọgụgụ ụlọ ọgwụ ndị ụka ọbụla nwere dị, dịka iwu siri kwuo, nakwa ole ike ha ra, dịka o si pụta ihè n'amụmà ego ọrụ steeti ahụ, nke ahọ 2017. Ọ rịọzịkwara ụlọ ọgwụ ndi ụka nwe, ndi na-esoghị keta ego nke ahọ a, ka ha zite ihe ghasaara, ka ha wee bata n'amụma ego ọrụ steeti ahụ nke ahọ na-abịa.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Gọvanọ Obianọ kwuru na ọchịchị ya ekeena ego ịgbata ọsọ enyemaka nke ngalaba ahụ ike na steeti ahụ ụzọ atọ, nke bụ: iwulite akụrụngwa e ji akwalite ọnọdụ ahụ ike, ịhụ na ndi ọrịa nwetere nkasi obi na ezi nnọzite, nakwa inye ndi ọrụ nkụzi, ijigide ha na ịhụ maka ezi ọnọdụ obibi ndụ ha. Ọsịkwazị na nke ahụ so n'otu n'ime mbọ ọchịchị ya na-agba ịhụ na e nwere ezi nnwogharị pụrụ iche na ngalaba ahụ ike na steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na mbụ n'okwu ya, onye Kọmichọna na-ahụ maka ahụ ike na steeti ahụ, bụ Dọkịnta Josephat Akabuike kwuru na ịgba ahụ ọchịchị nọ ugbua tigoro na ngalaba ahụ ike ahụ bụ iji wee webata mgbanwe dara ụda n'ebe ọnọdụ ahụ ike na inye ọgwụgwọ dị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dọkịnta Akabụike kpọpụtara ihe dịgasị iche iche ọchịchị nọ ugbu a megoro na ngalaba ahụ ike, nke gụnyere iwebata atụmatụ 'State Health Insurance Scheme', Ịkwalite amụma 'State Primary Healthcare', Iwube ụlọ ọrụ 'State Integrated Emergency Management Services', Inyegharị ndi ụlọ ọgwụ asambodo, tinyere ihe ndi ọzọ ha mepụtagoro.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'aka nke ya, onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche nye Gọvanọ n'ihe gbasaara ọrụ ugbo, njem nlegharị anya, inye ọzụzụ na ọnọdụ gbanụ gbanụ, bụ 'Venerable' Amaechi Okwuosa kwuputara hoohaa na Gọvanọ Obianọ egosipụtana n'ebe a hụrụ anya, na ọ bụ nwoke na-adịghị akpa oke n'opukperechi, ma sịkwa na e wezuga mmemme ndi ọzọ, na ya bụ Gọvanọ na-esonyesi ike na mmemme na ọgbakọ dị iche iche ndi ụka na-emegasị na steeti ahụ, ma na-akwalitekwa mmelọrịta nke okpukperechi dị iche iche n'ala Naịjiria.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ozi ekele ha n'otu n'otu, onye Archbishop 'Metropolitan, Ecclesiastical Province' nke Niger, bụ 'Most Reverend' Christian Efobi, nke onye nọchitere anya ya bụ 'Venerable' David Obiagboso; onye 'Archbishop Metropolitan, Onitsha Catholic Archdiocese' bụ 'Most Reverend' Valerian Okeke, nke onye nọchitere anya ya bụ 'Auxiliary Bishop' nke Dịọsis Awka, bụ 'Most Reverend' Jonas Benson Okoye, tinyere onye nnọchite anya nke otu jikọtara ndi ụka Pentikostal n'ala Naịjiria, kelere Gọvanọ Willie Obianọ maka mgbata ọsọ ya na mbọ niile ọ na-agba iji kwalite ọnọdụ obibi ndụ ndi Anambra, ma kwe nkwa iji ego ndi ahụ wee rụọ ọrụ e jiri weta ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark

text: Ka ọ na-ekwputa na ọrụ na-aga n'ihu n'ụzọ nke siri Nkwọ-Umuchu gaa Achala-Umuchu, Gọvanọ Obianọ kwukwara na e nyego ọrụ ngo nke ịrụgharị ụlọ ọgwụ ọhaneze dị n'Ụmuchu, bụ nke ọ sị na o so n'otu n'ime ụlọ ọgwụ a ga-eji wee rụọ ọrụ amụma 'Health Insurance Scheme' nke steeti ahụ.

text: Ọ nọzịkwara n'oge ahụ rịọ ndi obodo ahụ ka ha gaa n'ihu n'inye ọchịchị ya nkwado iji wee ga n'ihu n'ọrụ ọma o ji n'aka na steeti ahụ.

text: N'ozi nnọọ ya n'ofufe nru ahụ pụrụ iche, onye Bishọp ụka Katọlik na Dịọsis Awka, bụ Bishọp Paulinus Ezeokafor kelere gọọmenti steeti Anambra na mbọ ya niile n'iwunye ihe dị iche iche na-akwalite ọnọdụ obibi ndụ na ọnọdụ mmụta n'obodo a na n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dịgasị iche iche na mpaghara ahụ, ma rịọziekwa ụmụ akwụkwọ ka ha gbado anya n'ịgụ akwụkwọ ha.

label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Otu jikọtara ndị ahịa na steeti Anambra bụ AMATAS n'aha mkpirisi na nke jikọtara ndị ahịa na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ ala anyị bụ SEAMATA ekworona ntutu taa ma kpebie na ha agaghị ekwe ka e nwee ihe ọbụla bụ igwu ojoro n'ụdị ọbụla na nhọpụta ọchịchị na-abịa n'ihu na steeti ahụ, site n'aka mmadụ ọbụla ma ọ bụ otu ọbụla.

label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ya bụ mmemme weere ọnọdụ n'ahịa Afọr Adazi-Nnukwu dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Anaocha na steeti Anambra ụbọchị Satọdee gara aga, ma bụrụkwa nke dọtara ọtụtụ ụmụafọ obodo ahụ, ma ndi nọ n'ụlọ na ndị bị na mba ofesi, tinyere ọtụtụ ndị selitere isi n'ọrụ gọọmenti.

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ bụ nnọọ ụwa bịa kirie, dịka ụmụafọ, ndi enyi, ndị nwadiala, ikwu na ibe nakwa ndị agbataobi obodo Adazi-Nnukwu nuputara n'igwe ma sonye na mmemme iri ji ọhụụ nke ya bụ obodo, nke ahọ 2017.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark

text: Ka ọ na-eme mmemme ịwa ji, Adama (eze ọdịnala) Adazi-Nnukwu, bụ Igwe Ọkammụta Augustine Obiekezie kwuru na ya bụ mmemme abụrụna nnọ oge ịgbakọ kpee ekpere, kelee Chineke maka ngọzị ya na obodo ahụ, ma kwanyekwara ụmụafọ obodo ahụ ugwu.

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ kọwara ji dịka eze nke ihe niile a kụrụ n'ubi, ma kpọkwazie oku ka e webata ụzọ ọgbara ọhụụ e ji akọ ụgbo, iji wee kwalite ihe omume ya na ihe a na-enweta site na ya.

citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu nke ya na mmemme ahụ, onye kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ndị ntorobịaa, ọrụ aka na nkwalite egwuregwu, bụ Dọkịnta oriakụ Uju Nwọgụ kọwara mmemme iri ji dịka ụzọ pụrụ iche e si egosi ma na-akụnye n'ime ụmụntakịrị Igbo omenala ndi Igbo na ịma mma nke ọnatarachi dị iche iche Chineke jiri wee gọzie ndị ya bụ agbụrụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ kpọkuru onye ọbụla, ọ kachasị ndi ntorobịa ka ha banye n'ọrụ ugbo ma jikọtakwa onwe ha ọnụ n'otu 'cooperative' dị iche iche iji wee rita uru n'atụmatụ dị iche iche gọọmenti steeti ahụ ji n'aka banyere ngalaba ahụ iji kwalite ọdịmma nke ndị bi n'ime ime obodo.

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye 'Pesident-General' nke obodo ahụ, bụ maazị Francis Madubuike nakwa onye isi otu 'Society of Engineers' n'oge mbụ, bụ maazị Chief Cyril Anaeto, kwuru n'otu n'otu, na udo tọrọ atọ na ezi nchekwa dị n'obodo ahụ ugbu a bụ n'ihi ịdị uchu nke ọchịchị Gọvanọ Willie Obianọ, ma sịkwazie na ọ bụ ezi mgbanwe nke ọchịchị ya wetagoro na ngalaba ọrụ ugbo mere e jiri nwee nnukwu owuwe ihe ubi na ya bụ obodo n'ahọ a.

text: Ihe pụtakarịchara ihe na ya bụ mmemme bụ ịwa ji, bụ nke Igwe Augustine Obiekezie mere, nakwa ikesa ji ahụrụ ahụ, bụ nke e ji mmanụ nrị, ụkpaka, ose na akwụkwọ ụtazị wee chọọ mma, nke mezịrị ka mmemme ahụ zaa aha a kpọrọ ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Aka na-achị steeti ahụ bụ gọvanọ Willie Obianọ kwuputara nke ahụ n'ofufe nru pụrụ iche, nke weere ọnọdụ ụbọchị ụka gara aga n'ụlọ ụka St. Andrews (Katọlik) nke Adazi Nnukwu, dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Anaọcha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ya bụ ofufe nru pụrụ iche bụ iji mee mmemme icheta ọgbụgba ahọ iri abụọ na ise e jiri chie onye 'Auxiliary Bishop' nke ụka Katọlik na Dịọsis Awka bụ 'Most Reverend' Jonas-Benson Okoye.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Gọvanọ Willie Obianọ, nke onye nọchitere anya ya bụ ode akwụkwọ izugbe nke steeti ahụ, bụ Ọkammụta Sobe Chukwulobelụ mere ka a mara banyere izuzu iwebata ya bụ amụma n'usoro ọchịchị, ma kpọkuokwa ndị steeti ahụ ka ha gaa n'ihu ịdọnyere ọchịchị ya ukwu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị ọzọ kwuru okwu na mmemme ahụ gụnyere onye kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ndị ntorobịaa, ọrụ aka na nkwalite egwuregwu, bụ Dọkịnta oriakụ Uju Nwọgụ; onye isi otu na-ahụ maka ịhọpụtagharị Gọvanọ Willie Obianọ ma bụrụkwa onye isi izugbe nke otu pati APGA n'ala anyị n'ogo gara aga, bụ maazị Victor Umeh, tinyere ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ. Ha niile kelere Chineke banyere ndụ ya bụ nwoke.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ha jizịkwara ohere ahụ wee kpọkuo ndị Anambra ka ha nuputa n'igwè sonyesiekwa ike na nhọpụta a ga-eme na steeti ahụ n'abalị iri na asatọ nke ọnwa Nọvemba ahọ a.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu nke ya, onye bụ isi a hụrụ kwaba okpu na ya bụ mmemme, bụ Most Reverend' Jonas-Benson Okoye kelere gọọmenti steeti Anambra n'ihi ihe o megoro, ọ kachasị na ngalaba ahụ ike, ma dụzie gọọmenti etiti ka o were ngalaba ahụ kpọrọ ihe karịa ifepụ mba ofesi anara ọgwụgwọ oge ọbụla ọkọ kọọrọ mmadụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: A nọzịkwa na ya bụ mmemme wee gọzie ma hanye n'aka Chineke nnukwu ụlọ ọgbakọ ezumezu ọhụụ a rụrụ na ya bụ ụlọ ụka.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị ọzọ bịara ya bụ mmemme gụnyere: ndi otu 'State Executive Council' , ndi otu ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu steeti ahụ, onye isi ụlọ ọba ego ala Naịjiria n'oge gara aga, bụ Ọkammụta Chukwula Soludo, aka chịrị steeti Anambra n'oge gara aga, bụ maazị Peter Obi, onye isi ngalaba ọdụ ụgbọ elu n'ala Naịjiria n'oge gara mbụ, bụ maazị Osita Chidịọka, tinyere ọtụtụ ndi ọzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: {instantpaypal}action=donate,price=10{/instantpaypal} Izunna Okafor is a lover of the Igbo language. He joined the Igbo Radio in August 2017. We want to be able to pay him at least $100 per month so that he can conitnue to write articles for the Igbo Radio and remain a part of our team of volunteer fighters who work hard to save Igbo language. Please donate whatever amount you can.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ya bụ agụ nwoke bụkwannọọ onye nọ n'ụbọchị ahụ n'ụlọ ikpe ahụ wee wedachaa onwe ala kpamkpam, ma kwuwaakwa hooha na ikpe mara ya, dịka a na-agụpụtasị ihe ahụ dị iche iche gọọmenti steeti Legoosị wetara megide ya, bụ nke e jiri wee kpee ya ikpe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọbụnadị ndị ọrụ nchekwa dị iche iche, bụ ndị kekpọkwara onwe ha nke ọma, juputara n'ụlọ ikpe ahụ nakwa ogige ya niile.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka ọ bụ ọdibendi, ọ bụ ihe a ma ama, na mba ọbụla nwere ihe e jiri mara ha maka na ụtọ bụ ihe onye kpọrọ ụtọ. Ọ bụkwa na ihe ndị na-eri ka ndị na-asọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị Igbo, ndị Yoruba na Awụsa nwagbdoro nri dị iche iche e jiri mara ha. A bịakwa n'ala Igbo, ndị obodo dị iche iche nwere ihe ha na-eri na nke ha na-asọ. Ihe ọbụla ndị na-asọ nwekwara ụfọdụ ihe kpatara ha ji asọ ya, ọ kachasị n'ebe anụ a na-eri eri dị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Iji ma atụ, Ọka bụ isi obodo steeti Anambra ma bụrụkwa otu n'ime obodo dị n'ala Igbo, anaghị eri anụ enwe n'ihi na ha kwenyere na ọ bụ enwe bụ mmụọ nwe ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọzọkwa, ndi Ebenator, dị n'okpuru ọchịchị 'Nnewi South' na steeti Anambra anaghị eri anụ eke, n'ihi na ha kwenyere na ọ bụ Eke Ọfala, bụ mmiri dị n'obodo ahụ nakwa arụsị ha fere oge gboo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ bụ ihe doro anya na asụsụ dị iche iche, mana a kwaa ụkwara, ọ bụrụ otu. N'ihi nke a, e nwere ụfọdụ nri dị iche iche zuru ụwa ọnụ, bụ nri a na-eri ebe ọbụla, dịka osikapa, agwa na ndị otu ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ala Igbo, e nwere nri dị iche iche e ji mara ha, bụ nke ha kwenyere na-enye ha ihe n'ahụ karịa ihe ndị a na-emepụtazị n'oge ugbu a, sị na ọ bụ nri. Ọ bụ nri ndị a mere ndi nna nna anyị ha jiri bie ogologo ndụ ma na-emesikwa ihe ike n'oge nke ha, bụ oge gboo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'oge gboo ahụ, nri dịka ede, akpụ, ji, adụ, ọnà, ụtara ji, ụtara ede, nduku, ụgbọgụrụ/anyụ, ighu, ịbaa, mkpụrụ ụgụ, ụkwa, ọka a gwọrọ agwọ, abacha, ọgbara, ụgba, ojoko, akịdị, fịọfịọ na nri ọdịnala ndị ọzọ bụgbado nri oke ụtọ; ebe akwụkwọ ọkazị, ụtazị, ụzịza, nchụ anwụ, ụkpaka, ose, ụrị (ede ụrị), ogiri, azụ kpọnkụ, okporoko, ịsha, oguru akwụ, mmanụ nri, akwụkwọ nri dị iche iche nakwa ngwa ofe ndị ọzọ bụ ahụghị ebuli ma sị eline dika, n'ebe isi ihe oriri dị, n'ala Igbo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Oge ahụ bụ oge ndị ghọtara ihe nri bụ ji aka ha aba n'ụsọ ekwu ma sie bupụtara ohà, maka na ha ghọtara nke ọma na nri anyị bụ ọgwụ anyị. Ọ bụ nnọọ oge a na-esighe nri esighe. Ihe ndị a mere ndị gboo ahụ jiri wee nọọ ahọ kwuru ahọ ma na-atụkwa gengem ka ihe a fụrụ afụ. Ọ bụ n'oge ahụ ka mmadụ ga-anọ ihe karịrị narị otu ahọ ma na-agbakwaara onwe ya ọsọ ka nwa okorobịa na-ejighị nkpọ, na-arịaghịkwa ọrịa ọbụla ma ọ bụ yiri ugegbe anya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Eziokwu na-elu ilu na ntị ugbu a bụzị na ihe ndị a abụrụla mba a gara aga, maka na okokporo nwoke amaghịzị uru ara baara ikwe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndi Igbo, ugbu a, amaghịzịkwa ihe a na-akọ banyere nri ọdịnala e jiri mara ha, ma ya fọdụzie ịma otu e si esi ma ọ bụ akwado ya. Nke ahụ wee bụrụ otu n'ime omenala anyị na-anwụnahị anyị ugbu a.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ugbu a bụzịkwa oge nwa agbọghọ amaghị nke ekwe na-aka, ga-abaa ụsọ ekwu, sie ihe egheghị eghe bupụta ma kpọọ ya 'haff dọn'. Nke ahụ wee bụrụ asụsụ pụtara ọhụụ ha ji aghọgbu onwe ha na ndị ha na ha bi n'ụlọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị okokporo ume ngwụ na ụmụ agbọghọ oji ọnụ etinye azụ n'ofe jizịkwa ya bụ asụsụ amaghị ebe o si wee na-atọgha ndị ọ dị nke mma, ka ha wee sonye na ya bụ ụzọ ọgbara ọhụụ, bụ nke ha sịzịkwa na ọ bụ otu ndị ọcha si esi nke ha. Ha bụ ụkpana na-ere ọkụ wee chee na ha na-aha mmanụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọzọkwa, e wezuga isi na iri nri egheghị eghe, ndị Igbo esina n'iri nri chi ha jiri gọzie wee pụọ, sị na ọ bụzịkwa iri ihe ha amaghị ebe o si na otu e siri mee ya kazị ha mma.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nke kacha agba ha ara ma bụrụkwa nke na-ata ha ego gwoo gwoo bụ nke ahụ pụtara ọhụụ na-adị ka idide ma ọ bụ eriri afọ nwa ọkụkọ, nke a sị ha kpọba indomì. Ha wee werezie ya mere nri kacha ụtọ na nke na-eghe ịchafụ ịchafụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ugbu a bụ oge ị ga-ahụzị nwa agbọghọ ma ọ bụ okorobịa ahụ zuru oke, kwa ụbọchị, o rie ya bụ indomì n'ụtụtụ, ñụọ mmanya fanta, rie ya n'ehihe ñụọ fanta, rikwazie ya n'abalị ma werekwa otu fanta ahụ budaa ya, huo aka n'afọ ma bie ezigbo ubiri dara ụda. Ị kpazịe ya aka, ọ wụọ efe ka ọkụkọ na-efe elu. Obere oge ọ malite ịdọnye afọ ka onye otoro na-awa. Tupu ị mara ihe na-eme, a sị na ọ na-arịa kansa, ma ọ bụ arịrị ọzọ adịghị n'asụsụ Igbo. Nke ahụ wee bụrụ ihe na-egbusi ndị be anyị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Oge agaana mgbe a na-eji akwụ, ogiri, ụzịza, ọkazị, ịsha, nchụ anwụ ma ọ bụ ụtazị were ete ofe. Ụtara ede, ụtara ji, ụtara akpụ, ikpoko akpụ, adụ, ighu na ọna abụrụgokwa ihe mgbe ochie ma na-asọzịkwa ndị Igbo oyi oriri.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ bụzịkwa Maggị, Ọnga, ofe e ghere eghe, Gesha, Spagetti, Nọtmeegị, Tomato na ndị otu ha ndị ọzọ kachazị anyị mma. Onye ghekọchazie ihe ndi ahụ rie, ọ chọọ otu mmanya akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ mmanya ekpem jụrụ nwịị wee butuo ya. Mmadụ a na-agbada. Obere oge otu ọrịa ejide ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Okorobịa dị n'agbata ahọ iri anọ na-ejizịkwa nkpọ na ugegbe anya aga ugbu a n'ihi na mmadụ ejighịzị ahụ. Tupuu ahọ iri na isii, onye ahụ nwụọ, a sị na ọ nọka, ma ọ bụ na o biri nnọọ ogologo ndụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nke a wee bụrụ maka ihi na anyị elegharana ịsụ n'ikwe wee na-asụzị n'ala. Onye ọbụla wee na-arịazị ihe anyị amaghị ma na-anwụchuzị anwụchu ka ọkụkọ. Ndị be anyị, ka anyị ghọtanụ na nri anyị bụ ọgwụ anyị, na ọ bụkwa ihe onye kpọrọ nwa nkịnta ya ka ọ na-aza, maka na ike anaghị anyụ ihe ọnụ erighị. Onye hụrụ na ihe gburu nne ya bụ eju, ihe gburu nna ya bụrụ eju, ma ya onwe ya kachie kwa ntị jidekwa eju n'aka, ọ makwa na ọ bụ ọnwụ nke ya ka ọ na-akpọ oku??
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ya mere, ka anyị laghachinụ azụ na nri e jiri mara ayị, bụ nke ndị nna nna anyị ha riri wee bie ogologo ndụ. Ka anyị sepụlata aka n'ụmụ nrị ọgbara ọhụụ ndị aṅna-agbakọ na mkpọ, bụ nke anyị na-amaghị ebe, otu na ihe e jiri mee ma bụ gbakọọ ha; ka ndụ anyị wee dịrị anyị ogologo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nwata a na-akpọ oku, ọ na-agbakpu ọhịa ga-emechakwanụ mara na ọhịa abụghị ebe obibi.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye a gwara kwe, a hụ ọzọ, a gwakwa ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụkpana okpoko gburu bụ ntị chiri ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Uwaifo bụ otu onye n’ime ndị onye isi ala Naịjiria, bụ Muhammadu Buhari, họpụtara ka e me ha ndị ode akwụkwọ ukwu. Tupu ahọpụta yam aka ọkwa ahụ, Maazị Uwaifo jibu ọkwa dịka onye ndu (Daịrektọ) nke na-ahụ maka ọnọdụ mmiri ọṅuṅu nan gala ahụ ike.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Maazị Uwaifo gwara ndị ọrụ ngalaba ahụ ike ka ha kwado ya, iji mee ka ọnọdụ ahụ ike kawanye mma n’ala Naịjiria.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye minista na-ahụ maka ọrụ na mmeputa akara ngwa bụ Sinetọ Chris Ngige kwuru na gọọmenti akpọla ọtụtụ nzukọ maka ịleba anya na nsogbu abụbọ ọrụ ndị ASUU ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Minista na-ahụ maka mmuta, bụ Adamu Adamu, kwenyere n’otu abụọ a ga ekwekọrịta, nwekwe ike meek a ụmụ lọghachi, malite ịgukwa akwụkwọ ọzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye isi otu ASUU, bụ ọkammuta Biodun Ogunyemi, kwuru na e mezicha ịhe etu kwesịrị ekwesị, ndị isi ASUU ga-enwe nzukọ were mara ịhe ọzọ ha ga-eme.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: ASUU malitere ịgba abụbọ-ọrụ n’abalị iri na anọ nke ọnwa Ọgọstụ, afọ puku abụọ na iri na asaa. Iwe ha bụ akwụghị ụgwọ ọnwa ndị nkuzi mahadum yana ego mmawapụta maka ịrụ ọrụ na mahadum ala Naịjiria.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ya bụ nwunye aka na-achị achị, nke onye nọchitere anya ya bụ Dọkịnta Ify Madụkasị kpọpụtasịrị ihe dị iche iche ọchịchị nọ ugbu a na steeti ahụ mepụtagoro na ngalaba agụm akwụkwọ, ngalaba ọrụ ugbo, nchekwa ndụ na akụnụba, ihe mwunye nakwa ngalaba ndị ọzọ dị iche iche, ma mekwa ka a mara na ime obodo niile dịna steeti ahụ eritela otu uru ma ọ bụ nke ọzọ na ya bụ ọchịchị Gọvanọ Obianọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ dụrụ ndị ntorobịa ka ha ghara ikwe ka onye ọbụla were ha rụọ ọrụ agboro ma ọ bụ ọrụ ọjọọ ndị ọzọ dị iche iche na nhọpụta ahụ na-abịa n'ihu, ma kpọkuzie ndị steeti ahụ maka ekpere ha na nkwado ha nye Gọvanọ Obianọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'aka nke ya n'ofufe nro ekpere ahụ nke isi okwu ya bụ 'Chineke Tute Steeti a Na Ụlọ Ụka Gị',  onye ụkọchukwu nke ụlọ ụka ahụ, bụ 'Rev. Cannon' Emmanuel Onovo kwuru na ebumnobi e jiri nwee ya bụ ofufe ntute na ọgbakọ ekpere bụ ka e wee hafeeṅsteeti ahụ n'aka Chineke, ọ kachasị ugbu a a na-akwadobe ime nhọpụta ọchịchị; ma rịọkwa ndị bịara ya bụ ofufe ka ha nabata Kraịst dịka onye nwe ha na onye nzọpụta ha, ka ha wee mara ebumnobi Chineke banyere ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na mbụ n'okwuchukwu ya, onye enyem aka pụrụ iche nye Gọvanọ steeti Enugu n'ihe gbasaara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ma bụrụkwa onye nyawara achịcha okwu Chineke n'ofufe ahụ, bụ Maazị/Onye oziọma Chinedu Anịchi dụrụ ndị otu Kraịst ka ha na-aga ije n'ụzọ nke Chineke ma na-akwụbakwa aka ha ọtọ n'ihe niile iji wee nwee akara onwunwe na otite mmanụ nke Chineke, ma mekwa ka ha mara na ọ bụ Chineke na-enye ọganihu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Oriakụ Ebere Arụbalueze, onye kwuru okwu na ntute steeti na ụka rịọrọ ndị ụka ka ha nwee ezi mmekọ, ha na Chineke,  ka ha wee hụta ịdị ukwu ya. Ọ dụkwara ha ka ha bie ezi ndụ ma mụrụ anya ka azụ  n'ihi na Kraịst pụrụ ịbịa oge ọbụla, malite ugbu a.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Eze ọdịnala Nsugbe bụ Igwe Victor Ntoka so na ndị ukwu ndị ọzọ bịara ya bụ ofufe nro pụrụ iche.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Abụ dị iche iche a bụrụ site n'ọnụ ndị ọbụ abụ, ịtụ mmamma na usoro ekpere dị iche iche e kpere so n'ihe pụtakarịchara ihè na ya bụ mmemme.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Obodo jupụtara nnọọ gbịm n'ọnụ dịka a nọrọ n'izu ụka gara aga wee mee mmemme iri ji ọhụụ nke obodo Enugwu-Ukwu, dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Njikọka na steeti Anambra. Ya bụ mmemme omenahọ bụ nnọọ oge iji kele Chukwu Okike maka ọrụ ọma ya dị iche iche na ya bụ obodo, ọ kachasị otu o siri debe ha ndụ ogologo oge ahọ ọrụ niile wee rukwaa n'oge owuwe ihe ubi, nke gosiri nnọọ na onye rụọ n'anwụ o  rie na ndò.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka ọ na-ekwu okwu na a ya bụ mmemme, eze ọdịnala Enugwu-Ukwu bụ Igwe Maazị Ralph Ekpeh kelere ndị niile siri n'ebe dị iche iche wee bịa ya bụ mmemme maka na ọ bụ mmadụ ka e ji aka; ma sịkwazie na o nwere nnọọ ezi olile anya na owuwe ihe ubi nke ahọ na-abịa abịa ga-aka nke ahọ a.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ sị na ya bụ irii ji ọhụụ ọha obodo riri ga-emezị ka  ndi echichi dị iche iche n'obodo ahụ malitezie iri ji ọhụụ, n'ihi na dịka ọ dị n'ọtụtụ obodo dị iche n'ala Igbo gbaa gburu gburu, iri ji ọhụụ n'obodo bụ ahụghị ebuli ma sị elina dike ma sorokwa n'ihe mbụ na mbụ a ga-emerịrị tupuu onye echichi ọbụla amalite isi ma ọ bụ iri ji ọhụụ n'ụlọ be ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị obodo ahụ anọrọnarii n'ọnwa Julaị gara aga wee mee otu n'ime mmemme pụrụ iche e jiri mara ha, bụ Ịkpọ Ji, nke bụ omenala ha ga-emechaa tupuu a malite ire ji n'ahịa obodo ahụ bụ Nkwọ Enugwu-Ukwu, ma bụrụkwa nke dọtara ọtụtụ ụmụafọ obodo ahụ sitere n'ebe dị iche iche n'ala Naịjiria nakwa mba ofesi.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Igwe Ralp kpekwazịrị ekpere maka udo na ọganihu nke obodo ahụ, steeti Anambta  nakwa ala Naịjiria n'izugbe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọtụtụ ndị ukwu ndị ọzọ bịara mmemme ahụ gụnyere onye na-nọchite anya ọgbọ nta nkwado Anọcha, Dunukọfịa na Njikọka n'ụlọ ọgbakọ nnọchi anya etiti, bụ Dọkịnta Dozie Nwankwọ, onye isi na ọga kpata kpata nke ụlọ mgbasa ozi 'Anambra Broadcasting Service', Awka, bụ Nze Uche Nwọrah, onye isi otu pati APGA n'oge mbụ ma bụrụkwa onye isi otu ịchụ nta nkwado maka ịhọpụtagharị Gọvanọ Willie Obianọ nke ugboro abụọ, bụ Maazị Victor Umeh, na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.
