text: Ndị otu a kwupụtara nke ahụ na mmemme a chịkọbara site n'aka ndị otu pati APGA n'okpuru ọchịchị ahụ, bụ nke dọtara ọtụtụ ndị ukwu dị iche iche, nke gụnyere: onye isi otu pati ahụ n'okpuru ọchịchị Ikeja dị na steeti Legọọsị, ma bụrụkwa onye ode akwụkwọ nchịkọba nke otu Ọhaneze Ndị Igbo na steeti Anambra, bụ maazị Emmanuel Awogu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka ọ na-agwa ọhaneze ndị bịara mmemme ahụ okwu, onye ndu otu ụmụ nwaanyị n'okpuru ọchịchị ahụ, bụ 'Dame' Chinyere Mbakwe sị na ọtụtụ ọrụ dị iche iche Gọvanọ Willie Obianọ rụpụtara na ngalaba dị iche iche na steeti ahụ, tinyere ezi ọnọdụ nchekwa, ịkwụ ndị nkụzi na ndị ọrụ ụgwọ ọnwa n'oge, na ọtụtụ ihe ndị ọzọ o mepụtagoro  ga-agbara ya aka ebe, ma mekwa ka nturu ugo ya na nhọpụta ahụ na-abịa n'ihu na steeti ahụ bụrụ nnọọ nke dara ụda dịka a tụrụ anya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ rịọzịkwara ndị Anambra ka ha ghara ikwe ka onye ma ọ bụ otu ọbụla duhie ma ọ bụ ghọrịa ha na  nhọpụta ahụ na-akpụdobe nso, bụ nke ga-ewere ọnọdụ n'abalị iri na asatọ nke ọnwa Nọvemba ahọ a.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'otu n'otu n'okwu ha, nnukwu onye enyem aka pụrụ iche nye Gọvanọ Obianọ n'ihe gbasaara ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị bụ maazị Arịnzechukwu Awọgụ, na ogbo ya bụ maazị Paul Nwosu kwuputara na Gọvanọ Obianọ dị njikere ịhụ na ihe na-agawanye n'ihu na steeti ahụ otu o kwesiri, ọbụnadị ruo ọchịchị ya nke ugboro abụọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ha bụ ndị otu e ji okwu ha agba izu nọrọ n'ebe ahụ kwuo hoohaa na ọchịchị Gọvanọ Willie Obianọ dị ha mma, na n'ihi ya, ya chịrị gaba, na ha kwụkwa ya n'azụ, maka na ọchịrị mma ga-achịkwa ọzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Otu a kpọrọ Rotary Club International, mpaghara nke 9142, nọrọ n'ụbọchị Tọọzdee wee bute ma nye ụlọ ọba akwụkwọ steeti Anambra onyinye akwụkwọ ọgụgụ dị iche iche. Nke ahụ bụ nnọọ otu n'ime mbọ ha na-agba  iji wee kwalite omenala ịgụ akwụkwọ nyegara ezi ụmụafọ ala anyị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka ọ na-ekwu okwu na ya bụ mmemme inyefe akwụkwọ ndị ahụ n'aka ụlọ ọba akwụkwọ ahụ, bụ nke a maara dịka Prof. Kenneth Dike Central E-Library n'Awka; n'aha onye isi mpaghara 9142 ahụ, bụ Dọkịnta Emma Udeh-Akpeh, osote ya bụ Ọkammụta Michael Okikpo kwuputara na atụmatụ ahụ so n'ụtụ nke ya bụ otu na-atụnye n'ịkwalite ezi ọnọdụ mmụta na agụm akwụkwọ n'ogogo dị iche iche n'ala Naịjiria.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Maazị Udeh-Akpeh kwuputanworo ịgbasi mbọ ike nke otu ahụ n'inyere ndị ụwa na-atụ n'ọnụ aka, ma sịkwa na ha ga na-aga n'ihu n'ịrụ ya bụ ọrụ obi ebere.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụfọdụ ndị selitere isi n'otu ahụ, nke gụnyere Maazị Amobi Adịrịka na Uche Akpakama kọwara otu 'Rotary Club' dịka otu na-adịghị achọ uru ego, ma kpọpụtagasịkwa ọtụtụ ihe dị iche ya bụ otu megoro nakwa ụfọdụ atụmatụ ndị ọzọ ha ji n'aka.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu nke ya, onye isi otu jikọtara ụlọ ọba ego dị iche iche n'ala Naịjirịa, ngalaba nke Anambra, bụ Dọkịnta Uju Nwaforizu toro ndị otu a n'ihi ezi nzọpụ ụkwụ ahụ  n'ikpochalata amaghị akwụkwọ ma kwalitekwa ezi ọnọdụ agụm akwụkwọ n'ala anyị, ma kpọkuzie ndị nne na nna ka ha nye aka jalie ụmụ ha iji wee kete oke na ya bụ uru amamihe site n'ịga n'ụlọ ọba akwụkwọ ahụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ dị iche iche agụ akwụkwọ na mgbe na mgbe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ozi ekele ya, onye nọgodi  dịka onye isi ụlọ ọba akwụkwọ ahụ, bụ Nwaada Nkechi Udenze kwupuuru ma tokwa ndị otu ahụ banyere ezi atụmatụ ahụ, ma rịọkwazie ndị nne na nna ka ha nye aka n'ịkwalite ọnọdụ mmụta n'ebe ụmụ ha nọ n'ihi na ọ dịrịghị naanị ndị nkụzi, kama, ọ bụ ọrụ dịịrị mmadụ niile.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ihe pụtakarịchara ihe na mmemme ahụ bụ inyefegasị akwụkwọ ọgụgụ ahụ n'aka ndị isi ụlọ ọba akwụkwọ ahụ bụ Kenneth Central E-Library site n'aka ndị otu ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ịlụ nwaanyị bụ ọzọ dịịrị okokporo niile, ma bụrụkwa a na-agụrụ akwụ nwanne ya a na-eghe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ bụ ụkwa ruo oge ya, ọ daa. Ịlụ nwaanyị bụ okokporo rie ọ lakpuo n'ihi na ọ bụ òke ọhà, onye kere nke ya, ọ lakpuo be ya, ga ribe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ihi na a sị na ihe mmadụ ruru ogo ya wee rie, ọ bụghị akpịrị, ịlụ nwaanyị bụ omenala zuru ụwa ọnụ. Ya bụ, ndị mba ọbụla n'ụwa gbaa gburu gburu na-eme emume ịlụ nwaanyị n'ihi na ịkpọ ngwere emeghị ihe o jiri bụrụ ịkpọ ngwere, ụmụaka ewere ya mee anụ, ọkọchị na udu mmiri. Ya mere okokporo ọbụla ji agbakarị ala ka ọ kpọta nke ya, maka na a sị na onye lee ihe ibe ya mere, o nwee ọnụ okwu n'ebe ibe ya nọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ịlụ nwaanyị so n'otu n'ime njirimara ndi Igbo, ma n'oge gboo ma n'oge ugbu a. Ọbụnadị akwụkwọ nsọ kwadoro ya, nke pụtara na Chineke onwe ya ghọtara ihe nwoke na-agabiga, ma marakwa ebe o ji nwamkpi; o wee sị na ọ dịghị mma ka ọ nọrọ naanị ya. Ndị kwuru okwu sị na ahụ abụghị ogwodo nkụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ịlụ nwaanyị nwere usoro n'ala Igbo, ma bụrụkwa nke uche dị n'ime ya, n'ihi na ọ bụghị ebe ọbụla onye siri pụta, ọ ga maburu nwaanyị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ala Igbo n'oge gboo, ịlụ nwaanyị na-abụ nnọọ nke a kwadobere nke ọma, ma bụrụkwa nke a na-ehi asaa naabụ n'anya were eme, n'ihi na onye banye, ọ banyesịgokwa. Nke ahụ bụ maka na ndi gboo ahụ ghọtara na alụm di na nwunye abụghị egwu apa ụtaba n'aka agba. Ọ bụghịkwa 'suru ụtara ka m nuru ofe m'. Ọ bụ ya mere na n'oge ahụ a dịghị enwekebe oke ọgu na mgba, esemokwu, alụkata esee nakwa ọtụtụ nsogbu dị iche iche ndị ugbu a na-enwe n'ebe ịlụ di na nwunye dị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mgbe ahụ, nwoke na-achọ ịlụ nwaanyị nwegasịrị ụfọdụ ihe ọ ga-eme tupuu ọ kpọrọ ya bụ ogoli nwaanyị labaa. Mana ugbu a, ihe ndị ahụ adagharịana n'ihi na ụmụ okorobịa ọgbara ọhụụ a na-atazị na-achaghị acha ma na-erizịkwa na-egheghị eghe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nwaokorobịa ọbụla chọrọ ịlụ nwaanyị n'oge ahụ ga-ebugodi ụzọ tuzuo oke n'ihe e ji mmadụ eme ma bụrụkwa onye anọghị nkịtị, ka agụụ wee ghara igbu nwaanyị ọhụụ ahụ maka na ọ bịara ije di. A sịkwaṅna onye rie ede na-egheghị eghe, ọ gbaa ya na-ebeghị ebe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nwata nwoke ahụ, mgbe ọ hụrụ nwa agbọghọ chara acha ọ chọrọ ịlụ, ọ gaghị agwagodi ya ihe ọbụla, kama ọ ga-ebu ụzọ na-enyocha ma na-amụ ya ka akwụkwọ. Ọ bụrụ na ọ chọpụta na ọ dị nnọọ mma idebe n'ụlọ, ọ ga-aga gwatụrụ nne na nna nke ya banyere ya bụ ụtụ chara acha ọ hụrụ n'ụzọ, ma kọwatakwara ha onye ọ bụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Oge ahụ, nne na nna ya ga amalite inyocha na ịjụ ase banyere ya bụ nwata nwaanyị na ndị ezinaụlọ ha, ịmara otu ha si eme, ịmara ndị si na ezinaụlọ ahụ pụta  ọ na-ezu ohi, ma ha ọ na-agba ara, ma ha ọ na-akwụ ụdọ ma ọ bụ ma ọ bụ ma o nwere onye si n'ebe ahụ kwụgoro ụdọ n'oge gara aga; ma ha ọ na-amụnwukwa nwa, ọ kachasị nwa nwoke, ma ndi be ha ọ na-akpa nsi ma ọ bụ na-ata amoosu,  ma o nwere ihe ọjọọ ndị ọzọ dị iche iche ejiri mara ha, ọbụnadị ruo n'okwuru anọ gara aga (past four generations).
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nke kachasị nke bụ na ha ga-enyochaa ma jụọ ase miri emi, iji mara na onye si n'ezinaụlọ ha ọ pụkwara ịlụ onye si n'ezinaụlọ nke nwaanyị, ka o nwere ihe jikọrọ ha ọnụ dịka otu ọbara. Nke a bụ ka e wee gbochie nsogbu ụdị ọbụla ịdapụtara n'ọdịnihu maka na ọbara  esika. Ọ bụkwa ajụghị ajụ e rie na-ebute arịaghị arịa a nwụọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mgbe ha gadụchaara ihe ndị a ma mechaa nnyocha niile ahụ wee hụ na ụzọ gara, ha ga-ejikere buru ihe dịka otu ite nkwụ wee gaa be ndị nke nwaanyị iji mee ka ha mara na o nwere akwụ chara acha ebe ahụ ha chọrọ ịkpara. Nke ahụ ka a kpọrọ ije 'amara m ụzọ ọgọ' ma ọ bụ 'ịkụ aka n'ụzọ' (dịka ndị si akpọ ya).
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nke ahụ pụtara na ha bịara ịkụ aka n'ụzọ ọgọ iji mara ma a ga-emeghekwara ha; na ụzọ ọ gakwara.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'aka nke ha, ndị be nke nwaayị nabatachaa ha na ije ha bịara, ha ga-emekwa otu ụdị nnyocha ahụ ndị be nke nwoke mere ma jụkwa ase niile ahụ ha jụrụ banyere ha n'ihi na a sị na ozu nwaada adaghị n'isi nna ọ daa n'isi ọkpara.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ bụrụ na ha mechaa ihe ndị ahụ wee chọpụta na ọ ga-adaba, ha ga-eme ka nwa ha nwaanyị mara otu ihe siri gbata kwụrụ, iji wee mara ọnụ mmiri okwu ya banyere nke ahụ, maka na ọ bụ ya bụ ọnụ na-elo ụtara ma ụdị okpoko ọ chọrọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na ngwụcha ihe niile, ọ bụrụ na nke nwaayị kweta, ọ ga-aga ilele ala na be nke nwoke iji mara ka ọnọdụ siri gbatakwụrụ n'ezinaụlọ ya. Nke ahụ bụkwa oge ya na nke nwoke ga-eji wee mụọ onwe ha iji mara ma ọ ga-adabakwa, na o rekwara ka a gọrọ. Ya na nke nwoke agaghịkwa abakwuru onwe ha chaa chaa, ma ya fọdụzie ije n'ọnwa.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ikpe azụ, ụbọchị ọ ga-ala, ọ ga-ebu ite mmanya n'isi wee ga kọọrọ ndi be ya ihe ọ hụrụ banyere ya bụ ezinaụlọ, wee gwa ha ma ọ ga-adaba ma ọ bụ na ọ gaghị adaba. Ọ bụrụ na nke nwaanyị ekweta, a ga-ezighachizịrị ndị be nke nwoke ozi ka ha bịa, e wee kanyezie ụbọchị a ga-abịa ime ego (ma ọ bụ ya na ịgba nkwụ). E wee zibezịe ndị ikwu na ibe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ bụzị mgbe e mekọrọchaara ihe ndị a ka nke nwaanyị ga akwakọrọzị ngwongwo ya lakuru nke nwoke n'ihi na o nyego ndị be ya ihe ha na-eri, nke gosiri na o chizuona ma tozukwa oke ịkpọrọ ya na nwunye. Nke ahụ wee bụrụ otu ndi Igbo si eme ya n'oge ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mana ugbu a, ihe adagharịsịgo n'ihi na ụmụ ntorobịa anyị na-atazịkwa na-achaghị acha, ma na-erizịkwa na-ajụghị ase. Ugbu a, ọ kachasị nke nwoke na-achọzịkwa ka o buru ụzọ detụ ihe ire, rie ihe nne ya riwọrọ ya ma ọ bụ bịnyegodi nke nwaanyị ogbe afọ tupuu a mara na a ga-alụ ma ọ bụ na a gaghị alụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ bụzịkwa ebe onye siri kote nwaanyị, o koro ya lakpute sị na ọ na-alụ ya alụ, ebe ụfọdụ na-anọ ebe ha hụrụ nwata nwaanyị anya mbụ gbado ya ma kweya nkwa ọlụlụ ozigbo ozịgbo; nke nwaanyị ekwetekwa zigbo ozịgbo ahụ na-egbughị oge, na na-ajughịkwa ase.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onweghizịkwa ihe dịka ilele ala, ma ọ bụ inyocha mara ka ezinaụlọ ndị ahụ dị maka na ọ na-eghuzị ụmụ okoro na ụmụ agbọghọbịa ugbu a eghu,  ọ kachasị ọ bụrụ ebe ego dị. Ha wee chezọọ uru ara baara ikwe maka na ọ na-adịzị onye ọbụla n'ọkụ n'ọkụ, nke mezịrị na ọtụtụ adanyena n'ọtụtụ ihe ọjọ dị iche iche, na ọtụtụ ezinaụlọ aghasaana, ebe ọtụtụ bụzịkwa a lụọ ta, a laa echi maka na ha bụ ọkụkọ ajụwughị ajụwu tupuu ribe. Ụfọdụ esikwana n'ụzọ dị otu ahụ dinaa ma ọ bụ lụọ otu ọbara ha na-maghị ama; nke bụ nnukwu arụ kwọ nwa n'ala Igbo, ma sokwa n'ihe ji ọtụtụ ezinaụlọ agaghị n'ihu ma ọ bụ amụtaaghị nwa, ma ọ bụ nwa nwoke, ruo n'ụbọchị taa. Ọtụtụ atụfugokwa ndụ ha n'ihi ajọ nwoke ma ọ bụ ajọ nwaanyị ha lụtara maka na ha ajụghị ase.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: E nwekwara ọtụtụ ihe egwu na ajọ ọnọdụ ndị ọzọ dị iche iche na-esikwa n'ihe ndị ahụ apụta.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị be anyị, na nchịkọta, mmechakọrọ ihe ndị a niile bụ ka anyị laghachinụ azụ n'ụzọ na usoro ahụ uche dị n'ime ya, bụ otu e si alụ nwaanyị n'ala Igbo n'oge gboo, ka anyị wee gbanahị ọdachi, nsogbu na ihe egwu ndị ọzọ niile na-si ime  ya apụta, bụ nke jupụtakwara n'ọtụtụ ezinaụlọ taa; ka udo wee dịrị anyị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nke a ga-emekwa ka anyị nọọ ogologo ndụ ruo ahọ ole Chineke debeere anyị, maka na mmadụ ịlụta ajọ nwaanyị ma ọ bụ ajọ nwoke na-eweta ọnwụ erughị eru maka na n'ebe ọkụkọ na-eṅakpa nri ka a na-ebute ozu ya. Ajụghị ajụ e rie bụkwa ya na-ebute arịaghị arịa a nwụ. Ọzọ, nwaanyị bụkwa ahịa akpa, onye enyochaghị enyocha wee goro laa, ihe ọ tọghetere, ya na chi ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ya bụ, ka anyị hie asaa n'anya, maka na onye banye, ọ banyesịgo. A sị na  jụlaruo, a kọwaruo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndeewo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Otu onye ara a ma ama na steeti Kogi nọrọ ụnyaahụ weeṅtie onye ụkọchukwu gwoo gwoo ma menyekwa ya ihere dị egwu n'ihu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nke ahụ bụ n'ihi na ya bụ onye ụkọchukwu kwechiiri ma kpebie na ọ ga-achụpụrịrị ya bụ nwoke ajọ mmụọ n'isi, ma ọ chọrọ ya ma ọchọghị ya, n'ihi na akwụkwọ nsọ nyere ya ikike banyere mmụọ ọjọọ na mmụọ ara niile.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye akaebe nọ mgbe ya bụ ihe mere kwuru na ya bụ onye ụkọchukwu ụka ọgbara ọhụụ na-emekarị ihe ahụ oge ọbụla, na ọ na-ejekwa mgbe ụfọdụ kpọta ndị ahụ zuru oke ma gwa ha ka ha na-eme ka ndị ara na-agba, ka ọ ga-abụ o kpeere ha ekpere, ha adaa n'ala,  tụrụgharịa dịka ndi amụma na-ebu, ma blite kwuo n'ahụ adịna ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mana ụbọchị ahụ bụụrụ ya ajọ ụbọchị dịka onye ara ahụ kụpụrụ ya ajọ mmụọ n'anya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Otu onye  nnọchi anya n'ụlọ ọgbakọ ukwu sineeti ala anyị ma bụrụkwa onye ji ọkwa 'Chief Whip'  n'oge mbụ  n'ụlọ ọgbakọ ukwu ahụ, bụ maazị Roland Owie ekwuona na ọchịchị onye isi ala anyị bụ Buharị jọgburunnọọ onwe ya n'ihi ihe dị iche iche a na-ahụta na ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Sinetụ Owie kwuru nke a banyere mkpọlite ahụ onye isi ala kpọlitesiri ụfọdụ ndị isi na ngalaba dị iche iche n'ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ bụ NNPC, ma sịkwa hooha na ịkpọ ganịganị ndị otu dịgasị iche iche n'ala anyị na ihe ndị ọzọ ha na-emegasị ka mma karịa ọchịchị ya bụ nwoke.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ sị na ọ baghị uru ịta ọtụtụ otu ndị a na-akpọgasị oku maka ikewa ala Naịjirịa ụta n'ihi na ọtụtụ ihe dị iche iche Buharị na-eme na otu o si enyegasị ọrụ gosiri n'ala abụghị otu, maka na ikpe mara eziokwu, aka azụ dị ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Otu jikọtara ndị na-akpọ ganị ganị  na mpaghara Naịja Delta emeena ka ọhaneze mara na ha ga-amalitekwa inye nsogbu na ịgbagwosi okporo mmanụ ma ọ bụrụ na ọnwa Septemba dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị otu a kwuru nke a n'izu ụka gara aga ma mee ka a mara na ndị orụ ha enyena ha ọnụ ọgụgụ ikwe mmanụ bụ nke ndị mgbago ugwu nwere na mpaghara ahụ, bụ ihe karịrị pacent iri itoolu nke ikwe mmanụ niile dị na mpaghara ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ha sị na n'ụbọchị ahụ, nke ga-abụ ụbọchị ụka, na ndị otu ha karịrị puku ise n'ọnụ ọgụgụ ga-eme mkpamkpa dị egwu, gbagwosie ihe ma mechisiekwa ọtụtụ ebe na mpaghara ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndi otu pati APGA ekwuona na ha agaghị ekwelata ka onye ọbụla ma ọ bụ otu pati ọbụla gwuo ojoro na nhọpụta ahụ na-abịa n'ihu na steeti Anambra, bụ nke a ga-ewere ọnọdụ n'abalị iri na asatọ nke ọnwa Nọvemba.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye isi otu pati ahụ n'ala anyị n'oge mbụ, ma bụrụkwa onye isi otu ịchụ nta nkwado maka ịhọpụtagharị gọvanọ Willie Obianọ nke ugboro abụọ, bụ Maazị Victor Umeh mere ka a mara nke a na nzukọ ha na ndị isi otu pati ahụ mere n'Awka.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwuru na ha ga-etinyesi atụmatụ  na amụma pụrụ iche n'ọrụ iji hụ na izuzu ọtụtụ ndị na pati ụfọdụ na-ezu iji wee gwuo ojoro na ya bụ nhọoụta, agaghị amịta mkpụrụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Otu jikọtara ndị Anambra bi na steeti Enugu ekwunwona nkwado ha nye ọchịchị gọvanọ Willie Obianọ maka ịchị nke ugboro abụọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị otu a kwuputara nke a mgbeṅosote aka na-achị steetiṅAnambra bụ Dọkịnta Nkem Okeke nabatara ndị isi otu ahụ a maara dịka 'Anambra State Peoples' Assembly' (ASPA), ngalaba nke Enugu, n'aha Gọvanọ Obianọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka ọ na-anabata ndị ahụ  n'obi gọọmenti dị n'Awka, Dọkịnta Okeke kwuru hoohaa na iwepụta gọvanọ site na mpaghara na mpaghara na steeti ahụ so n'otuṅụzọ e si akwalite ezi ọchịchị na udo tọrọ atọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Iri ji ọhụụ bụ otu n'ime omenala dị iche iche e ji mara ndị Igbo n'ụwa gbaa gburu gburu. Ọ bụ mmemme omenahọ ma bụrụkwa nke ezi nwaafọ Igbo ọbụla na-esonyesi ike na ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mmemme iri ji ọhụụ bụ oge e ji enye Chineke ekele n'ihi nchebe ya na ndụ o nyere anyị wee ruo n'oge owuwe ihe ubi maka na a kụọ ghọta, ị mara na ahọ amagbuona onwe ya. Ọ bụkwa oge ndị Igbo ji akwanyere ji ugwu dịka eze nke ihe niile a kụrụ n'ubi, dịka akụkọ okike siri kọọ, bụkwa nke mere ka a mara na ọ bụ agbara bụ mmụọ nwe ji.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'obodo ala Igbo niile, ịkọ ọrụ ugbo bụ ihe ọtụtụ mmadụ jiri mere aka ọrụ, ọ bụghị naanị n'ihi nri ma ọ bụ ego si na ya apụta, kama n'ihi na ọ bụ ihe e jiri mara ndị Igbo. A sị na ihe onye na-eme ka e jiri mara ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mgbe ha kụnyesikwara mkpụrụ ọkụkụ dị iche iche dịka ji, ede, akpụ, ọka, ọnà, ụgụ, ọkwụrụ, ụgbọgụrụ na ihe ndị ọzọ n'ubi; ha na-atụ anya na ha ga-enweta nke karịrị nke ahụ n'ahọ ọzọ, maka na ala bụ ọ nara ọ zụọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Oge nke ahụ ruzịrị, ihe ndị a buchaa, ndị Igbo n'obodo ha dị iche iche na-akpọ oriri n'isi otu n'ime ha, nke bụ eze ha, tupu onye ọbụla n'obodo ahụ amalite ribe ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ụfọdụ obodo, dịka Enugwu-Ukwu nke dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Njikọka na steeti Anambra, a na-ebu ụzọ mechaa otu omenala pụrụ iche a kpọrọ mmemme 'Ịkpọ Ji', bụ nke ha ga-emerịrị tupuu a malite ibubata ma ọ bụ ire ji n'ahịa obodo ahụ bụ nkwọ Enugwu-Ukwu. Ha mechazie nke ahụ, ha ewee mezie ṅmmemme iri ji ọhụụ kpọmkwem.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị obodo ndị ọzọ nwegasịrị ihe dị iche iche ha na-akpọ ya n'obodo ha, bụ nke dabarà n'usoro ya bụ mmemme. Iji ma atụ, e nwere ihe ji ọkụ, Imo Ọka (Awka), Afịọlụ Nnewi, Afịọlụ Nnobi, Ịgba Ọfala, Ilo Mmụọ n'Ogidi, tinyere ndị ọzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Oge ndị a na-abụ nnọọ oge igosipụta ịma mma nke ọnatarachi dị iche iche ndị Igbo nwere nakwa ihe ngosi ndị ọzọ Chukwu jiri gọzie ha. A na-agba ụdị egwu ọdịnala dị iche iche, dịka uhie, nke ndi chie na-agba, egwu mmọnwụ, ekpo na ihe ndị ọzọ dị iche iche na-ekpozịkwa elu iji wee ndị mmadụ obi ụtọ, ọ kachasị site n'ịchụ ha ọsọ, ịgba egwu ha na ihe ndị ọzọ. Ụfọdụ na-agbakwazị mgba ka ha mebe nke ha, bụ oge ụmụ okorobịa ji esì ọkụkpụ, ka a mara onye ka eriju afọ ma ọ bụ onye akwa kara si ike n'ukwu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Oge ụfọdụ, onye kacha bụrụ okenye n'obodo na-anọ na mmemme erim ji ọhụụ wee kọọrọ ndị obodo ahụ ọtụtụ akụkọ miri emi dịgasị añaa gbasara obodo ahụ, dịka akụkọ nta ala (history) nke obodo ahụ, ebe ha siri bịa, nakwa ọtụtụ akụkọ ọdịnala ndị ọzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nke kacha nke bụ na mmemme iri ji ọhụụ na-abụkwazị oge oriri na ọñụñụ pụrụ iche maka na erimeri na-abụ atụrụ taraba; onye ọbụla na-añụkwa ọgwụ afọ ma ghebe afọ ya oghe tupuu o si n'ụlọ ya pụtaba.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nkwụ: mmanya ngwọ, nkwu elu, mmanya karama, ji a hụrụ ahụ ma were ụtazị mara abụba, ose, ụkpaka, ogiri na mmanụ na-amụ mịrị mịrị bụgbadonọọ ihe ndị na-eme ka mmemme ahụ zaa aha a kpọrọ ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ihe ndị a niile bụ ihe na-eweta obi añụrị na obi ụtọ na ya bụ mmemme omenahọ, ka a ga-asị oge ya agwụna agwụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na-agbanyeghị ihe ndị a niile, n'elu uwa ugbu a, ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ na-ahụtazị iri ji ọhụụ dịka ikpere arụsị, ebe ndị obodo ụfọdụ mechigoro ya kpamkpam n'ihi na ha na-ahụta ndị na-eme ya dịka ndị nọ n'isì.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọtụtụ ndị nne na nna adịghịzịkwa ekwe ka ụmụ ha sonye na mmemme iri ji ọhụụ n'obodo ha, ma ọ bụ rie ihe ọbụla e siri ebe ahụ, n'ihi na ha na-ahụta ya dịka ihe a gọọrọ arụsị, ma ọ bụ ihe ndị ọgọ mmụọ. Ha wee chezọọ na nke ahụ so n'otu ụzọ pụtakarịchara ihe e si akwalite njirimara na omenala ndị Igbo, bụrụ oge ndị obodo ji anọkọ ọnụ dịka ụmụnne wee kpaa maka ọdịmma na uto nke obodo ha, tinyere ọtụtụ uru ndị ọzọ ọ na-eweta.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ihe kacha egbu njirimara na omenala ndị Igbo bụ ịgbakụta ha azụ site n'aka ụfọdụ ụmụafọ Igbo bụ ndị na-eche na ha hụrụ ụzọ ma ọ bụ na ha na-ahụzị Chineke anya kwa ụbọchị, na n'ihi ya, na ihe niile gbasaara ndị Igbo na omenala ha bụzị ihe ọchịchịrị, ihe nzuzu na ihe ndị ọgọ mmụọ. Nke ahụ wee bụrụ nnọọ echiche onye nzuzu sị na ya dara n'elu, na amụghị ya amụ. Ụkpala na-ere ọkụ ọ sị na ọ na-aha mmanụ. Ihe ndị bụ nke anyị wee na-efunahịzị anyị maka na anyị bụ ndị nwere ogiri amaghịzị uru ogiri bara n'ofe, dịka ofeke na-amaghị uru akpa agwụ baara eze dibịa.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị be anyị, ka anyị chigharịanụ ghọta na nke anyị bụ nke anyị bụ nke, na ọ bụkwa ebe onye bi ka ọ na-awachi, wee kpọọ ihe anyị ihe. Ka anyị jisie ike n'ịkwalite na n'isonye n'omenala dị iche iche e jiri mara ndị Igbo maka na nkwụ daa n'ala, nwaanyị eñe ya uhie, rịa ya elu. A sịkwa na onye kpọọ ọba ya ọkpọkọrọ, agbataobi ewere ya kpoo ahịha. Omenala Igbo ga-adị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ya bụ gọvanọ nyere onyinye ego ahụ oge ọ nabatara ndị otu abụọ ahụ ụnyaahụ na nzukọ 'State Executive Council' nke weere ọnọdụ n'ebe obibi gọvanọ dị n'Amawbịa.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị otu a jụọ a zaa ahụ, nke ụmụakwụkwọ atọ sitere na steeti ahụ mejupụtara bụ ndị tuuru ugo n'asọm mpi a jụọ a zaa mba ụwa nke weere ọnọdụ na Bally nke mba Ịndọneshịa, ma bụrụkwa nke mba iri ise na atọ sonyere na ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye ọbụla n'ime ụmụakwụkwọ atọ ahụ nwetara ego dị otu nari puku Naịra n'otu n'otu ebe ndị isi ha dị abụọ nwetara otu narị puku Naịra na ụma iri ise n'otu n'otu. Gọvanọ Obianọ nọkwara n'oge ahụ wee nabata ụmụakwụkọ abụọ ndị Anambra, bụ ndị nwetara akara otu nari iri asatọ na iteghete n'ule 'Common Entrance' n'ala anyị, nke mezịrị ka ha bụrụ ndị kachara wee mee nke ọma na ya bụ ule n'ahọ a.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Obere nwaada Chinazọm Ọnụbụọgụ dị ahọ iri nke sitere n'Obosi bụ nwata akwụkwọ 'God's Wisdom International School, Nnewi', ebe obere nwaada Chinecherem Emeka-Egbuna dị ahọ iri sitere Ichida bụ nwata akwụkwọ 'Tendercare International School na Nkwelle Ezunaka'. Ha abụọ nwetagbadoro puku Naịra iri ise n'otu n'otu na ohere agụm akwụkụkwọ n'efu n'ogoogo sekọndịrị na n'ogoogo mahadum ma ha mee nke ọma, ebe ụlọ akwụkwọ ha nwetekwara ego dị otu narị puku Naịra na ụma iri ise n'otu n'otu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka ọ na-enye ihe onyinye ahụ, gọvanọ Obianọ toro ụmụakwụkwọ ahụ na nturu ugo ha, ma sịkwa na ọchịchị ya ga na-aga n'ihu n'ịnye ụdị onyinye ahụ nyegara ụmụakwụkwọ na-ewetara steeti ahụ ugwu dị iche iche.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwuru na ọ bụ ihe oke ọñụ na ihe ngala na ụmụakwụkwọ sitere na steeti ahụ bụ ndị kacha eme nke ọma n'ule dị iche iche n'ala anyị, ma sịkwazie na nke ahụ bụ n'ihi ịgba dị iche iche ọchịchị ya tigoro na ngalaba agụm akwụkwọ na steeti ahụ. Ọ gbara ụmụakwụkwọ ahụ ume ka ha gaa n'ihu n'ịbụ ndị mbụ n'ihe dị iche iche ha na-eme, mekwa ka ha mara na site n'inye aka Chineke na ịgbasi mbọ ike ha, na ha ga-eru ogoogo dị elu na ndụ a.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na mbụ n'okwu ya, kọlishịọna na-ahụ maka agụm akwụkwọ na steeti ahụ bụ ọkammụta Kate Omenụgh kwuru na nturu ugo niile ahụ bụ nnọọ ngosipụta na ezigbo nnwogha na-agawanye n'ihu na ngalaba agụm akwụkwọ na steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na nzaghachi ya n'aha ndị otu asọm mpi a jụọ a zaa ahụ, obere nwaada Precious Chigozie kelere gọvanọ Willie Obianọ n'icheta ha na inye ha nkwado iji wee mara ihe a na-akpọ asọm mpi n'ogoogo mba ụwa site n'inye ha nkwado iji wee sonye na ya bụ asọm mpi.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu nke ha n'otu n'otu, obere nwaada Chinazọm na obere nwaada Chknecherem kwuru na nkwado na onyinye ahụ gọvanọ nyere ha bụ ihe ịkwalite mmụọ nyere ha iji wee gaa n'ihu n'ile nke ọma na agụm akwụkwọ ha na n'iwetara steeti ahụ ezi aha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: A nọkwara n'oge ahụ wee kesaara ụmụakwụkwọ ahụ akwụkwọ ọgụgụ ahụike site n'aka ministry na-ahm maka agụm akwụkwọ na steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nke bụ nnukwu oke ọñụ dara nnọọ n'obodo Ụmụeri nke dị n'okpuru ọchịchị 'Anambra East' na steeti Anambra, dịka ụmụafọ obodo ahụ, ndị dị iche iche selitere isi n'ọrụ gọọmenti , ndị enyị, ikwu na ibe nupụtara n'igwe iji wee mee mmemme iri ji ọhụụ nke obodo ahụ nke mbụ na mbụ ya ka ọ gachara ahọ iri abụọ na abụọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ya bụ mmemme bụ nke weere ọnọdụ n'obi eze ọdịnala obodo ahụ, bụ Igwe Ben Emeka. Igwe Emeka na nwunye ya bụ lọọlọ Ocheze Chinwe, tinyere ndị ichie igwe nọrọ na mmemme ahụ wee gbaa egwu ịgbaeze na uhie, ebe a gbazịkwara ọtụtụ egwu ọdịnala dị iche iche.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ya Igwe site na nnọnyere ndị ichie nọrọ n'oge ahụ wee mee omenala ịwa ji, nke ọ nọ na ya wee warịe otu mba ji ụzọ atọ, nke nọchitere anya mpaghara atọ mejupụtara obodo ahụ, bụ: mpaghara Ifite, mpaghara Ikenga na mpaghara Ezi ma nyefee ya n'aka ndị isi mpaghara atọ ahụ. A nọzịkwara n'oge ahụ wee kesaara ndị bịara ebe ji ahụrụ ahụ, nke ejiri ụkpaka, ụtazị na mmanụ nri na-akwọ mụrị mụrị wee hazie, tinyere mmanya ngwọ na nkwụ elu e jiri wee gbanyere ya ụgbọ nwamkpi.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Igwe Emeka kọwara mmemme iri ji ọhụụ dịka oge iji kele Chineke n'ihi owuwe ihe ubi, sị na ndị Ogidi bụ ndị e jiri ọrụ ugbo mara, ma sịkwazie na obi dị ya ụtọ etu ụmụafọ obodo ahụ siri nuputa n'igwè isonye na ya bụ mmemme pụrụ iche.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu nke ya, onyeisi ndị uwe ojii na steeti Anambra bụ maazị Garba Umar na onye 'Inspector General' ndị uwe ojii lagoro ezumike nka bụ maazị Paul Okafor kọwara na ezi nchekwa tọrọ atọ na nnukwu owuwe ihe ubi e nwere n'obodo ahụ bụ n'ihi ezi mbọ pụrụ iche ọchịchị gọvanọ Willie Obianọ gbagoro na ngalaba nchekwa, ngalaba ọrụ ugbo na ngalaba dị iche iche na steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na ntụnye nke ya, kọmishịọna na-ahu maka agụm akwụkwọ na steeti ahụ bụ ọkammụta Kate Omenugha kọwara mmemme iri ji ọhụụ dịka oge e ji e gosiopụta ihe dị iche e jiri mara ndị Igbo, ma keleziekwa Igwe Emeka maka mpụta ya na nsonyesi ike ya n'ihe dị iche iche a na-eme.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị ọzọ kwuru okwu na mmemme ahụ gụnyere ọkamụta Ọgụgụa Ikpeze, bụ otu n'ime ndị ichie igwe; 'Chief' Chris Udealor, onye isi otu 'Committee of Friends Nteje na steeti Anambra, Igwe Ezenebo III nke Akwaeze, 'Chief Innocent Edozie' tinyere ndị ọzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị ọrụ uwe ojii na steeti Anambra nọrọ n'izu gara aga wee nwụchikọọ mmadụ dị iri atọ n'ọnụ ọgụgụ, bụ ndị a na-enyo enyo na ha bụ ndị ohi na ndị otu nzuzo. Mmadụ iri abụọ na abụọ n'ime ndị omekoomè a ka a na-enyo enyo na ha bụ ndị otu nzuzo, ebe mmadụ asatọ ndị ọzọ bụ ndị a na-enyo na ha bụ ndị ekperima.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ihe e nwetasịrị n'aka ndị ahụ gụnyere: egbe 'AK47' na-agba ọnụ narị atọ iri isii na isii; ọtụtụ nsụnsụ egbe dị iche iche, uwe ndị otu IPOB, ọgwụ agwọrọ agwọ na otụtụ ihe ndị ọzọ e ji ebibi ndụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka ọ na-akpụgharị ndị ahụ n'isi ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe ojii dị n'Amawbịa, onye isi ndị uwe ojii na steeti Anambra bụ maazị Garba Umar sị na mmadụ abụọ n'ime ndị ahụ --- Peter Onyebụchi na Nnaemeka Ugwuokpe bụ ndị 'otu mmadụ isii', ndị ahụ gbagburu otu uwe ojii ma zukwa ohi n'ebe dị iche iche a na-ere mmanụ ọkụ na steeti ahụ n'ọnwa gara aga.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ sị na otu onye n'ime ndị ahụ a na-enyo enyo, bụ Kenneth Chiemezie bụ onye otu ọzọ na-eji ọgbaa tum tum ezu ndị aka ha dị ọcha ohi ma sịkwa na o duuru ndị uwe oji wee ga gosi ha ebe ndị na-amụgosi ha ọrụ na-ezo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Maazị Umar sị na ndị ahụ niile ekwupụtachago ihe dị iche iche ha mere na akụmakụ ha kụrụ; na ha na-enyezịkwara ndị uwe ojii ahụ aka na nnyocha ha iji wee nwụchikọọ ndị otu ha ndị fọrọ afọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka ọ na-ekwupụta ihe o mere, Peter Onyebụchi, onye sịrị na ọ bụ onye na-azụ ahịa n'ahịa ebe a na-ere ihe ndị e ji arụ ụlọ n'Ogidi, kwetara ma kwuo hoohaa na egbe 'AK47' ahụ e nwetere n'ụlọ ya bụ nke otu enyi ya a na-akpọ 'Trigger', bụ onye ọ sị na ọ na-akwapụ n'ụlọ ya ugbu a.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị a bụzịkwa ndi a ga-anọ oge na-adịghị anya wee kpụpụ ụlọ ikpe ma e mechaa nnyocha, ka e wee jiri usoro iwu wee nyụchaa ha anya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Aka na-achị steeti Anambra bụ Gọvanọ Willie Obianọ enwetena aha echichi ọhụụ 'Dike e ji eje mba' site n'aka ndị obodo Ogidi, bụ nke dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Idemili Nọọtụ na steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Gọvanọ Obianọ natara ya bụ oke echichi pụrụ iche na mmeme Ilo Mmụọ bụ nke weere ọnọdụ n'obi eze ọdịnala obodo ahụ, bụ Igwe Alex Ọnyịdo, ma bụrụkwa mmemme ndị obodo ahụ na-eji eme emume iri ji ọhụụ ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ya bụ mmemme bụ nke dọtara ndị ukwu ndị ukwu dị iche iche site na mpaghara dị iche iche n'ala anyị, nke gụnyere gọvanọ Willie Obianọ na osote ya bụ Dọkịnta Nkem Okeke, onye isi otu pati APGA n'ala anyị n'oge mbụ, ma bụrụkwa onye isi otu ịchụ nta nkwado maka ịhọpụtagharị gọvanọ Willie Obianọ nke ugboro abụọ, bụ Maazị Victor Umeh, tinyere ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ gọọmeenti dị iche iche na ụmụafọ obodo ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka ọ na-echibe ya echichi ahụ, Igwe Ọnyịdọ sị na ya bụ mmemme bụ nke dịbara gboo iji kwalite mmekọrịta na ịdị n'otu nke ndị obodo ahụ, ma kpekwazie ekpere ka owuwe ihe ubi nke ahọ a bukarịchaa nke ndị gara aga. O toro gọvanọ Obianọ n'ihi ihe dị iche iche o mepụtagoro kemgbe ọ rịgooro n'ọkwa ọchịchị, ọ kachasị na ngalaba ọrụ ugbo, nchekwa na ihe mwunye, ma gwakwazie ya na ndị obodo ahụ ekpebiena ịkwado ya na nhọpụta ahụ na-abịa n'ihu na steeti ahụ n'ihi na o gosina ha ịhụnanya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu nke ya kwa, otu nwaafọ obodo ahụ ma bụrụkwq onye a ma ama n'ịzụ ahịa, bụ 'Chief' Sam Anyanwụtakụ, mere ka a mara na site n'aka gọvanọ Obianọ, na Chineke ewechighatana udo n'obodo, bụ nke gbapụrụ kemgbe ihe karịrị ahọ iri abụọ gara aga a na-azọ eze na ya bụ obodo, ma sịkwazie na echichi ahụ bụ iji kele ya n'ihe o meere ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na nzaghachi, gọvanọ Obianọ kelere Igwe Ọnyịdọ na Ogidi niile banyere nnukwu nkwanye ugwu ahụ ha nyere ya ma kwe ha nkwa na ọ ga-aga n'ihu na-echeta ndị obodo ahụ n'ọchịchị ya. Ọ sị na ọrụ ijikọ aka ọnụ nke ya na ndị Anambra iji hụ na e nwere ịdị n'otu na ezi ọnọdụ obibi ndụ so n'ezi ihu na mbọ ọchịchị ya na-agba, na n'ihi ya, na ọ ga-agakwa n'ihu n'ịkwalite ezi ọdịmma ahụ site n'ọchịchị ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ozi ekele ya, ode akwụkwọ mgbasa ozi nke otu pati APGA n'ala anyị bụ maazị Ifeatụ Obi-Okoye, onye bụkwa nwaafọ obodo ahụ kwuru na mmemme ahụ nke e jikwa echeta ọgbụgba otu ahọ Igwe Ọnyịdo jiri rịgoro n'ọkwa ọhịchị bụ nke dara ụda n'ihi na ngọzị ọdịnala amalitekwana ịbatara ụmụafọ obodo ahụ n'ịgba mbọ ha niile, ka ọ gasịrị nnọọ ihe karịrị ahọ iri abụọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Imepe ụlọ ọrụ nhazị ọhụụ nke eze ọdịnala ahụ na egwu ọdịnala dị iche iche a gbara so n'ihe pụtakarịchara ihè na ya bụ mmemme.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Gọọmenti steeti Abịa ekwuona onye apụtakwụna iro n'Aba ruo ụbọchị atọ iji hụ na e wetara udo tọrọ atọ na steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Aka na-achị steeti ahụ bụ gọvanọ Okezie Ikpeazụ kwuputara nke a ụbọchị Tuuzdee ka e mechaara nzukọ ya na ndị isi nchekwa na steeti ahụ nwere ma sị na nke ahụ bụ n'ihi ọgba aghara na ihe ndị ahụ na-ekwo na steeti ahụ kemgbe ụbọchị ụka, tinyere arụrụ ala ahụ ndị ọrụ agha ala anyị rụrụ na steeti ahụ nso nso a, na mkpagharị egwu-eke agba nke abụọ ahụ ndị ọrụ agha malitere na mpaghara Ndịda-Ọwụwa anyanwụ ala anyị kemgbe ụbọchị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ sị na ya bụ 'onye apụtakwụna iro' ga amalite n'elekere isii nke ọnụ ụtụtụ wee ruo elekere isii nke mgbede bido ụbọchị Tuuzdee wee ruo ụbọchị Tọọzdee.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị gọvanọ ise nke mpaghara ndịda-ọwụwa anyanwụ ala anyị akatọọna mwakpo ahụ ndị ọrụ agha ala anyị wakporo ụlọ onye ndu ndị otu IPOB ma kwuo na nke ahụ ekwesighị ekwesi chaa chaa.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye mgbasa ozi ndị otu a bụ maazị Mike Udah mere ka a mara nke a n'Abakaliki nke steeti Ebonyi ma kwuo na iwe na-ewe ndị gọvanọ steeti ise nke mpaghara ahụ iwe banyere arụrụ ala ahụ ndị ọrụ agha ala anyị rụrụ ụbọchị ụka, ma sịkwa na ha ekpebiena iwebata udo tọrọ atọ na mpaghara ahụ, na ime ihe kwesiri ha banyere ajọ akụlakụ ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: E kwuputana na steeti Anambra abụrụna ndị kachara wee mee nke ọma n'ule WAEC nke ahọ 2017.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye Kọmishiọna na-ahụ maka agụm akwụkwọ na steeti ahụ bụ ọkammụta Kate Azụka Omenụgha kwupụtara nke a n'Awka bụ isi obodo steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ sị na Ndị steeti ahụ nwetere akara krediti dị pacentị iri asaa na ise na ụma atọ, ma n'ihe ọmụmụ asụsụ bekee na gbakọ na mwepu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọkammụta Omenụgha kwukwara na ha na-agbasi ezi mbọ ike iji hụ na ha mechisịrị ebe dị iche iche a na-egwu ojoro n'ule na steeti ahụ maka na agụm akwụkwọ na nkuzi a na-enye ụmụakwụkọ na steeti ahụ bụ nnọọ nịe na-ada ụda na nke zuru okè.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Gọọmenti steeti anambra n'ọchịchị Gọvanọ Willie Obianọ emego ka a mara njikere ya na mkpebi ya ịkwalite ezi ọnọdụ obibi ndụ na ọdịmma ndị ntorobịa na steeti ahụ, iji mee ka ha bụ ndị kwụụrụ onwe ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nwunye aka na-achị steeti ahụ bụ Oriakụ Eberechukwu Obianọ mere ka a mara nke a n'ọgbakọ ekpere pụrụ iche e mere maka iche nhọpụta na-abịa n'ihu na steeti ahụ n'aka Chineke, bụ nke weere ọnọdụ n'ụlọ ụka St. Luke (Anglican) dị na Nsugbe n'okpuru ọchịchị 'Anambra East' na steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ya bụ nwunye aka na-achị achị, nke onye nọchitere anya ya bụ Dọkịnta Ify Madụkasị kpọpụtasịrị ihe dị iche iche ọchịchị nọ ugbu a na steeti ahụ mepụtagoro na ngalaba agụm akwụkwọ, ngalaba ọrụ ugbo, nchekwa ndụ na akụnụba, ihe mwunye nakwa ngalaba ndị ọzọ dị iche iche, ma mekwa ka a mara na ime obodo niile dịna steeti ahụ eritela otu uru ma ọ bụ nke ọzọ na ya bụ ọchịchị Gọvanọ Obianọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ dụrụ ndị ntorobịa ka ha ghara ikwe ka onye ọbụla were ha rụọ ọrụ agboro ma ọ bụ ọrụ ọjọọ ndị ọzọ dị iche iche na nhọpụta ahụ na-abịa n'ihu, ma kpọkuzie ndị steeti ahụ maka ekpere ha na nkwado ha nye Gọvanọ Obianọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'aka nke ya n'ofufe nro ekpere ahụ nke isi okwu ya bụ 'Chineke Tute Steeti a Na Ụlọ Ụka Gị', onye ụkọchukwu nke ụlọ ụka ahụ, bụ 'Rev. Cannon' Emmanuel Onovo kwuru na ebumnobi e jiri nwee ya bụ ofufe ntute na ọgbakọ ekpere bụ ka e wee hafeeṅsteeti ahụ n'aka Chineke, ọ kachasị ugbu a a na-akwadobe ime nhọpụta ọchịchị; ma rịọkwa ndị bịara ya bụ ofufe ka ha nabata Kraịst dịka onye nwe ha na onye nzọpụta ha, ka ha wee mara ebumnobi Chineke banyere ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na mbụ n'okwuchukwu ya, onye enyem aka pụrụ iche nye Gọvanọ steeti Enugu n'ihe gbasaara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ma bụrụkwa onye nyawara achịcha okwu Chineke n'ofufe ahụ, bụ Maazị/Onye oziọma Chinedu Anịchi dụrụ ndị otu Kraịst ka ha na-aga ije n'ụzọ nke Chineke ma na-akwụbakwa aka ha ọtọ n'ihe niile iji wee nwee akara onwunwe na otite mmanụ nke Chineke, ma mekwa ka ha mara na ọ bụ Chineke na-enye ọganihu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Oriakụ Ebere Arụbalueze, onye kwuru okwu na ntute steeti na ụka rịọrọ ndị ụka ka ha nwee ezi mmekọ, ha na Chineke, ka ha wee hụta ịdị ukwu ya. Ọ dụkwara ha ka ha bie ezi ndụ ma mụrụ anya ka azụ n'ihi na Kraịst pụrụ ịbịa oge ọbụla, malite ugbu a.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Eze ọdịnala Nsugbe bụ Igwe Victor Ntoka so na ndị ukwu ndị ọzọ bịara ya bụ ofufe nro pụrụ iche.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Abụ dị iche iche a bụrụ site n'ọnụ ndị ọbụ abụ, ịtụ mmamma na usoro ekpere dị iche iche e kpere so n'ihe pụtakarịchara ihè na ya bụ mmemme.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ezigbo nwaafọ Igbo ọnọdụ ndị mmadụ na-emetụ n'obi, bụ onyeisi otu na-ahụ maka ịhọpụtagharị gọvanọ Willie Obianọ nke ugboro abụọ ma bụrụkwa onyeisi otu pati APGA n'ala anyị n'oge gara aga, bụ maazị Victor Umeh, ekesaana ego dị nde Naịra iteghete nyegara ụmụ akwụkwọ dị iche iche ndị ritara uru n'okpuru amụma agụmakwụkwọ n'efu nke ya bụ nwa amadi na-enye.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ya bụ nkesa ego bụ maka agba agụmakwụkwọ nke a babyere na ya ugbu a ma bụrụkwa nke weere ọnọdụ na mmemme pụrụ iche a chịkọbara n'obodo ya bụ nwa amadi, bụ Agụlụzigbo dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Anaọcha na steeti Anambra.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka ọ na-ekesa ya bụ ego, maazị Victor Umeh kwuru na ya bụ atụmatụ inye ohere agụmakwụkwọ n'efu so n'ezi ihu n'otu n'ime ịgbasi mbọ ike ya, kemgbe ahọ iri gara aga n'ihi na ọ ghọtara ezi mkpa ọ dị, bụ ịkụnye ihe nkụnye n'ime mmadụ. Ọ sị na mmadụ iri na asaa gụchara akwụkwọ n'ahọ gara aga, site n'okpuru amụma ahụ, ma kpọkuziekwa igwe mmadụ ahụ ka ha gaa n'ihu n'inye ọchịchị nọ ugbu a na steeti ahụṅ nkwado, ọkachasị n'ịchị nke ugboro abụọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na mbụ n'okwuchukwu ya n'ụka pụrụ iche a kara iji merube ya bụ mmemme, onye ụkọchukwu Sixtus Agụịnam, onye so n'otu n'ime ndị ritagoro uru na ya bụ ohere agụmakwụkwọ n'efu toro maazị Victor Umeh maka ịghọta na ịkụnye ihe n'ime mmadụ bụ ihe kachasị dị mkpa n'ụwa ma sokwa n'otu n'ime ihe na-akwalite ọnọdụ mmepe na ọdịmma. Ọ kpekwazịrị ekpere ka Chineke gaa n'ihu na-agọzi ya bụ nwoke, ọbụnadị ka ọ na-agawanye n'ihu n'ime nke ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Amụma ohere agụmakwụkwọ n'efu ahụ gụnyere ma ndị nọ n'ogo praịma, ogo sekọndịrị, ogo mahadum, nakwa ogo na-esote ogo mahadum. Ihe dịka mmadụ iri abụọ n'ọnụ ọgụgụ bụkwa ndị nwetara ya bụ ohere n'agba agụmakwụkwọ nke a banyere ugbu a.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mmemme ahụ dọtara ndị ukwu ndị ukwu dị iche iche, nke gụnyere: onye kọmishịọna steeti ahụ na-ahụ maka omenala, njem nlegharị anya na ihe ndị na-eme na mba ofesi, bụ oriakụ Stella Ọnụọrah, onye na-anọchite anya ọgbọ nta nkwado Anaọcha nke mbụ n'ụlọ omebe iwu steeti Anambra, bụ maazị Azubuike Okoye, onyeisi nchere oge n'okpuru ọchịchị Anaọcha, bụ maazị Ikeobi Ejiofor, onyeisi Ọhaneze Ndị Igbo na steeti ahụ, bụ maazị Damian Okeke-Ogene, tinyere ndị ọzọ ndị selitere isi n'ọrụ gọọmenti nakwa ngalaba dị iche iche.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Otu jikọtara ndị gọvanọ steeti ise nke mpaghara ndịda-ọwụwa anyanwụ ala anyị nọrọ n'izu ụka gara aga wee machie kpamkpam, otu ahụ a kpọrọ 'Indigenous People of Biafra' bụ IPOB n'aha ịchafụ, ma machiekwa ọrụ niile nke bdị otu ahụ. Nke a bụ nke e kwuputara ka ya bụ otu jikọtara ndị gọvanọ mpaghara ahụ mechara nzukọ gbanụ gbanụ maka ọrụ nchekwa, bụ nke weere ọnọdụ naṅobi Gọọmenti Enugu dị n'isi obodo steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka ọ na-agwa ndị nta akụkọ okwu na mmechi nzukọ ahụ, onyeisi otu ahụ jikọtara ndị gọvanọ mpaghara ndịda-ọwụwa anyanwụ, ma bụrụkwa aka na-achị steeti Ebonyi, bụ gọvanọ Dave Umahi mere ka a mara na mkpebi ahụ bụ n'ihi otu ọnọdụ nchekwa siri gbata kwụrụ na mpaghara ahụ nakwa ihe nke ahụ pụrụ iweta. Ọ kpọkuzịkwara ndị otu IPOB na otu ndị ọzọ na-akpọ ganị ganị na malitezie ugbu a gaba, ka ka ha chịkọlọta ma deputa ebumnobi ọbụla ha nwere ma nyefee ya site n'aka ha bụ ndị otu jikọtara ndị gọvanọ ndịda-ọwụwa anyanwụ ahụ, otu Ọhaneze Ndị Igbo na ndị otu ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu etiti sitere na mpaghara ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ sị na ndị gọvanọ niile nke mpaghara ahụ ga-eleba anya ịhụ na e mere nke ahụ otu e siri kpebie ya na steeti ha dị iche iche.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwupụtanworo nkwado nke otu jikọtara ndị gọvanọ ndịda-ọwụwa anyanwụ ahụ, nke Ọhaneze Ndị Igbo na nke ndị otu ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu etiti sitere na mpaghara ahụ nyegara ịdị n'otu nke ala Naịjiria, ọbụnadị dịka ha na-akpọ oku maka ihazigharị ala Naịjiria iji hụ na e nwere ikpe nkwụmọtọ na ime ihe otu o siri kwesi ekwesi nyegara ụmụafọ Naịjiria na-enweghị onye ọbụla a na-akpagide.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị otu kwukwara hoohaa na ntụli aka ahụ a ga-eme na steeti Anambra n'abalị iri na asatọ nke ọnwa Nọvemba ga-ewererịrị.ọnọdụ, ma gwaziekwa onyeisi ala bụ Muhammad Buharị ka o were ọsọ were ije kposie ndị ọrụ agha niile ahụ o zidatara na mpaghara ahụ, maka na e sighị n'ọdụ agbọ akwụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ha kwuru na ha bụ ndị gọvanọ azọpụgo ụkwụ dike dị iche iche iji hụ na e nwere ezi nchekwa ndụ na akụkụba n'akụkụ ọbụla nke mpaghara ahụ niile, tinyere nchekwa nke ụmụafọ Igbo bigasị na mgbago ugwu ala anyị. Ha kwuzịkwara na ha na-emezị nnyocha dị omimi banyere mgbusi ahụ e gbusiri mmadụ na arụrụ ala dị iche iche a rụgoro na mpaghara ahụ nso nso a, ma kpọkukwa ụmụafọ mpaghara ahụ ka ha bụrụ ndị na-erubere iwu ala anyị isi.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị gọvanọ niile nke steeti ise dị na mpaghara ahụ bịara ya bụ nzukọ, beelụ sọ nke steeti Imo, bụ onye zitere osote ya maazị Eze Madumere.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị ọzọ ezitere na ya bụ nzukọ gụnyere osote onyeisi ụlọ ọgbakọ sineet bụ maazị Ike Ekweremadụ bụ onye nọchitere anya ndị ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu etiti na ya bụ nzukọ, onye kọmanda nke '82 Division' nke ndị ọrụ agha ala Naịjiria bụ 'Major General' Adamu Abubakar, onyeisi izugbe nke Ọhaneze Ndị Igbo n'ụwa gbaa gburugburu bụ maazị Nnia Nwodo nakwa ndị isi ndu nke otu IPOB.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Otu Ọhaneze Ndị Igbo n'ala anyị akatọọna nkwuwa ahụ ndị ọrụ agha ala anyị kwuwara bụ nke sị na otu 'Indigenous People of Biafra' (IPOB) bụ otu iyi egwu, ma sị na nke ahụ adabaghị adaba chaa chaa. Ha jụrụ ya jụwapụ ya isi ma kwuo hoohaa na otu IPOB abụghị otu iyi egwu chaacha, ọkachasị dịka iwu siri kọwaa ihe bụ otu iyi egwu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Otu ọ dị, ndị otu a kelere ndị gọvanọ ndịda-ọwụwa anyanwụ na mbọ ha dị iche iche iji welata ịkpọ ganị ganị na ihe egwu ndị ọzọ na mpaghara ahụ, ọkachasị mwakpo ahụ ndị ọrụ agha ala anyị wakporo ndị mpaghara ahụ. Ka ha nwechara nzukọ imeobi ha n'Enugu n'abalị gara aga, ndị otu a kwuru na ha kwụdooro ala Naịjiria ịdị n'otu, naanị ma e nwee nhazigharị ghe anya oghe, bụ nke ga-eweta ikpe nkwụmọtọ, nhatanha na ihe ziri ezi, maka na o doro ewu na ọkụkọ anya na ihe amaghị kwụrụ ugbu a.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ozi ọ gụpụtara, onyeisi izugbe nke otu ọhaneze ndị Igbo n'ụwa gbaa gburugburu bụ maazị Nnịa Nwodo katọrọ kpam kpam, akparamagwa na akụmakụ ndị ọrụ agha ala anyị na mpaghara ndịda-ọwụwa anyanwụ ahụ, ma kpọkuo ha ka ha kwụsị nke ahụ ngwa ngwa ma kwakọrọ ngwo ngwo ha pụọ na mpaghara ahụ. Ndị otu ahụ kwuru na mgbe adịghị anya, na ha ga-enwe nzukọ pụrụ iche iji kwado ebumnobi nke nhazigharị ahụ a na-akpọ oku ya n'ala Naịjiria, ma sịkwa na ha na-akwado mkpebi niile nke otu jikọtara ndị ndu na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ mere.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ha kwuputanworo ọtụtụ mmegbu na mkpagbu dị iche iche a na-akpagbu ndị sitere mpaghara ndịda-ọwụwa anyanwụ ala anyị ma sị na nke ahụ bụ nnọọ isi sekpụ ntị n'ịkpọ ganị ganị dị iche iche nke ndị otu na-akwado Biafra na-akpọ. Nke a bụ n'ihi na e mee nwata ka e mere ibe ya, obi adị ya mma. A sịkwa na nwata zọba oke ya, a sị na ọ gbara ajọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọtụtụ ndị ukwu ndị ukwu na ndị e ji okwu ha aga izu sonyere na mmemme gụnyere: onyeisi izugbe nke otu Ọhaneze ndị Igbo n'ala anyị bụ maazị Nnia Nwodo, osote onyeisi ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu sineeti nke ala anyị bụ maazị Ike Ekweremadu, aka na-achị steeti Abịa bụ gọvanọ Okezie Ikpeazu, osote gọvanọ steeti Imo bụ maazị Eze Madumere, ogbo ya nke steeti Ebonyi bụ maazị kelechi Igwe, onyeisi izugbe nke Ọhaneze ndị Igbo n'ala anyị n'oge gara aga bụ maazị Joe Irukwu, ode akwụkwọ izugbe nkeṅotu ahụ n'oge mbụ, bụ maazị Joe Nworgu, onye jibụ ọkwa minista na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi n'ala anyị, bụ maazị Walter Ọfọnagọrọ, aka chịbụrụ steeti Anambra n'oge gara aga, bụ maazị Chukwuemeka Ezeife, tinyete ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Otu jikọtara ndị Arewa bi na steeti Anambra ekwuputana nkwado ha nyegara aka na-achị steeti ahụ bụ gọvanọ Willie Obianọ maka ịchị steeti ahụ nke ugboro abụọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nkwado a bụ nke bịara dịka e mere ngagharị udo ịchụ nta nkwado nke ya bụ gọvanọ, bụ nke weere ọnọdụ n'ebe obibi gọvanọ dị n'Amawbịa. Ngagharị ahụ bụ nnọọ nke ọtụtụ ndị Arewa sonyere na ya, bụ ndị sitere n'ebe dị iche iche na steeti ahụ wee pụta iji gosipụta ndọnye ukwu ha nyegara gọvanọ Willie Obianọ n'ihi ezi ọnọdụ nke ọchịchị ya nye ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya na mmemme ahụ, nnukwu onye enyemaka pụrụ iche nye gọvanọ Obianọ n'ihe metụtara okpukperechi ndị ụka Islam ma bụrụkwa Sarikin Awụsa n'Ọka, bụ Alhaji Garuba Haruna kwupụtara hoohaa na kemgbe okike steeti ahụ, na onwebeghi oge ha nwetara ezi ọnọdụ tọrọ atọ na steeti ahụ dịka nke na-enweta ugbu a n'ọchịchị gọvanọ Willie Obianọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'otu n'otu n'okwu ha dị iche iche, onye bụ Sarikin Awụsa n'Ọnịsha bụ Alhaji Ilyasu Iman, na ogbo ya nke Nnewi bụ Alhaji Salisu Kumba, tinyere onyeisi ndị Fụlani na steeti ahụ, bụ Alhaji Giddado Sadiq mere ka a mara na ha na-azụrụ nnọọ ahịa ha ma na-arụkwa ọrụ ọma ha dị iche iche na steeti ahụ na-enweghị ihe mgbakasị ahụ ọbụla maka ihi mmụọ ịhụ ịdị n'otu n'anya, nke gọvanọ Willie Obianọ nwere. Ha kwezịkwara nkwa inye ya nkwado zuru oke n'ịzọ ọchịchị ya nke ugboro abụọ iji hụ na ya bụ udo na ịdị n'otu tọrọ atọ ma bụrụkwa nke ga-adịgide.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu nke ya, onyeisi otu na-ahụ maka ịhọpụtagharị gọvanọ Obianọ nke ugboro abụọ, bụ maazị Victor Umeh kwuru na ya bụ gọvanọ egosipụtana n'ezie na ọ bụ ezi nwaafọ hụrụ ala anyị na ịdị n'otu n'anya, ma sịkwa na ude ya na-ede n'ala Naịjiria na ụwa gbaa gburugburu. Ọ sị na nke ahụ na-eweta nnọọ ezi mmetụta nye ụmụafọ steeti Anambra bi n'ebe dị iche iche, ọkachasị na mgbago ụgwu ala anyị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na nzaghachi, gọvanọ Obianọ kelere ndị otu Arewa ahụ maka nkwado ha nye ọchịchị ya nke ugboro abụọ, ma kwe ha nkwa ezi nchekwa nye ndụ na akụnụba ha na steeti ahụ. Ọ dụkwara ha ka gbaa mbọ bụrụ ndị na-erubere iwu isi, ka ha ghara itinye aka n'akparamagwa ọbụla nwere ike ibutere ha nsogbu n'ebe ha bi, na ka ha mekwa ka ndị ọrụ nchekwa mara babyere onye ọbụla a na-enyo enyo n'etiti ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'aka nke ya kwa, onye na-anọchite anya ọgbọ nta nkwado Njikọka nke abụọ n'ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu steeti ahụ, bụ maazị Pete Ibida kpọkuru ndị gọvanọ ndị ọzọ ka ha ñomiri ma soro nzọ ụkwụ ezi onye ndu nke gọvanọ Willie Obianọ na-egosipụta, site n'idị n'otu, na-akpazugaghị onye ọbụla n'akụkụ n'ihi okpukperechi ya ma ọ bụ agbụrụ o si na ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndi otu ahụ nọzịkwara n'oge ahụ wee bụkuo abụ nkwado nyegara gọvanọ Willie Obianọ, bụ nke na-egosi na ha kwụ ya n'azụ gidigbaa na ya bụ nhọpụta na-abịa n'ihu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Otu na-ahụ maka nhọpụta ọchịchị n'ala anyị bụ INEC n'aha ịchafụ ekwuputana na ha edebanyego ihe ruru aha nde mmadụ abụọ n'akwụkwọ maka nhọpụta ahụ na-abịa n'ihu na steeti Anambra. Onye 'Resident Electoral Commisioner' nke steeti ahụ bụ maazị Nwachukwu Orji mere ka a mara nke a na nzukọ ya na ndị isi na-ahụ maka nhọpụta na ndị otu 'Civil Society Organisations' bụ CSOs n'aha ịchafụ mere n'Ọka bụ isi obodo steeti Anambra. Ọ sị na ha ga-ebipụta akwụkwọ ndebanye jikọtara ihe niile ahụ n'ihe dịka izu atọ na-abịa abịa, bụ nke ha ga eme n'ọgba atọ, ma mekwa ka ọ dị n'okpuru dị iche iche na steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Maazị Ọrjị mekwara ka a mara na a ga-ezitekwa ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ nchekwa maka ya bụ nhọpụta, ma sị na n'ime ndị ọrụ nchekwa dị puku iri abụọ na ọtu a mapụtara maka ya bụ nhọpụta, na puku abụọ anọrọgorị anọrọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ sị na otu INEC na steeti ahụ ga-arịọ ikike site n'aka isi ụlọ ọrụ ha dị n'Abụja iji wee nweta ụfọdụ ndị ga-eso rụ ọrụ na ya bụ nhọpụta site na mahadum dị iche iche na steeti ahụ, tinyere puku mmadụ asaa a ga-esi na ndị na-efe ala nna anyị wee nweta. Ọ sị na ọ bụ mmadụ iri atọ na ise ndị na-apụta ịzọ ya bụ ọkwa aka ga-achị steeti ahụ, ma sịkwa na otu pati ọbụla nke mere nhọpụta praịma ha na-agwaghị ha bụ ndị INEC emeghị ya n'usoro iwu, na n'ihi ya, na onye nke ha apụghị isonye na ya bụ nhọpụta.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwuru na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ga enyocha ịchụ nta nkwa nke ndị otu ọbụla iji hụ na e nweghị okwu akpọmasi ọbụla na ihe ndị ọzọ na-ekwesighị ekwesi, ma gwakwa otu pati ọbụla ka ha mee ya bụ ihe n'usoro iwu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu nke ya, onyeisi otu 'Policy and Legal Advocacy Centre' (PLAC) bụ maazị Clement Nwankwo kwuru na ala Naịjiria na-atụ anya ka ya, bụ nhọpụta ga-ewere ọnọdụ na steeti ahụ n'abalị iri na asatọ nke ọnwa Nọvemba ahọ a bụrụ nke e mere n'ụzọ pụrụ iche na n'ụzọ ghe anya oghe nke ọma karịa ndị a na-emebụ n'oge gara aga.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ sị na anya onye ọbụla dị na ya bụ naṅhọpụta nke ukwu maka na ọ bụ site n'ezi mpụtara ya ka a ga-eji mara ihe nhọpụta izugbe a ga-eme n'ala anyị n'ahọ 2019 ga-abụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Akwamozu bụ e mee nwata ka e mere ibe ya. Ọ bụ otu n'ime emume zuru ụwa ọnụ ma bụrụkwa mmemme zuru ọnwa na ahọ ọnụ maka na ụwa bụ ahịa na-azụ kwa ụbọchị; ndị na-eje eje ndị a na-ala ala.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Akwamozu bụ ugwu ikpeazụ a na-akwanyere onye nwụrụ anwụ na emume ikpeazụ a na-emere ya iji sị ya gaa ije ya nke ọma. Nke a bụ n'ihi na ọ bịara ije ga-alarịrị ala, ụdị ogologo ọ sọkwara ije ya too, maka na o nweghị onye ga-epu ome n'ụwa a.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị ọbụla, ọbụnadị ndị Awụsa na ndị ọcha na-emegbado emume akwamozu maka na a nwụọ elighị elu na-ebute a nwụma ebighị ebi. Ọ bụ eziokwu na ndị ọbụla na agbụrụ dị iche iche nwere otu ha si eme nke ha, mana otu ọbụla e sina mee ya, ihe na-adịghị mgbagha bụ na a kwaana ozu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ala Igbo, a hụtara akwamozu dịka mmemme ọ bụ m ka ọ bụ gị maka na ebe onye na -akwa mmadụ ka ọ na-akwa onwe ya. Oku ọnwụ bụ mgbe chi onye ụwa jiri kpọọ ya maka na ụwa bụ ahịa, onye zụchaa nke ya ọ laa. Onweghịkwa onye maara oge nke ya ga-abụ, ọbụnadị ndị che na ha na-ahụ ụzọ apụghị ịhụ nke ahụ maka na ihe Chukwu zonahịrị Mmụọ ozi, ọbụzị mmadụ pụrụ ịmata ya?? Ọ bụ nke a mere na ndị Igbo ejighị akwamozu egwu egwu, ọ kachasị n'oge mbụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'oge mbụ ahụ, ọ bụrụ na mmadụ nwụọ ma ọ bụ ọ nwekwahaa ka e siri tie mkpu akwa o wee bụrụ mkpu ọnwụ, ntị ọbụla nụrụ ya, ọbụnadị onye ntị ochi, ga-ebihapụ ihe ọbụla ọ na-eme ma agbara gaba ebe ahụ ozigbo ịga mara ihe na-akpọtụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: E ruo ebe ahụ, ọ bụrụ na isi dara n'ezie, onye ọbụla ọ kachasị ụmụnwaanyị na-atawara akwa na-ebe iji besuo ozu ahụ. Ụfọdụ n'ime ha ndị enweghị obi na-ebekarịkwuzị ndị ọ bụ mmadụ nwụnahịrị, ọ kachasị ọ bụrụ ezigbo mmadụ, mmadụ ọha, ma ọ bụ isi a hụrụ kwaba okpu n'ezinaụlọ ahụ nwụrụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mgbe nke ahụ gachara, ụmụ okorobịa na-amalite gwube ili ozigbo ozigbo maka olili ya n'ihi na o nweghị ihe dịka ụlọ nchekwa ozu n'oge ahụ. A sịkwa na ozu e lighị eli nọ ọdụ ka nsị e kpoghị ekpo, maka na awọ koo, a nụ isi ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: E lichaa ozu, ọ bụrụ na ọ bụ nke apụghị ịkwa oge ahụ n'ihi otu ihe ma ọ bụ nke ọzọ; a ga-akanye ụbọchị a ga-akwa ya, ma zisasịara ndị nke ahụ metụtara ozi ka ha wee kwadobe, maka na ọ bụ mmadụ ka e ji aka.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Tupu ụbọchị akwamozu ahụ kpọnkwem, ndị inyom, bụ ụmụ nwaanyị a lụtara n'ogbe ahụ ma ọ bụ na okirikiri ahụ na-akpata ukwu nkụ n'otu n'otu ma chuta mmiri buje n'ezinaụlọ ahụ dịka enyemaka nke ha nyegara ndị ahụ na ntụnye nke ha iji hụ na ya bụ akwamozu gara nke ọma. Ha na-agakwa rụchaa ma zachasịa mbara ebe ahụ niile, ọ na-eti korikori, maka na ihe dị mma na anya gbara, ọbụnadị n'ebe e nwere ihe dị njọ. Ụmụnwoke na-agakwa gbuo achara na igu, maa ọwọkọ, ma gbochisiekwa ebe e kwesiri ile mgbochi n'iji kwadobe ya bụ ebe. N'echi ya bụ ụbọchị mmemme kpọnkwem, onye ọbụla nọ n'obodo ahụ torugoro ihe e ji mmadụ eme na apụta n'uju ma sonye na ya bụ mmemme anya mmiri, ma' ọnọ n'ụlọ ma ọnọ n'ọhịa' (ndị bi n'obodo ahụ na ndị bi n'ebe dị iche iche). Nke a bụ n'ihi na ebe onye na-akwa mmadụ ka ọ na-akwa onwe ya. Gidigidi bụ ugwu eze, maka na ọ zụọ gidigidi a hụ ọha, a mara na obodo nwere mmadụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nke ahụ wee bụrụ otu e si akwa ozu n'oge mbụ, bụ mgbe elu bụ ala ọsa, oge e ji mmadụ akpọrọ ihe karịa akụ, oge a na-emere ndị na-akwa ozu ebere, nakwa oge ndị na-akwa ozu na-emekwara onwe ha ebere.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mana oge ugbu a, ihe ndị a adịghịzịkwa otu ha dị na mbụ maka na amamihe kọzịrị ụkọ n'akpa onye amamihe, ebe uche zuru oke funahịgokwara onye akpa uche. Ihe niile wee na-adazị hakoro hakoro maka na onye ghara ụzọ si ọhịa, ya na osisi ọhịa ana-alụ. Isi ghara èdè kụọ mkpi, ọgịga abụrụ ọgụ na mgba.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ugbu a bụzị oge mmadụ ga anwụọ, kama a ga-eli ya, eburu ya ga dọbagodi n'ụlọ nchekwa ozu, ka a ga-asị na ọbụghịzị akwa ala ga-ata ya, ma ọ bụ na ọ bụghị n'ala ka a ga-eli ya. Nke ahụ ga-anọzịkwa ebe ahụ wee mụọ ọtụtụ ego, tinyere ego ndị ọzọ a na-emefuzị n'akwamozu ugbu a.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ugbu a bụzịkwa oge mmadụ na-aga ree ala, ree ngwongwo ya, ma ọ bụ mee ihe ndị ọzọ dị iche iche ka o wee nweta ego ọ ga-eji kwa ozu, maka na ndị mmadụ na-amazịkwa aka onye akwamozu ya ga-aka da ụda, ma ọ bụ wee kwo ekwo. Ọ dịzie ka a ga-asị na a na-agba asara ma ọ bụ na a na-eme mmemme okpensi. Nke a wee bụrụ n'ihi na ọ gbara anyị bụ ndị Igbo nchezọ, bụ ihe akwamozu pụtara.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ugbu a, ọtụtụ ndị nwere ndị ọrịa na ndị ogbenye dị iche iche n'ụlọ na-agbachị ha nkịtị, ha ana-anwụ ma ọ bụ weere isi na-eje ije, biri n'ụlọ akịrịka, agụọ ana-echikwa ha ọnụ n'ala. Onweghị onye ọbụla ga-ajụ ha ka a na-anwụ anwụ ka a na-ete ete, ma ndị ụlọ ma ndị ama. Mana ngwa ngwa onye ahụ mere kpọgem n'ala, ọ bụrụ ọnwụ; ịhụ ka ndị be ya ga-amalite ịnyụsị ego ka nsị. Ha ga-ebugodi ụzọ kụtuo ụlọ ọkpọkịrị aja ya ahụ ma rụọ agidigba ụlọ elu ọhụụ ebe ahụ. Ha ga-ekpochasịkwa ebe ọbụla ma were ego tie ya ịgba, dịka a ga-asị na anya onye ahụ adịghị mma ịhụ ụlọ elu na ndụ ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụfọdụ na-aga gokwara onye ahụ akpati kacha wee gala ọnụ n'ahịa, dịka a ga-asị na ili bụ ebe obibi, ma ọ bụ na ego na-aka mma ha oriri n'ọnwụ. Ụfọdụ ndị ọzọ na-agakwa biri ego n'ihu arụsị ka ha wee mee ka akwamozu onye nke ha dakarịa n'ụda, ebe ụfọdụ na-erisisi ihe a gara eji zụpụta ndị dị ndụ, were kwaa onye nwụrụ anwụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọbụnadị ndị ụka, ndị obodo, ụmụ ọkpụ na otu dị iche iche na-achọzịkwa ka ha were ụtụ regbuo onye na-akwa ozu, nke pụta nnọọ e jiri sị na ala adịghị mma bụ uru ndị nze. Nke a gosiri n'ebe o doro anya na ndị ụka na ndị otu dị iche iche socha agbanye mmadụ anya n'oke mmefusi ego n'akwamozu site n'ụtụ afọ eju akpa ego. Obi ebere adịghịzịkwa, maka na ha ga-eji ụtụ wee tichakọchaa onye na-akwa ozu ego dị ya n'aka, ma gwakwa ya ụdị nri na mmanya ọ ga-esi debere ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị obodo n'onwe ha enweghịzịkwa obi enyemaka ma ya fọdụzie ime ihe ọbụla nyegara onye na-akwa ozu, karịa ma ịbịa añụsịrị ya mmanya na irisiri ya nri o ji akwọ ndị ọgọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndi be anyị ọ bụzị gịnị na-eme??
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ bụzị a na-ekwu na ụlọ na-agba ọkụ, anyị ana-awụnyekuru ya abịrịbọ?? Ụfọdụ ndị bi ebe dị iche iche nụ na mmadụ nwụrụ n'obodo, ha agaghịdị akpọ n'ekwentị ma ọ bụ zie ozi, ma ya fọdụzịe ịbata ụlọ maka akwamozu ya. Ha asị na ihe siri ike, dịka a ga-asị na ha onwe ha agaghị anwụzị anwụ, ma ọ bụ na ọ bụghị mmadụ ga-eli ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị Igbo be anyị, ka anyị werenụ uche na-ata akara maka na ihe e mere na-ejighị uche na-aghọ nzuzu n'anya onye akpa uche. Ya mere, ka anyị burugodinụ ụzọ ghọta na akwamozu abụghị ịgba asara ma ọ bụ ime okpensi, nke o ji abụ mmemme Ekeresileesi. Kama, ọ bụ ihe anya mmiri na ihe iru uju.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka anyị kwụsị ịgbakọ ego na mkpọ chere mgbe mmadụ nwụọrọ ka anyị wee nyere ya aka, ma ọ bụ ịgbakụta mmadụ, onye ogbenye, onye ọrịa na ihe ndị ọzọ a ga-eme eme azụ rukwaa mgbe onye ahụ dara n'ụra ọnwụ, anyi e wee malite ịnyụlasị ego elu ka nsị, ịrụ ụlọ elu na ime ihe ndị ọzọ, iji sị na anyị kwara onye ahụ n'ụzọ dara ụda. Akpati abụghị ebe obibi.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ihe ndị a niile ga-enyere anyị aka ịhụ na anyị mere ihe ndị anyị kwesiri ime mgbe isi ka na-eku ume, ma nyekwa aka belata oke nghafu ego anyị na-emefusi n'akwamozu na n'isi onye nwụrụ anwụ. Ndị ụka n'aka nke ha kwesikwara iji ire ha gụọ eze ha ọnụ ma selata aka n'ụtụ na ihe oriri dị iche iche ha na-ana n'aka ndị na-akwa ozu tupu ha abịa ya bụ akwamozu, ka ihe wee hara ha na nso. Ka m gharakwa ịsị na ọ bụghịkwanụ ụka ịkwa mmadụ na-ebuga onye ahụ elu igwe. Mana ihe a gba n'aka, e jighị enyo elele ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ya bụ, ndị be anyị, ka onye ọbụla haa nke o kwesiri ịha ma mee nke o kwesiri ime iji hụ na akwamozuṅgara nke ọma, na-abụghịkwa nke mmefusi ego. Maka na a dịghị ala ụma agbasa mmiri n'okwute. Onye a gwara kwe, ahụ ọzọ, a gwakwa ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mbọ dị iche iche a na-agba maka ịhọpụtagharị gọvanọ Willie Obianọ nke ugboro abụọ enwetawanyena nnọọ nkwado, dịka ndị obodo Nawfịa na Enugwu-Agịdị dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Njikọka na steeti Anambra nọrọ n'izu gara aga wee guzobe mkpokọta ndị ntorobịa karịrị narị atọ n'ọnụ ọgụgụ nakwa ndị ndu ha stite n'aka nnukwu onye enyemaka pụrụ iche nye gọvanọ n'ihe gbasaara nchịkọba ndị ntorobịa, bụ maazị Oddy Akubuike.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka ọ naa-eguzobe ndị ntorobịa ahụ, ya bụ nnukwu onye enyemaka pụrụ iche chetaara ha na gọvanọ Obianọ emego nke ọma n'ahọ atọ na ọkara ọ nọgoro n'ọkwa ọchịchị, ma gwaziekwa ha ka ha baa n'ime ime obodo ha dịgasị iche iche mee ka ndị mmadụ mara mkpa ọ dị na ya bụ nwa amadi nwetara mmeri maka ịchị nke ugboro abụọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na nzaghachi, maazị Simon Ndulue na Nkem Obuzọr sitere Enugwu-Agịdị gbara akaebe banyere ọtụtụ ihe dị iche iche ọchịchị gọvanọ Obianọ meputagooro ndị ntorobịa na obodo ha, nke gụnyere iguzube ebe a na-amụ ọrụ aka dị iche iche, ebe obibi maka ndị ọrụ dọkịnta, inye ndị ntorobịa obodo ahụ karịrị narị anọ ọrụ, tinyere ọtụtụ ihe ndị ọzọ, ma kwekwa nkwa ịkwado ya bụ gọvanọ maka ịchị nke ugboro abụọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na Nawfịa, onye ndu ndị ntorobịa n'obodo ahụ bụ maazị Obiọrah Okechukwu, na ndị nchịkọba ụmụ agbọghọbịa n'obodo ahụ bụ Adaeze Ijeoma Nwankwọ na nwaada Tessy Nweke kwuputakwara maa gbaa akaebe n'ọtụtụ ihe gọvanọ Obianọ meputagoro na mkpa ọ dị inye ya na osote ya bụ Dkt. Nkem Okeke nkwado nke ugboro abụọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ihe pụtakarịchara ihe na mmemme ahụ gụnyere nguzobe e guzobere kpọmkwem ndị ndu nke nchịkọba ndị ntorobịa ahụ site n'aka onye enyemaka pụrụ iche nye osote gọvanọ n'ihe gbasaara okwe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị bụ maazị Anthony Otue, na nkwado ịchị nke ugboro abụọ nke e nyere gọvanọ na osote ya site n'aka ụmụafọ obodo abụọ ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ịgụ Aha n'ala Igbo pụtara inye nwata aha, ma ọ bụ ịba aha, dịka ndị si asụ. Aha bụ ejirimara onye ma bụrụkwa ihe onye na-aza. Onye ọbụla na ihe ọbụla dị n'ụwa nwere aha e jiri mara ya, ma ndị nwụrụ anwụ ma ndị dị ndụ; maka na onye enweghị aha nọ ọdụ ka oke osisi enweghị akwụkwọ. Ọbụnadị ụmụaka a mụrụ ọhụụ nakwa ụfọdụ ndị a ka bu n'afọ nwechakwuru aha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ala Igbo, ọ kachasị n'oge elu bụ ala ọsa na oge a na-ebute ụkwa n'osi ụkpaka, bụ oge gboo; ọ na-abụ nwaanyị tụrụ ime, nwoke atụrụ echiche, ọ kachasị ọ bụrụ nwoke ọnọdụdịịrị añaa. Echiche ebe a abụghị naanị maka ihe a ga-eri, ihe a ga-eji zụ nwa, ma ọ bụ ihe nwaanyị na afọ ime ga-eje; kama otu ihe a na-echekarị n'oge ahụ gụnyere echiche aha a ga-enye nwa bịara ụwa ma o seputere isi n'afọ nne ya. E cheechaa maka nke a ga-enye ya ma ọ bụrụ nwoke, e chee maka nke nwaanyị, maka na ọ nwebeghị onye maara ihe ya bụ mbekwu gara afọ ga-azụta.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ihe e ji ebido na gboo wee chebe echiche aha ahụ abụghị na nne na nna nwata ahụ apụghị inye ya aha ọbụla gbatara ha n'uche, kama ọ bụ maka ihi na ndị gboo ghọtara uru akpa agwụ baara eze dibịa ma ghọtakwa uru ọkpọntụ baara ụgụrụ. Ha ghọtara n'ezie na ọ bụ aha onye na-edu ya, maka na ọ bụ ihe onye kpọrọ nwa nkịta ya ka ọ na-aza ya. Ndị gboo ma uru ezi aha bara na ndụ mmadụ ọbụla, ihe aha onye pụtara, nakwa ihe aha onye pụrụ ibutere ya ma ọ bụ igbochiri ya n'ụwa ya. Ọ bụ ya mere ha ji echemi echiche ime, ma taakwa okwu eze tupuu ha agụọ nwata ọbụla aha, ka aha a gụrụ ya wee ghara iwetara ya 'ị makwara me m eze ka ewu' ma ọ bụ bụrụ ihe ọgbatauhie nye ya na ndụ ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Echiche na amamihe na-ejuputakwa n'aha ndị Igbo gụrụ mmadụ n'oge gboo ahụ maka na ha na-elechaa anya n'ihe mere na ndụ onye ahụ, ọ kachasị mgbe a dị ime ya; ihe mere na ndụ nne ma ọ bụ nna ya; ọnọdụ nwata ahụ n'ezinaụlọ ahụ, ihe a na-atụ anya ya n'aka ya; oge ma ọ bụ ụbọchị a mụrụ ya, tinyere ọtụtụ ihe ndị ọzọ ha na-elekwasị anya tupuu enye ya bụ nwata aha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ụbọchị ahụ a ga-agụ nwata ahụ aha kpọnkwem, ihe mkpori na-ezo ka mmiri maka na a ga-eri ma ñụọọ gwoo gwoo. Ndị ezinaụlọ ahụ na-ezikwa ndị mmadụ ka ha bịa nọnyere ha ụbọchị ahụ, rie ma ñụọrọ, maka na òkù nwa enweghị iro. Ihe ndị a bụ nnọọ nke na-egosi na a kwadoro ya bụ ụbọchị nke ọma. Nke kacha nke bụ na a na-ekpekwa ekpere ụbọchị ahụ kelee Chukwu Abịama n'isi nwa bịara ụwa, ma rịọkwazie ya ka o mee ka aha nwata ahụ ghara ịbụrụ ya ihe ọgbatauhie n'ụdị ọbụla; kama, ka o si n'elu si n'ala wetere ya chi ọma.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ṅ Nne na nna ga-eweputa aha izugbe a ga aba nwata ahụ, bụ nke onye ọbụla ga-eji mara ya. E nyechaa ya nke ahụ, nne ochie, nna ochie, nnukwu nne na nnukwu nna (n'otu n'otu) na-ewetakwa aha a ga-agụrụ ha nwata ahụ, bụ aha nke ha onwe ha ga na-akpọ ya.
