text: Ya bụ nwoke, bụ onye na-ere ọgwụ, ihe nwa, mmanya, ude, ihe oriri nakwa ọtụtụ ihe ndị ọzọ e ji enyere ndụ aka, sịrị na o teela ya jiri kpebe ekpere ka a nwụchikọọ ndị ahụ, bụ ndị o kwuru na ha na-abịa akpakasị ọnụ ụlọ ahịa ya oge ọbụla, wee ruo ugbu aka kpaara ya bụ ezeku udele.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na ntụnye nke ya, otu nwa amadi nọ ebe e jidere ya bụ nwata, bụ maazị Ikechukwu Ọffọr kwuru na o teela ya na ndị òtù ya siri zube ohi, ma nọrọkwa ebe gbaa n'anwụ onyonyoo dị iche iche na-egosi ebe ụfọdụ e jidegoro ya bụ nwata na ndị otu ya n'ohi n'oge gara aga, bụ ebe e setere ha na ihe dị iche iche ha zutere n'ohi.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Otu ọ dị, a hafeela nwata ahụ n'aka ndị uwe ojii steeti ahụ iji wee mee nnyocha miri emi, nwụchikọọ ndị ọzọ, ma kpụpụkwa ha ụlọ ikpe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nke a bụ nke e mere ka a mara site n'ọnụ onyeisi oche òtù ahụ na-ahụ maka nchịkọba nhọpụta ọchịchị n'ala anyị, bụ ụlọ ọrụ Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC), ọkammụta Yakubu Mahmood, n'okwu ya n'Abụja, dịka ọ kpọpụtara mpụtara ikpe azụ nke nhọpụta ahụ ụbọchị Wednesday.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọkammụta Mahmood mere ka a mara na onyeisi ala Buharị nwètara mmeri ahụ site n'inweta ntụli aka dị ndè iri na ise, otu narị puku na iri iteghete na otù, narị asatọ na iri anọ na asaa, (15,191,847) n'ime ntụli aka niile e nwetara na nhọpụta ahụ, nke dị ndè iri abụọ na asaa, narị puku atọ na iri abụọ na anọ, narị ire na iri asatọ na atọ (27,324,583), ebe nwa amadi ahụ jiri aha otu ndọrọ-ndọrọ ọchịchị 'Peoples Democratic Party' (PDP), bụ maazị Atiku Abụbakar gbàrà onye nke abụọ, site n'inweta ntụli aka dị ndè iri na otu, narị puku narị abụọ na iri ise na ise, narị iteghete na iri asaa na asatọ (11, 255,978).
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwuru na na-agbanyeghị na ọ bụ eziokwu na Buharị enwetachaghị nkwàdo zuru òkè na steeti Anambra na steeti Enugu, na o nwetazùrù ihe ruru paseenti iri abụọ na ise na steeti iri atọ na anọ ndị ọzọ dị n'ala anyị, tinyere Federal Capital Territory (FCT), nke gosiri na nwetàzuru ihe a chọrọ, dịka o siri dị n'akwụkwọ iwu na-achị ala anyị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onyeisi ala Buharị, bụ onye gbara ahọ iri asaa na isii ma bụrụkwa onye e kwuru na o nwètàrà mmeri na steeti iri na iteghete wee merie mmadụ iri asaa na abụọ ndị ọzọ, bụ ndị ya na ha zọrọ ọkwa ahụ, ebe maazị Atiku Abụbakar nwetara mmeri na steeti iri na asaa, tinyéré FCT.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Maazị Mahmood kwukwara na maazị Felix Nicholas, nke otu ndọrọ-ndọrọ ọchịchị 'Peoples Collation Party' (PCP) gbara onye nke atọ site n'inweta ntụli aka dị otu narị puku na iri, otu narị na iri iteghete na isii (110,196), ebe maazị John Gbor nke otu ndọrọ-ndọrọ 'All Progressive Grand Alliance' (APGA) gbara onye nke anọ, site n'inweta ntụli aka dị puku iri isii na isii, narị asatọ na iri ise na otu (66,851).
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị ọzọ soro wee zọọ ya bụ ọkwa onyeisi ala, otu ndọrọ-ndọrọ ọchịchị ha, na ntụli aka ha nwetara n'otu n'otu gụnyere:
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

(ACPN) 7,223 Mailafia Obadiah (ADC) 9,874 Yabagi Yusuf (ADP) 54,930 Nwachukwu Nwabuikwu (AGA) 4,689 Chief Umenwa Godwin (AGAP) 3,071 Obaje Ameh (ANDP) 3,104 Durotoye Olufela (ANN)- 16,779 Shittu (WTPN) 732 Ali Soyode (YES) 2,394 Moghalu Kingsley (YPP) 21,886
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onyeisiala Buharị na osote ya, bụ ọkammụta Yemi Osinbajo bụkwazị ndị e nyegoro akwụkwọ ikike na-egosi na ha bụ ndị tuuru ùgò na ya bụ nhọpụta, ma bụrụkwa nke e nyere ha n'Abụja ụbọchị Wednesday site n'aka onyeisi oche ụlọ ọrụ INEC, bụ ọkammụta Mahmood Yakubu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya dịka ọ na-anabata ya bụ nturu ùgò, onyeisi ala Buharị tòrò ndị dị iche iche sonyere na ya bụ nhọpụta, nakwa ụmụafọ ala Nigeria n'ihi nkwàdo ahụ dara ụda ha nyèrè ya, iji sị ya chịrị gaba n'ihu, ma kwekwazie nkwà na ọchịchị ya ga-aga n'ihu n'ọrụ ọma ahụ o ji n'aka n'inwògharị ala Nigeria na ibu agha megide mpụ na aghụghọ n'ala anyị. Ọ kọwara ya bụ nhọpụta ọchịchị e mere dịka nke magburu onwe ya na nke gheere anya oghe, ma tòkwazie ụmụ Nigeria maka irube isi nye iwu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ihe bànyere otu e siri mee ya bụ nhọpụta ọkwa ọchịchị onyeisi ala na nke ndị ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu etiti, ọ bụ eziokwu na a hụtara ọtụtụ ihe ọdachi, oke nsogbu, ọnwụ na ọgba aghara na mpaghara ebe dị iche iche n'ala anyị, ya bụ ntụli aka bụ nnọọ nke gara nke ọma ma gakwa siriri werere na steeti Anambra.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Otu ọ dị, e nwegasịrị ụfọdụ ihe ndapụta na ihe ịgbaghàchi aka elekere azụ dapụtasịrị ma chọọ ibì nhọpụta ahụ aka ọjọọ na mpaghara ebe dị iche iche na ya bụ steeti n'oge nhọpụta ahụ. Iji maa atụ, e nwegasịrị ngharịpụ nke akụrụngwa e ji enyocha akwụkwọ ikike e ji a akwụkwọ, bụ 'Smart Card Reader' n'ebe dị iche iche a na-atụ akwụkwọ n'Ebenatọr, Ọsụmenyi na Ụkpọr dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Nnewi South, mana ndị ji ọkwa 'Supervisory Presiding Officers' (SPOs) n'ebe ndị ahụ mere ngwa ngwa wèta ndị dị mma wee gbanwee ha ozigbo. E nwekwara igbu oge tupuu a malite ịgụkọ akwụkwọ a tụrụ atụ n'ime mkpu nke isii (ward six) Ụkpọr, n'ihi na o nweghị ọ bụnadị otu onye nchekwa nọ n'ebe ahụ, nke mezịrị egwu jiri jide ndị ọ INEC nọ n'ebe ahụ, wee ruo mgbe ndị nta akụkọ wụchara n'ebe ahụ, wee kpọtụrụ ma kpesara ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ INEC banyere nke ahụ, nke mezịrị ka e zìte ndị ọrụ nchekwa DSS n'ebe ahụ ozigbo n'ebe ahụ, e wee màlite ịgụkọ ihe a tụtara.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Site na ngagharị ndị ọzọ ndị nta akụkọ mere ụbọchị ahụ n'ọtụtụ ebe dị iche iche a na-atụ akwụkwọ na ya bụ steeti, nke gụnyere Ụbụlụisiụzọ dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Ihiala, Nimo, Abagana na Enugwu-ukwu dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Njikọka; a chọpụtakwara na ndị mmadụ nupùtara n'ìgwè ma sonyesie ike na ya bụ nhọpụta, ebe ọtụtụ n'ime ha, nke gụnyere osote aka na-achị steeti Anambra, bụ dọkịta Nkem Okeke kwupùtara ka obi dị ha, ma tòókwa ụlọ ọrụ INEC maka ezi nhàzi ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'aka nke ọzọ, a chọpụtakwara na ịtụ akwụkwọ amaliteghị n'oge n'ụfọdụ ebe, nke gụnyere ụlọ ezumezu Chima dị n'Abagana dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Njikọka na Ụmụike dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Awka South, ebe ụfọdụ ndị ọzọ bụkwa ebe a chọpụtara na ihe agachaghị otu o kwèsiri n'ihi ezughị oke nakwa ngharịpụ nke akụrụngwa dị iche iche e ji arụ ọrụ, na-agbànyeghị na e mechaara nwee mgbata ọsọ nke ụlọ ọrụ INEC.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Akụkọ agbasala na Social media na Emefiele nwetara akwụkwọ ozi site na Ụlọ Ọrụ Onye Isi Ala Muhammadu Buhari, ụnyaahụ, ka ọ hapụ ọkwa ya dịka Gọvanọ Ụlọ Akụ Etiti.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'akụkọ anyị nwetara site n'ụlọ ọrụ Onye Isi Ala nke gbaruru ihu na ọ dịghị eziokwu dị n'akụkọ ahụ kwuru na: Onye Isi Ala enweghị ike ịchụ Gọvanọ Ụlọ Akụ Etiti ala anyị ma ọ bụrụ na o nwetaghị nkwado nke Ndị Ụlọ Ome Iwu nke ala anyị. O kwuru na ya bụ akụkọ bụ asị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Oge TheCable tụlere ya bụ akụkọ dịka otu esiri kwụsị Muhammad Sanusi II, onye jiburu ọkwa dịka Gọvanọ Ụlọ Akụ Etiti n'ọrụ, ozi anyị nwetara sịrị: Nkwụsinaọrụ dị iche na Nchụpụnaọrụ, na Emefiele emebeghị ihe ọ bụla nke ga-eme ka a chụpụ ya n'ọrụ, kwụsị ya n'ọrụ ma ọ bụ si ya jee zuo ike.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Gọvanọ Ụlọ Akụ Etiti Ala Naịjiria, Maazị Godwin Emefiele
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nkebi asatọ nke Akwụkwọ Iwu Ụlọ Akụ Etiti nke afọ puku abụọ na asaa kwuru na Onye Isi Ala ga-ewepụ Gọvanọ Ụlọ Akụ Etiti ma ọ bụrụ na ụzọ abụọ n'ime ụzọ atọ ka n'ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ndị Ụlọ Ome Iwu ala anyị akwado mwepụ ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Oge ọlụ Emefiele dịka Gọvanọ Ụlọ Akụ Etiti ka a na-atụ anya ga-abịa n'isi njedebe na ụbọchị atọ nke ọnwa Junu, afọ puku abụọ na iri na iteghete - ya bụ afọ ise dịka a họpụtachara ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ozi ọzọ ruru anyị aka kwuru na akụkọ ahụ nke na abụghị eziokwu agbasala rinne dịka ọ fọdụrụ nanị ọnwa atọ ka oge ọlụ ya zuo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nkebi iri nke Akwụkwọ Iwu Ụlọ Akụ Etiti kwuru na a ga-ahọpụta Gọvanọ na ndị osote gọvanọ ịrụ ọrụ afọ ise n'oge mbụ na onye ọ bụla n'ime ha tozukwara okè ka ahọpụta kwa ya ọzọ n'afọ na-akarighi afọ ise.

text: Ozi a sị na Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Mgbasa Ozi Vanguard, ụbọchị ise nke ọnwa March afọ puku abụọ na iri na iteghete.

text: N'okwu ya na mmemme ahụ, onye chikọbara ya oriri na ọñụñụ ma bụrụkwa onyeisi otu GOGAN, bụ maazị Johnobosco Ọnụnkwọ kọwara ya bụ nturu ugo Buharị dịka nturu ugo nke ụmụafọ ala Nigeria niile n'izùgbe, ma kwuo na nke ahụ bụ nnọọ ntọpụ n'agbụ nye ụmụafọ Nigeria nke ugboro abụọ. O mere ka a mara na ọ bụ Chineke nna jiri aka ya wee guzobe Buharị n'oche site n'inye ya mmeri nke ugboro abụọ ahụ, iji wee chịkwuo ala Nigeria afọ anọ ọzọ, ma sị na nke ahụ kwesiri ịbụ obi añụrị na ihe oke oriri na ọñụñụ nyere onye ọbụla bụ ezi nwaafọ ala Nigeria.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Maazị Ọnụnkwọ gara n'ihu kpọpụtasịa ụfọdụ n'ime ihe dị iche iche onyeisi ala Buharị meputagoro kemgbe afọ ole na ole ọ nọgoro n'ọkwa, nke gụnyere itute na inwògharị ọnọdụ akụnụba ala Nigeria, ibu agha megide mpụ, arụrụ ala na ịmazụ ego ọhanaeze, idozigharịsị okporo ụzọ dị iche iche, imemìla mkpamkpa ndị Boko Haram, igbochì nsogbu na-adapụta n'etiti ndị ọrụ ugbo na ndị Fụlani na-achị ehi, iweputa atụmatụ itinye ego Nigeria n'otu akpa ego bụ 'Treasury Single Account' (TSA), atụmatụ ịzụ ụmụakwụkwọ nri, tinyere ọtụtụ ihe ndị ọzọ, ma kwuo na ihe ndị a niile so n'ihe gbaara ya akaebe n'oge ọ na-achụ nta nkwàdo, nke mezịrị ụmụ Nigeria jiri tụnyere ya nkwádo n'ụzọ dara ụda.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ chetaara ụmụafọ Igbo ịhụnanya Buharị nwere n'ebe ha nọ, gosipụta ezi olile anya o nwere na ọ ga-enyefe ha ọkwa n'aka n'ahọ 2023, ma kpọkuo ha ka onye ọbụla gaa n'ihu ịkwàdò ọchịchị ya, ọbụnadị ka ọ rịọrọ ka onye ọbụla pụta n'ìgwè ma tụnyere ndị niile dị iche iche ji aha otu ndọrọ ndọrọ All Progressive Congress azọ ọkwa dị iche iche na nhọpụta ahụ a ga-eme ụbọchị Satọdee.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu nke ha n'otu n'otu, ode akwụkwọ otu ndọrọ APC na steeti Anambra, bụ maazị Chuks Agụfụgo; onyeisi ndị ntorobịa otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ahụ na steeti ahụ, bụ maazị Augustine Mụọmaife, na otu onye ọzọ selitere isi n'otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ahụ ma bụrụkwa kọmishọna na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi na steeti ahụ, bụ maazị Jerry Amilo kọwara mmemme ahụ dịka ihe iji sị ndị mmadụ daalụ maka ịtụrụ onyeisi ala Buharị akwụkwọ, ma rịọkwa ha ka ha gaa n'ihu ịkwàdo ya na otu ndọrọ ndọrọ APC.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ha kọwara Buharị dịka nwoke maara nke ekwe na-akụ n'ihe gbasaara ọchịchị obodo, kwuo na o wulitela ọnọdụ mmepe ala anyị n'ụzọ pụtara ihè, kwàlite ọnọdụ akụnụba ala anyị, ma mepùtekwa ọtụtụ ihe ndị ọzọ a na-ahụ anya na mpaghara ebe dị iche iche n'ala Nigeria, nke ndị Igbo ritere ọtụtụ uru na ya n'ụzọ dị iche iche. Ha rịọkwara ka ụmụafọ ala Nigeria gaa n'ihu ịkwàdò otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ahụ iji hụ na ọrụ ọma ahụ gàrà n'ihu, ma mekwa ka nkwà ahụ e kwèrè inyefè ndị Igbo ọkwa ọchịchị ala anyị n'ahọ 2023 pụtara ìhè.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ dị mkpa k'anyị sonye nke ọma n'emume nke mmụọ a. Site na ịbu ọnụ, anyị ga-adị ike ịji were merie agụụ niile nke anụ arụ, ma cheta na Chineke enyewo anyị ike ịji were merie ọnwụnwa niile.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Site n'ịnye onyinye, anyị ga-ewere ihe anyị nwere nyetụ ndị o nweghị ka ọ há ha na ndị ụwa na-atụ n'ọnụ. Ezi àgwà dị otu a ga-enyere anyị aka ịmata na anyị niile bụ otu ezinaụlọ n'ime Chineke.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nanị otu Chineke dị nke ji ike niile maka ndụ anyị. Maka ezi ọlụ niile nke ebere na obiọma anyị mere site na onyinye anyị nyere mmadụ ibe anyị, bụ Christ k'anyị mere ya (Matiu isi nke iri abụọ na ise, amaokwu nke iri anọ)
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Site na ekpere, anyị ga-amata na ndabere anyị dị na Chineke.

citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ekpere Maka Wednezdee Ntụ
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onyenweanyị, Onye Nsọ, mere anyị ebere. Anyị ekwupụta mmehie anyị n'iru gị. Anyị emehiewo megide Gị ma ewepụ ebere gị na amara gị, anyị ga-abụ ntụ. Anyị echegharịa na mmehie niile anyị ugbua. Onyenweanyị, dịka anyị na-abanye n'ime oge Lent a, nọrọ anyị nso. Nyere anyị aka site na mmụọ nsọ gị, k'anyị were nwee ezi nchegharị sitere n'ime obi anyị. Nyere anyị aka site na mmụọ nsọ gị, k'anyị were nwee ume iji were merie onye iro.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ekele dịrị gị, Onyenweanyị, na mmemme mbilite na ọnwụ gị na-abịa! Ọnwụ enweghị ike, o nweghịkea mmeri n'ihi Jesus. Ebube, nsọpụrụ na otuto dịrị aha gị. Nara ekele n'ihi na ị napụtawo anyị. Nyere anyị anyị ịnọgide n'ume na ọñụ nke oge a dịka anyị na-aga n'ime ịsụ niile nke dị n'ime ya. Nyere anyị aka ịmị mkpụrụ nke Mmụọ Nsọ.

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ekele dịrị Gị na ntụ nke dị na egedege ịhu anyị egosighị ihe anyị bụ. Ọ bụ ezie na site na ntụ ka anyị si pụta, mana arụ anyị na mmụọ anyị na onwe anyị, nọ na-echere mgbapụta ọma ahụ na nyeghachi zuru okè nke ihe niile. Nyere anyị aka ilegide anya ụbọchị ahụ, ma mee ka ọ bịa ọsịsọ, Onyenweanyị Jesus Christ. Amen.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark

citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark

text: Ka Chineke nọnyeere anyị n'ime oge a. Amen.

text: Ngwá ngwa a kpọrọ Buhari dịka onye nwetara mmeri na ntụli aka nke ahụ emere na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri abụọ na atọ nke ọnwa Febụwarị n'ọnụ ụtụtụ Wednezdee izu ụka gara aga, Haruna mere ka okwu ya ghara ịbụ ihe dara n'àjà dịka o gwuru mmiri dị na ọwa mmiri ide ma ñụkwaa ya bụ mmiri na-adịghị ọcha. Akụkọ gbasara ya mere ka Social Media mee mkpatụ ma zụọ azụọ.

text: Mana ụnyaahụ, anyị nwetara ozi na ya bụ nwa amadị agawala ije n'ala mmụọ site na ọgbụgba ọbara nke mgbarịma afọ (Gastrointestinal bleeding).

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Site na ozi ruru anyị aka, e bugara Haruna n'ụlọ ọgwụ dịka o kwuchara na ọ na-enwe ihe mgbu dị ike n'afọ ya ma na-anyụkwa ọbara ka mgbe ụbọchị abụọ.
label: igbo

citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Anyị ga-echeta na n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na ise, otu nwoke aha ya bụ Abubakar Duduwale, gara ije site na Yola, Steeti Adamawa ruo Abuja ịji gosipụta obi añụrị ya na mmeri Buhari.
label: igbo

citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'afọ gara aga, Minista Ọlụ Ahụ Ike dị n'aka, Ọkammụta Isaac Adewole, gara leta nwoke ahụ na Ụlọ Ọgwụ Etiti (Federal Medical Center) nke dị na Yola, ka ya bụ nwoke nwechara ihe mmerụ ahụ n'ụkwụ ya site na nje m ahụ dị anya o jere.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Gọvanọ Obianọ kwuputara nke a oge ya na ndị ọrụ oyibo n'ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche na steeti ahụ zùtere n'isi ụlọ ọrụ Jerome Udọjị dị n'Awka bụ isi obodo steeti ahụ. O mere ka a mara ezi mbọ ọchịchị ya gbagoro na njikere ọ dị ịga n'ihu n'ịkwalite ọdịmma na ezi obibi ndụ ndị ọrụ na steeti ahụ, dịka o si eme kemgbe ọ batara n'ọkwa ọchịchị, ma bụrụkwa nke o kwuru na ya na-eme site na nkwàdo na ezi mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ndị omebe iwu steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ịgbakwàsà ụkwụ na nke ahụ, ọ gara n'ihu mekwa ka a mara na ya ezutela ma nwee mkparịta ụka, ya na ndị isi òtù jikọtara ndị ọrụ oyibo steeti ahụ bànyere ihe dị iche iche na-akpà ndị ụrọ na steeti ahụ, ma nọrọkwazie ebe ahụ kwuwaa hoohaa n'ihu ndị ọrụ ahụ na Anambra ga-abụ steeti mbụ n'ala Nigeria ga-akwụ ụgwọ ọnwa opekata mpe ahụ bụ 'Minimum Wage', ngwa ngwa e kpebìrì ma kwekọrịta ka a kwụbazie ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ sị na ya ga-emezùputakwa nkwekọrịta niile ahụ ha mere ngwa ngwa ọ malitere kwụba ụgwọ ọnwa ọhụụ ahụ. O kwuru ya bụ ụgwọ ọnwa ọhụụ ga-eme ka e nwee mmakwasa nke ihe karịrị otu ìjèrí Naịra na ụma anọ n'ọnụ ego steeti ahụ na-akwụ ndị ọrụ ya, ma kwuo na na-agbanyeghị na nke ahụ abụghị ihe dị mfe, na ya ga-akwụ ya, n'ihi ezi mmasị ahụ o nwere ịkwàlite ọdịmma ndị ọrụ na ya bụ steeti.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ chetakwazịịrị ndị ọrụ ahụ na n'imezùputa ihe niile ndị a, e kwesiri ka e nwee ezi mmekọrịta n'etiti ndị ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu na isi ọchịchị steeti ahụ, dịka e nwere ugbu a, iji hụ na ha ga na-akwàdo amụmà iwu, amụmà ego ọrụ na ezi atụmatụ ndị ọzọ dị iche iche a tụpụtara. N'ihi ya, ọ kpọkuzịrị ma dụọ ndị ọrụ niile ahụ na ụmụafọ Anambra n'izugbe ka ha pụta n'ìgwè, kwàdo ma tụnyere ndị niile ji aha otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị 'All Progressive Grand Alliance' (APGA) apụta ịzọ ọkwa ụlọ omebe iwu steeti ahụ, iji mee ka ya bụ ezi ebumnobi bụrụ nke pụtara ihè, gaa n'ihu ma dịkwa ọkpụtọrọkpụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Gọvanọ Obianọ kpọrọ oku a n'Awka oge ya na ndị ọrụ oyibo steeti ahụ na-akparịta ụka, bụkwazi nke ọ nọrọ na ya wee mee ka ha mara oke mkpà ọ dị na otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ahụ nwetara mmeri dara ụda na ya bụ ntụliaka. Ọ kọwara nhọpụta ahụ a ga-eme n'ụbọchị Satọdee dịka nke nwere ọtụtụ ihe so ya n'azụ, nakwa nke pụrụ inwe mmetụta pụtara ìhè n'ọchịchị steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O mere ka a mara na, dịka ọ bụ otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị APGA ji ọkwa ọchịchị na steeti ahụ ugbu a, na ọ bụrụ na e nweghị ọkà n'ọnụ ọgụ ndị otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ahụ n'ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu steeti ahụ, na o nwere ike ibì ezi ọchịchị dị na ya bụ steeti ugbu a aka ọjọọ, ma gbaghachikwa aka elekere azụ n'ebe o metụtara ịkwàlite ọdịmma ndị ọrụ oyibo steeti ahụ nakwa ebe o metụtara ya bụ ọrụ mmepe na-aga n'ihu ugbu a, n'ihi na ọ gaghị adịchazị mfe ịkwàdò atụmatụ ọrụ, atụmatụ ego ọrụ na ọmarịcha atụmatụ ndị ọzọ n'ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu ahụ, dịka e si eme ya ugbu a, maka na a ga-enwezị ọtụtụ ndị kwe na ndị ekweghị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'iji gbanahị nke ahụ, gọvanọ Obianọ kpọkuzịrị ndị ọrụ oyibo steeti ahụ ka ha binyere otu ndọrọ ndọrọ APGA aka iji nweta mmeri dara ụda na nhọpụta ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na ntụnye nke ya, osote aka na-achị ya bụ steeti, bụ dọkịta Nkem Okeke, onye kwuputara na ọ dị oke mkpa ka onye ọbụla bụ ezi nwaafọ steeti ahụ tụnyere otu ndọrọ ndọrọ APGA na nhọpụta ahụ, kpọpụtasịrị ọtụtụ ihe dị iche iche gọvanọ Obianọ meputagoro n'ebe o metụtara mmepe izugbe nke steeti ahụ, nke gụnyere ịrụ na idozigharị okporo ụzọ n'ọtụtụ ebe dị iche iche na itinyesi ọkụ na ha, iwèta ezi nchekwa ndụ na akụnụba, inye obodo niile dị na steeti ahụ ego ka ha wee rụọ ihe dị ha mkpà, iji hụ na obodo ọbụla ritere úrù n'ọchịchị ya, tinyere ọtụtụ ihe ndị ọzọ. Ọ rịọrọ ndị dị iche iche a kpasùrù iwe n'ụdị ọbụla n'otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ahụ ka iwe ha dàjụọ, ma kpọkuo ha ka onye ọbụla tinye aka na mbọ ahụ a na-agba ịhụ na ya bụ otu ndọrọ ndọrọ nwetara nturu ugo dara ụda ọzọ dịka o nwetara n'oge e mere ntụliaka maka ọkwa gọvanọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na mbụ n'ozi nnọọ ya, onyeisi ọrụ oyibo na steeti ahụ, bụ ọkaiwu Harry Udu chetaara ndị ọrụ oyibo ahụ ebe ha siri màlite nà otu ọnọdụ dịịrị ha na mgbe gara aga, bụ mgbe a na-eji ha ụgwọ ọrụ ọtụtụ ọnwa, mgbe a dịghị akwụ ha ụgwọ ịla ezumike nka, nakwa mgbe ha gabigara ihe iche aka mgba dị iche iche n'ịhụ ọrụ ha n'ihi otu e siri gbakụta ha azụ, wee ruo mgbe ọchịchị nọ ugbu a na steeti ahụ bàtàrà n'ọkwa.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ gara n'ihu chetara ha ihe ndị ọzọ ọchịchị Obianọ meere ha na nke ọ ka na-emere ha ugbu a, ma e wezuga ịkwụ ha ụgwọ ọnwa na ụgwọ niile ruuru ha n'oge na otu o kwesiri, nke gụnyere ibunye ha akpa osikapa n'ekeresimeesi ọbụla, iweputa ụgbọala e ji ebuta ma na ebula ha n'ọrụ site na mpaghara ebe dị iche iche ha si abịa, itinye ego n'ụgwọ ọnwa ndị ọrụ, idozigharịsị ụlọ ọrụ gọọmenti steeti ahụ, tinyere ihe ndị ọzọ, ma dụzie ya ka ha gosi Gọvanọ n'ọchịchị ya dị ha ahụ mma site n'ịtụnyere otu ndọrọ ndọrọ APGA na nhọpụta ụbọchị Satọdee ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na nzaghachi n'aha ndị ọrụ ahụ, onyeisi otu jikọtara ndị ọrụ oyibo na steeti ahụ, bụ maazị Jerry Nnụbịa, kwere gọvanọ Obianọ nkwà itinye ihe niile a gwara ha n'ọrụ site n'ịtụnyere otu ndọrọ ndọrọ APGA n'ùjú ụbọchị Satọdee, ma kwuputakwa nkwàdo ha nye ọchịchị ya, bụ nke o kwùrù na ọ dị ha nnọọ ahụ mma.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na mkpụrụ ụbọchị asaa, otu egwu bọọlụ Madrid abụrụla ndị a gbapụrụ na iko Copa del Rey, iko La Liga na agbata nke iri na isii na Champions League, bụ asọmpi ha kwetara na ọ bụ naanị ha bụ eze na ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ha ebuola ya bụ iko ugboro atọ na-esepụghị aka, na ugboro anọ n'ime afọ ise gara aga, ebe oge ikpe azụ ndị egwu bọọlụ Madrid erughị agbata nke asatọ bụ n'afọ puku abụọ na iri, bụ n'afọ mbụ nke Cristiano Ronaldo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ronaldo zọpụtara Madrid n'afọ gara aga n'ime agbata nke asatọ ebe Gareth Bale bunyere ha ya bụ iko, mana ebe Ronaldo anaghị agbaziri ndị egwu bọọlụ Madrid, Bale bụ onye ewebatara ewebata na ya bụ egwuregwu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Solari ahụla ihe mgbanwe dị iche ka achụchara Julen Lopetegui n'ọnwa Novemba, mana otu egwu bọọlụ ya ka ndị egwu bọọlụ Barcelona ji akara iri na abụọ were na-agha na nkwụdo La Liga, hụrụ ka izu ụka a siri jọrọ ha njọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye Isi egwu bọọlụ Madrid, Florentino Perez nọzi n'ihe mgbagwoju anya ebe ọ maghị ma ọ bụ ya hapụ Solari rue ọgwụgwụ afọ bọọlụ a, ma ya fọdụzie ị bido afọ bọọlụ ọhụrụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Solari nwere ike inwe ọtụtụ mkpesa. Ajax bụ ndị na-akwụghị ofuma dịka emerichara ha ọkpụ abụọ asatara otu na ụkwụ nke mbụ mana ha bịara na Santiago Bernabeu were bụrụ akwa a kwụrụ, site na mmeri ịtụ na-anya ọkpụ ise asatara atọ na nchịkọta ụkwụ abụọ ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Hakim Ziyech na David Neres gbanyere goolu abụọ n'ọkara nke mbụ ebe Dusan Tadic mere ya atọ dịka Marco Asensio nyechara ndị Madrid olileanya. Ka nkeji abụọ gasịrị, Lasse Schone gbanyere bọọlụ n'ebe ọnụ goolu ndị Madrid tupu achụpụ Nacho.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Bale batara ka nkeji iri abụọ na iteghete gachara were nọchie Lucas Vazquez mana nwa amadị a bụ onye mba Wales gbara bọọlụ kụrụ n'ìgwè ọnụ goolu ma tufuo ohere ọma abụọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Sergio Ramos nọ n'akụkụ ebe o nwetachara akwụkwọ edo edo ọ kpachara anya nweta nke mere ka ọ ghara ịso gba bọọlụ ahụ ebe o jupụtara na olileanya na ha emeriela agbata ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Raphael Varane kara ime ka nkea bịa na mmezu n'ime nkeji ise mana bọọlụ ahụ nke ọ mara ise site na yard isii gara n'elu ọnụ goolu. Ndị egwu bọọlụ Ajax werezie ọnọdụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Toni Kroos, amaghị ihe ọ na-eme n'abalị ahụ niile, ka a natara bọọlụ site na ịtụ bọọlụ ebe Dusan Tadic gbara ọsọ n'aka nri. Tadic kwụsịrị maka Ziyech, onye tinyere bọọlụ ahụ ụkwụ aka ekpe ya o were baa n'ọnụ goolu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ajax jupụtara n'ike dịka Neres kpara Dani Carvajal n'akụkụ ebe Tadic mekwara otu ihe ahụ dịka ọ dọkpụgharịrị Casemiro na-etiti ama egwuregwu ahụ tupu onye bọọlụ ahụ maka goolu nke abụọ. Neres hapụrụ Thibaut Courtious n'ọnọdụ na-adịghị mma dịka ọ gbanyere bọọlụ ahụ maka goolu nke abụọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Vazquez na Vinicius Junior hapụrụ ama egwuregwu ahụ n'anya mmiri site na ihe mmerụ ahụ ha nwetara. Bale batara, ya na Asensio, were gbaa ọsọ na aka ekpe mana bọọlụ ọ gbara site n'akụkụ ahụ gara n'elu ọnụ goolu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị nkwado na-eme mkpọtụ iji kwado ndị nke ha dịka ọkara nke mbụ gara mana ọnọdụ Madrid kawanyere njọ, ha na-ewepụta ohere mana ha enweghị ike iji ohere ndị a were mepụta ezi ihe. Benzema kpara Ziyech mana ọ gbafuru bọọlụ ya, oge a ka Ajax ji mee ka ọnọdụ ha kwudosie ike site na ị gbanye nke atọ na-edochaghị anya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ha sitere n'aka nri were gaa n'aka ekpe, gaghachikwa n'etiti ọzọ, ebe Donny van de Beek nyere bọọlụ Tadic ahụ, onye ji iwe na ọnụma were gbanye ya n'elu ọnụ goolu
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mkpọtụ kwụsịrị dịka refirii Felix Brych chere ka VAR kwuo, ebe bọọlụ ahụ dịka ka ọ gafechago maka ịtụ ya tupu Noussair Mazraoui agbapụta ya. Site n'akụkụ igwe onyonyo, ahụchaghị nke ọma mere ya bụ goolu jiri bụrụ nke a gụnyere.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Madrid chọrọ goolu atọ na nkeji iri abụọ na-anọ na abụọ na nkeji iri abụọ, dịka Asensio gbanyere bọọlụ Sergio Reguilon gbabatara n'iru ọnụ goolu were nye ha olileanya anya. Mana ka akwụsịchara bọọlụ dịka Erik ten Hag chọrọ ị gbatu Schone, a gbanyere bọọlụ ahụ n'elu ọnụ goolu Courtious.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Frenkie de Jong tihiere ụkwụ na nkeji nke iri asatọ na anọ, nke nyere Luka Modric ezi ohere n'akụkụ ahụ mana Benzema lara ya bụ ohere n'iyi. Nacho nwetara akwụkwọ ọbara ọbara oge ya na Van de Beek zọchara bọọlụ, ebea ka ike jiri gwụ ndị Madrid.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ya bụ nkesà akụrụngwa na ihe ndị ọzọ bụ nke weere ọnọdụ ụbọchị Wednesday n'ụlọ ọba ego ala anyị dị n'Awka, bụ isi obodo steeti ahụ, ebe e siri wee busaa ha n'okpuru ọchịchị niile e nwere na ya bụ steeti.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ajụjụ ọnụ ndị nta akụkọ gbàrà ya banyere nke ahụ, onyeisi ụlọ INEC na steeti Anambra, bụ dọkịta Nkwachukwu Ọrjị mere ka a mara na ihe e ji ekesà ma na-ebusa ya n'oge bụ ka e wee hụ na ya bụ akụrụngwa na ihe ndị ahụ niile ruchara ebe a ga-eji ha wee rụọ ọrụ n'oge ma zùkwa òkè, n'ihi na a ga-anọkwa ebe ahụ e bùgara ha wee wepùta ogè nyòchagharị ha niile ọzọ, iji hụ na o nweghị nke ọbụla na-eri mperi, ma ọ bụ na-enwe nsògbu tupu ụbọchị ahụ a ga-eme nhọpụta.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ sị na ọ bụ ụbọchị Satọdee ahụ a ga-eme nhọpụta maka ndị ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu ka a ga-emegharịkwa nhọpụta ahụ e kwuru na a ga-emegharị n'ọgbọ nta nkwàdo Agụata na 'Idemili South' bụ ebe e nwere ụfọdụ ihe iche aka mgba na ihe ọdachi ndị ọzọ n'ụbọchị mbụ ahụ e mere ya bụ nhọpụta ìzùgbe. O kwupùtazịkwara ezi njikere nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị ugbu a ịchịkọba nhọpụta ọchịchị ga-aga siriri werere na bụ steeti ahụ, n'ihi na ha akwadola ma tinyesie ihe niile ha kwesiri itinye n'ọrụ màkà ya bụ nhọpụta.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ kpọkuzịkwara ọhanaeze na-atụ akwụkwọ, ndị ọrụ otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ndị dị iche iche na-egwu okwe ndọrọ ndọrọ ka onye ọbụla kpachara anya ya, kwanyere onwe ya ùgwù ma mee ihe n'usòrò iwu, iji hụ na e nweghị ụdị nsogbu obụla ga-adapụta ọzọ na mpaghara ebe ọbụla na steeti ahụ, n'ihi na onye ọbụla a ga-enweta n'isukanye ọgba aghara n'ụdị ọbụla ụbọchị ahụ ga-eji anya ya abụọ wee hụ ntị ya na-ejighị ènyò.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụkọchukwu Obimma, bụ onye a maara nke ọma dịka Ebubemụọnsọ kpọrọ oku a ma nye ya bụ ndụmọdụ n'ofufe nrò otite mmanụ e fèrè n'ụlọ ụka 'Blessed Iwene Tansi Catholic Church' dị n'Ụmụdiọka, n'okpuru ọchịchị Dunukọfịa nke steeti Anambra, bụkwa ebe ọ nọrọ wee gbarụọ ihu bàbyere mgbusi ahụ e gbusiri ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ aka ha dị ọcha na mpaghara ebe dị iche iche n'ala anyị na nhọpụta nke mbụ ahụ e mere n'izu ụka abụọ gara aga, ma kọwaa ya dịka nke jọgburu onwe ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O chetaara ọhanaeze na ịzọ ọchịchị abụghị tigbuo zọgbuo n'ihi na o nweghị ihe ọbụla bụ ihe nke ụwa mmadụ kwesiri iji tụfuo ndụ ya, ma ya fọdụzie nke ihe gbasaara igwù okwe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ma dụọ ndị nọ na ya bụ égwú ka ha zụọ ya n'usoro iwu. Ọ gwara ndị na-atụ akwụkwọ ka onye ọbụla kee nkwụchà, sepu aka n'ihe ọbụla pụrụ isukanye nsogbu n'oge ndọrọ ndọrọ a, ọ bụnadị dịka ọ rịọrọ ha ka onye ọbụla pụta n'igwe ụbọchị ahụ, ma tụnyere onye o chere na ọ bụ ya kacha mma akwụkwọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

Nke ka ọ kọwara na ọ gaghị adị irè ma ọ bụrụ na ndị ókwé ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ọzọ abụrụ ndị a tụnyere n'ụlọ Ome Iwu nke ga-eme ka ezi ọchịchị gọvanọ Obianọ bù n'obi ghara ịdị irè.

text: N'itule ọtụtụ ụsa soro akụkọ ahụ, ọ bụ ihe doro anya na ọtụtụ ụmụ afọ Anambra Steeti kpọrọ ekwo nkụ ịji gosipụta iwe ha na obi adịghị ha mma gbasara agwa ndị APGA kpara na ntụli aka onye isi ala gara aga. Ọtụtụ n'ime ha na-ekwu na ndị tozuru isonye na ntụli aka ná Anambra Steeti ekpebiela ma kwukwa hoohaa na ọ bụ gọvanọ kpatara ọdịda ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị PDP na-agbanyeghị na ọ bụ Anambra Steeti nyere okwe ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ahụ ntụliaka kachasị na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ.

text: Kamgbe ahụ, ọ na-akpọtụ akpọtụ ma na-azụkwa azụ dịka ọtụtụ edemede jupụtara na Facebook nke isi ya bụ iriteghachi obi ụmụ Anambra ka ha nwee nchegharị na mkpebi ha iji were chụpụ ndị APGA na Ụlọ Ome Iwu. Nke a gosiri nke ọma na otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị APGA guzoro na ala n'emikpu emikpu n'oge a na steeti ahụ. Ndị isi ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị APGA bụzi ndị ji otu ụkwụ kwụrụ na-éché otu ha ga-esi lụọ ọgụ a siri ike ma dịkwa oké mkpa megide ndị ọzọ kwadoro nke ọma.

text: A gaghị m achọ ị ga n'iru otu ndị APGA siri jehie mana nke bụ isi okwu bụ na ndị isi ya bụ otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị aghọtala njehie ha n'ụzọ dị ilu dịka ha mara afọ n'ala n'izu ụka gara aga nke gosiri ha na ọ bụ ụmụ Anambra ji ike site n'igosi ha na ha mara nke ekwe na-akụ n'ihe gbasara ndọrọndọrọ. Obodo a abụghị Kano ma ọ bụ Zamfara steeti bụ ndị na-emepeghị anya n'ihe gbasara ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị. Dịka ndị ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya doro anya nke ọma, ụmụ Igbo bụ ndị nwere uche ị kwụrụ onwe ha ọtụtụ afọ tupu amụọ Lincoln.

text: Ajụjụ were bụrụzia, ndị Anambra a ga-eji maka njọ otu nwoke mekpaa otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ahụ? Ụdị mmechu ihu emechuru APGA na ntụli aka gara aga, o zubeghị iji gbanwee echiche ndị otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ahụ? Ọ bụ na-enweghị ike ị gbaghara njehie nke ndị APGA dịka ọtụtụ kpọrọ ekwo nkụ? Ajụjụ ndị a na ndị ọzọ na-achọ ụsa nke ga-abụ na o nwetaghị, nwere ike ime ka anyị mee ihe mmekpu ndọrọndọrọ nke ga-ebute arịrị n'ọdịnihu. Ka anyị ghara iwere iwe nwata kwafuru ogiri akwụ were tigbuo ya.

text: Anambra n'afọ ndị gara aga egosipụtala ntozu okè na ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị site na imemila ọgbaghara n'oge ntụliaka. A na m eche ma werekwa na-ekpe ekpere na-asị ka ọgba aghara nke dị oge a ghara ịnye onye iro oghere na Anambra Steeti. Ya biri ndị Anambra ebiri n'uche na Anambra ga-adị ma mkpụrụ ụbọchị iteghete nke ọnwa March gafee. Ya mere, ka anyị tụlee uche nke ọma na nhọpụta a dị oké mkpa tupu anyị ebinye aka n'akwụkwọ. Ma cheta na onye gburu nwanne ya, abụghị dike.

N'ihi nkea, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ga-emegharị ntụliaka n'ụbọchị Satọdee, ụbọchị iri abụọ na atọ nke ọnwa March, n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na iteghete ka ewere chịkọta ya bụ Ntụliaka.

text: N'okwu ya dịka ọ na-agbape ya bụ ọrụ ngo, aka na-achị steeti ahụ bụ gọvanọ Willie Obianọ, nke onye nọchitere anya ya bụ osote ya, bụ dọkịta Nkem Okeke mere ka amara na nke ahụ so n'otu n'ime ịgba mbọ nke ọchịchị nọ ugbu a na steeti ahụ iji kwàlite mmepe obodo na ezi ọnọdụ obibi ndụ ụmụafọ steeti ahụ, ma mekwa ka ihe dịrị ha mfe. O sị na nke ahụ bụ nke a ga-emekwa ka ọ gazuo obodo niile dị na ya bụ steeti, kwuputa ezi njikere gọọmenti dị n'inye ụmụafọ steeti ahụ ezi ọchịchị, ma kpọkuzie ha ka ha jisie ike n'inye ya bụ gọọmenti nkwàdo iji wee gaa n'ihu n'ezi ọrụ dị iche iche ahụ o ji n'aka na steeti ahụ.

text: Na mbụ n'ozi nnọọ ya, otu onye sitere na mpaghara ahụ e ji okwu ya agba izu, bụ maazị Gabriel Chukwuma, onye nabàtara ndị ahụ tòrò gọvanọ Obianọ maka ezi ịgba mbọ ya nakwa ọrụ ọma dị iche iche o ji n'aka na Nnewi ahụ na n'ọtụtụ ebe ndị ọzọ na steeti ahụ, ma kwekwazie ya nkwa na ndị Nnewi ga-aga n'ihu n'inye ọchịchị ya nkwàdo zuru oke.

text: Onye òkwú ókwú nke Lagos State Emergency Management Agency, Kehinde Adebayo, kwuru na ọ bụ ezi okwu. Ọ kwụkwara na ha ebutego ngwa ọrụ ha ji azọpụta ndụ n'ebe ahụ ya bụ ebelebe gburu. Ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ na-ahụ maka ihe mberede dịka Lagos State Fire Service, Lagos State Building Control Agency, Federal Fire Service, National Emergency Management Agency, Ndị Uwe Ojii, Rapid Response Squad, Nigeria Security and Civil Defence Corps, Nigeria Red Cross Society and the Lagos State Neighbourhood and Safety Corps bụkwazi ndị gbatara ọsọ enyemaka.

text: Aka na-achị Steeti Lagos bụ Gọvanọ Akinwunmi Ambode, onye ruru na ebe ahụ mkpamkpa ahụ kpara oge ọ fọdụrụ nkeji iri na asatọ ka ọ kụọ elekere atọ nke ehihie kọwara ya bụ ihe dịka ihe anya mmiri na obi mgbawa, ma rịọzie ndị mmadụ ka ha nye ndị ọrụ mberede efe iji rụọ ọrụ ha nke ọma n'enweghị nsogbu ọ bụla were hụ na ha chọpụtachasịrị ma zọpụta ndị niile ọdachi ahụ dachibidoro.

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Gọvanọ ahụ gara n'ihu were tie ezinaụlọ ndị nke ha nwụrụ site na ya bụ ihe mberede aka n'obi. Ọ sịrị na ya bụ ihe bụ nnukwu ihe mgbu mere ụmụ afọ Lagos. Ọ kwukwara na ihe gọọmenti na-eme ugbua bụ ịhụ na anyị zọpụtara n'ebe ọ ka n'ọnụ ọgụgụ ọtụtụ ndị anyị nwere ike ị zọpụta ndụ ha. Gọvanọ ahụ kpebiri na steeti gọọmenti ga-ahụ maka ụgwọ ụlọ ọgwụ niile nke ndị ihe a metụtara.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye Isi Ala Muhammadu Buhari, n'okwu ya gbasara ihe mberede a, gosipụtara obi mwute ya n'ezie karịchasịa ebe o metụtara ndụ ndị mmadụ, tinyere ụmụ akwụkwọ. Ọ kasiri ezinaụlọ niile nkea metụrụ na steeti gọọmenti Lagos ma kpekwa ezi ahụ ike maka ndị merụrụ ahụ. O mere ka amara nkea site n'aka onye okwu ya bụ Maazị Femi Adesina. Onye isi ala rịọziri steeti gọọmenti Lagos ka ha gba mbọ hụ na ha gbochiri ụdị ihe mberede dị otua ime n'ọdịnihu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ịkpọ ganịganị ahụ bụ nke weere ọnọdụ n'okporo ụzọ ahụ e si aga n'isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nchịkọba nhọpụta ọchịchị dị n'aka n'ala anyị, bụ 'Independent National Electoral Commission' (INEC), ngalaba ya nke steeti Anambra dị n'Awka. Nke ahụ bụ nke ha mere iji katọọ mpụtara ahụ ụlọ ọrụ INEC weputara, bụ nke na-akọwa na ọ bụ maazị Douglass Egbuna nke otu ndọrọ ndọrọ 'People's Democratic Party' (PDP) tuuru ugò na ya bụ nhọpụta, ebe ha onwe na-ekwu na ọ bụ maazị Tony Nwora nke otu ndọrọ ndọrọ APGA tuuru ùgò na ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ọ gwara ndị nta akụkọ banyere nke ahụ, onyeisi oche nchere oge n'okpuru ọchịchị Ọnịtsha North, bụ maazị Patrick Aghamba kwùrù na mpụtara ụlọ ọrụ INEC kpọpụtara abụghịdị ihe a tụtara n'akwụkwọ n'ọgbọ nta nkwàdo ahụ, chaa chqa, ma kpọkuo ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ka ọ kagbuo nhọpụta ma hazigharịa nhọpụta ọzọ n'ọgbọ nta nkwàdo ahụ iji hụ na udo na ikpe nkwụmọtọ chịrị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'otu aka ahụkwà, ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ ndị sonyere na ya bụ ngagharị iwe gwara ndị nta akụkọ, mere ka a mara na ndị otu ndọrọ ndọrọ PDP gwùrù ojoro ghe anya oghe na ya bụ ntụliaka, ọ kachasị n'ebe ahụ a nọrọ gụkọọ ihe a tụtara n'akwụkwọ, bụ ebe ha kwuru na ndị ọrọ nchekwa na ndị ọrụ INEC gbochiri ndị otu ndọrọ ndọrọ APGA ka ha bàta mgbe a na-agụkọ ya. Ha kpọkuzịkwara ndị ụlọ ọrụ INEC ka ha na-agbaso usòrò iwu n'ihe ọbụla ha na-eme iji hụ na ihe ọbụla gara otu o kwesiri.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ọ gwara ndị nta akụkọ oge ọ natachara mkpesa ndị ahụ, onyeisi ngalaba nhazi n'ụlọ ọrụ INEC, bụ maazị Ibe Uche-Agwụ kpọkuru ma rịọ ndị ahụ ka ha wetuo obi, ọbụnadị dịka o kwere nkwa na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ga-eleba anya na ya bụ mkpesa. Ọ kpọkuzịkwara ha n'otu aka ahụ ka ha wègakwa mkpesa ha n'aka òtù ahụ na-ahụ bànyere ikpe maka nhọpụta ọchịchị, dịka usoro iwu siri dị iji wee lebàra nke ahụ anya nke ọma.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nhọpụta a bụ nke weere ọnọdụ n'abalị iteghete nke ọnwa Maachị ahọ a, ma bụrụkwa nke e mere n'ọtụtụ steeti dị iche iche ụbọchị ahụ. Tupu ya bụ oke ụbọchị, akụkọ dị iche iche malitere kọba n'ebe dị iche iche banyere ihe aghaghị ime na ihe agahị eme na ya bụ ntụliaka, nke mezịrị ka ọtụtụ steeti nọrọ n'oke egwù ma chịrịkwa uche n'aka.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka akụkọ e nwetara site n'ọtụtụ ebe siri kọọ, nhọpụta ahụ bụ nnọọ nke gara n'ụfọdụ ebe dịka ndị mmadụ siri chee, ma gakwa n'ụfọdụ ebe ndị ọzọ n'ụzọ abụghị ka e siri chee ma ọ bụ tụọ anya. E wezùga steeti Anambra, Ondo, Ekiti, Osun na Edo, bụ ebe e mere naanị nhọpụta ndị ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu steeti; e mere nhọpụta ọkwa gọvanọ ndị ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu steeti na steeti iri atọ na otu ndị ọzọ dị n'ala anyị, bụkwa nke otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị iche iche nwetara mmeri na ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ụfọdụ steeti n'ala anyị, dịka steeti Rivers, Delta, Kastina, Kaduna Ebonyi, Ondo, Oyo na ụfọdụ ebe ndị ọzọ, e nwegasịrị ọtụtụ ihe iche aka mgba, ịkwafù ọbara na ihe ọdachị ndị ọzọ, bụ nke biri nhọpụta ahụ aka ọjọọ na mparagha ebe ahụ. O pekata mpe, mmadụ iri na ise ka e gburu egbu na steeti ndị ahụ, ebe ngwo-ngwo na akụnụba gburu nde kwùrú nde Naịra bụ nke e bibìrì ebibi na ya bụ nhọpụta n'ọtụtụ ebe na steeti dị iche iche.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Otu ọ dị, ntụliaka ahụ bụ nke gara nkè ọma ma gakwa siriri wèrèrè na steeti Anambra karịa ka a tụrụ anya, na-agbanyeghị na e nwekwara ụfọdụ ihe ọdachi dapụtara n'ụfọdụ ime obodo. Dịka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nchịkọba ọkwa ọchịchị dị n'aka n'ala anyị bụ 'Independent National Electoral Commission' (INEC) sìrì kwe na nkwà tupuu ụbọchị ntụliaka; ntụliaka bidoro nnọọ n'elekere asatọ kpọnkwem n'ọtụtụ ebe dị iche iche na steeti Anambra ahụ, nke gụnyere: Ebenator, Ọsụmenyi, Ụkpọr na Ụtụh (dịgbàdò n'okpuru ọchịchị Nnewi South na steeti ahụ). Otu ọ dị, ịtụ akwụkwọ ebidochaghị n'oge n'ụfọdụ ebe, n'ihi abịaghị n'oge, ngharịpụ nke akụrụnwga e ji enyocha akwụkwọ ikike e ji atụ akwụkwọ, bụ 'Smart Card Reader', na ihe ndị ọzọ (dịka a hụtarana Nnọkwa dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Idemili South na ụfọdụ ebe ndị ọzọ).
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ihe gbasaara nsonye ndị mmadụ na ya bụ ntụliaka, ọ bụ ihe doro anya, dịka a chọpụtara n'ọtụtụ ebe dị iche iche, na e nwechaghịzị ọtụtụ ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị mmadụ sonyere na nke a dịka e nwere n'oge e mere ntụliaka maka ọkwa onyeisi na ndị ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu etiti, dịka ọtụtụ ndị gbakụtara nke ahụ azụ ma jewara ahịa, ọrụ, igwù mmiri, igwu egwe nakwa ihe ndị ọzọ dị ha mkpa ụbọchị ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ajụjụ ọnụ ndị nta akụkọ gbara ha bànyere nke ahụ, ụfọdụ n'ime ụmụnwaanyị a hụrụ n'ahịa Eke Ọsụmenyi dị na Nnewi South (mgbe ntụliaka na-aga n'ihu), ebe ha na-akwọrọ onwe ha akamụ ma na-ayọchasị nri ọka ha na-ere ere n'ahịa ahụ ụbọchị ahụ, nke gụnyere: oriakụ Fidelia Afọma, oriakụ Uju Mmadụbụọgụ na oriakụ Agnes Ụgbọaja kwuru na o nweghị ihe gbasaara ha na ịtụ akwụkwọ n'ihi na ndị niile na-egwu okwe ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị bụ ndị wàyo, bụ ndị (dịka ha siri kwuo) ọ na-abụ maadụ tụnyechaara akwụkwọ, ha echezọọ onye ahụ n'ime ahụhụ ya ma na-eri ego gọọmenti naanị ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'akụkọ dịkwa ka ibè ya, n'ajụjụ ọnụ a gbara ha maazị Romanus Obika na Ezeh Amaefuna, bụ ụfọdụ ụmụnwoke a hụrụ n'ọdụ ahịa Nkwọ Akwaihedị ebe ha nọ na-azụ òkwè, na-añụrụ onwe ha mmanya ma na-akọrị akụkọ (dịka ntụliaka na-aga n'ihu); ha kwuru na ndị ọnụ na-eru n'okwu edechaalarị mpụtara ntụliaka ahụ ma debe ya edebe na-echezị ka e mechaa ntụliaka. Ha kwuru na nke ahụ pụtara ìhè na nhọpụta izugbe onyeisi ala ha sònyere na ya, bụ nke ha sị na ọ bụghị onye kwesiri ituru ùgò tuuru ùgò na ya, ma kwèrezie n'ihi ya kwuo na onye ga-eturu ùgò na nhọpụta nke ụbọchị ahụ ga-eturu ùgò, ebe onye ga-ada ada ga-adara onwe ya, ma ha ọtụrụ akwụkwọ ma ha atụghị, n'ihi na ịtụ akwụkwọ ha enweghị mgbanwe ọ ga-eweta na mpụtara nhọpụta ọchịchị ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ihe gbasaara ọdachi, e nwere ụfọdụ ihe iche aka mgba, nsògbu na ọgbagara dapụtara n'ụfọdụ ebe, nke gụnyere Akwaihedị, ebe a sụkasịrị ụfọdụ mmadụ mmà ma merụọkwa ụfọdụ ahụ ebe ha gara ịtụ akwụkwọ; na Obosi dị n'Idemili North, bụ ebe e gbùrù mmadụ abụọ ma merụọkwa ọtụtụ ahụ ụbọchị ahụ, tinyere ụfọdụ ebe ndị ọzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ebe o metụtara mpụtara atụmakwụkwọ ahụ na ya bụ steeti, otu ndọrọndọrọ niile sonyere na asọmpi ahụ lụrụ nnọọ ọgụ ahụ dịka nwoke, ma otu ndọrọndọrọ All Progressive Grand Alliance (APGA) gosiri ihe o jiri bụrụ ọka ibè site n'ịzachakọ na inweta mmeri n'ọgbọ nta nkwàdo iri abụọ na anọ n'ime ọgbọ nta nkwàdo iri atọ e nwere na ya bụ steeti, ebe otu ndọrọ ndọrọ People's Democratic Party (PDP) werezịrị isii fọrọ afọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọgbọ nta nkwàdo niile ahụ na otu e siri nweta mmeri na ha gụnyere:
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Anaocha I PDP. Anaocha II APGA Awka North APGA Awka South I APGA Awka South II APGA Dunukofia APGA Idemmili North APGA Idemmili South APGA Njikoka I APGA Njikoka II APGA Anambra West APGA Anambra East APGA Oyi APGA Onitsha NORTH I PDP Onitsha NORTH II APGA Onitsha South I APGA Onitsha South II APGA Ogbaru I PDP Ogbaru II PDP Ayamelum APGA Aguata I APGA Aguata II APGA Ihiala I APGA Ihiala II APGA Ekwusigo PDP Nnewi North APGA Nnewi South I APGA Nnewi South II PDP Orumba North APGA Orumba South APGA
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị a bụ ndị e jidere site na mpaghara ebe dị iche iche na steeti ahụ, nke gụnyere Nnewi, Ọkịja, Obosi, ọdụ ụgbọala Ihiala, nke Aba, nke Owerri, nke Lagos, nke Benin. Ihe ndị e nwekọtakwara n'aka ha gụnyere ọgwụ Cannabis sativa, ọgwụ Cocaine na ọgwụ ike Heroine.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya bànyere nke ahụ, onyeisi ụlọ ọrụ NDLEA na steeti ahụ, bụ maazị Sule Momodu mere ka a mara mbọ pụrụ iche ha na-agba iji busoo ịkpọ, ịñụ ma ọ bụ ịtụ mgbere ọgwụ ike agha na ya bụ steeti ahụ, ma kwuo na nke ahụ na-aga n'ihu n'ịmịta ezi mkpụrụ a tụrụ anya, ọ kachasị ugbu a ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa ndị ọzọ màlitere ijikọ aka ọnụ na ya bụ agha. O mere ka a mara na ụlọ ọrụ niile ahụ ga-aga n'ihu na njikọ aka ahụ, ma na-ebukwa agha na mgbe na mgbe megide ndị niile na-etinye anya n'ọgwụ ike, wee ruo mgbe ịtụ mgbere ọgwụ ike ga-aghọ akụkọ mgbe ochie na steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka ọ na-etò aka na-achị steeti ahụ bụ gọvanọ Willie Obianọ maka ezi nkwàdo ọ na-enye ha, maazị Momodu kpọkùrù ndị na-etinye aka n'ọgwụ ike na steeti ahụ ka ha sepù aka na nke ahụ ma ọ bụ kwara ngwongwo ha pụọ na ya bụ steeti n'ihi na o nweghịzịkwa ebe mgbaba ọbụla dịịrị ha. Ọ dụzịkwara ndị nne na nna ka ha na-ejide ma na-eleru ụmụ ha anya nke ọma oge niile, iji mara ebe ha na-etinye aka na ndị ha na ha na-emekọ ihe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O mere ka a mara na ndị ahụ a nwụchikọrọ bụ ndị a ga-enyòcha nke ọma ma tọhàpụ ndị aka ha dị ọcha n'ime ha, ebe ndị ikpe mara bụ ndị a ga-akpụpụ ụlọ ime ma were iwu mee ha ihe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nke a ka emere ka ọ pụta ìhè site n'ọnụ Onye Ndụmọdụ n'ihe gbasara iwu nke ndị otu People's Democratic Party, Maazi Emmanuel Enoidem, n'ogige ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị, bụ ebe ọgbakọ ahụ jiri mere isi ụlọ ọrụ ha ma bụrụkwa ebe ha tinyere akwụkwọ mkpesa n'ụbọchị Mondee.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Enoidem bụ onye gwara ndị nta akụkọ okwu oge otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ahụ na onye zọrọ onyeisiala tinyesịrị akwụkwọ mkpesa ha n'isi ụlọ ọrụ ọgbakọ ntụliaka ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka o ji nkeji iri anọ gafee elekere asaa nke abalị na ụbọchị Mondee, ndị ọka iwu ikpeazụ nọchitere anya ndị mkpesa si n'ụlọ ọrụ ahụ were pụọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Enoidem, bụ onye kwuru na ndị nnukwu ọkà iwu nke ala anyị bụ Naijiria karịrị iri abụọ ga-anọchite anya ndị ahụ wetara mkpesa, rụtụrụ aka ná ụbọchị ikpeazụ iji tinye akwụkwọ mkpesa site n'ụbọchị a kpọchara onye turu ugo bụ Tuzdee.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye ọ bụla nwere mkpesa nwere ụbọchị iri abụọ n'otu site n'ụbọchị a kpọchara onye tụrụ ugo mmeri na ntụliaka onyeisiala nke bụ n'abalị iri abụọ na asaa nke ọnwa Febrụwarị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Enoidem kwuru, Ụbọchị ikpeazụ maka mkpesa bụ echi (Tuzdee) ma ha kpebiri itinye akwụkwọ mkpesa ha taa (Mondee). Ihe anyị chọrọ bụ ka onye nke anyị bụ onye nwetara mmeri na ntụliaka gara aga n'ụzọ pụrụ iche n'ala anyị bụrụ onye a ga-etunye ugo ruru ya na ntụliaka ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'akụkụ nke ọzọ, anyị na-arịọ ka-akagbue ya bụ ntụliaka n'ihi na mago mago dị na ntụliaka ahụ bụ nke pụtara ihe n'onye kpuru ìsì na-ahụ ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Anyị nwere Nnukwu Ndị Ọka Iwu karịrị iri abụọ, bụ ndị mara nke ekwe na-akụ na mkpesa na-eso ntụliaka, na ndị ọkà iwu ndị ọzọ amara aha ha bụ ndị ha na ha na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ. Ya mere, anyị dị njikere maka ya bụ mkpesa. Anyị kwadoro ọma. Egwu anaghị atụ afọ o ji were buru ụzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mpesa ahụ bụ nnọọ nke akwọrọ aka were kwado. Ndị aka ebe karịrị narị anọ dị njikere ịgba aka ebe na mkpesa a. Ụmụ Naijiria bụ ndị lara n'ụlọ ha were n'ebe ákwà n'ihi ihe mere na Febrụwarị n'ala anyị, bụ wururwuru ha kpọrọ ntụliaka.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ezie, anyị ga-egosi ụmụ Naijiria nke bụ eziokwu maka ihe ndị a bụ ihe ndị megasịrị okirikiri ụmụ Naijiria. Anyị agaghị ewepụta ihe ọ bụla na-abụghị eziokwu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka ikike ahụ nke ọgbakọ ụlọ ikpe mkpesa nyere ndị mkpesa ahụ ka ha were nyochaa akọrọngwa ndị ahụ eji mee ntụliaka bụ nke ụkwụ ka na akpọ, Enoidem kwuru na Mondee na otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ya na onye zọrọ ọkwa onyeisiala gbara mbọ rinne iji were hụ na ha tinyere akwụkwọ mkpesa tupu oge ahụ enyere abịa n'isi njedebe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Otu onye n'ime ndị ọkà iwu nke ndị mkpesa ahụ, Chief Mike Ozekhome (SAN), kwuru na mkpesa ahụ bụ nke siri ike, tọọ atọ ma bụrụ nke agaghị enwe ihe mkpọbi ụkwụ n'ụdị ọ bụla.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwuru na ọ bụla ka ọ fọdụrụ otu ụbọchị ka ụbọchị enyere maka itinye akwụkwọ mkpesa gafee, na etinyeghị akwụkwọ mkpesa ahụ n'oge bụ n'ihi arụkọghị ọrụ ọnụ nke ụlọ ọrụ na-achịkọba ntụliaka n'ala anyị iji nye ha ohere ka ha wee nyochaa akọrọngwa ndị ahụ eji were mee ntụliaka.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya, Anyị nwere ruo echi (Tuzdee) iji were tinye akwụkwọ mkpesa mana anyị nwetara ọtụtụ ihe aka mgba n'ebe ụlọ ọrụ INEC nọ n'ebe o metụtara ị nyochaa akọrọngwa ndị ahụ eji were mee ntụliaka. Mana e kwenyere m na anyị ga-agbata ihe na ọsọ a.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mkpesa anyị bụ nke siri ike, tọọ atọ ma gbadosie mgbọrọgwụ n'ala ike na ọ gaghị enwe mkpọbi ụkwụ ọ bụla, na o kwenyesiri ike na amara Chineke, onye na-eme eze ga-eme ya eze ruru ya maka oji ihe nwata welie aka elu, aka ruwe ya, o wetuo ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Gọọmenti Steeti Kaduna ekwuola na ụmụ afọ mmadụ iteghete atụfuela ndụ ha n'ọgba aghara ahụ dị n'ime obodo Nandu, nke dị na okpuru ọchịchị ime obodo Sanga n'ọnụ ụtụtụ ụbọchị Satọdee, abalị iri abụọ na isii nke ọnwa March. N'edemede nke Samuel Aruwan, bụ nnukwu onye na-enyere gọvanọ steeti ahụ ahụ n'ihe gbasara mgbasa ozi, wepụtara na Satọdee, katọrọ ogbugbu ahụ e gburu ndị mmadụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nasir El-Rufai, bụ gọvanọ Kaduna Steeti, kasiri ndị niile nke a metụrụ n'otu ụzọ ma ọ bụ ụzọ nke ọzọ obi ngwangwa ya na ndị ọlụ nchekwa kpasịrị ụbụbọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Edemede bụzi nke kwuru na: Gọọmenti Steeti Kaduna enwetala ozi site n'aka ndị ọlụ nchekwa gbasara ọnwụ nke mmadụ iteghete n'aka ndị omekome, bụ ndị wakporo obodo Nandu n'okpuru ọchịchị ime obodo Sanga n'ọnụ ụtụtụ taa.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Site na ịgba mbọ na njikọ aka ọnụ ha, ndị ọlụ nchekwa ebutela ozu mmadụ iteghete, nke gụnyere ụmụ aka. Ndị omekome a gbara ọtụtụ ụlọ ọkụ n'obodo ahụ. Gọọmenti Kaduna nọrọziri wee kagbuo kpamkpam ya bu àgwà nke lara ndụ ụmụ afọ steeti ahụ n'iyi ma rịọkwaa obodo dị iche iche ka ha mụrụ anya ka azụ ịhụ na ha nọchibidoro ndị na-achọghị udo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Aka na-achị steeti ahụ, nọrọziri n'aha steeti ahụ na ụmụ afọ Kaduna, tie ezinaụlọ niile nke a metụtara aka n'obi ma rịọkwaa ka mkpụrụ obi ndị niile nwụrụ anwụ zuo ike n'udo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Gọọmenti, ndị ọlụ nchekwa, ndị isi obodo na ụlọ okpukpere dị iche iche ga na-agba mbọ ịlụsi ọlụ ike iji were hụ na udo were ọnọdụ na Steeti ahụ. N'oge iri ụjụ a, k'anyi bịakọta ọnụ were buo agha megide atụmatụ niile nke ndị achọghị ọdịmma na ọganihu nke mmadụ na ibe ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọgbaaghara alaana ndụ ọtụtụ n'iyi ma merụọ ndị ọzọ ahụ, mebie ụzọ obibi ọtụtụ ndị, tinye égwù na ihe iri ụjụ n'obi ndị mmadụ. Anyị ga-emeri nke a site na ịsọpụrụ ibe anyị, idozi esemokwu dị n'etiti anyị na ị kọrọ ndị ọ dị n'aka gbasara ọnọdụ anyị na-enyo enyo ma ọ bụ nke na-adịchaghị mma. Ajọ ihe agaghị enwelata mmeri n'ebe ọdịmma mmadụ na ibe ya dị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị ọlụ nchekwa bụzi ndị ahụrụ ka ha na-akparaghị na mpaghara ahụ iji hụ na udo chighatara azụ n'obodo ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwuru n'ụzọ esi eme nhọpụta ọchịchị n'ọkwá dị iche iche n'ala anyị bụ ihe dị oké mkpa karịa ọrụ ha ga-arụ ma ọ bụrụ n'ahọpụta ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na ị ga n'ihu n'okwu ya ka o kwuru n'etu esi were mee ntụliaka bụ mgbọrọgwụ ezi ọchịchị nke onye ọ bụla na-azọ ọkwa ọchịchị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ya bụ aka chiburu Anambra Steeti n'oge mbụ nọrọ na Abuja ụbọchị ụka mee ka amata, na ntụliaka nke mago mago dị n'ime ya bụ mgbọrọgwụ nke ajọ ọchịchị nke ga-apụta ìhè na ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na ọnọdụ akụ n'ụba obodo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwuru na mago mago nke pụtara ìhè na ntụliaka nke afọ a bụzi nke chere ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya n'ala anyị na ọdịnihu ya aka mgba, na ya bụ ihe jọgburu onwe ya ma sigbukwa nkakwụ n'isi ga-emebi ezi ọnọdụ ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na-aga n'iru n'obodo anyị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O siri na ụmụ afọ Naijiria agaghị enwe ike ịgụkọnwu ọtụtụ ihe mebisịrị n'ime ntụliaka a n'obodo anyị bụ Naijiria.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ihe mberede a bụ nke mere na okporo ụzọ Upper Iweka na MCC nke siri Ọnịcha gaa Awka n'akụkụ ụlọ ọgwụ Toronto. Ya bụ nnukwu ụgbọala bu mmanụ ọkụ kerosene sitere Awka na-aga Upper Iweka oge onye na-akwọ ụgbọala ahụ enweghị ike ịjide ya dịka ụgbọala ahụ ekweghịzi nkwụsị. Ebe ọkwọ ụgbọala ahụ na-achọ ị kwụsị ya, ọ gbapụrụ n'okporo ụzọ gaa ebe ndị mmadụ kpọsachara ngwa ahịa n'akụkụ ụzọ tupu o were nwee ike kwụsị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ya bụ nnukwu ụgbọala gburu ọtụtụ mmadụ nke metụtara ebe ọ ka n'ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị na-ere ihe n'akụkụ ụzọ oge ọ na-akpọ ganigani tupu ọ were kwụsị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ozu ndị mmadụ nke jupụtara na ya bụ okporo ụzọ ka ndị ọlụ nchekwa bụ ndị bịara n'ogige ahụ ngwa ngwa ya bụ mkpamkpa kpachara na-ebupu sị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye isi oche ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe mberede (Nigeria Red Cross Society) na Steeti ahụ, Ọkammụta Pita Kathy, n'okwu ya kwuru na bụ ihe mberede bụ eziokwu ma kwukwa na mmadụ asaa bụ ndị nwụrụ ozigbo ozigbo. Ọ gara n'ihu kwuo na n'agbanyeghị mbọ ha niile, ha zọpụtara nanị mmadụ atọ ebe ozu ndị niile nwụrụ bụzi nke ha bugara na ụlọ ebe a na-echekwa ozu nke ụlọ ọgwụ Toronto.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị ọrụ nchekwa okporoụzọ (Federal Road Safety Corps) na Ndị Uwe ojii bụzi nke nyere aka n'izoputa ndị mmadụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Obi kwuru nkea site n'edemede onye mgbasa ozi ya wepụtara na Tuzdee na Abuja.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Otú ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ahụ, nọrọ n'ụbọchị Mondee, tinye akwụkwọ mkpesa megide mmeri nke Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari na ndị All Progressive Congress na ntụliaka ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Obi kwuru na mkpebi iji ụlọ ikpe were nweta nke bụ eziokwu nke onye zọrọ ọkwa onyeisiala na PDP, Atiku Abubakar, gbasoro bụ ihe mara ezi mma maka ótútó ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya n'ala anyị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ kwadoro ma jaa Atiku ike maka ịgbadosi mgbọrọgwụ ike n'ebe ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya dị, bụ nke ọ sịrị, otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị PDP guzobere ma mee ka ọ pụta ìhè n'afo iri na isii gara aga.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Obi kwuru na ọchịchị nke PDP nọ n'isi ya mere otú n'ime ntụliaka ghere anya oghe kachasị mma, ma nyefekwa ike sịrịrị werere oge ha emerighị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ya bụ gọvanọ Anambra Steeti n'oge gara aga sịrị na ọ ga-abụ ihe jọgburu onwe ya ma eleghara oké magomago ahụ pụtara ìhè na ntụliaka onyeisiala nke ọnwa Febrụwarị, mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri abụọ na atọ na-emeghị ihe ọ bụla.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Site n'ịma magomago ahụ aka, anyị ekpebigo ị mee ka ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya guzosie ike site n'ụzọ kachasị mma, dịka ndị otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na ndị ezi usoro iwu na-amasị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Obi kpọkuziri ndị niile ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na-amasị ka ha nọrọ n'ekpere na ilegidesi anya ike, site n'okwukwu na mmeri ga-abụrịrị nke ndị na-achọ ezi ikpe na ihe ziri ezi.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mmadụ ise: Francis Uzoho, Henry Onyekuru, John Ọgụ, Oghenakaro Etebo na Victor Osimhen, bụ ndị a na-eche na ha ga-erute na ebe nchere oge ha na elekere anọ nke mgbede ụbọchị Tuzdee, mana otu na-ahụ maka egwu bọọlụ ala anyị bụ Nigeria Football Federation ekwetala na ndị ahụ na-agba bọọlụ na mba ofesi erutela site na Twitter na mgbede ụbọchị ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụlọ zuru ezu. John Ogu, Etebo Oghenakaro, Francis Uzoho, Victor Osimhen na Henry Onyekuru awụchiela na-ebe nchere iji sonyere na nkwadebe nke taa. #FeeSuperEagles #Team9jaStrong. bụ ihe ha dere na Twitter nke otu egwu bọọlụ
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nanị mmadụ asaa n'ime ndị otu egwu bọọlụ ahụ bụ ndị rutere maka nkwadebe ahụ na Mondee, nke gụnyere Alex Iwobi, Odion Ighalo, Semi Ajayi, Valentine Ozornwafor, Daniel Akpeyi, Ikechukwu Ezenwa na Ikouwen Udo, bụ ndị rutere n'oge.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọnụ ọgụgụ ha bawanyere ụba na Tuzdee dịka osote onye isi otu egwu bọọlụ ahụ bụ Ahmed Musa, Leon Balogun, Kenneth Omeruo, William Troost-Ekong na ndị ọzọ sonyere ibe ha na ebe nchere ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị egwu bọọlụ ahụ nwere nkwadebe mbụ ha maka asọmpi ahụ oge ọ fọdụrụ nkeji iri na ise ka ọ kụọ elekere ise nke mgbede ụbọchị Tuzdee n'ámá egwuregwu Stephen Keshi.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị otú egwu bọọlụ Gernot Rohr bụ ndị tozugororị maka asọmpi iko mba Afrịka nke afọ puku abụọ na iri na iteghete na ndị ọgbọ ha na mba Ijipt ga-asọkwa mpi nke enyi na enyi na Asaba ụbọchị Tuzdee izu ụka ọzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'akụkụ nke ọzọ, otú egwu bọọlụ mba Seychelles, a na-akpọ 'Pirates', wụchiri na Abuja na Tuzdee maka asọmpi itozu oké iko mba Afrịka.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mmadụ dị iri abụọ na iteghete nke si mba Seychelles bịa, soro ụgbọ elu Ethiopia were bata n'ehihie Tuzdee ma bụrụzie ndị ga-agaba Asaba na Wednezdee (taa), dịka akụkọ sị na ụlọ ọrụ ndị NFF sịrị dị
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nkea mere ka ụbọchị ọnwa Febrụwarị gbara mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri abụọ na isii, n'afọ puku abụọ na iteghete, n'ime obodo Emiworo nke dị n'okpuru ọchịchị ime ime obodo Wushishi na steeti ahụ, ka ha abụọ enweghị ike were nwee nkwekọrịta.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye ahụ a na-enyo enyo bụ nke ndị ọlụ uwe ojii na-alụ ọlụ na Ngalaba Wushishi nwụchịkọrọ ka ha nwetachara ozi.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Akụkọ kọrọ ụbọchị Tuzdee na nwa amadị a na-enyo enyo gwara nwunye ya lagoro mmụọ ka o kutere ya mmiri ọ ga-eji wee saa ahụ mana ya (nwunye ya) gbara isi akwara.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Akụkọ gara n'ihu were kwuo na nwoke ahụ gara jiri aka ya kute mmiri n'onwe ya ebe nwunye ya tụgharịziri bowe ya ebubo na o buru mmiri nke ya (nwunye ya) kutere.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye ahụ a na-enyo enyo jiri iwe na ọnụma nke juru ya obi were tie Hauwa étí étí nke buteziri ọnwụ ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye ahụ a na-enyo, oge ọ na-aza ajụjụ ọnụ boro nwunye ya ebubo ị leda ya anya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye na-ahụ maka ezi mmekọrịta ọhaneze na ndị uwe ojii na steeti ahụ, Mohammad Abubakar, kwuru na ya bụ ihe bụ eziokwu ma kwukwa na onye ahụ a na-enyo enyo ekwetala n'ebubo ahụ eboro ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Abubakar kwuru na Tambari jiri osisi were kụọ nwunye ihe ugboro ugboro, ebe nwanyị ahụ bụzi onye nwụrụ oge ebu ya aga n'ụlọ ọgwụ ma tinyekwa na a kpụpụla nwa amadị ahụ n'ụlọ ikpe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Otuto a bụ nke bịara site n'aka ụlọ ọrụ Radio Nigeria, Enugu na mmemme asọmpi n'asụsụ a chịkọbaara ụlọ akwụkwọ Sekọndịrị dị n'Enugu, ma bụrụkwa nke weere ọnọdụ n'ụlọ ọrụ Coal City FM, bụ isi ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Radio Nigeria na steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya dịka ọ na-enye ụlọ ọrụ National Light òtùtó ahụ na akwụkwọ ozi so ya, onyeisi nhàzi ụlọ ọrụ Federal Radio Corporation of Nigeria n'isi ụlọ ọrụ nke ụlọ mgbasa ozi ahụ na mpaghara ndịda-ọwụwa anyanwụ ala anyị, bụ maazị Ike Okere kọwara ya dịka nke kwesiri ekwesi n'ilekwàsị anya na mbọ dị iche iche pụtara ihè ụlọ mbipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ gbàgòrò n'ịkwalite asụsụ Igbo, ọ kachasị site n'ibipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ Ka Ọ Dị Taa bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ e dere n'asụsụ Igbo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O mere ka a mara na ọnọdụ asụsụ Igbo nọ na ya n'ụbọchị taa bụ nnọ nke na-agba anya mmiri n'ihi na ọtụtụ ndị Igbo agbakụtala ya azụ ma na-emesòzị ya ka asụsụ nwaokpùrù, kọwaa nke ahụ dịka ihe jọgburu onwe ya, ma kpọkuokwa onye ọbụla bụ ezi nwaafọ Igbo ka o were asụsụ Igbo kpọrọ ihe ma na-asụkwa ya kwà ụbọchị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O bunyere ụlọ ọrụ National Light ụkpa ekele maka ịhụta mkpa ọ dị na a kwàlitèrè ya bụ asụsụ ma chekwaba ya ka ọ ghara ịnwụnyụ anya dịka ndị òtù mba ụwa 'United Nations Education Scientific and Cultural Organization' (UNESCO) bùrù n'amụma n'ahọ 2012. O mere ka a mara na ụlọ mgbasa ozi, ọ kachasị ụlọ mbipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ so n'otu ụzọ pụtakarịchara ìhè a pụrụ isi kwàlite asụsụ Igbo, n'ihi na ọ ga-enyere ndị mmadụ aka ịmụ otu e si agụ, otu e si asụ na otu e si ede ya bụ asụsụ. Ọ jakwazịrị ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ike n'ịzọpụ ụkwụ dike ahụ, bụ nke o kwuru na ọ bụ ihe kọrọ ụkọ n'ala anyị, ma dụkwazie ha ka ha jide ka ha ji ma gaa n'ihu n'iti ịgbà ahụ n'ihi na mpụtara ya bara ụba.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na mbụ n'okwu ya na mmemme ahụ, otu onye n'ime ndị ikpe na ya bụ asọmpi ma bụrụkwa nwa amadi aha ya na-ada ụda n'ide edemede n'asụsụ Igbo, bụ maazị Chinedum Ọfọmata kwàrà àrịrị bànyere ọnọdụ asụsụ Igbo nọ na ya ugbua, tòó ndị chịkọbara ya bụ asọmpì, ma kpọkuzie ụmụakwụkwọ na ụlọakwụkwọ sonyere na mmemme ahụ, ndị nne na nna na ụmụafọ Igbo n'izùgbe ka ha were asụsụ Igbo kpọrọ ihe ma werekwa ya na-ekwurịta okwu oge ọbụla.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ozi nnọọ ya, onye chịkọbara ya bụ asọmpi, bụ maazị Ibiam Ufiem, onye jiri otu ahọ wee fèé ala nna ya n'ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, kọwara na ebumnobi o jiri chịkọba ya bụ iji wee nwàléé ụbụrụ ụmụakwụkwọ ahụ n'asụsụ Igbo, mee ka ha ghọta mkpà ọ dị na oke uru ọ bara, bụ ịma asụ na ịma ede asụsụ Igbo, ma sikwazie n'ụzọ dị òtù ahụ kwàlite ya bụ asụsụ, bụ nke ọ kwara arịrị na ọtụtụ ndị ntorobịa amaghịzị àsụ ma ya fọdụzie ide ya ede ugbua.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị tuuru ùgò na ya bụ asọmpi gụnyere:
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Urban Girls Secondary School, Enugu (gbárá ndị nke mbụ); New Layout Secondary School, Enugu (gbárá ndị nke abụọ); Day Secondary School Enugu (gbárá ndị nke atọ); and Lady Ibiam Girls Secondary School (gbárá ndị nke anọ)
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwuchukwu n'ụlọ ụka 'St. John the Apostle Anglican Church', Ọbà, bụ ebe a nọrọ wee kàárá ya ụka onye nwụrụ anwụ, Bishọọpụ ụka Anglịkan na dayọsiisi Niger, bụ Rt. Rev. Owen Nwokolo kọwara ọnwụ dịka òkè onye ọbụla ga-éwèrịrị n'ụwa a, dịka o mere ka a mara na ọ bụ mgbe nke ahụ gachaara ka ikpe ga-esochi.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O jiri ndụ na akparamagwa Dọrcas nke akwụkwọ nso wee kọwaa ma tụnyere ezi ndụ oriakụ Ọnwụamaegbu, bụ onye ọ kọwara dịka onye bara úrù nke ukwuu n'ọrụ Chineke, n'ọrụ ụlọ ụka na n'ọrụ obi ebere, bụ inyerịtara ụmụ mmadụ aka, mgbe ọ dị ndụ, wee rukwaa ụbọchị ọnwụ ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ kpọkuzịrị onye ọbụla dị ndụ ka o were ndụ ya na oge o nwere ugbua fèé Chineke òfùfè, nyere ndị nọ na mkpà aka, ma kwadokwara onwe ya ọnọdụ n'alaeze eluigwe maka ụbọchị ikpeazụ, bụ ụbọchị a ga-enye onye ọbụla ụgwọ ọrụ dịka ọrụ ya sìrì dị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu nke ya na ya bụ akwamozu, aka na-achị steeti Anambra bụ gọvanọ Willie Obianọ kọwàrà ya bụ agụ nwaanyị dịka onye biri ezi ndụ n'ụwa, ma meputakwa ọtụtụ ezi ihe kwesiri nñòmí n'ezinụlọ, n'ụlụ ụka na n'obodo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ kasizịrị ụmụ ya obi ka ha dìbé, ma dụọ ha ka jìgídesie ụkpụrụ nne ha ma sonyesie nzọ ụkwụ ya ike, ọbụnadị dịka o kwere nkwà ịga n'ihu n'ọrụ ọma dị iche iche o ji n'aka na steeti ahụ na iwètara ndị Anambra ezi ọchịchị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka ọ na-akọwa nne ya dịka nwaanyị obi ọma, onye ji ọkwa dịka ọkaikpe ukwu steeti Anambra, bụ ọkaikpe Ijem Onwuamaegbu rụtụrụ aka n'ụzọ dị iche iche nne ya sigoro gosi na ya bụ nne nke okwukwe, nwaanyị obi ọma na onye ọrụ Chineke na inyere ụmụ mmadụ aka na-echu ụra, ma kwupùta na ya nwere ezi olile anya na ntụkwasịobi na mkpụrụ obi ya nọ n'alaeze eluigwe ugbua na-ézù ike.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kèlèrè ndị dị iche iche bịara isonye na ya bụ mmemme akwamozu na ndị tụnyere ụtụ ma ọ bụ nye aka n'otu ụzọ ma ọ bụ nke ọzọ iji hụ na ya bụ akwamozu gara nke ọma, ma kwuo na óbì ga na-atọ nne ha ụtọ nke ukwuu n'ebe ọbụla ọ nọ n'ihi ọbịbịa ha, ma kpekwazie ka Chineke gaa n'ihu ịkwụghàchì ha mmaji kwùrù mmaji.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị dị iche iche sonyere na ya bụ mmemme akwamozu gụnyèrè:
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Minista ala anyị na-ahụ maka ihe na-eme na mba ofesi, bụ maazị Godffery Onyeama; Major General Azubuike Ihejirika lagoro ezumike nka; aka abụọ chịbụrụ steeti Anambra n'oge gara aga, bụ maazị Peter Obi na oriakụ Virgy Etiaba; kọmishọna steeti ahụ na-ahụ maka ọrụ, bụ maazị Marcel Ifejiọfọr; onyeisi ndị ọrụ nyere gọvanọ Willie Obianọ, bụ maazị Primus Ọdịlị; ode akwụkwọ ìzùgbe steeti ahụ n'oge gara aga, bụ maazị Oseloka Ọbaze; Archbishọọpụ Province nke Niger n'oge gara aga, bụ 'Most. Rev'd.' M.S.C. Anịkwenwa; Bishọọpụ ụka Anglịkan na dayọsiisi Amichi, bụ 'Rt. Rev'd'. Ephraim Ikeakọr; nkè dayọsiisi Asaba, bụ 'Rt. Rev'd'. Justus N. Mọgekwu; nke Dayọsiisi Niger West, bụ 'Rt. Rev'd'. J.N. Ekwe; nke dayọsiisi Ọgbaru, bụ 'Rt. Rev'd' Prosper Amah; tinye ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ ikpe na ndị ọzọ selitere isi na ngalaba dị iche iche n'ala anyị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Oriakụ Lilian Ụzọakụ Ọnwụamaegbu bụ onye a mụrụ n'abalị atọ nke ọnwa Ọkụtoobà ahọ 1928, ma nwụọ n'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ nke ọnwa Febụwarị ahọ a, ka ọ gbachara ahọ iri iteghete.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Di ya, bụ maazị Moses Ọbụmneme Ọnwụamaegbu lagoro mmụọ jiri ọkwa dịka Attorney General na Kọmishọna ikpe nkwụmọtọ nke mpaghara East Central ala anyị n'oge gara aga, ma jiekwa ọkwa dịka ọkaikpe nke ụlọikpe ukwu steeti Anambra n'oge gara aga.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Tupu ọnwụ ya, Oriakụ Ọnwụamaegbu nwere ụmụ ise, ụmụ-ụmụ iri na ụmụ-ụmụ-ụmụ abụọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O gosìputara afọ ojuju ya banyere otu ya bụ ọrụ ngo si aga na ogoogo e ji arụ ya, ma mee ka a mara na a ga-etinye ọkụ okporo ụzọ na ya nwga ngwa a rụchara ya. O kwuru na ọchịchị ya ji ọrụ okporo ụzọ ruru kilomita iri anọ na ise na mpaghara ahụ, ma sị na mbize na-akpa ike na mpaghara ahụ bụ nke a ga-elebàrá anya nke ọma, were uche sochie ya azụ ma kpàá ya eze.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ gara n'ihu kwuo na a na-edozigharị ebe ahụ e si abànye n'ọgbà Ogbunike na ime ka mma ya pụtakwuo ìhè, bụkwa nke ọ sị na ọ ga-enye aka ịdọta na ịkwàlìtè njèm nlegharị anya n'ebe ahụ. Ọ dụzịrị ụmụafọ Anambra ka ha jisie ike na nkwàdo ha na-enye ọchịchị ya, iji wee gaa n'ihu n'ọrụ ọma dị iche iche o ji n'aka na ya bụ steeti.
label: igbo
