citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na ntụnye nke ya, kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ọrụ na steeti ahụ, bụ maazị Marcel Ifejiọfọr kwuru na e nyechaala onye ji ya bụ ọrụ ngo ihe ndị kwesiri iji rụchapụ ya bụ ọrụ, ma mekwazie ka a mara na e teela ihe karịrị kilomita ise n'okporo ụzọ ahụ dị kilomita iri na abụọ. O gosipụtazịkwara ezi olile anya o nwere na a ọrụ ga-akụrụ ọnụ ebe ahụ n'oge a tụrụ anya ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Maazị Yinka Amosun, bụ onyeisi ụlọ ọrụ ngo ji ya bụ ọrụ kwèrè nkwà ịrụchapụ ma hafee ya n'oge e kwùrù na n'ogoogo kwesiri ekwesi, ebe kọmishọna na-ahụ maka njèm okporo ụzọ, bụ maazị Uchenna Okafor kwuru na a rụchaa ya, na okporo ụzọ ahụ ga-enye aka n'ịkwàlitè njem siriri werere na mpaghara ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwuru na mkpocha na nzacha ahụ e sìrì na ya wee nwụchikọọ ndị ahụ bụ nke e mere site n'aka ndị òtù ọrụ nchekwa ahụ pụrụ ichè na-ebu agha megide otu nzúzo, bụ 'Anti-Cult', n'ọrụ ha gàrà n'ime izuụka abụọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O mere ka a mara na a kpụpụla mmadụ iri anọ na ise n'ime ha ụlọ ikpe, tọhapụ mmadụ iri atọ na ise aka ha dị ọcha ka ha laba, ebe a ka na-enyòchakwa mmadụ iri atọ na atọ fọrọ afọ. Ọ sị na ihe e nwèkọtara n'aka ndị ahụ gụnyere: ótù nsụnsụ egbè, ogologo égbè asaa mgbọ dị na ha, ọtụtụ anyụike, mma ògè, na akwụkwọ kpọrọ nkụ a na-enyo ènyò na ọ bụ ìgbó.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwuru na ụfọdụ n'ime ndị ahụ bụ ndị na-apụnara mmadụ ụgbọala n'ike, bụ ndị a nàpụtara ụgbọala asatọ ha zutere ezute n'aka ha. Ndị ahụ ka ọ kọwara dịka Paul Chukwuezugo gbara ahọ iri anọ na abụọ na onye òtù ya bụ maazị Micheal Obinna, onye a maara dịka Mayor. O kwuru na ihe e nwèkọtara n'aka ndị ahụ bụ ụgbọala asaa, nke gụnyere: ụgbọala Toyota Venza, ụgbọala Lexus 350 atọ, otu ọkwụọtọ ekele eze Toyota Rav 4, Toyota Corolla atọ na ụgbọala Sports Utility Vehicles (SUV).
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ihe ndị ọzọ e nwètara n'aka ha gụnyere otu nsụnsụ égbè na-agba ọnụ iri, otu mma ògè na ekwentị anọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mmeri nkea bụ mmeri nke abụọ Naijiria nwetara n'ụbọchị anọ ka ha merichara mba Seychelles ọkpụ atọ asatara nanị otu na ngalaba E n'asọmpi eji amara ndị ga-etozu ịsonye na iko Africa n'ámá egwuregwu ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onuachu, onye nọchiri Odion Ighalo na ndị bidoro bọọlụ, kpara onye Ijipt tupu ọ gbanye bọọlụ ahụ n'ọnụ goolu maka goolu mbụ ya na mpụta abụọ dịka onye egwu bọọlụ Naijiria.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onuachu nyere goolu ahụ ndị Naịjirịa ji were merie na nkeji mbụ nke asọmpi ahụ, ebe ndị Ijipt bụzi ndị gbara mbọ ka ha gbata ihe na asọmpi ahụ mana mbọ ha niile wụrụ n'ala.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị Naịjirịa were ọnọdụ ma na-ahazi ihe ha mara eme nke ọma dịka ha n'eti mba Ijipt mmanwụ, mana Hassan Mahmoud chọrọ ime Naijiria echeta ebewe site n'adọba agbaa nke ha jiri megharịa onye ọ bụla anya mana Daniel Akpenyi na-eche goolu jidere ya bụ bọọlụ n'enweghị nsogbu ọ bụla.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ijipt nwere ohere ọzọ dị iche iche mana oche goolu, Ikechukwu Ezenwa, onye nọchiri Daniel Akpenyi n'agba nke abụọ, gosiri na ya zuru okè n'ihe a na-eme site n'ichewa ndị Ijipt obi.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mohammed Salah, bụzi onye na-esoghi gbaa ya bụ asọmpi.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu na mmemme ahụ, Pingjian kwuru, Akwụkwọ bụ ike nke ọnọdụ mmepe ahụ pụtara ìhè na China. N'afọ otu puku, narị iteghete na iri anọ na iteghete (1949), ọnọdụ itiboribo bụ pacenti iri asatọ, mana ugbu a ọ nọ n'ihe pekarịrị pacenti atọ. Nke a bụ n'ihi ọnọdụ dị oké mkpa nke anyị nyere akwụkwọ. Anyị na-asọpụrụ ndị nkụzi ma matakwa uru akwụkwọ bara.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onyeisi Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe dị n'Ọka, Ọkammụta Josefụ Ahaneku, jara onye nnọchiteanya anya ahụ ike maka ọnọdụ agụm akwụkwọ n'efu ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụmụ akwụkwọ dị iri anọ na asatọ bụ nke a kpachara anya were họpụta iji were cheta afọ iri anọ ma asatọ ala Naịjiria ma China jiri were nwee ezi mmekọrịta.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Anyị ga-echeta na onye nnọchiteanya mba China ahụ bịara na Mahadum na ụbọchị mbụ nke ọnwa Ọkụtoba afọ gara aga were nye ụmụ akwụkwọ iri anọ na asaa onyinye agụm akwụkwọ n'efu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụmụ akwụkwọ ndị a bụ ndị rutere uru a bụzi ndị esiri na ngalaba dị iche iche nke Mahadum ahụ were họpụta n'eleghị mmadụ ọ bụla anya n'iru.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ bụ ihe sịrị ike nke a na-amaghị otu a ga-esi tinye aka na o nweghị onye azọpụtara n'ime ha dịka ọkụ ahụ nọ na-agha ike na-anwụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ozi anyị nwetara gara n'ihu were kwuo, Anyị enweghị ike bute ozu onye ọ bụla n'ime ha maka tupu anyị enwee ike bata n'ụlọ ahụ, ha abụrụgo ndị ọkụ gbagburu ha bụrụ ntụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye na-ahụ maka ezi mmekọrịta ndị uweojii na ọhaneze na steeti ahụ, Haruna Mohammed, kwuru na ya bụ akụkọ bụ ezie.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwuru na ndị ahụ nwụrụ bụ ndị ọkụ gbara na o nweghị onye ga-amatazi ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọkụ kpara mkpamkpa na Umuoffor, Ọkịja n'ogige otu nwoke aha ya bụ Maxwell Okeke.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ihi nkea, nwunye ya dị ime bụ Nwazuru Okeke, ụmụaka abụọ, aha ha bụ Chidiebube Okeke, gbara afọ abụọ na Makuochukwu Okeke, gbara nanị otu afọ, bụ ndị nọ n'ime ụlọ ahụ oge mkpamkpa ahụ na-akpa bụrụzie ndị ọkụ gbara na o nweghị onye ga-ama onye ha bụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwuru n'ọkụ ahụ bụ nke a kwụsịrị oge ndị uweojii, ngalaba nke Ọkịja, wụchiri n'ogige site n'enyemaka nke ndị ọ metụrụ n'obi.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mohammad onye kwuru na ihe kpatara ọkụ ahụ jiri bido bụ nke anamabeghị, tinyere na onyeisi ndị uweojii na steeti ahụ, Rabiu Ladodo, akpọọla ọkụ maka nyocha ka amata ihe kpatara ya bụ ọkụ maka na awọ anaghị agba ọsọ ehihie na nkịtị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Asọmpi ahụ bụ nke were mkpụrụ ụbọchị iteghete, màlite n'abalị iri abụọ na otù nke ọnwa Maachị wee ruo n'abalị iri na itoolu, ma bụrụkwa nke ọ bụ ụmụakwụkwọ nọ n'agbata ahọ iri na anọ wee ruo n'agbata ahọ iri abụọ na otu sonyere na ya, bụ ndị sitere mba iri anọ sònyere na ya
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụmụakwụkwọ Anambra ahụ gara ya bụ asọmpi bụ maazị Meshack Ugwuishi, maazị Onyedika Chuka-Umeora, maazị Chukwualụka Nwachukwu, na maazị Dominic Machi, ma bụrụkwa ndị nwetara mmeri site n'ihe ha jiri aka ha rụọ, bụ nke ha kpọrọ 'Adaptable Alternative Power Supply for Sub-Saharan Africa'. Ya bụ akụrụngwa bụ igwe na-ewèta ọkụ, site n'igwè solar bụ nke na-enyere ya aka ịdọta ike sitere n'anyanwụ, jìgide ike ahụ wee na-ekesà ya dịka ọkụ n'ụlọ, ma ọ bụ n'ụlọ ọrụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya n'Awka dịka ọ na-anabata ndị ahụ, aka na-achị steeti ahụ bụ gọvanọ Willie Obianọ, nke onye nọchitere anya ya bụ osote ya bụ dọkịta Nkem Okeke kwupùtara nnọọ na steeti ahụ na-eme nke ọma na ngalaba agụmakwụkwọ nakwa ngalaba niile. O kwuru na Anambra nwere nnọọ ụmụakụkwọ nwere ezi ọgụgụ isi a chọrọ iji wee soro ndị sitere mba ụwa dị iche iche wee sọọ mpi ma nwetekwa mmeri dị ịtụ n'anya, ma kwuo na naanị ihe ha chọrọ bụ agbamume na nkwàdo. O kwukwazịrị na ọchịchị nọ ugbua na steeti ahụ agaghị ada mbà chaa chaa na nkwàdo ọ na-enye ụmụakwụkwọ na ngalaba agụmakwụkwọ ya bụ steeti.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na mbụ n'okwu mmalite ya, kọmishọna steeti ahụ na-ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ, bụ ọkammụta Kate Omenụgha mere ka a mara na nturu ugo ahụ ụmụakwụkwọ ahụ nwètara bụ n'ihi ịgbà dara ụda gọvanọ Obianọ tigoro na ngalaba mmụta steeti ahụ. O kwuru na njikọ aka gọọmenti steeti ahụ na ndị ụka n'ihe gbasaara agụmakwụkwọ na-amịta nnọọ ezi mkpụrụ a tụrụ anya, ma kwuo na ha ga-akwàgide nkè ahụ. Ọ kpọkùzikwara ụmụakwụkwọ ka ha jisie ike n'ịgụ akwụkwọ ha na n'iji ohere ọma ha nwere ugbua wee kpọrọ ihe, n'ihi na uru dị na nke ahụ bụ akọcha akọcha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nke a bụ nke e mere site na nkwàdo akwụkwọ ikike e nwètàrà site n'aka ụlọ ikpe ukwu steeti ahụ, bụrụ nke weere ọnọdụ na Awka bụ isi obodo steeti ahụ, Ọnịtsha, Nnewi na ụfọdụ ebe ndị ọzọ, ma bụrụkwa nke e mere site n'aka ụlọ ọrụ 'Anambra State Internal Revenue Service', ndị òtù ọrụ 'Nigeria Security and Civil Defence Corps' na ndị ọrụ uwe ojii.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya bànyere nke ahụ, onyeisi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ 'Anambra State Internal Revenue Service', bụ Dọkịta David Nzekwu kọwara na nke ahụ dabàrà adaba na ntụziaka na ebumnobi gọọmenti steeti ahụ na-achụso ugbu a, bụ ịkwàlite ọnụ ego a na-enweta na steeti ahụ kwà ọnwa ọbụla, bụkwa nkè ọ sị na ha na-agbaso ùsoro iwu were na-emezùputa.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O mere ka a mara na ụlọ ọrụ ọhụụ ọbụla kwesiri idebànye aha n'akwụkwọ ma màlite tụba ụtụ ya na ụtụ isi ndị na-arụ ọrụ ebe ahụ, n'agbàtà ọnwa isii ha jìrì malite ọrụ, ọbụnadị dịka o mere ka a mara na akwụkwọ iwu na-akọwa maka ụtụ isi kọwapụtàsịrị ihe ndị ahụ niile n'ebe o dòrò anya ọma. O kwuru na amụma ịkpọchisi ụlọ ọrụ a ha màlitere imezuputa ugbua ga-eme ka ọtụtụ mmadụ na ụlọ ọrụ màlite ịtụ ụtụ isi ha n'ụzọ na n'oge kwesiri ekwesi, ma kwukwazie na onye ọbụla nwara ànwà, tiwaa, gbapee ma ọ bụ kpọpee ụlọ ọrụ ndị ahụ ha kpọchiri ga-abụ onye a ga-akpụpụ ụlọ ikpe ma wèré ùsòrò iwu nyụchaa ya anya, n'ihi na gọọmenti agaghị ada mbà n'imezùpúta atụmatụ ahụ o ji n'aka n'uju.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụfọdụ n'ime ebe ndị ahụ ha kpọchiri gụnyèrè: ụlọ ọrụ Suburd Consortium dị n'Awka, bụ ndị ji ụgwọ ụtụ karịrị nde Naịra ise màlite n'agbàtà ọnwa Jenụwarị ahọ 2011, wee ruo ọnwa Ekeresimeesi ahọ 2016; ụlọ ọrụ 'Eteleson Industries' dị n'Ogbunike, màkà ịgbanahị ịtụ ụtụ isi ya n'agbata ahọ 2010 wee ruo ahọ 2015, bụ nke karịrị nde Naịra iri abụọ; ụlọ ọrụ Nelly New Town Hotels and Suites dị n'Ọba, bụ nke ji ụgwọ ụtụ isi ruru nde Naịra asatọ n'agbatà ahọ 2014 na 2016; ụlọ ọrụ Ejiamatu Microfinance Bank dị n'Ojoto, bụ nke ji ụgwọ karịrị nde Naịra iri na isii; ụlọ ọrụ Delendu Aluminium Manufacturing dị n'Onitsha, nke ji ụgwọ karịrị nde Naịra asatọ, ụlọ akwụkwọ Good News Academy, Ogidi, ji ụgwọ ruru narị puku Naịra asaa, tinyere ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mmemme akwamozu ahụ, nke e mere màlite n'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ wee ruo n'abalị iri atọ na otù nke ọnwa Maachị ahọ a bụ nke weere ọnọdụ n'ezinụlọ be di ya dị n'Umuhu Ụkpọr, bụ isi obodo okpuru ọchịchị Nnewi South nke steeti Anambra.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ozi nkasiobi o ziteere ezinaụlọ ndị be Nwachukwu, Bishọọpụ ụka Katọliiki na Dayọsiisi Nnewi, bụ Most Rev. Hilary Odili Okeke tòrò Mama Josephine, bụ onye o kwùrù na ezi ọrụ ya n'obodo, ọrụ obi ebere ya inyeịtara ụmụ mmadụ na ndị ụwa na-atụ n'ọnụ aka, tinyere ezi ntụnye ya na nsònyesi ike ya n'ụlọ ụka na n'ihe Chineke nà-agba nnọọ ezi àmà na akaebe na ọ ghọtara ihe ọsọ eluigwe pụtara nakwa ụgwọ ọrụ so ya; o wee gbaa nkè ya n'ụzọ a tụrụ anya
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Bishọọpụ Okeke, onye kwara àrịrị na ya apụghị ibịanwu ya bụ akwamozu n'onwe ya ụbọchị ahụ n'ihi ihe ndapụta, kasìzịrị ezinaụlọ ndị be Nwachukwu obì, chètara ha na nne ha bìrì ezi ndụ, ma kpọkukwazie ha ka ha sògide ezi nzọ ụkwụ ya ma jìgidesie ezi ọrụ ya ike, ya na ihe ndị o mepùtasịrị n'ụwa.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na mbụ n'okwuchukwu ya na mmèmme ụka akwamozu ahụ, bụ nke weere ọnọdụ n'ụlọ ụka 'St. Mary's Catholic Church, Ukpor Center', onye nọchitere anya bishọọpụ ma bụrụkwa ode akwụkwọ ya, bụ Rev. Fr. Celestine Okonkwo kpọpụtara úrù atọ na ihe atọ o jiri dị mkpa na a ga-akàrà onye nwụrụ anwụ ụkà akwamozu, nke gụnyere: iji nye Chineke nna òtùto maka ndụ onye ahụ nwụrụ anwụ, iji rịọ Ya o nye onye ahụ nwụrụ anwụ ezumike na ọñụ ebighị ebi n'alaeze Ya, na iji rịọ ya ka ọ kasìé ndị ahụ mmadụ nwụnahịrị obi ma nye ha mmụọ ha ga-eji dìé nkè ahụ. Ọ kpọkùzịrị ma dụọ onye ọbụla dị ndụ ka o were ugbua ọ dị ndụ kwadobere onwe ya ebe ọ ga-aga na ebe ọ ga-anọ ọnọdụ ya n'oge ikpeazụ, n'ihi na ọ dịghị onye maara oge ekwe ga-akpọ ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mgbe ọ na-akọwa nne ya dịka agụ nwaanyị pụrụ ichè, nwa mbụ nkè oriakụ Nwachukwu ma bụrụkwa onyeisi ọchịchị obodo Ụkpọr, bụ Maazị Emmanuel Nwachukwu leghàchirì nnọọ anya azụ, wee kọọ ma kpọpụtasịa ụzọ dị iche iche nne ha siri gosi na ya bụ nwaanyị dị ike ọrụ na nwaanyị nwere ùgwù na nsọpụrụ, malite na tupuu, mgbe na oge a lụchàrà agha Nigeria na Biafra; ya na tupuu na mgbè di ya bụ maazị Joseph Nwachukwu nwụchara n'ahọ 1999. Ọ kpọpụtara ụfọdụ ihe dị iche iche ya bụ agụ nwaanyị mepùtara tupuu ọ laba mmụọ, kwe nkwà n'aha ezinaụlọ ahụ na ya ga-ejigidesi ihe ndị ahụ na nzọ ụkwụ ya ike, ma kpekwazie ka Chineke nara mkpụrụ obi ya na ndokwa ma nye ya ezumike udo, ọbụnadị dịka o tòrò ndị dị iche iche bịara isònyere na ịnọnyèrè ha n'oge akwamozu ahụ, ma kpee ka Chineke kwụghàchi ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu nkè ha n'otu n'otu, nwa nwoke nke abụọ nke Ma Josephine, bụ Ụkọchukwu Ifeanyị Nwachukwu, na nwa ya nwoke nke ikpèazụ, bụ Maazị Sunday Nwachukwu, tinyere ụmụ ya ndị nwaanyị, bụ oriakụ Flommy Ekwuy Obiekwe na oriakụ Ogochukwu Nwosu kpọpụtasịrị ụfọdụ akparamagwa dị iche iche e jiri mara nne ha, nke gụnyere na ọ bụ o jide o nye, nwaanyị dị ike ọrụ, ọchọ udo, nwaanyị kwesiri ntụkwasi obi, nwaanyị obi sara sara, nwaanyị obi ọma, nwaanyị na-adịghị akwàdo ihe ọjọọ, nwaanyị na-atụ egwu Chineke, nwaanyị na-egwùte egwu na nwaanyị dị ike n'ekpere. Ha kwuputazịkwara na ọ na-ewute ha na ha agaghị ahụzịkwa ya anya n'ụwa ọzọ, ma kwe ya nkwà na ha agaghị echefù ma ọ bụ hapụ ihe niile ha mụtara n'aka ya, ma ọ bụ gbakụta ha àzụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị oriakụ ụmụ Mama Josephine, nke gụnyere oriakụ Paulyn Nwachukwu, oriakụ Ify Nwachukwu na oriakụ Ijeoma Nwachukwu, tínyéré ụmụ-ụmụ ya, nke gụnyere nwaada Ebere Nwachukwu na maazị Nọnso Nwachukwu gbàkwàrà ezi àmà bànyere ezi ọrụ na ezi ndụ nke mama bìrì n'ụwa, ma kwuo na ha ga-esòsi ụkpụrụ ahụ ọ tọbara ha ike, iji wee biekwa ndụ zuru òkè dịka ya onwe ya bìrì.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mmemme ahụ bụ nke dọtara ọtụtụ ndị dị iche iche selitere isi na ndị e ji okwu ha agba ìzù na ngalaba dị iche iche na steeti ahụ na mpụga ya, nke gụnyere: aka chịbụrụ steeti Delta n'oge gara aga, bụ maazị James Ibori; nwa amadi ahụ a họpụtara ọhụ ịnọchite anya ọgbọ nta nkwàdo 'Anambra South' n'ụlọ ọgbakọ sineeti ala anyị, bụ Dọkịta Ifeanyị Ụbah; ògbò ya nke ọgbọ nta nkwàdo Anambra Etiti, bụ sinetọ Uche Ekwunife; ọka okwu ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu steeti Anambra, bụ oriakụ Rita Madụagwụ; onyeisi ụlọ ọrụ 'APAMS Ltd', bụ maazị Kelvin Chukwumaobi, tinyere imirikiti ndị ọzọ selitere isi.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ikanda gbárá ahọ iri abụọ na asaa sitere Azịa n'okpuru ọchịchị Ihiala bụ onye a na-enyo enyo na ọ bụ ya na ndị òtù ya gbùrù otu nwoke a maara dịka Ndubuisi Nwokolo na mkpewara ụzọ Otumoye dị n'Ọdọakpụ Ọnịtsha, na steeti Anambra n'abalị iri abụọ na iteghete nke ọnwa Juunu ahọ 2018.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ọ gwara ndị nta akụkọ dịka ọ na-akpụgharị ndị ahụ n'isi ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe oji dị n'Amawbịa, onyeisi ndị uwe ojii na steeti ahụ, bụ maazị Mustapha Dandaura mere ka a mara na e jidere ya bụ nwoke n'Ọnịtsha site n'ọrụ nke alaka ndị uwe ojii na-ahụ maka iji ọgụgụ isi achọpụta ihe, ma kwenwèé nkwà na ha agaghị ada mbà n'ọrụ ya na n'agha ọ na-ebu megide ohi, mpụ na arụrụ ala na steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwupùtakwara ezi njìkere ha dị ịkwàlite ezi nchekwa ndụ na akụnụba na steeti ahụ, ma kpọkùkwazie ndị ụmụafọ Anambra ka ha na-ewèta mkpesa n'aka ndị ọrụ nchekwa oge niile ma na-emekwa ka ha mara banyere ebe na mgbe ọbụla ndị omekome na-akụ akụmakụ site n'ịkpọtụrụ ha ozigbo, ma sikwazie n'ụzọ dị otu ahụ kwàlite ma nyere ha aka n'ọrụ nchekwa ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị uwe ojii ahụ kpụgharịkwara ndị ọzọ a na-enyo ènyò na ọ bụ ha wakpòró ògigè ndị uwe ojii dị n'Ajalị, suo ya ọkụ ma bukọrọ egbe dị ebe ahụ gbafuo. Mana mmadụ ndị ahụ gọrọ aka na ọkpà ha, sị na o nweghị ihe ha mà bànyere ebubo ahụ a na-ebo ha; ọbụnadị dịka Ikanda n'onwe ya gọrọkwara agụgọ, kwuo na ya bụ onye na-arụrụ gọọmenti ọrụ, ma sịkwa na ọ bụ naanị mgbe a gwara ya na ndị òtù ya gbùrù mmadụ n'ime ahịa ka ya pụtara.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Maazị Dandaura gàzịrị n'ihu mee ka a mara na a kà na-eme nnyòcha miri èmì bànyere nkè ahụ, nke mgbe e mechara ya, a kpụpụ ndị ahụ ụlọ ikpe ma were usoro iwu nyụchaa ha anya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụkọchukwu Ugwu bụ onye a tọrọ n'ụlọ ụka ya, Ụlọ ụka Katọlik Mak dị nsọ, dị na Obinọfia Ndiụnọ, na okpuru ọchịchị Ezeagu, n'ime abalị iri na atọ nke ọnwa Maachị, afọ puku abụọ na iri na iteghete, oge ọ na-akụ elekere iteghete nke anyasị ka o siri nzukọ lọta.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị ntọ ahụ dị mmadụ anọ n'ọnụ ọgụgụ gbara ya egbe tupu ha akpụrụ ya n'ụgbọala ya, ma mechaa werekwa ego site n'ụlọ akụ ya dịka ha na ndị ezinaụlọ ya kpachara.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka ọtụtụ ụbọchị gasịrị ma anya ahụghị ya bụ ụkọchukwu, ndị ụlọ ụka ya gbagharịrị site na enyemaka ndị obodo ahụ were chọwa ya; ka mkpụrụ ụbọchị abụọ gasịrị, ha hụrụ ozu Ugwu ka ọ na-ere n'otu ọhịa dị n'ogige ahụ, ụbọchị Wednezdee, abalị iri abụọ nke ọnwa Maachị, afọ puku abụọ na iteghete.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ozi sitere n'aka ndị Uweojii kwuru na ha anwụchịkọla onyeisi ma osote ya n'ime mmadụ anọ ahụ gburu ya bụ onye ụkọchukwu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ha gara n'ihu were kwuo na aka kpara onyeisi òtù ahụ n'Abuja ebe ya na ezinaụlọ ya nọ ka kpachara ya bụ arụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta ndị Uweojii na ọhaneze na Steeti ahụ, SP Ebere Amaraizu, kwuru na ha ejidela ndị omekome ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Amaraizu kwuru, Ndị Uweojii na Steeti Enugwu na-agwa ọhaneze karịsịa ọhaneze Enugwu Steeti, na ha ejidela ọtụtụ ndị a na-enyo enyo gbasara ntọrọ na ogbugbu Ụkọchukwu Clement Ugwu, onye ụkọchukwu nọ na Ụlọ ụka Katọlik nke Mak dị nsọ na Obinọfịa Ndiụnọ na okpuru ọchịchị Ezeagu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị ahụ a na-enyo enyo na-enyere ndị Uweojii aka ná nchọpụta ha ka ha were nwee ike jide ndị òtù ha ndị ọzọ bụ ndị nọ n'ọsọ ụkwụ eru ala ugbua
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ sịrị na a ga-akpụgharị ndị ahụ a na-enyo enyo ụbọchị Tọọzdee. O kwukwara na ndị ahụ ejiderela ugbua bụ ndị gbara ụkọchukwu ahụ egbe ma werekwa ego ya site n'ụlọ akụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye nọ n'isi Ntụliaka ahụ, Teddy Adias, bụ onye mere nkwupụta n'isi ụlọ ọrụ INEC dị na Port Harcourt kwuru, Wike, bụ onye zọrọ ya bụ ọkwa site na ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị People's Democratic Party, nwetara vootu dị puku narị asatọ na iri asatọ na isii, na narị abụọ na iri isii na anọ (886,264), ebe ogbo ya na African Alliance Congress, Biokpomabo Awara, nwetara puku otu narị na iri asaa na atọ, na narị asatọ na iri ise na iteghete (173, 859).
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Awara bụ onye Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka Njem, Rotimi Ámá echi, kwadoro dịka ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị All Progressive Congress enweghị onye ha wepụtara na ntụliaka ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka ọ na-akpọ Wike dịka onye meriri, Adias kwuru na gọvanọ ahụ mezuchara ihe niile iwu kwuru.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Adias kwuru na vootu dị puku narị abụọ na iri anọ na iteghete, na narị atọ na iri abụọ na anọ (249,324) bụ nke a na-agụnyeghị n'ihi na emeghị Ntụliaka ebe ahụ ma ọ bụ Ntụliaka ahụ bụ nke akagburu akagbu n'ihi ọgbaghara.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya, Mụ, n'ụbọchị taa, kwusịrị ike, na abụ m onye nọ n'isi Ntụliaka a, na Nyesom Wike nke People's Democratic Party, emezuchala ihe niile iwu chọrọ, ma nwetakwa vootu kacha n'ọnụ ọgụgụ ma bụrụzịa onye turu ugo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye mmeri, bụ onye ji vootu kachasị n'ọnụ ọgụgụ, nwetara vootu dị puku narị asatọ na iri asatọ na isii, na narị abụọ na iri isii na anọ (886,264), ebe onye nke abụọ nwetara vootu dị narị asatọ na iri ise na iteghete (173, 859). Ndịiche dị na vootu ndị a dị puku narị asaa na iri na abụọ, narị anọ na ise (712,405). Ndị denyere anya ha n'akwụkwọ maka Ntụliaka na ebe ndị ahụ emeghị Ntụliaka ma ọ bụ ebe ndị ahụ akagburu dị puku narị abụọ na iri anọ na iteghete, narị atọ na iri abụọ na anọ (249,324).
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ozigbo akpọchara ya dịka onye meriri, Wike si na mmeri ahụ bụ nke Chineke na ndị niile bụ ndị tufuru ndụ ha n'ime Ntụliaka nke afọ a na Steeti Rivas.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Gọvanọ ahụ bụ onye meriri na okpuru ọchịchị iri na iteghete n'ime okpuru ọchịchị iri abụọ na otu ebe Awara meriri na okpuru ọchịchị ndị a: Toru (okpuru ọchịchị ya) na Oyigbo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Wike gosipụtara ume ya n'okpuru ọchịchị ya, Obio/Akpọrọ, ebe o nwetara vootu dị puku narị abụọ na iri asatọ na otu, otu narị na iri isii na otu, ebe Awara nwetara naanị puku asaa, narị anọ na iri iteghete na ise (7,495)
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Enweghị vootu a chịkọtara na okpuru ọchịchị Abua/Odual na Gokana maka ọtụtụ nsogbu na ọgbaghara nke metụtara ọnọdụ nchekwa.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Gọvanọ ahụ nwetakwara vootu dị elu n'okpuru ọchịchị Andoni, bụ obodo onyeisi oche ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị People's Democratic Party, Uche Secondus.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka ihe ịtụnanya, Wike merikwara n'okpuru ọchịchị Ikwerre, bụ okpuru ọchịchị Amaechi.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị Super Eagles, bụ ndị burula iko Afrịka ugboro atọ, gbagoro dịka ha sụchara ndị Seychelles akwụ n'isi ma gwakwa mba Ijipt na dimkpa na ibe ya hà bụ n'okwu ọnụ na asọmpi ha sọrọ ịzụ ụka abụọ gara aga. Nke a meziri ha ji gbagolite n'etiti ha siri kwụrụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Otú egwu bọọlụ Senegal bụ ndị mbụ na Afrịka ebe ndị Tunisia na-achụ ha n'azụ. Morocco bụ ndị nke anọ na DR Congo bụ ndị nke ise mezuziri ohere ise nke mba Afrịka. E tinyere Ghana, nanị obodo ndị a bụ otu egwú bọọlụ siri Afrịka sonyere na ndị iri na ise bu ụzọ n'ụwa niile.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị kacha were gbagolite n'ọnwa Maachị bụ Tanzania dịka ha gafere mba isii site n'ebe ha kwụbu. Ọ bụ nwa amadị Naijiria bụ Emmanuel Amuneke bụ onyeisi ha mere ha jiri were bụrụ ndị ga-esonye na iko Afrịka nke afọ a ka o mechara afọ iri atọ na iteghete ha etozughị maka ya bụ egwuregwu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka FIFA depụtara ya, Belgium ka nọ dịka ndị mbụ, France bụ ndị bụrụ iko mba ụwa n'afọ gara aga (puku abụọ na iri na asatọ) na-agba ndị nke abụọ ebe Brazil kwụrụ dịka ndị nke atọ. England gbagotara dịka na ndị nke anọ ka ha gafere mba Croatia bụzi ndị nke ise.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Anyanwụ rịọrịọ ụlọ ikpe ahụ ka ha kagbuo mmeri Ihedioha ma kpọọ ya dịka onye meriri na nhọpụta nke onye ga-azọ gọvanọ na ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ahụ. Ọ sịrị na Ihedioha jiri wuruwuru were nweta mmeri na nhọpụta nke ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka ọ na-ekpe ikpe, Ọkaikpe Tijani Ringin kwuru na onye mkpesa (Anyanwụ) enweghị ike kọwara ụlọ ikpe ahụ ihe mere ha ga-eji were nye ya arịrịọ ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Oge ndị PDP mere nhọpụta ha na Owere, Ihedioha nwetara vootu dị otu puku, narị asaa na iri abụọ na atọ (1,723) nke mere o jiri bụrụ onye pụtara dịka onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ahụ họpụtara ga-azọ ọkwa gọvanọ na ntụliaka ahụ emere na abalị iteghete nke ọnwa Maachị. Anyanwụ, n'aka nke ọzọ nwetara vootu dị otú puku, narị abụọ na iri asatọ na abụọ (1,282) were bụrụ onye nke abụọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ebe Anyanwụ anabataghị mpụtara ntụliaka nke nhọpụta ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ahụ, ndị ọzọ so zọọ ya bụ ọkwa dịka Sinetọ Athan Achọnụ, Ọkammụta Jude Njọkụ, Chukwu Ekomaru na George Ejike, kelere Ihedioha na mmeri ya dịka onye ga-azọ gọvanọ steeti ahụ n'okpuru ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ahụ na Steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye na-ahazi mgbasa ozi na Mahadum ahụ, Maazi Olatunji Oladejo, nọrọ ụbọchị Satọdee na Ibadan were kwuo na Zubair nwụrụ n'ihi ọkụ nke gbara n'ebe o bi. Ọ gara n'ihu were kwuo na ọ bụghị maka ọrụ nke ndị na-emenyụ ọkụ, ngalaba nke mahadum ahụ, ụlọ ahụ niile ga-abụ nke ọkụ ga-agbari.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ya bụ onye nkuzi nà-arụ ọrụ n'oge gara aga na ngalaba mgbakọ na mwepụ na Mahadum ahụ mana o tinyere akwụkwọ alụghịzim tupu ihe anya mmiri a emee.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ekele dịrị ndị na-akwụsị ọkụ ọgbụgba bụ ndị gbatara ọsọ enyemaka n'oge n'ụzọ Philipson bụ ebe o bi. Ma e wezụga nkea, ụlọ ahụ niile ga-abụ ihe ọkụ ga-agbatu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Site n'obi ebere mahadum ahụ ka ha jiri hapụ ya ka ọ nọrọ n'ụlọ ndị ọrụ mahadum tutu ruo oge ọ ga-akwapụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ gaziri n'ihu were sị ka Chineke kasie ezinaụlọ ya na ndị ọ hapụrụ obi.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ihi na akwụkwọ mkpesa ahụ erughị ya aka n'oge, Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari, bụ onye jiri aha ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị APC were zọọ ọkwa onyeisiala, nwere rue abalị iri na isii nke ọnwa Epurel iji were nye ụsa nke ya banyere mkpesa ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Atiku na otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ya, n'ụbọchị iri na asatọ nke ọnwa Maachị, afọ puku abụọ na iri na iteghete tinyere akwụkwọ mkpesa n'ihu otu ahụ na-ahụ maka mkpesa nke ntụliaka onyeisiala, were na-ekwu na ọ bụghị Buhari na APC turu ugo na ya bụ ntụliaka.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ha gara n'ihu were kwuo na ọ bụ onye zọrọ ọkwa onyeisiala n'otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị PDP bụ onye meriri nke megidere ihe INEC kwuru. INEC, Buhari na APC bụ ndị mbụ were ruo na nke atọ bụ ndị mkpesa ahụ metụtara.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị mkpesa ahụ nyere ụlọ ọrụ INEC na APC akwụkwọ mkpesa na abalị iri abụọ na abụọ nke ọnwa Maachị, mana ihe agaghị ka siri chee dịka ha nwere ihe ndọghachi azụ were ruo abalị iri abụọ na asaa nke ọnwa Maachị oge ha nwetara ikike na ụlọikpe mkpesa dị na Abụja nke nyere ha ike ịnye onyeisiala akwụkwọ mkpesa ha site n'ụzọ ọzọ. Ha kwuru na ọ bụ n'ihi usoro dị iche iche na ọrụ ndị nche nke nọ na ụlọ onyeisiala so n'ụfọdụ ihe mere ha ejighị nwee ike nye Buhari akwụkwọ mkpesa ahụ n'aka.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka ọ dị ugbu a, ohere ụlọ ọrụ INEC na APC nwere ga-agwụ na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri na otu nke ọnwa Epurel, nke ga-eme ya abalị iri abụọ na otu ha nwetara akwụkwọ mkpesa ahụ. Nke a bụzi ihe otu onye n'ime ndị ọkàiwu otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị APC kwetara ma kwuzie na ha ga-azaghachi ya bụ akwụkwọ mkpesa tupu Tọzdee bụ ụbọchị ikpeazụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mkpamkpa a bụzi nke kpara ụbọchị ụka dịka ndị obodo ahụ gbara ọsọ ndụ were gbapụ n'ụlọ ha ebe ha na-azọ ndụ ha, ka ha ghara ị bụ ndị a ga-egbu dịka ndị otu nzuzo ahụ bịara ị chọ ndị iro ha. Ndị ahụ bụ ndị nwụrụ bụ ndị a ghọtara na ha bụ ndị otu nzuzo ọzọ ha na ha na-enwe nsogbu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị otu nzuzo ahụ jiri ime abalị oge ọ na-akụ elekere atọ nke ọnụ ụtụtụ were ruo elekere ise nke ụtụtụ were kpaa arụ a ebe ndị uweojii bụ ndị bịaziri oge ndị otu nzuzo ahụ lachara.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onyeisioche na-ahụ maka Mmepe Obodo Rumuolumeni, Sunny Odum, kọwara ya bụ mwakpo awakporo obodo ahụ dịka ihe ọhụrụ a na-ahutụbeghị, ma tinyekwa na ọ bụ ihe na-ekwesịghị ịdị bụ ogbugbu ahụ e gburu mmadụ asatọ. Odum kpọkuziri ndị bi n'obodo ahụ ka ha ghara ịtụ egwu, ebe ọ na-ekwe nkwa na ndị ọrụ nchekwa ga-anwụchịkọ ndị ahụ aka ha dị na ya bụ arụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O gosipụtakwara obi nwute ya n'ebe ndị nwụrụ anwụ nọ ma gwazie ndị obodo ahụ ka ha gaa rụọ ọrụ ha dịka ha na-eme na mbụ, na-edozichago ihe niile otu o kwesịrị ịdị nke ga-egbochi ụdị arụ ahụ ime n'ọdịnihu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị otu nzuzo ahụ bụ ndị wakporo obodo ahụ n'ọnụ ụtụtụ ụnyaahụ ebe ha na-achọ ndị iro ha were na-aba n'ụlọ n'ụlọ ebe ha na-achọ ha. Nkea mere ha jiri gbuo mmadụ asatọ n'ime ha. Egwu bara ndị obodo ahụ arụ mere ọsọ jiri wee daa iru na azụ, nne amaghịzi nwa ya n'ọsọ ndụ ahụ ebe onye ọ bụla na-azọ isi onwe ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Anyị ga-amata na ndị omekome nọ eri oge debe Steeti Zamfara n'ọnọdụ ụra aga n'anya, ebe ọtụtụ mmadụ bụ ihe nwụrụ anwụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na ngagharị iwe ha mere na Satọdee n'isi obodo ala anyị bụ Naijiria, a rịọrịọ ka onyeisiala gbata ọsọ enyemaka n'ebe nchekwa ndụ na akụnụba steeti Zamfara dị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ihi nkea, ka ndị ọbịa bụ ndị na-arụ ọrụ ebe a na-egwupụta ihe na Steeti Zamfara bụ ndị enyere nanị awa iri anọ na asatọ (abalị abụọ) ka ha were si n'obodo ahụ pụọ dịka Gọọmenti Etiti na-ebido ibu agha nke ha ga-eji were kpochapụ ndị omekome na steeti ahụ. Ọnọdụ ibu agha bụ nke akpọrọ n'olu bekee Operation Puff Adder.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ibuagha a bụrị nke bidoro na izu ụka gara aga nke eji chụọ ọnọdụ ntọrọ mmadụ nke malitere n'okporo ụzọ ahụ si Abuja were gaa Kaduna.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Iwu a bụ nke enyere dịka ọtụtụ akụkọ na-arị ibe ya elu na Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari ji ọnọdụ nchekwa obodo were egwu egwu n'ọtụtụ mpaghara ala. Ọtụtụ kwukwara na oji ya were na-egwu okwe ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị People's Democratic Party nọrọ n'akụkụ nke ha were sị na ọ bụrụ na ọlụ ahụ karịrị onyeisiala, ha kwuo ka amara ebe a ga-esi were kwa onye ukwu wara ma ọ bụ o tinye akwụkwọ alụkwaghịm. Ha gara n'ihu were dụọ onyeisiala ọdụ ka o lebaa anya nke ọma otú ọnọdụ nchekwa obodo a sịrị kwụrụ ma weta ụzọ tọrọ atọ kachasị mma a ga-eji were mee ka udo dị na Naijiria.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'akụkụ ọzọ, dịka o siri na nzukọ nke ndị isi ọlụ nchekwa ala anyị dị n'aka mere pụta, onye na-alụ ọlụ dịka onyeisi ndị uweojii ala anyị, Maazị Muhammed Adamu kwuru na o nwere ihe dị omimi dị na-arụ ahụ ndị omekome na-akpa na igwupụta ihe ahụ na Steeti Zamfara. Nke a mere gọọmenti jiri buru ụzọ kwụsị ọrụ igwupụta ihe niile na-aga n'ihu na steeti ahụ ruo mgbe ihe niile dajuru ma dọzie ndị ọbịa niile aka ná ntị n'onye ọ bụla nke na-erubeghị isi ga-abụ onye a ga-anara akwụkwọ ikike ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwuru na-agha a bụ nke ndị ọlụ nchekwa ala anyị gụnyere ndị uweojii, ndị ọlụ agha na ngalaba steeti savici ga-alukọ ọnụ. Nke bụ nke ha ga-eji were merie ma napụta ndị omekome ahụ ebe ndị ahụ niile ha were ma nọrọ na-akpa mkpa mkpa.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ebe mmiri si were baa n'opi ụgbọgụrụ bụ nke a na-amataghị mana ọkụ ahụ gbara bụ nke gbara ebe a na-arụgharị arụgharị n'ọdụ ụgbọelu ahụ. Ọkụ ahụ bụ nke bidoro oge ọ na-akụ elekere abụọ nke ehihie.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ bụ site na-enyemaka na ịgba mbọ nke ndị ọrụ na-emenyụ ọkụ na ndị na-arụ ọrụ n'ọdụ ụgbọelu ahụ mere e ji kwụsị ọkụ ọgbụgba bụ nke jiri nkeji iri ise were mebie ihe. Ọkụ ahụ lara ọtụtụ ihe n'iyi mana m kwụsị a kwụsịrị ya n'oge mere ka ọ hapụ ị ka njọ mana ekele dịrị Chukwu na o nweghị onye nwụrụ na ya bụ ihe mberede.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị na-ahụ maka njem na ọdụ ụgbọelu ala anyị bụ, FAAN, kwuru na ha amalitego nnyocha n'ihe kpatara ya bụ ọkụ ọgbụgba.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na nkọwa, ya bụ atụmatụ iwu bụ nke ebumnobi ya bụ iji wee bèlata oke mmefù ego nke ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ na-emefù na nchịkọba mmemme akwamozu na ya bụ steeti. Dịka ya bụ atụmatụ iwu ahụ gàrà n'ihu kọwaa, o nweghịzị onye ọbụla ga-adọba ozu n'ụlọ nchekwa ozu na steeti ahụ ma hapụgide ya karịa ọnwa abụọ, ebe mmemme akwamozu ga na-abụzị naanị otù ụbọchị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọzọkwa, ya bụ atụmatụ iwu mègidere mà màchíé ịgba mkpọala, imebisi ihe na ịbụ abụ òtùtó n'akwamozu, tinyéré igbóchìsì ma ọ bụ dochisie ihe n'okporo ụzọ ma e mebe mmemme akwamozu, ma kwuo na onye ọbụla nupùrù isi na nke ahụ, bido n'ụbọchị ọ màlitere dịba ìrè, ga-enweta ntaramahụhụ ga-ejezu ya àhụ. Iwu ahụ kwuru na ọ bụ ndị na-akwa ozu ga-ekpebì ma hàziere ndị bịaara ha mgbárú ihe oriri na ọñụñụ dịka o sìrì masị ha, ma ọ bụ dịka ike ha rà; ma kwukwazie na ọ nweghị onye ọbụla a ga-eme ka ọ nọrọ n'ọnọdụ iru uju karịa otu izu ụka, na-agbànyeghị ihe onye ahụ bụụrụ onye nwụrụ anwụ, ma ọ bụ otu ya na ya siri dị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya bànyere iwu ahụ, maazị Ezeana, bụ onye tụpụtara ya bụ atụmatụ iwu kọwara ya dịka nke dị óké mkpà, n'ilekwàsị anya n'ụdị ego ndị mmadụ na-emefùzị ugbu a na steeti ahụ n'oge mmemme akwamozu, ma sịkwa na atụmatụ iwu ahụ guzòbekwara òtù ga-eleru anya nke ọma ịhụ na e tinyere ihe ndị ahụ niile n'ọrụ ma mezùpùtachaakwa ha niile.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu nkè ya, ọka okwu ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu ahụ, bụ oriakụ Rita Madụagwụ kèlèrè ndị omebe iwu ahụ maka ịkwàdò ya bụ atụmatụ iwu dịka nke magburu onwe ya, ma kwukwazie na a ga-agbasi mbọ ike ịhụ na e mezùpùtara ya n'ozuzo òkè.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nke a so n'otu n'ime ọtụtụ mbọ ya bụ steeti na-agba iji hụ na ihe ndị a kọpụtara na ya bụ steeti nwere nkwàdo zuru òkè wee sikwazie n'ọzọ dị otu ahụ bèlata ma nwụchikọọ ndị na-ebupùta ihe adịgboloja n'aha ihe a kọpụtara n'ubì na ya bụ steeti.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Amụmà a bụ nke a màlitere oge e mechara ọgbakọ were ótù ụbọchị, bụ nke a nọrọ na ya wee kụziere ọhanaeze ihe ndị ha kwèsiri ịma bànyere nchekwa, ezi ọnọdụ ahụike na gburugburu bụ ịgbà. E sitere na ya bụ ámụmà wee gaa n'ụfọdụ ebe dị iche iche a na-esucha ihe a kọpụtara n'ugbo dị n'Ọmọr, n'okpuru ọchịchị Ayamelụm nakwa Ụmụeze-Anam, dị n'okpuru ọchịchị 'Anambra West'; bụ ebe a nọrọ wee nyòchaa ma leruo ụlọ ọrụ ndị ahụ anya n'okpurù atụmatụ nnyòcha 'Mandatory Conformity Assessment Programme' (MANCAP), bụ otu n'ime atụmatụ nnyòchá nke ụlọ ọrụ SON na-eme.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mgbe ha rutere ebe a na-esúcha osikapa, bụ 'Udoka Rrice Mill Ọmọr' nakwa ebe a na-akwọ akpụ dị n'Ụmụeze-Anam; ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, bụ maazị Paul Egwuatu na oriakụ Theresa Anaja-Obi n'ótù n'ótù kpọghàrịrị ndị òtù ahụ n'ogigè ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, gọsigasịa ha otu na ùsòrò dị iche iche ha sì esucha osikapa na otu e si akwọ akpụ, malite n'isi mbido wee ruo n'ogè a gbàkọrọ ha n'àkpà. Ha bunyere ọchịchị steeti ahụ, nke gọvanọ Willie Obianọ nọ n'isi ya ụkpa ekele, maka iwètara ha ụdị òhèrè ọma ahụ, bụ nke ha kọwara dịka nke kọrọ ụkọ, ma kwekwazie nkwà irube isi na ntụziaka na ndụmọdụ niile nke ụlọ ọrụ SON nyere, bụkwa nke ha kwuru na ha emezùpùtachaala ụfọdụ n'ime ihe a tụrụ anya n'aka ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya banyere njem ahụ ha bàgìdere, onyeisi 'State Agro Processing and Quality Enhancement' n'okpuru amụmà IFAD VCDP, bụ maazị Bonaventure Mụọchebe mere ka a mara na ebumnobi nnyòcha ahụ bụ iji kụziere ndị na-esucha na ndị na-akwọ nri a kọpụtara n'ubì na steeti ahụ ihe ha kwesiri ịma banyere ya bụ ọrụ, iji mee ka ha bụrụ ndị tozùrù òkè, nweta asambodo ndị SON ma nwetekwa nkwàdo ndị ụlọ ọrụ NAFDAC, bụ nke ga-eme ka a na-anabata ihe ha rụpụtara na mpaghara ebe ọbụla n'ụwa gbaa gburugburu
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na ntụnye nke ya oge ha mèchara nnyocha na nleru anya ahụ, otu onye ọrụ selitere isi n'ụlọ ọrụ SON, bụ oriakụ Anne Osakwe kwurù na obi dị ha ụtọ banyere ihe ha hụrụ, ọ kachasị ụdị adịmọcha ha hụrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ ndị ahụ. O kwuru na ụlọ ọrụ, ọ kachasị ebe a na-esucha nri kwèsiri ịdị na-adị ọcha oge ọbụla, mee ka a mara na ndị ụlọ ọrụ ahụ etinyebeghị akụrụngwa 'Personnel Protective Equipment' (PPE) n'ọrụ n'uju na ha bụ ụlọ ọrụ, ma kwukwazie na ngwa ngwa ha màlitere imezùputa ntụziaka e nyere ha, na ha ga-enweta asambodo na nkwàdo MANCAP ozigbo ozigbo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye ji ọkwa ọkwa 'Assistant Director' n'ụlọ ọrụ 'Federal Competition and Consumer Protection Commission' na mpaghara ndịda-ọwụwa anyanwụ ala anyị, bụ maazị Anthony Nwafọr kwùrù na ịgbaso ụkpụrụ na imezupute ntuziaka ahụ nke ụlọ ọrụ SON nyere ga-enye aka ime ka ụmụ mmadụ nwee ma na-eri nri zuru òkè nakwa nri nwere ihe a chọrọ, ma dụkwazie ụlọ ọrụ ndị ahụ ka ha gaa n'ihu imezùputa ya bụ nktụziaka n'ozuzu oke.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nke a bụ nke e mere ka a mara site n'ozi a kụpụrụ nso-nso a, bụ nke Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka njem okporo ụzọ na steeti ahụ, bụ maazị Uchenna Okafor binyere aka na ya. Dịka ya bụ ozi sìrì kọwaa, gọọmenti steeti ahụ chọpụtara na ụfọdụ ndị mmadụ ka na-aga n'ihu na-enupù isi na ntụziaka gọọmenti nyere, bànyere mmachi ahụ a màchiri ịkwọ ọgbaa tum-tum n'Ọnịtsha na n'Awka. Gọọmenti jikwazị ohere ahụ wee chètara ọhanaeze na ya bụ mmàchi ka dịkwa ìrè, kwuo na onye ọbụla dara ya bụ iwu nà-enupùrú gọọmenti isi, ma bụrụkwa onye a ga-eji usoro iwu wee kpụọ isi ma e jìde ya. Ọ kpọkùrù ndị ọrụ dị iche iche nke ahụ dị n'aka ka ha dị ichu n'ọrụ ma gbadosie anya ike ịhụ na ha nwụchikọrọ onye ọbụla ga-aga n'ihu ịkwọ ọgbaa tum-tum n'ebe ndị ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Site na ya bụ ozi, gọọmenti gakwara n'ihu kpọkuo ma dụọ ọhanaeze ka ha na-abà n'ọdụ ụgbọala were akwụba ụgbọala ha, ma a ọ bụ were eburu/ebutù mmadụ, karịa ime nke ahụ n'akụkụ okporo ụzọ, bụ ebe na-ekwesighị ekwesi nakwa nkè iwu na-akwàdoghị. O mere ka a mara na ịkwụba ụgbọala n'akụkụ okporo ụzọ, tinyere iburu ma ọ bụ ibútù mmadụ n'ebe ekwesighị ekwesi na-eme ka ụzọ kpọchie, na-eweta ihe mberede okpro ụzọ ma sòrokwa n'ihe na-eweta agbakata akwụsị n'okporo ụzọ, ọbụnadị dịka ọ kpọkùrù ndị na-eme nke ahụ ka ha sepù aka na ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O mekwazịrị ka a mara na e nyela ndị ọ bụ ọrụ ha ime ka éfè dị n'okporo ụzọ ikike na ntụziaka itinye amụmà ahụ n'ọrụ n'ozuzu òkè, iji wee bèlata agbakata akwụsị, óké mkpọchitoba ụzọ, oke ihe mberede okporo ụzọ, na ọtụtụ ajọ ọnọdụ ndị ọzọ nke ahụ na-ewèta.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Oge ha na-akanye n'akwụkwọ iwu bụ iwu ahụ nke ga-akwụsị oké ego ahụ a na-emefu n'akwamuozu na steeti ahụ, ndị Ụlọ Omeiwu ahụ sịrị na ọ bụrụla arụ ime mmemme akwamozu karịa nanị otu ụbọchị na steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Tupu iwu a, ọtụtụ obodo na-eme mmemme akwamozu ihe dịka mkpụrụ ụbọchị atọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Iwu nke a etiri ugbua bụzi nke onye ahụ na-anọchite anya Anaọcha nke abụọ na Ụlọ Omeiwu steeti ahụ, Charles Ezeani, kwupụtara na Iwu Akwamozu ahụ bụ nke ga-eme ka ewere kwụsị oké ego ahụ a na-akwafusị n'ebe mmemme akwamozu dị na steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Iwu ahụ bụ nke kwuziri na n'ebe mmadụ ọ bụla nwụrụ, Ọ nweghị onye ga-edebe ozu ọ bụla na-ebe a na-echekwa ozu karịa ọnwa abụọ site n'ụbọchị onye ahụ nwụrụ, ebe mmemme akwamozu na steeti ahụ ga-abụzi nanị otu ụbọchị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Iwu ahụ gakwara n'ihu kwụsị imebisi ihe, ịgba mkpọnala, ịgụ abụ otuto, ịnọchi ma ọ bụ ịmechi okporo ụzọ oge mmemme akwamozu ọ bụla na-aga n'ihu na steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Iwu ahụ kwukwara na, Ọ nweghị onye ga-amanye onye ọ bụla na-akwa ozu iri uju karịa otu izu ụka site n'ụbọchị akwamozu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ gakwara n'ihu kwuo na mgbe akwamozu na-aga n'ihu, ezinaụlọ ahụ na-akwa ozu ga-enye ụmụnna, ndị enyi, ndị ikwu na ibe na ndị ọzọ bịara isonyere onye ahu n'iri uju nrí otu ha siri chọọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Oge ọ na-agwa ndị nta akụkọ okwu, Ezeani kwuru na Kọmitii ga-ahụ na iwu a guzoro ga-ebido ọlụ ozigbo gọvanọ na-achị steeti ahụ nyere nkwado ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nke a dị n'ozi a kụpụrụ nso-nso a, bụ kọmishọna steeti ahụ na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi na ịkọwara ọhanaeze ihe ha kwèsìrì ịma, bụ maazị C-Don Adinụba binyere aka na ya. Ya bụ ozi kọwara na maazị Nwokolo bụ onye e gbùrù site n'aka ndị ekperima, bụ ndị na-ebugharị onwe ha dịka ndị ọrụ gọọmenti na-anakọsị ego, oge ha chọrọ ịkapụ otu onye ọgbaa tùm-tùm aka ya dị ọcha ego, bụ nke ya onwe ya (bụ maazị Nwokolo) kwèchììrì mà foro ntùtù taa, sị na ha agaghị eme nke ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka ya bụ ozi siri kọwaa, aka na-achị steeti ahụ, bụ gọvanọ Willie Obianọ edegarala onyeisi ndị uwe ojii steeti ahụ, bụ maazị Mustapha Dandaura akwụkwọ ozi èkèlé bànyere ótú ya na ndị òtù ọrụ ya sìrì wee nwụchikọọ ma kpụpụ ya bụ nwa amadi ụlọ ikpe, bụ onye ha nwụchikọrọ n'otu ebe zoro ezo n'Ọnịtsha, bụ ebe ọ nọ wee na-eche ka ndị òtù ya wètara ya ego ha nàkọtara ndị mmadụ site n'ụzọ iwu na-akwàdòghị. O kwuru na nke ahụ gosiri na ndị uwe ojii steeti ahụ na-arụsi ọrụ ike ma na-emeputekwa ihe a hụrụ anya na ngalaba nchekwa steeti ahụ, n'ilekwasa anya n'ọtụtụ mbọ ha gbàgoro nso-nso a.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O gosiputazịkwara ezi ntụkwàsị obi o nwere na nke ahụ ga-aga n'ihu ịkwalite ezi ọnọdụ nchekwa na mmepe na steeti ahụ, dịka ọ ga-enye aka ibèlatà ohi, mpụ na arụrụala ndị ọzọ na-agbachigha aka elekere azụ n'ụzọ dị iche iche na ya bụ steeti.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ya bụ ozi mezịrị ka a mara afọ ojuju gọvanọ Obianọ banyere otu ndị ọrụ nchekwa si arụ ọrụ ha na ya bụ steeti, bụ nke o kwùrù na ọ dabàrà adaba n'ịgbaso ezi ebumnobi ya iwètara ụmụafọ steeti ahụ ezi nchekwa ndụ na akụnụba, bụ nke a pụghị ịgbakụta azụ oge ọbụla a na-ekwu okwu mmepe n'ụdị ọbụla. O mekwazịrị ka a mara na ọchịchị ya ga-aga n'ihu n'inye ndị ọrụ nchekwa steeti ahụ nkwàdo zuru òkè.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ikanda, gbárá ahọ iri abụọ na asaa, bụ onye Azịa dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Ihiala na steeti Anambra. Ọ bụ onye a na-enyo enyo na ọ bụ ya na ndị òtù ya gbùrù otu nwoke a maara dịka Ndubuisi Nwokolo n'abalị iri abụọ na iteghete nke ọnwa Juunu ahọ 2018, nke mezịrị ka gọọmenti steeti Anambra kwe nkwà na a ga-enye onye ọbụla jidere ma ọ bụ gbaa ama otu a ga-esi jide ya otu nde Naịra.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya n'ụbọchị Tọzdee na nzukọ njikọ ọnụ ha na ndị ụlọakụ ụwa na Washington DC, ka onyeisioche ahụ mere ka amata na n'ihi ego gọọmenti na-enweta gbakwụnyere oge ole oruru n'isi otu onye, ọ bụ ihe dị mkpa ka gọọmenti wepụ ego mgbakwụnye mmanụ ụgbọala.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Site n'ime nkea, o kwuru na gọọmenti ga-enwe ike tinye ego ahụ na ịkwalite ọnọdụ ahụike, akwụkwọ na ọrụ mmepe obodo n'obodo ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụlọ ọrụ IMF nọrọ n'akwụkwọ o zitere Naijiria n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na iteghete rụtụ aka ná iwepụ ego mgbakwụnye na itinye ego ahụ n'ebe ndị ọzọ o kwesịrị ga-eme ka obodo dị mma, nyere ụmụ afọ aka ma chụọ ụbịam ọsọ ụkwụ eru ala; wepụtakwazie ọtụtụ ohere ga-akwalite ọnọdụ akụnụba ala Naịjiria.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Oge e chetara ya na ego mgbakwụnye mmanụ ụgbọala bụ nnukwu ihe n'ebe ụmụ Naijiria nọ, ebe ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ ndị ha na ụbịam gbara agbata obi, Lagarde gbadosiri ụkwụ ike n'okwu ya na ihe dị mkpa Naijiria aghaghị ime bụ iwepụcha ego mgbakwụnye mmanụ ụgbọala ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwuru, A ga m egosi gị ka o si arụ ọrụ. N'ihi ọtụtụ ihe na otu ihe a ga-e si rụọ ọrụ, anyị kwenyere na iwepụ ego mgbakwụnye mmanụ ụgbọala bụ ụzọ kwesịrị ka a gaa. Ị lee anya n'ọnụ ọgụgụ Naijiria site na afọ puku abụọ na iri na ise, ihe karịrị dollar puku ijeri ise ka e tinyegoro n'ego mgbakwụnye mmanụ ụgbọala na mpụtara ya. Ndị na-eleba anya na ịkwalite ọnọdụ akụnụba achọpụtala na ego a ga-echekwa akụnụba na mmadụ ma ọ bụrụ na-akwụọ ụgwọ maka anwụrụ na-esite na mmanụ ndị a apụta n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na ise dị oké ọnụ. Ọnụ ọgụgụ ahụ bara ụba nke ukwuu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onyeisi ahụ kwuru na, ọ bụrụ na nkea emee, a ga-enwe ọtụtụ ego a bụ nke a ga-etinye n'ọrụ ịkwalite ụlo ọgwụ, ịrụ ụzọ, ịrụ ụlọakwụkwọ na ị kwado akwụkwọ na ahụike ndị mmadụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Site na Janụwarị ruo Nọvemba afọ puku abụọ na iri na asatọ, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka mmanụ na Naijiria, NNPC, tinyere ijeri narị naira isii na iri abụọ na atọ na ụma n'ebe ego mgbakwụnye ebe ha na-achọ ịnwetacha ihe niile.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'agbanyeghị na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ kwuru na ego ahụ abụghị maka ego mgbakwụnye mmanụ ụgbọala dịka o nweghị ike maka nke ahụ, a chọpụtara site n'akwụkwọ ha gosiri gọọmenti na ọnwa Dicimba afọ puku abụọ na iri na asatọ, n'ego ha riri n'ọnwa iri na otu n'ebe ịnwetacha ihe niile dị dị ijeri narị naira isii na iri abụọ na atọ na ụma.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mmemme iji mata ndị ga-agba ibe ha n'Iko Afrịka, agba nke iri atọ na abụọ ya, bụ nke were ọnọdụ ụbọchị Fụraịdee, n'isi ala Ijipt bụ Cairo
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Asọmpi Afrịka a bụ ga-ewere ọnọdụ na amaegwuregwu isii: Amaegwuregwu dị na Kayịro, Amaegwuregwu Borg El-Arab dị na Alexandria, Amaegwuregwu Suez, Amaegwuregwu Nchekwa Ikuku, Amaegwuregwu Ismaila na Amaegwuregwu Al Salam dị na Ijipt site n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na otu nke ọnwa Jun were rue abalị iri na iteghete n'ike ọnwa Julaị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ijipt ga-agbapụ bọọlụ nke mbụ na asọmpi ahụ oge ha na ndị mba Zimbabwe ga-ama mbe na-abọ nke bụ oké n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na otu, n'ọnwa Jun. Asọmpi Iko Mba Afrịka a ga-abịazi n'isi njedebe na abalị iri na iteghete nke ọnwa Julaị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Òtù F, n'iko ahụ mba iri abụọ na anọ na-azọ, jikọrọ mba abụọ bụ ndị nke abụọ na ndị nke atọ na ndị kachasị were mee ofuma kamgbe iko ahụ bidoro. Cameroon, bụ ndị burula ya bụ iko ugboro ise ma bụrụkwa ndị kara ibu ya bụ Asọmpi Iko Afrịka, na ndị ogbo ha na Ghana, bụ ndị burula ya bụ iko ugboro anọ ga-achịpụ ya. Benin na Guinea-Bissau bụ ndị mezuru otu ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mba atọ burula iko ahụ ugboro atọ nke gụnyere Morocco kpụ ọkụ n'ọnụ, Ivory Coast na South Afrịka ga-ama onye bụ isi, tinyere Namibia.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Senegal, Algeria na Kenya na Tanzania si ọwụwa anyanwụ Afrịka bụ ndị nọ n'otu C.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: APC, bụ ndị nke atọ mkpesa metụtara, kwuru na mkpesa ahụ erijughị afọ, na Atiku bụ onye Cameroon, na ọ bụghị onye Naijiria site n'ọmụmụ, na o kwesịghị ịso were zọọ ya bụ ndọrọndọrọ na mbụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ sịrị na mpụtara ahụ nke ndị PDP sị na ha nwetara n'igwe ụlọ ọrụ INEC na ntụliaka ahụ emere n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na atọ, nke ọnwa Febrụwarị, afọ puku abụọ na iri na iteghete nke gosiri na ha meriri bụ asị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Site n'ụsa ha, ha rịọrịọ ọgbakọ mkpesa ahụ ka ha nwee ntị ike n'ebe arịrịọ ahụ nke ndị mkpesa ahụ na-arịọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ha gwara ọgbakọ mkpesa ahụ ka ha kachapụ mkpesa ahụ bụ nke na-enweghị eziokwu dị na ya, ma bụrụzie nke na-emebi ụlọ ikpe ala anyị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: INEC nọrọ n'abalị iri abụọ na asaa nke ọnwa Febrụwarị, afọ puku abụọ na iteghete, kpọọ APC, na onye zọrọ ọkwa onyeisiala na ya bụ ndọrọndọrọ dịka onye jiri vootu dị nde iri na ise, puku otu narị na iri iteghete na otu, na narị asatọ na iri anọ na asaa (15,191,847) were merie Atiku, bụ onye hụrụ azụ ya anya site na vootu dị nde iri na otu, puku narị abụọ na iri isii na abụọ, na narị iteghete na iri asaa na asatọ (11,262,978).
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mana ndị mkpesa ahụ bụ site n'akwụkwọ mkpesa ha dị otú narị na iri atọ na iteghete mere mkpesa ha n'ụzọ ihe ise, site na ihe ha chọpụtara na ìgwè ndị INEC, na ihe bụ mpụtara ntụliaka ahụ sitere na steeti were bịa gosiri na Atiku nwetara vootu dị nde iri na asatọ, puku narị atọ na iri ise na isii, na narị asaa na iri atọ na abụọ (18,356,732) were merie Buhari bụ onye nwetara vootu dị nde iri na isii, puku narị asaa na iri anọ na otu, na narị anọ na iri atọ (16,741,430).
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ha kwuru na mpụtara ahụ bụ vootu niile nke ndị zọrọ ọkwa onyeisiala na steeti iri atọ na ise tinyere isi ala obodo Naijiria bụ Abụja, ebe enweghị mpụtara na ìgwè ndị INEC sitere na steeti Rivas rue ụbọchị iri abụọ na ise nke ọnwa Febrụwarị, afọ puku abụọ na iri na iteghete.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Site na mgbakọ na mwepụ, Atiku na PDP kwuru na meriri Buhari site na vootu dị (otu nde, puku narị isii na iri na ise, na narị atọ na abụọ (1,615, 302).
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ụsa ha nke Maazị Lateef Fagbemi (SAN) bụ onyeisi, APC kwuru na ihe mpụtara ntụliaka ahụ sitere na steeti niile bụ okwu ụgha. Ha kwuru na nanị mpụtara bụ eziokwu bụ nke ụlọ ọrụ INEC wepụtara.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ha kwuru na o nweghị onye ma ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ nọ na Naijiria, ma ewepụ INEC bụ ndị nwere ike iji were hazie ma chịkọba ntụliaka were kpọpụtakwa mpụtara ya. Ha gakwara n'ihu were kwuo na nanị mpụtara ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị nke INEC bụ eziokwu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka ha na-ekwu na Atiku abụghị onye Naijiria site n'ọmụmụ mere o jighị tozuo ókè ịzọ ọkwa onyeisiala Naijiria. Ha kwuru na site na nchọpụta ha, a mụrụ Atiku na abalị iri abụọ na isii afọ otu puku, narị iteghete na iri anọ na isii, na Jada Adamawa, dị na mgbago ugwu Cameroon, mere o jiri bụrụ onye Cameroon. Ha tinyere na nna ya bụ Garba Atiku Abdukadir nwụrụ na ọnwa Dicemba afọ otu puku, narị iteghete na iri ise na asaa.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Òtù ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị gara n'ihu were kwuo na onye zọrọ ọkwa onyeisiala na òtù ahụ bụ onye ndị mmadụ họpụtara site n'ụzọ iwu kwadoro site na vootu kachasị na ntụliaka.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mmeri a mere ka Naijiria bụrụzie ndị na-achị eze na ótù A. Ugo Ọlaedo, dịka a na-akpọ ndị egwu bọọlụ Naijiria na-erubeghị afọ iri na asaa lụrụ ọgụ ka nwoke na-agbanyeghị ndahie ha na asọmpi ahụ mere ha ji nweta mmeri.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Agbanyeghı na ọ bụ ha na-ahazi egwu na asọmpi ahụ ọtụtụ oge, Ugo Ọlaedo Naijiria tufuru ọtụtụ ohere ha nwere nke sitere n'aka Olakunle Olusegun na timkọm timkọm iri abụọ, nakwa site n'aka Wisdom Ụbanị na Ayobami Amoo bụ ndị gbafukarịsịrị bọọlụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Olatomi Olaniyan mepere ọnụ goolu oge o nyere goolu mbụ na asọmpi ahụ na nkeji iri abụọ na otu ebe oche goolu ndị Tanzania, Mwinyi, echeghị nke ọma.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Edmund John sara ya bụ goolu ngwangwa, dịka o were ohere na Suleman Shaibu anọghị ebe o kwesịrị ịnọ were nye goolu ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka nkeji asatọ gasịrị, Ụbanị bụ onye ririla goolu na mbụ mere ka ndị Naịjirịa nọrọ n'ihu dịka ọ gbanyere bọọlụ ebe aka Mwinyi agaghị eru. Amoo mere ya ọkpụ atọ ka nkeji asaa gara site na bọọlụ ahụ agbara ya site na a dọba agbaa.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka oge ezumike gachara, Ugo Ọlaedo Naijiria echekwaghị onwe ha nke ọma mere ha ji bụrụ ndị na-achụ n'azụ dịka enyere ha goolu atọ na nkeji asaa ebe ndị nkwado Tanzania nọ na-ekwere ha egwu mmeri. Shọtụ kpụ ọkụ n'ọnụ nke Kelvin John gbara na penarịtị abụọ nke Morice Abraham na Edmund John gbara mere ndị Naịjirịa taa kpuchie ọnụ dịka ha na-achụzi n'azụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụbanị sara site shọtụ m mara mma ọ gbara site na-adoba agbaa na nkeji iri asaa na abụọ. Na nkeji isii dị n'ihu, Ibraheem Jabaar nyeghachiri Naijiria mmeri ha jiri bụrụ Ugo Ọlaedo n'ezie. Nke a meziri Naijiria jiri were ọkpụ ise asara anọ were na-eme ngala ka asọmpi ahụ gwụrụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụbọchị Wednezdee, Ugo Ọlaedo Naijiria ga-akwatụ ya n'otu amaegwuregwu ahụ ebe ndị Tanzania na Uganda ga-achịpụ nke ha. Mmeri ga-ahụ na Naijiria nwere ohere isonye na Iko FIFA maka ndị ahụ na-erubeghị afọ iri na asaa nke afọ puku abụọ na iri na iteghete a ga-agba na Brazil bụ nke Naijiria burula ugboro ise.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onyeisioche na steeti ahụ bụ Onyeozi Chukwu Benjamin Akanmu, kpọrọ òkù a oge ya na ndị nta akụkọ na-akparịta ụka na Ibadan. Akanmu kpọkuru ndị òtù Kraịst ka ha ñomie ndụ umeala, ịhụnanya na ijere ndị ọzọ ozi nke pụtara ìhè na ndụ Jizọs Kraịst mere o jiri were nwụọ n'obe maka nzọpụta mmadụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ gara n'ihu kpọọ nzukọ Kraịst ka ha na-ebi ndụ ga-amịpụta ezi ihe n'obodo ma dọrọ ndị mmadụ were bịakwute Kraịst dịka ha na-eme ihe ahụ Chineke nabatara. Ọ kwuru, Oge Jizọs batara obodo Jeruselem, bụ ihe anyị na-echeta tata dịka Ụka Igunkwụ, mbata ya mere ka ka amụma nke onye amụma Zekaria buru: Ọ bụ onye mmeri, na-anya ịnyịnya ibu bịa na mmezu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Anyị ga-ekpe ekpere maka ike nke dị omimi, ịkụziri anyị ịhụnanya na-adịghị akpa ókè, dịka ọ dị na ndụ Jizọs; ka anyị nye uche Chineke ohere ka o mee na ndụ anyị, anyị ga-ahụ n'anya ma gbasie ike mgbe ụzọ niile sịrị ike, wee ghara ịbụ ndị nzukọ Kraịst nanị n'egbugbere ọnụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye ụkọchukwu Ụlọụka Angịlịkan Ndị Nsọ, Koroduma, Nasarawa, bụ Ụkọchukwu Alexander Okoye, kwuru na Ụka Igunkwụ bụ emume eji echeta Ọgịga Jizọs Kraịst gara Jeruselem dịka eze. O tinyere na ọ bụkwa oge iji cheta na Jizọs Kraịst batara Jeruselem dịka onye nzọpụta, eze ndị eze na Onyenwe ndị nwe niile.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka ọ nọ n'ịnyịnya ibu ahụ were bata Jeruselem, ìgwé mmadụ soro ya, tụọ igunkwụ, àkwá ha n'ụzọ were n'eti mkpu Hosanna Hosanna dịrị nwa David, ngọzi dịrị onye ahụ nke na-abịa n'aha onye nwe anyị, Hosanna n'ebe kachasị elu . Ọ rịọziri ndị otú Kraịst ka ha mara Jizọs dịka onye nzọpụta, eze ndị eze, onye na-egbo mkpa na Onyenwe ndị nwe niile, ebe ọ na-akpọkukwa ha ka ha ñomie ndụ umeala, ịdị nwayọọ na udo nke Jizọs.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kpere na, Dịka Jizọs batara n'ụlọ nsọ, chụpụ ndị ahụ na-agbanwe ego ma kpuo tebụl ha ihu n'ala, otu a ka Ọ ga-esi bata na ndụ anyị n'oge a, chụpụ njọ, ahụ ọnwụnwụ na ogbenye n'aha Jizọs. Amen.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọzọ, otu onye ụka, Maazi Cornelius Nnamdi, gosipụtara ekele ya nye Chineke maka ụbọchị Ụka Igunkwụ ọzọ, kwuo na ọgịga Jizọs gara Jeruselem dịka eze butere ọnwụ na mbilite n'ọnwụ ya nke wetara nzukọ Kraịst olileanya nke ndụ ebighị ebi. Nnamdi kpere Chineke ka ọ nye nzukọ Kraịst amara iji ñomie ndụ umeala, udo, ichu àjà na irubeisi nke Jizọs. O kwuru, Jizọs emeghị ihe ọ bụla ma ọ bụrụ n'onwe ya ma ọ bụghị ihe ahụ nke Chineke na-achọ; nke a bụ ihe ị ma aka were ndị otu Kraịst ta.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Minista Ọnọdụ Akụnụba Obodo Naijiria, Zainab Ahmed, mere ka amata nkea oge o kwuru okwu na nzukọ ndị International Monetary Fund na Ụlọakụ Ụwa nke na-aga n'ihu na Washington DC. Onye minista na-ahụ maka ịtụaro na ịhazi ihe, Sinatọ Udo Udoma na gọvanọ Ụlọakụ Naijiria, Maazi Godwin Emefiele bụ ndị sonyere na nzukọ ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ị ga-echeta na onyeisi IMF, Christine Lagarde, nọrọ n'izu ụka gara aga were kpọọ òkù ka gọọmenti etiti wepụ ego mgbakwụnye mmanụ ụgbọala ahụ, maka na ọ bụ ihe ziri ime. Lagarde kwuru na ọ bụ ihe dị mkpa ka Naijiria wepụ ego mgbakwụnye ụgbọala ahụ ma tinye ego ahụ n'ebe ịkwalite ọnọdụ ahụike, akwụkwọ na ọrụ mmepe ime obodo dị, tinyere ihe ndị ọzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Site n'akwụkwọ o zitere Naijiria n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na iteghete ebe rụtụrụ aka ná iwepụ ego mgbakwụnye na itinye ego ahụ n'ebe ndị ọzọ o kwesịrị ga-eme ka obodo dị mma, nyere ụmụ afọ aka ma chụọ ụbịam ọsọ ụkwụ eru ala; wepụtakwazie ọtụtụ ohere ga-akwalite ọnọdụ akụnụba ala Naịjiria. Ka ọtụtụ ụbọchị Lagarde kpọchara oku a maka iwepụ ego mgbakwụnye mmanụ ụgbọala gasịrị, ndị mmadụ jupụtara ebe ndị ahụ a na-ere mmanụ ụgbọala kachasị n'ụbọchị Satọdee iji dị njikere maka ihe ha chere bụ ọdịnihu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ihi nkea ka minista akụnụba ala anyị dị n'aka jiri were kọwa na Gọọmenti Etiti enweghị mgbe oji akpa nkata iwepụ ya bụ ego mgbakwụnye mmanụ ụgbọala.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya, E nweghị nkata akpara maka iwepụ ego mgbakwụnye mmanụ ụgbọala ugbua. Anyị bịara k'anyị kparịta ụka maka ọnọdụ mba ụwa. Otu n'ime ya bụ ụsa nke ndị IMF na-enye, bụ k'anyị si were na-ahazi ego mgbakwụnye ụgbọala. Ya mere, dịka ha tụlere ya, IMF na-ekwu na ọ ka mma iwepụ ego mgbakwụnye ahụ ka e were tinye ya na ngalaba ndị ọzọ dị mkpa. Nke bụ na ị lee anya, ọ bụ eziokwu ime otua.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mana na Naijiria, anyị enweghị nkata ọ bụla iwepụ ego mgbakwụnye ụgbọala oge a maka anyị edozichabeghị ihe ndị ahụ ga-enyere anyị aka ị nagide mpụtara iwepụ ego mgbakwụnye ahụ ma tinyekwa ihe n'usoro nke ụmụ afọ ga-eso. N'ihi nkea, enweghị nkata ọ bụla dị iji were wepụ ego mgbakwụnye mmanụ ụgbọala. Anyị na ọtụtụ ndị ga-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ iji were chọpụta ihe ndị e kwesịrị ime ma ọ bụrụ na anyị ewepụ ego mgbakwụnye mmanụ ụgbọala. Kedụ ihe ọzọ anyị ga-eme? Anyị ahụbeghị ụzọ ọzọ ka mma anyị ga-eso. Ya mere, o rubeghị oge anyị ga-ewepụ ego mgbakwụnye mmanụ ụgbọala.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya dịka ọ na-azaghachị ndị IMF ozi ahụ ha zitere Naijiria, ọ sịrị, Ndụmọdụ ahụ IMF nyere dị mma ka ewepụ ego mgbakwụnye mmanụ ụgbọala mana anyị ga-eme ya n'ụzọ ọ ga-esi gaa nke ọma ma tọkwaa atọọ. Anyị achọghị ebe ọ ga-abụ anyị teta ụra otu ụbọchị, anyị ewepụ ego mgbakwụnye mmanụ ụgbọala.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Anyị ga-akụziri ndị mmadụ; anyị ga-egosi Naijiria ebe ndị a ga-etinye ego mgbakwụnye mmanụ ụgbọala ahụ. Nke a gosiri na anyị nwere ọtụtụ ọrụ anyị ga-arụ. Anyị ga-aghọtakwa na a naghị ewepụ ego gbara ọkpụrụkpụ otu ahụ n'otu oge, ọ bụ nwayọọ nwayọọ ma kọwara ọhaneze ihe ị na-achọ ime maka nwayọọ nwayọọ ka eji aracha ofe dị ọkụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka akụkọ siri kọọ, ya bụ nsogbu bụ nke dapụtara oge ndị òtù jikọtara ndị na-anya keke, bụ 'Keke Drivers Welfare Association' nọ na-akpọ ganịganị bànyere otu e sì akapụsị ndị òtù ha ego ọdụ dị n'Ọnịtsha ahụ; ndị òtù ọzọ wee wákpò ha n'ike ma manye ha ọgụ ozigbo; ha wee màlite ịpịrị ya. Ndị keke ahụ anọrọlarị n'ụbọchị gara aga wèré Keke dochisie okporo ụzọ awara awara ahụ siri Ọnịtsha gaa Owerri na ụfọdụ okporo ụzọ e sì abà na mpaghara nnukwu ahịa Ọnịtsha dịka ha na-eme ngagharị iwe megide ótú ndị a na-enyo ènyò na ha bụ ndị na-anakọ ego n'ụzọ iwu akwadòghị n'ahịa ahụ sìrì wee kụọ ótù onye òtù ha gwoo gwoo maka na o kweghị akwụ ótù puku Naịra ha na-akwụ kwà ụbọchị ọbụla n'ahịa ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya bànyere nke ahụ, osote onyeisi oche òtù ahụ jikọtara ndị na-anya Keke na maaghara ahụ, bụ maazị Ekene Ifediata mere ka a mara na ọ bụ ụbọchị Mọndee ka ndị ahụ a na-enyo ènyò na ha na-anakọsị ego n'ụzọ iwu na-akwàdòghị kụrụ onye òtù ha ihe ọkụkụ ahụ, nke na o kubìchaalarị ume, tupu e buruzie ya gaa n'ụlọ ọgwụ, ebe ọ bụ naanị site n'inye aka Chineka ka e jiri megide ya ihe, o wee laghachita azụ, wee dịkwa ndụ ọzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwuru na ndị ahụ na-akapụ ha òtù puku Naịra kwà ụbọchị na mpaghara nnukwu ahịa Ọnịtsha, ebe ndị òtù ọzọ na-akapụkwa ha otu puku Naịra ọzọ na mpaghara ụzọ nke siri Ọnịtsha gaba Owerri, na-agbanyeghị akwụkwọ ikike niile ha na-azụkọsị. Ọ sịkwa na ọ bụ otu a ka ndị ahụ sì anakọsị ha ego ụbọchị ọbụla, na-agbanyeghị na gọọmenti steeti ahụ amàchiela ihe dị òtù ahụ. Ọ kpọkùzịrị aka na-achị steeti ahụ, bụ gọvanọ Obianọ na kọmishọna steeti ahụ na-ahụ maka azụmahịa, ịtụ mgbere ahịa na ikewàpụta akụnụba, bụ maazị Christian Madụbuko ka ha doo, gbatara ha ọsọ enyemaka n'ihi na ya bụ ihe akarịala, ebe ndị ọna ụtụ ahụ ka na-afụlikwa elu, sị na ha agaghị ala azụ n'ịkapụ ha ego, n'ihi na ha sị na ha nwetere nkwàdo site n'aka gọọmenti.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nwa amadi a, onye a maara dịka Mmili ka a gbàgburu n'ime ụgbọala ya ụbọchị Tuuzdee mgbe ọ gara ịzụrụ onwe ya ihe n'ahịa Oyè Nimo, bụkwazị ebe a nọrọ wee kwàá mgbọ dị egwù site n'aka ndị a maghị ndị ha bụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka ozi a kụpụrụ site n'aka onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta ọhanaeze na ndị uwe ojii na steeti ahụ, bụ maazị Harụna Mọhamed, siri kọwaa, ebelebe ahụ gbùrù ka o jiri nkeji iri na asatọ gafèé elekere asatọ nke anyasị, bụ oge ndị ahụ màlitere gbaba egbè aghara aghara n'ahịa ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwuru na ndị ọrụ uwe ojii nọ na mpaghara Nimo ahụ gbààrà gaba ebe ahụ oge ya bụ ụda egbe màlitere ịda; ma mgbe ha rùrù, ha hụzịrị nwa amadi ahụ ka ọ tọbììrì n'ime ụgbọala Chevrolet SUV ya n'ogbu ọbara na àpà mgbọ egbe juru ya ahụ. Nke ahụ, dịka o siri kwuo, mezịrị ka ha búrú ya ozigbo gaba ụlọ ahụike Beke dị na Nimo, bụ ebe dọkịta nọzịrị wee lee ya ahụ, ma fee n'isi, sị na ụkwa a na-apị, nà mkpụrụ adịghị ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ịga n'ihu, maazị Harụna kwuru na site n'obere nnyocha e mègoro, na a chọpụtara na ndị ahụ dị mmadụ anọ n'ọnụ ọgụgụ, wee nọrọ nso nke ukwuu, jìrí égbè sụọ nwa amadi ahụ kọtọkọtọ, ma buru ụgbọala ha tinye isi n'ụzọ chere ihu n'Eziowelle, nyàá ọnwụ ọnwụ, fee ka nnụụ, larie ozigbo, nke na o nweghịzịkwa onye hụrụ azụ ha anya. Ọ sịkwa na ha tụtụkọtara mgbọ egbe 7.62 MM a gbagoro agba n'ebe ahụ ya bụ ihe nọrọ wee mee.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O forozịrị ntutu taa, sị na ha ga-eme nnyòcha miri èmì banyere nke ahụ, iji nwụchikọọ ndị obikpọnkụ ahụ kpara ya bụ arụ, ọ bụnadị dịka ọ dụrụ ọhanaeze ka ha nyere ha aka site n'inye ha ozi ọbụla dị mkpà ga-eme ka e nwee ike ijide ndị ahụ na ndị ọzọ na-ebute ala adịghị mma na steeti ahụ, site n'ịkpọtụrụ ha n'akara ntụmadị, bụ 07039194332.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu dịkwa ka ibè ya, gọọmenti steeti Anambra adịlarị na mbụ katọọ ogbugbu ahụ e gburu ya bụ nwa amadi, ma kọwaa ya dịka nke jọgburu ònwé ya na nke na-agba anya mmiri.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Kọmishọna steeti ahụ na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi na ịkọwara ọhanaeze ihe ha kwèsiri ịma, bụ maazị C. Don Adịnụba gbarụrụ ihu bànyere nke ahụ, ka ọ nara ozi maka ya bụ akụkọ ọjọọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ozi a kụpụzịrị site n'aka ya bụ kọmishọna n'aha gọọmenti Anambra, ọchịchị steeti ahụ àmápụtala ma kwe nkwà inye mmadụ ọbụla gba ezi àmà ma ọ bụ wèta ozi ga-edubànye ma nye aka n'ijide ndị gburu nwa amadi ahụ ego dị nde Naịra ise.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'oge gara aga, maazị Frank Anthony Igboka bụ onye ome iwu, n'ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu steeti Anambra, bụ ebe ọ nọchitere anya ọgbọ nta nkwàdo Njikọka malite n'ahọ 1999 ruo n'ahọ 2003.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.
