text: Nke a bụ nke e mere ka a mara site n'ozi a kụpụrụ nso nso a, bụkwa nke kọmishọna steeti ahụ na-ahụ maka azụmahịa, ịtụ mgbere ahịa na ikewàpụta akụnụba, bụ Maazị Christian Madụbuko binyere aka na ya. Dịka ya bụ ozi siri kọwaa, ebumnobi nke ahụ bụ iji wee bèlata agbakata akwụrụ, mee ka efè dị n'okporo ụzọ, ma kwàlitekwa ezi adịmọcha gburugburù.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Kọmishọna, site n'ozi ahụ gakwara n'ihu kpọkuo onye ọbụla na steeti ahụ ka o nye aka n'ịkwàlite na ịhụ na e nwere ezi ọnọdụ gburugburu bụ ịgbà, dịka ọ bụ ihe dị oke mkpà ga-ényékwa aka n'ịkwàlite mmepe na ịma mma nke steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye ọbụla nupùrù isi na ntuzi aka ahụ ma kachie ntị na-ebugharị ma ọ bụ na-ere ahịa n'okporo ụzọ, dịka ozi ahụ siri kwuo, ga-abụzịkwa onye a ga-anwụchikọ, kpụpụ ụlọ ikpe ozigbo, ma were usoro iwu tie ya mmanwụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Anyị ga-echeta na ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ atụfuola ndị ha na nke ndị ha hụrụ n'anya site n'ịzụ ahịa mbugharị na ịzụ ahịa n'okporo ụzọ, n'ihi ọtụtụ ihe egwu dị iche iche na-esi na ya apụtakarị oge ọbụla.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mmadụ ndị ahụ bụ ndị a nwụchikọrọ na mpaghara okporo ụzọ awara awara ahụ siri Enugu gaa Ọnịtsha, site n'aka ụlọ ọrụ na ahụ maka gburugburu na steeti ahụ, na njikọ aka ya na ụlọ ọrụ steeti ahụ na-ahụ maka nsogbu agbakata akwụrụ n'okporo ụzọ, bụ ụlọ ọrụ 'Anambra Traffic Management Agency' (ATMA).
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya banyere nke ahụ, kọmishọna steeti ahụ na-ahụ maka gburugburu, bụ maazị Mike Okonkwọ kwuru na nnwụchikọ ahụ a nwụchikọrọ ndị ahụ dabara nnọọ adaba na mbọ gọọmenti steeti ahụ na-agba ịhụ na e gbochiri nsogbo na mkpamkpa nke ólùlù, mbize na idè mmiri na-akpa na steeti ahụ. O mere ka a mara na mmiri ahụ ndị ahụ na-asapụta ma na-agbachikakwa n'okirikiri ebe ahụ niile oge ha na-asa ụgbọala nà-emebisi okporo ụzọ na gburugburu ebe ahụ, n'ihi na ebe ahụ abụghị ebe kwesiri ekwesi ịnọ wee mee ihe dị otu ahụ chaa chaa. Ọ kwara àrịrị na a dọọla ndị ahụ aka ntị ọtụtụ ùgboro ma degakwara ha akwụkwọ ka ha kwagharịa ọnọdụ ha ma kwụsị ime ihe dị òtù ahụ n'ebe ahụ, mana ha añaghịdịrị ntị, ma ya fọdụzie irube isi, wee ruzie ugbu a nwụchikọrọ ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Kọmishọna Okonkwọ kwuru na ihe dị otu ahụ emebiela ọtụtụ ihe, ma wetakwa ọtụtụ ihe mberede okporo ụzọ tagoro isi ọtụtụ ụmụ mmadụ aka ha dị ọcha. Ọ sịrị na ndị ahụ bụ ndị a ga-akpụpụ ụlọ ikpe ozigbo ka e wee kpee ha ikpe ma sikwa n'ụzọ dị otu ahụ mee ka ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe dị otu ahụ mụrụ akọ. O jikwazịrị òhèrè ahụ wee kpọkuo ndị na-arụnyesi ụlọ na ihe ndị ọzọ n'ebe na-ekwesighị ekwesi na n'ụzọ iwu na-akwàdòghị na steeti ahụ ka ha sepu aka na nke ahụ, n'ihi na ụlọ ọrụ ga na-aga n'ihu n'ịkụkpọsị ihe ndị dị otu ahụ, iji hụ na ya bụ steeti ga-aga n'ihu ịbụ eji ama átụ n'akụkụ niile na n'ozuzu òkè..
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na nzaghachi, onyeisi ọdụ ebe ahụ a na-asa ụgbọala, bụ maazị Chukwunweike Ezenwa, kwetara n'ezie na ikpe mara ha, n'ihi na gọọmenti adọọla ha aka na ntị ọtụtụ ugbòrò bànyere nke ahụ; ma rịọzie biko ka a gbaghàra ha, ọ bụnadị dịka o kwuru na ha amalitelarị ịgbàzì ebe mmiri ha na-asapụta ebe ahụ ga-esi na-apụrụ onwe ya, ma gharizie ịdị na-ehubànyezị n'okporo ụzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nke a bụ nke e mere ka a mara site n'ozi a kụpụrụ nso nso a, bụkwa nke onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta ọhanaeze na ndị uwe ojii na steeti ahụ, bụ maazị Harụna Mọhammed binyèrè aka na ya. Ya bụ ozi kọwara na e jidere ndị ahụ site na ngagharị na ághá ndị uwe ojii ahụ bùrù nso nso a, site njikọ aka ha na ngalaba pụrụ iche na-ahụ maka ibu agha megide òtù nzuzo, bụ 'Special Anti Cultism Unit' nakwa njikọ aka nke ụlọ ọrụ 'Special Anti Robbery Squad' (SARS).
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka ozi ahụ siri kọwaa, mmadụ asatọ n'ime ndị ahụ a na-enyo ényò bụ ndị e jidere n'Awka; mmadụ iri na isii bụ ndị e jidere n'Ọkịja; mmadụ iri na abụọ ka e jidere na Nanka; iri na otu ka e jidere na Nkwelle, jide iteghete n'Ogidi; nwụchikọọ iri na anọ n'agbata ụzọ Ajalị na Oko; nwụchikọọ iri na asatọ n'agbata ụzọ Enugwu-Ukwu/Nimo/Nise, wee jidezie iri asaa na asaa n'Achalla. Ndị ọzọ bụkwazị ndị e jidere site n'ebe dị iche iche, nke gụnyere Ọnịtsha, Awada, Urum, Ogbunike, Amawbia, Ukwulu, Ukpo na ebe ndị ọzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ozi ahụ gara n'ihu kọwaa na ihe e nwekọtara n'aka ndị ahụ gụnyere: mma ògè, anyike, tinyéré akwụkwọ kpọrọ nkụ a mazụrụ amazụ, bụ nke a na-enyo na ọ bụ ìgbó.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka ọ dị ugbu a, mmadụ iri isii na abụọ n'ime ndị ahụ ka a tọhapụgoro dịka ndị aka ha dị ọcha, site na nnyòcha ndị uwe ojii ahụ mere; mmadụ iri abụọ ka e kwùrù na ha erubeghị ịga ụlọ mkpọrọ, ma na-etinyezịrị ha anya ugbu a; mmadụ iri abụọ na ótù ka a ka na-enyòchakwa; ebe mmadụ iri anọ kwetàrà ma kwuputakwa n'ezie na ha bụ ndị otu nzúzó, ma bụrụkwa ndị a kpụpụgoro ụlọ ikpe, iji were ùsòró iwu nyụchaa ha anya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nke a bụ dịka ha jiri nanị otu ọkpụ were merie mba Angola na Iko Afrịka ndị na-erubeghị afọ iri na asaa, n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na iteghete nke were ọnọdụ n'amaegwuregwu Dae es Salaam, dị na Tanzania.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mmeri a mere na Ugo Ọlaedo Naijiria ga-esonye na Iko Mba Ụwa FIFA nke afọ a dịka mmiri richara ha, mere ha ejighị soro na-agba nke gara aga egbara n'afọ abụọ gara aga na India.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mba Naijiria jiri ọkpụ ise asatara nanị anọ merie Tanzania ụbọchị Sọndee.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụnyaahụ, Olusegun were otu goolu o nyere site na penariti na nkeji iri abụọ na otu, nke bụ nanị goolu enyere na asọmpi ahụ, were tunye ndị Naịjirịa ugo; bụ ndị rurula na agba nke na-eso agba ikpeazụ ma asọmpi ahụ. Olusegun gbanyere goolu ahụ ebe o mere oche goolu Geovani Raimundo taa kpuchie ọnụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ugo Ọlaedo Naijiria bụ ndị nọ na-akụziri ndị Angola egwu site mgbe nkeji mbụ asọmpi ahụ bidoro mana ha enweghị ike inye goolu. N'agbanyeghị bọọlụ nke Wisdom Ubani gbafuru bọọlụ na nkeji iri na otu na iri na asatọ, na nke oche goolu Sunday Stephen, bụ onye nọchiri Suleman Shaibu, chere site n'aka Zito Luvumbo na nkeji iri na atọ, Olusegun mere ka ihu ọchị pụta ndị Naịjirịa n'iru oge onye Angola na-agba n'azụ metụchara bọọlụ n'aka.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka ebidochara ọkara nke abụọ na nkeji nke isii ya, Angola fọdụrụ mmadụ iri ka Jose Cabincano nwetachara akwụkwọ edo edo nke abụọ mere o jiri bụrụ akwụkwọ ọbara ọbara mana ndị Naịjirịa enweghị ike iwere ohere ahụ mepụta ihe dịka ha na-agbafusi bọọlụ n'ọnụ goolu ndị Angola.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'asọmpi nke ọzọ, Uganda gwara Tanzania na ha karịrị ha site n'iji ọkpụ atọ asataghị ihe ọ bụla were dulaa ha mmụọ n'atụghị egwu na ọ bụ na be ha ka a nọ were asọ ya bụ mpi. Nkea meziri Uganda jiri bụrụ ndị nke abụọ n'otu A ebe Angola na Tanzania bụ ndị nke atọ na anọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ụbọchị Satọdee, Ugo Ọlaedo bụ ndị nọ n'isi otu A, na mba Uganda ga-achipụ ya na Amaegwuregwu Chamazi na Mbagala, otu oge ahụ Tanzania na Angola ga-agwọ onwe ya abacha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ gwara ndị niile ọganihu steeti ahụ na-adị mma na ọ ga-ahafe ọchịchị n'ọnwa Mee, afọ puku abụọ na iri na iteghete n'enweghị nsogbu ọ bụla. Onye gọvanọ ahụ kwuru n'ọchịchị ya bidoro mahadum isii ọhụrụ, mahadum nkà na ụzụ anọ, na ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị nkụzi abụọ n'ime afọ asatọ gara aga.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Okorocha, bụ onye guzobere otu kọmitii, nyere ha iwu iji hụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị a bụ nke e guzobere ma bụrụkwa nke ga-aga n'ihu. O kwuru na akwụkwọ bụ nnukwu ụlọ mmepụta na Steeti Imo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ sịrị na ọ naghị ekwere gọọmenti ga-anọchi ya ọnyà site na ị guzobe ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị ahụ. Anaghị m etinye gọọmenti ga-abata na nsogbu, achọghịkwa m ka ha daa site na ị guzobe mahadum, mahadum nkà na ụzụ, na ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị nkụzi ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ebe a jụrụ ya ma steeti e nwere ego iji were bido ụlọ akwụkwọ iri na abụọ, Okorocha kwuru, Mahadum, Mahadum nkà na ụzụ nd ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị nkụzi ndị a bụ nke gọọmenti na ndị mmadụ nọrọ onwe ha o metụrụ n'obi ga-anọkọ ọnụ were dozie. O nwere ọtụtụ ụzọ esi edozi ma na ahazi ụlọ akwụkwọ ọhụrụ ndị a, mana mkpali butere nke a bụ na ụmụaka anyị, bụ ndị kachasị achọ agụm akwụkwọ mahadum n'ala anyị niile, ga-enwe ohere iji were gụọ akwụkwọ na mahadum.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka ha na-eme na mbụ, ndị Naịjirịa nwetara ọtụtụ ohere ma were aka ha gbafusie ha niile n'otu n'otu, site n'aka Akinkunmi Amoo na nkeji nke iri na asaa. Nkeji atọ n'ihu, Wisdom Ubani jiri nwa ntakịrị ihe gbafuo bọọlụ agbara ya site na adọba, a gbaa.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Naijiria kara ịkwụ ụgwọ bọọlụ niile ha gbafusịrị dịka mba ahụ si ọwụwa anyanwụ Afrịka were bịa gosiri ha na ha abịaghị egwu ọnwa mana obi ruru ndị Naịjirịa ala dịka ha gbafuru bọọlụ ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Oche goolu ndị Uganda, Jack Komakech, chere bọọlụ Fawaz na Ubani ka ọ fọdụrụ nkeji abụọ ka ọkara nke mbụ gwụ. Na nkeji nke iri ise na asatọ, Andrew Kawooya gbara bọọlụ kụrụ n'ọnụ goolu Sunday Stephen site na adọba agbaa.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ma na nkeji nke iri na asaa, ndị Uganda bụ na-esi ọnwụ imeri asọmpi ahụ nyere goolu site n'aka John Alou bụ onye ewebatara ewebata dịka oji isi manye bọọlụ ahụ n'ọnụ goolu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka nkeji abụọ gasịrị, Ubani gbafuru ọmarịcha bọọlụ ọzọ o nwetara ebe ọ fọdụrụ nanị oche goolu ka ọ kpaa were nye goolu. Mana na tupu ịgbabie anya, Ibraheem Jabaar jiri anya oji ahụ ụzọ ka egbe hụ bọọlụ ahụ Olakunle Olusegun gbara ya, were gbakpunye ya n'ọnụ goolu dịka oche goolu ndị Uganda na-amachapụta n'ike.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nkeji ole na ole, shọọtụ Ubani bụ nke Komakech kụpụrụ dịka bọọlụ ahụ bịaziri na ngwụcha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mba Angola soro Naijiria bụrụ ndị si ná otu A were pụta dịka ha jiri ọkpụ anọ asatara nanị abụọ were merie mba Tanzania, ndị n'ebu ya bụ iko, ma bụrụkwa ndị jiri nkata kporo goolu iri na abụọ dịka ha emerighị otu asọmpi.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụbọchị Wednezdee, Naijiria na ndị nke abụọ na otu B, bụ nke a ga-amata tata n'etiti Cameroon na Senegal ma ọ bụ Guinea na Morocco, ga anwalee maka ndị ga-eru agba nke ikpe azụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Emume a bụ emume dị oké mkpa na ndụ ndị ụka ma na-egosi nzọpụta Chineke zọpụtara mmadụ, mmeri nke ìhè n'ebe ọchịchịrị dị, olileanya ebe olileanya na-adịghị na mmeri ezi ìhè meriri ajọ ihe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Emume ndị ụka a na-egosi mbilite n'ọnwụ nke Jizọs Kraịst, bụ oge dị mma iji ñomie ndụ ịhụnanya, ịchụàjà, mgbaghara, mwedanala, obi isi ike na ntachiobi, nke dị n'ime Kraịst ma bụrụkwa nke o gosipụtara n'oge ọ nọ n'ụwa.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka anyị were oge mmeri a were gosi ịhụnanya nye ndị agbataobi, ma nyere ndị chọrọ enyemaka n'etiti anyị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ala anyị nọ n'ihe anya mmeri maka ogbugbu, ntọrọ mmadụ na ịmebisi ihe bụ nke megasịrị n'ọtụtụ steeti n'oge na-adịghị anya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ihe ndị a ekwesịghị ịdị. Anyị ga-agba mbọ hụ na anyị jikọrọ ọnụ dịka nwanne na ezi agbataobi nke kwesịrị ịdị n'etiti ezi ụmụafọ ala anyị. Anyị agaghị ekwe ka ndị ndị ọjọọ nọ n'ime obodo anyị tinye nkewa n'ezi mmekọrịta na udo dị n'etiti anyị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: A mara m site na mkparịta ụka mụ na ndị isi ọlụ nchekwa, ndị gọvanọ steeti, ndị o metụrụ na obodo ọgbaghara ndị a dị, na ụmụ Naijiria bụ otu n'ọgụ megide ajọ ihe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọchịchị a ga-eme ihe niile o nwere ike iji hụ na o nyere ndị ọlụ nchekwa ala anyị akọrọmgwa na ezi nkwado iji hụ na ha buru agha megide ihe ahụ niile na-echere ọnọdụ obodo anyị aka mgba. Anyị agaghị ekwe ka ndị na-achọ ihe ọjọọ na ọnwụ merie ala anyị. N'anya m, ala anyị ga-emeri ha - ndị ohi, ndị omekome, ndị nrọ na ndị ọzọ dị otú a.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'Emume a dị nsọ, a na m arịọ ụmụ Naijiria ka ha nọgidesie ike n'ekpere ka udo na ezi nchekwa were laghachi n'akụkụ ala anyị niile. A na m arịọ ụnụ ka ume ghara ịkoropụ ụnụ maka ọdịnihu obodo anyị mara mma oge anyị na-eme ihe kwesịrị n'udo. Anya mmiri ga-adị n'abalị, mana iti mkpu ọṅụ ga-adị n'ụtụtụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: E jighị m ohere nke abụọ ụnụ nyere site na ịtụnyere m nke ugboro abụọ egwuri egwu, kachasị olileanya nke ọtụtụ ụmụ afọ n'ebe idozi ezi ọnọdụ nchekwa, ọnọdụ akụnụba na ịmerị mago mago dị. Ọrụ nke ọchịchị a dịka a na-akwado iwere ọchịchị a gaa n'ogogo ọzọ, bụ ka anyị na-egosi ezi ọchịchị, nke onye ọ bụla n'agbanyeghị ekpemekpe ma ọ bụ ebe onye sịrị bịa nwe ike ibi n'udo, rụọ ọrụ ma ga n'ihu; ebe ndị ji ọnọdụ ọchịchị ga-azara ọnụ ha, ndị na-emebi iwu abụrụkwa ndị ikpe mara.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọzọ kwa, a na m ekele ụmụnne anyị ndị otu Kraịst na Naijiria na mba ụwa niile ekele n'emume mbilite n'ọnwụ nke Jizọs Kraịst.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Oke mmemme mgbape ah bụkwa nke dọtara ọtụtụ ndị e ji okwu ha agba ìzù na steeti ahụ, ndị ndú òbòdò, ndị selitere isi n'ọrụ gọọmenti, ndị na-egwu okwe ndọrọndọrọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na nkenke okwuchukwu ya na ya bụ mmemme, bishọọpụ Nwokolo, onye dịrịlarịị na mbụ gọzie ya bụ ụlọ nsọ na ihe ndị e ji efe òfùfè na ya, mere ka a mara na obi Chineke jupùtara n'ịhụnanya, ọmaiko na ebere, ma dịkwa njikere mgbe ọbụla ịnabata ndị ọbụla ji obi gheere oghe wee bịakute ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ kpọkuru ndị ụka ka ha na-eso Chineke aga ogologo ụbọchị niile nke ndụ ha, iji nata ngọzị ya bara ụba nke ukwuu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O tòkwara ndị ụka Aglịkan na mpaghara Ọnịtsha maka ya bụ agadaga ụlọ nsọ, bụ nke ọ kọwara dịka ụlọ nsọ Chineke kwesiri ekwesi, ma mekwazie ka a mara na ọbịabịa ahụ ndị wetara oziọma bịara n'Ọnịtsha wetàrà ọtụtụ ngọzị na ezi ihe, bụ nke ọ dụrụ ha ka ha jigidesie ike.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na ntụnye nke ya, onye Chanselọ nke dayọsiisi Niger, bụ maazị Nnamdi Ibegbu mere ka a mara na ọ bụ n'ahọ 1957 ka a tọrọbụrụ okwute ntọala nke ya bụ ụlọ ụka, ebe okwute ntọala nke ọhụụ bụ nke a tọrọ n'ahọ 2006, site n'aka onye jibụ ọkwa bishọọpụ na dayọsiisi Niger, bụ Rt. Rev. Ken Sandy Okeke. O tokwazịrị ndị gbara mbọ n'ụzọ dị iche iche iji hụ na ya bụ ọmarịcha ụlọ ụka bụ nke kwụụrụ n'oge dịka oge a.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu nke ya, onye malitere ya bụ ọrụ, ma bụrụkwa Ashịdikin nke Ọnịtsha South Ashịdikinri, bụ Venerebụụl Josiah Ọfọegbu kwuputara na obi bụ ya nnọ sọ añụrị banyere mgbape ya bụ ụlọ ụka, bụ nke o kwuru na ọ bụghị ihe dị mfe oge a malitere ya; ebe onye nke rụchapụzịrị ya, bụ ụkọchukwu nọzị ebe ahụ ugbu a ma bụrụkwa Ashịdikin nke Inland Town Ashịdikinri, Venerebụụl Joseph Nweke megasịrị ka a mara ndị ụkọchukwu rụgoro ọrụ na ya bụ ụlọ ụka, ma tòó ha n'ihi ntụnye ha, ọbụnadị dịka o kpere ka Chineke gọzie ha niile n'otu n'otu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụfọdụ n'ime ndị dị iche iche sonyere na ya bụ oke mmemme gụnyere: eze ọdịnala Ọnịtsha, bụ Igwe Nnaemeka Alfred Achebe, onye na-anọchite anya ọgbọ nta nkwàdo Ọnịtsha Nọọtụ n'ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu steeti Anambra, bụ maazị Chigbo Enwezọr, ndị otu Agbalanze na Otu Ọdụ nke Ọnịtsha, tinyere imirikiti ndị ọzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Gọvanọ mere ka a mara nke a oge ọ gara ịkasì ndị ezinaụlọ ọnyeisi ọchịchị obodo Nimo, bụ maazị Anthony Igboka lagoro mmụọ obì na be ya dị na Nimo, n'okpuru ọchịchị Njikọka nke steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Gọvanọ Obianọ katọrọ dịka nke jọgburu onwe ya, ogbugbu ahụ e gburu ya bụ nwa amadi site n'aka ndị agameebù, bụ ndị jiri egbe wee sụọ ya kọtọkọtọ n'ahịa Oye Nimo n'abalị iri na isii nke ọnwa Epure. O mere ka a mara na ndị ọrụ uwe ojii na ndị ọrụ nchekwa ndị ọzọ na-eleba anya ma na-eme nnyocha banyere ogbugbu ahụ, iji nwụchikọọ ndị arụrụ ala ahụ kụrụ ya bụ akụmakụ. O kwuputara na atụmatụ nchekwa na steeti ahụ ka bụkwa nke kacha mma n'ala Nigeria gbaa gburugburu, ma sịkwazie na a ga-anwụchikọrịrị ndị ahụ, na-agbanyeghị ebe ha zòrò ma ọ bụ ogologo oge ole o werè.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Gọvanọ Obianọ gakwazịrị n'ihu kwuo na e nweghị ebe mgbaba ma ọ bụ ebe nzuzo ọbụla dịịrị ndị omekoomè na steeti ahụ, ma kwukwazịe na atụmatụ 'Operation Kpochapụ' ahụ ga-enye aka n'ụzọ dị ukwuu ikpochapụ ndị arụrụ ala ahụ, bụ ndị jikwa nwayọ nwayọ arịpụtasịkwa ọzọ ugbu a.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu nke ya, onye na-anọchite anya ọgbọ nta nkwàdo Njikọka nke abụọ n'ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu steeti Anambra, bụ maazị Pete Ibida kwùrù na ndị ọgbọ nta nkwàdo ya na ndị Nimo niile na-ekele gọvanọ Obianọ maka itinye ọnụ ozigbo na ya bụ okwu ma mekwa ihe pụtara ìhè banyere ya, ọ kachasị ịmapụta ego dị nde Naịra ise dịkwa ụgwọ ọrụ dịịrị onwe ọbụla ga-agba ezi àmà a pụrụ iji nwụchikọọ ndị ahụ gburu ya bụ nwoke
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O tòkwàrà gọvanọ n'ihi ndị òtù dị iche iche o zitegooro ha kemgbe ihe ahụ mere, na-agbanyeghị na ọ nọghị nso oge ahụ, ma kwekwazie nkwà na ha ga-aga n'ihu n'ezi nkwado ahụ ha na-enye ọchịchị ya, iji wee gaa n'ihu n'ọrụ ọma dị iche iche o ji n'aka na steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nke a bụ nke e mere site n'aka bishọọpụ ụka Angịlịkan na dayọsiisi ahụ, bụ 'Rt. Rev'd'. Alexander Ibezim, ma bụrụkwa nke weere ọnọdụ n'ụlọ ụka Cathedral Church of St. Faith dị n'Awka na steeti Anambra. Oke emume ahụ bụkwa nke dọtara ọtụtụ mmadụ sitere n'ebe dị iche iche wee bịa, nke gụnyere ndị bishọọpụ, ndị ụkọchukwu, ndị chiri echichi ụkà, ndị ọrụ gọọment na ndị ọzọ e ji okwu ha agba ìzù. Mmadụ ise n'ime ndị ụkọchukwu ka e buliri n'ọkwa 'Canọn' ebe otu onye ọzọ ka e siri n'ọkwa 'Canon' bulie n'ọkwa 'Venerable'.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya dịka ọ na-eguzobe ndị ahụ n'ọkwa ọhụụ ahụ, bishọọpụ Ibezim mere ka ha mara na ọkwa ahụ chọrọ mweda n'ala, nnọgidesi ike n'ekpere na ijere Chineke na mmadụ ozi, ma kpọkuo ha ka ha na-enyòchagharị ndụ ha oge niile iji mara ma ha kà nọzịkwa n'okwukwe ma nwezukwa ihe niile a chọrọ n'aka ha dịka ndị ọrụ ụka.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O chetaara ha na ndị mmadụ na-ele omume na usoro obibi ndụ onye na-ezi ha oziọma anya mgbe ọbụla iji mara ụdị mmadụ ọ bụ, ma dụkwazie ha ọdụ ka ha gbaa mbọ hụ na ihe ha na-ekwu n'okwuchukwu bụkwa ihe ha na-emeputa n'omùme, iji mee ka ndị mmadụ kwere n'oziọma Chineke bụ nke a na-akụghị mmiri, ma site na ya nwee nzọpụta zuru òkè.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na mbụ n'okwuchukwu ya, bishọọpụ dayọsiisi Isukwuato-Umunochi lagoro ezumike nka, bụ bishọọpụ Sam Chukwuka, ónyé okwuchukwu ya gbadòrò ụkwụ na ụlọ ụka na-aga n'ihu (the church matches on) kwuru na ọ bụ ọrụ kara dị elu ka e kenyegoro ndị ahụ, ma gwa ha ka ha mee ka mmekọrịta ha na Chineke na mmadụ ibe ha dị ọhụụ, ma gharakwa iduhiè ìgwè atụrụ Chineke nna ranyere ha n'aka. O nyekwara ndị ahụ ndụmọdụ ka ha were oge, ihe ndị bara ha urù, ọgụgụ isi na ihe niile ha nwere wee jeere Chineke ozi ma kụtakwara Christ mkpụrụ obi, bụ nke o nyegoro ha ikike na ndụmọdụ ime, ọ bụnadị dịka ọ gwara ha ka ha ghara ikwe ka ihe ọbụla rafuo ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụfọdụ n'ime ndị ahụ e buliri n'ọkwa, nke gụnyere 'Venerable Christian Okafor na ''Rev. Canon Charles Chukwurah, ndị kwuru okwu n'aha ndị ọzọ, kelèrè Chineke maka ọkpụkpọ òkù ọ kpọrọ ha nakwa mbuli elu ahụ, ma rịọkwazie Ya ka ọ gaa n'ihu inyere ha aka na inye ha ike ha ga-eji wee jeere Ya ozi otu o siri kwesi. Ha kwekwazịrị nkwà ịga n'ihu n'iji obi ha rụọọrọ Chineke nna ọrụ dịka ọkpụkpọ òkù ha siri dị, iji dubàá ndị mmadụ n'alaeze ma sorokwa keta òkè na ya bụ alaeze ebighi ebi na mgbe ikpeazụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'iguzobe n'ọkwa ahụ, e dukwara ndị ahụ n'iyi nrube isi nyéré Chineke nakwa nzere akwamiko nwoke na nwoke, na nkè nwoke dapụta ma ọ bụ nwaanyị dapụta, a pịachara.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: A nọrọ na ya bụ mmemme wee bụọ ọtụtụ abụ dị iche iche site n'aka ndị ọbụ abụ na ya bụ dayọsiisi, ma tekwazie egwu itò Chineke.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Gọvanọ Obianọ kpọrọ oku a n'Ogidi na mmemme Ito Arọ, bụ otu n'ime mmemme e jiri mara ndị obodo ahụ, ma bụrụkwa nke weere ọnọdụ n'ụlọ ezumeezu Ogidi dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Idemili North na ya bụ steeti. Ọ kọwapụtara mkpà ọ dị ka ndị Igbò na-akwàdo omenala ha, na-emeputa ha nke ọma ma na-echetakwa mmadụ mgbe ọ dị ndụ, karịa ịkwanyere onye ahụ ùgwù enweghị isi mgbe ọ nwụchagòrò.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O bunyere eze ọdịnala obodo ahụ ụkpa ekele, ya na ndị ọzọ niile nyere aka n'ịchịkọbà na ịhazi oke emume ahụ, ma kpọkukwazie ha ka ha jide ka ha ji, ọbụnadị dịka ọ kpọkùrù ndị Igbo ka ha were omenala ha kpọrọ ihe ma ghara ikwe ka nke ọbụla n'ime ya fuo ma ọ bụ nwụọ. N'okwu nke ya, eze ọdịnala Ogidi, bụ Igwe Alex Ọnyịdo kọwara na mmemme ahụ bụ nke tegoro aka ndị obodo ahụ jiri mebe ya, bụkwa nke ha mechara gbahapụ ya nwa oge, ma kwuo na ya bụ mmemme gbànyèrè mgbọrọgwụ n'òtù ọgbọ dịka ọ dị n'ala Igbo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ sị na otu ọgbọ n'obodo Ogidi bụ nnọọ nke na-ada ụda nke ukwuu, ma bụrụkwa nke wetegoro ọtụtụ mgbanwe n'obodo ahụ dịka o siri metụta nrube isi, mmepe obodo na ịmà aka n'ime ezi ihe dara ụda, ọ kachasị n'ebe ndị ntorobịa obodo ahụ nọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: A nọrọ na mmemme ahụ were kwanyere mmadụ ruru nàrị ise na asatọ ùgwù bụ ndị nọ n'agbata ahọ iri asatọ wee ruo ahọ iri iteghete, sitere na mpaghara anọ mejùpùtara Ogidi, nke gụnyere: Uru, Ezinkwọ, Ikenga na Akananọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka ha na-emerị n'oge mbụ site n'ụbọchị egwuregwu ahụ bidoro, ndị egwu bọọlụ Naijiria ejighị ohere ha nwere were kpọrọ ihe nke ha kara iji gosi na ha bụ ọkaibe tupu egbuzuo bọọlụ, nkea mere ha jiri were isi ha were kwụọ ụgwọ ya na penariti dịka ha agaghị ebutezi ọlaedo dịka aha ha siri dị mana ga-azọzi ọla nchara.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye na-agba n'ihu, Wisdom Ubani, kwesịrị ime nke ọma site na ịgbanye ohere goolu abụọ o nwetara n'ọkara nke mbụ, mana dịka ọ na-akpụ ka ejule, ohere ndị a gafere. Guinea site n'aka Bah Algassime na Toure Momo tụfukwara ohere nke ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka nkeji asaa gasịrị n'ọkara nke abụọ, Ubani gbafuru bọọlụ ọzọ nke bụ na nwanyị dị ime ga-abanye bọọlụ ahụ n'ọnụ goolu. Dịka ọ na-eme otú awa, Algassime nọrọ ebe tere aka were gbaa shọtụ oche goolu Sunday Stephen chere, ebe bọọlụ nke Toure Alya kụrụ n'ọnụ goolu na nkeji nke iri isii na isii. Na nkeji nke iri asaa na abụọ, Ubani nwetara onwe ya ọmarịcha ohere mana ọ gbafukwara ya bụ bọọlụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka ọ bụzi penariti ga-egosi onye meriri, Bangoura Alya, Toure Alya, Conte Aboubacar, Bangoura Sekou , Keita Ahmed , Bangoura Mahmoud , Bah Algassime, Fofana Ibrahima , Dado Ibrahima na Soumah Mohamed jiri nwayọọ gbakpunye penariti nke ha n'ọnụ goolu, ebe Ogaga Oduko gbafuru nke ya ka Ibraheem Jabaar , David Ishaya, Olakunle Olusegun , Clement Ikenna , Olatomi Olaniyan , Shedrack Tanko , Fawaz Abdullahi , Wisdom Ubani and Samson Tijani nyechara goolu nke ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mpụtara a gosiri na Naijiria, bụ ndị nwetagoro akwụkwọ Iko Mba Ụwa nke Afọ Puku Abụọ na iri na iteghete maka Ụmụ Okorobịa na-erubeghị afọ iri na asaa na Brazil, ga-agba asọmpi nkasi obi ụbọchị Satọdee nke a ga-eji mara ndị bụ ndị nke atọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ kwusịrị ike bụ njikere gọọmenti ya dị iji were bụrụ ndị mbụ ga-akwụ ụgwọ ọrụ opekatampe ọhụrụ ahụ nye ndị ọlụ n'ala anyị maka ma onye ọrụ kwesịrị ụgwọ ọrụ ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ sịrị na steeti ga-akwalite ego ndị ahụ ha na-enweta n'ime steeti ahụ iji were kwadoo ije ozi a dị oké mkpa. Obiano bụ onye mere ka amata nkea na nzukọ ya ndị isi mgbasa ozi mere n'ogige ya dị na Aguleri, na ọchịchị ime obodo Anambra East na steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ kwuru na ibido ịkwụ ụgwọ ọrụ opekatampe ọhụrụ ahụ ga-etinye ihe karịrị ijeri naira abụọ n'elu ego ụgwọ ọrụ gọọmenti steeti ahụ na-akwụ n'ọnwa ọ bụla.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Obiano kwuru na ọ ga-akwụ ụgwọ ọrụ opekatampe ọhụrụ ahụ dịka o kwere ndị ọrụ nọ steeti ahụ nkwa n'oge ntụliaka.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ gara n'ihu were kwuo mkpa ọ dị ịbulite ego gọọmenti na-enweta na steeti ahụ n'ihi na nkea ga-eme ka gọọmenti nwee ike were rụọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ na-ebute mmepe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Obiano kwuru na ngwa ngwa ọ kwụchara ụgwọ ọnwa opekatampe ọhụrụ ahụ, ọ ga-agbata ọsọ enyemaka na ụlọ ọrụ redio nke steeti nwe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ya bụ ọmarịcha okporo ụzọ ndị obodo ahụ jiri aka ha rụrụ onwe ha, bụ nke kilomita ya dị atọ na ụma ise ka e kwuru na o riri ego karịrị nde Naịra iri isii na ise, ma bụrụkwa nke a gbapere site n'aka eze ọdịnala obodo ahụ, bụ Igwe Gerald Mbamalu, onye ọ bụ aha ótútú ya ka a bàgharịzịrị ya bụ ụzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọrụ ngo okporo ụzọ ahụ bụ nke a tụpụtara site n'aka òtù Ojoto South Development Union, bụ òtù jikọtara mpaghara Ojoto Obo-Ọfịa n'okpuru òtù Ojoto Akanasatọ Union (OAU), ma bụrụ nke ogologo ya kwụsịrị n'agbata okè Ojoto na Ọba. N'okwu ya dịka ọ gbapechara ya bụ ụzọ, Igwe Mbamalụ kọwapụtara mkpa ọ dị obodo na gọọmenti ijikọ aka ọnụ n'ihe gbasaara mmepe òbòdò na mwunye ihe dị iche iche e ji enyere ndụ aka.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na ntụnye ha n'otu n'otu, onyeisi ọchịchị obodo ahụ, bụ maazị Edwin Umeghalụ nakwa onyeisi òtù Ojoto South Development Union bụ maazị Chukwudi Maduabum kọwara na ihe kpaliri ha ime nke ahụ bụ mkpa ọ dị iweta mmepe dịkọrọ ọnụ na ya bụ obodo, na itinyekwu aka na mbọ ọchịchị steeti ahụ na-agba n'ihe gbasaara mmepe ime òbòdò.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụfọdụ ndị mmadụ selitere isi n'obodo ahụ, nke gụnyere nwaanyị mbụ jiri ọkwa dịka Rektọ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ Federal Polytechnic Oko , bụ Injinia Dọkịta Francisca Nwafụlugo tinyere ndị ọzọ, tòrò eze ọdịnala obodo ahụ na ndị ọzọ tinyere aka na ya bụ ọrụ maka ịchọpụta ma tinye uche n'ihe so na ndị kacha bụrụ mkpa dịịrị obodo ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Oke ụbọchị ahụ bụ nke ya bụ ọba akwụkwọ jiri mmemme dị iche iche wee merùbe, malite n'ịga leta ndị nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ wee ruo n'ịchịkọba oke ọgbakọ n'ụlọ ezumeezu nke ya bụ ọba mmụta dị n'Awka.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ 'Anambra State Prison Command' dị n'Amawbia' bụ ebe ọ nọrọ wee bunye ndị nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ahụ akwụkwọ na ihe dị iche iche e ji akwàlite mmụta; onye ji ọkwa dịka onyeisi ọba akwụkwọ ahụ, bụ dọkịta Nkechi Udeze kọwara mmụta dịka ihe dị oke mkpa na ndụ mmadụ nakwà ụzọ pụtakarịchara ìhè a pụrụ isi kwàlite ezi mgbanwè na mmepe òbòdò.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ mere ka a mara na mmụta na-emepe anya, na-emepe ụzọ, na-anụcha mmadụ, na-emekwa ka mmadụ bàá urù n'obodo, tinyere ọtụtụ ihe ndị ọzọ ọ pụrụ ime na ndụ mmadụ. Ọ kpọkùkwazịrị ndị ahụ nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ka ha were ịgụ akwụkwụ kpọrọ ihe, were ya gbanwèé ma werekwa ya mụta ihe ndị ga-enyere ha aka ịbara onwe ha na obodo ha urù ma ha mechaa pụta n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ahụ, dịka ụfọdụ ndị nọgoro n'ụlọ mkpọrọ mère .
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na nzaghachi dịka ọ na-anabàtá ihe ndị ahụ, onye ji ọkwa 'Superintendent' n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ahụ, bụ maazị Christian Udeagwụ, onye kwuru okwu n'aha osotè onye 'Controller' ya bụ ụlọ mkpọrọ, bụ maazị Edwin Akabụeze tòrò ọba mmụta ahụ maka agadaga onyinye akwụkwọ na akụrụngwa mmụta ahụ, ma dụọkwa ndị ahụ nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ka ha tinye ha n'ọrụ nke ọma. O chetaara ha na ụwa na-emezịkwa mgbanwe, ma mee ka ha mara na ọ bụzịkwa mmụta na-achị ugbu a, ọbụnadị dịka ọ kpọkùrù ha ka ha were ịgụsi akwụkwọ ike wee kpọrọ ihe n'ihi na onye amaghị akwụkwọ n'ọgbara ọhụụ a, ihe kwàrà ya nke ukwuu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: E buruzịkwara ya bụ oke mmemme wee gaa n'ụlọ ezumeezu nke ọba mmụta ahụ, bụ ebe a nọrọ wee mee emume ịgụ akwụkwọ, inye nkuzi na ihe ndị ọzọ e ji akwalite mmụta.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya n'ebe ahụ, onyeisi oche na mmemme ahụ, ma bụrụkwa onye so n'òtù nlekọta nke 'All Progressives Grand Alliance' (APGA), bụ maazị Benjamin Oyedeji, kpọkuru ụmụakwụkwọ ka ha na-agusi akwụkwọ ike, ma na-agụ akwụkwọ maka na ha chọrọ ịmụta ihe iji tụnyekwa ụtụ nke ha na ndozi na mmepe òbodo, karịa ịgụ akwụkwọ naanị ka ha were mee nke ọla n'ule, bụ nke o kwuru na mgbe ọ gasịrị, onye ahụ echezọọ ihe niile ahụ ọ gụrụ n'otu ntabì anya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị na-ahazi ndị egwu bọọlụ Naijiria ga-enwe isi ọwụwa maka ebe mmiri siri wee baa n'opi ụgbọgụrụ ka goolu ndị Naịjirịa na-enye siri were gbadaa dịka egwuregwu ahụ na-aga n'ihu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na mbụ, ha jiri otu goolu merie Tanzania na asọmpi enyere goolu iteghete, were penariti merie Angola, ma jisi ike gbata onye laba onye laba dịka ha na Uganda gbara onwe ha otu ọkpụ otu ọkpụ, Guinea meriri ha na penariti; ebe ndị Angola mechiziri akwụkwọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Otu a ka o siri bịa n'isi njedebe maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ bụ ndị nwere ọtụtụ ohere mana gbafusie ya, n'agbanyeghị ohere juru eju ha nwere, na akwụkwọ ọbara ọbara ndị Angola nwetara mere ha jiri dị mmadụ iri gbachaa nkeji iri atọ na anọ fọdụrụ, Ugo Ọlaedo emenwughị ihe ọ bụla.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ebe Olatomi Olaniyan, Tijani na Charles Etim gbaliri bọọlụ ha elu oge ha nwetara ohere ịnye goolu, onye kacha nye goolu n'egwuregwu a bụ Osvaldo Capemba jiri isi nye goolu n'oghere mbụ Angola nwetara mana Wisdom Ubani sara goolu ahụ ka nkeji abụọ gasịrị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka ha sachara goolu ahụ, ndị Naịjirịa ejighị ohere ha nwetara ọzọ mere ihe n'ime asọmpi ahụ, kama ha nọ na-agbafusị bọọlụ ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Kama nkea, Andre Sebastio Zito nyere goolu abụọ nke ndị Angola n'ohere ọma ọzọ ha nwere na nkeji nke atọ dịka ọkara nke abụọ bidochara, mana n'agbanyeghị lịkalịka niile ha gbara, Naijiria enweghị ike ime ihe ọ bụla na nkeji ndị ọzọ fọdụrụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ụbọchị ụka, Cameroon jiri ọkpụ ise merie mba Guinea na asọmpi ikpeazụ ha jiri bụrụ ọkaibe n'egwuregwu Afrịka maka ndị na-erubeghị afọ iri na asaa ka ha na mba Guinea gbachara onye ha onye laba onye laba.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Obodo anọ ndị a ga-anọchitezi anya Afrịka n'Iko FIFA na Brazil n'afọ a.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ọnwa Novemba afọ gara aga, PTDF kpọrọ òkù ka ụmụ Naijiria tozuru tinye akwụkwọ maka ịgụ akwụkwọ n'efu a nke ha na ndị mahadum dị na Britain, Germany na France ha na ụlọọrụ PTDF nwere ezi nkwekọrịta.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Oge itinye akwụkwọ bụ izu isii mere ka ụlọọrụ PTDF nweta akwụkwọ site n'aka mmadụ puku iri na iteghete, narị atọ na iri atọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụlọọrụ ahụ kwuru n'Abuja na mmadụ puku iri na ise, narị asatọ na iri abụọ na abụọ tinyere akwụkwọ maka ịgụ M. Sc., ebe mmadụ puku atọ, narị ise na otu tinyere akwụkwọ maka PhD na mba ofesi.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: E kwuru na nwale nke ajụjụ ọnụ maka ndị a họpụtara n'otu abụọ ndị a ga-adị site n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na iteghete nke Eprel were ruo ụbọchị iri nke ọnwa Mee, afọ puku abụọ na iri na iteghete n'ebe ndị ahụ ewepụtagasịrị n'ala anyị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ihe gọọmenti etiti jiri were guzobe otu a bụ maka ọjụjụ ndị na-egwupụta mmanụ na mba ụwa jụrụ ịkụziri ụmụ Naijiria ihe ha ma gbasara otu na akarọngwa eji egwupụta mmanụ ọtụtụ afọ ka Naijiria chọpụtachara mmanụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ebumnobi bụzi ka azụpụta ụmụ afọ Naijiria ga-ewere ọnọdụ odudu ma chịa isi n'ụlọ ọrụ a bụ nke ndị ọcha nọ n'isi ya, nke ga-eme ka ndị nọrọ n'ịhazi na idozi ụlọọrụ ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nguzobe otu a n'afọ otu puku, narị iteghete na iri asaa na atọ, nke bidoro ọrụ n'uju n'afọ puku abụọ, bụ ụkwụ mbụ gọọmenti etiti zọpụrụ itinye ihe ndị ahụ ga-ebute mmepe ụlọọrụ mmanụ ala anyị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ịgụ akwụkwọ n'efu nke ụlọọrụ a nọrọ n'afọ gara aga zụọ ma wepụta ndị mara nke ekwe na-akụ n'ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ ala anyị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụzọ ebe ndị a na-enye ndị a ọzụzụ gụnyere ịrụ ìgwè, igwu ihe, ọnọdụ okirikiri, nkà na ụzọ, ịchekwa, iwu, ịgụ ego, mgbasa ozi na ihe ndị ọzọ metụtara ụlọọrụ a.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụlọọrụ PTDF kwuziri na mmadụ puku anọ, narị iteghete na iri na isii bụ ndị rigoro erere ịgụ akwụkwọ n'efu a. Ha kwuru na mmadụ dị otu puku, narị anọ na iri anọ na iteghete bụ ndị gụrụ PhD, ebe mmadụ dị puku atọ, narị atọ na iri isii na asaa gụrụ M. Sc.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Aka na-achị steeti Anambra bụ gọvanọ Willie Obianọ mere ka a mara nke a na nzukọ isi ọchịchị steeti ahụ, bụ 'State Executive Council Meeting' nwere n'Awka bụ isi obodo steeti ahụ ụbọchị Mọnde. Gọvanọ Obianọ kwupùtara nke a dịka ọ na-aja ndị ọrụ nchekwa na steeti ahụ ike maka ezi mbọ ha gbàrà n'ịnwụchikọ otu n'ime ndị ahụ a na-enyo ènyò na ọ bụ ha gburu onyeisi ọchịchị obodo Nimo dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Njikọka, bụ maazị Frank Anthony Igboka, bụ onye a gbàgbùrù n'abalị iri na isii nke Ọnwa Epure.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ihe gbasaara nde Naịra ise o kwere na nkwa maka onye ọbụla ga-agba ezi àmà ga-enye aka n'ịnwụchikọ ndị ahụ gburu ya bụ nwa amadi, gọvanọ Obianọ mere ka a mara na onye gbara ama e jiri nwụchikọ onye nke ahụ a nwụchikọrọ ugbua anatalarị ma fọlaa ego ya àkpà kemgbe, dịka gọọmenti kwere na nkwà. O mekwazịrị ka a mara na e buliela ọnụ ego ahọ ka ọ bụrụzie n'isi n'isi, nke pụtara na onye ọbụla gbara ama ga-enye aka n'ịnwụchikọ otu onye n'ime ndị ahụ ga-enweta nde Naịra ise, ebe gbara ama ga-enye aka n'ịnwụchikọ mmadụ abụọ ga-enweta nde Naịra iri, wee dịrịzie gaba.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Gọvanọ Obianọ kwupùtanwòrò njikere steeti ahụ nà mbọ ya ịhụ na e nwere ezi nchekwa ndụ na ngwongwo ụmụafọ steeti ahụ site n'ịhụ na ndị arụrụala na ndị omekoome enweghị ọnọdụ ọbụla na steeti ahụ. Ọ kpọkùrù ndị dị iche iche nwere ụlọ na steeti ahụ, ka ha na-eleru anya ma na-akpachàpụkwa anya ịhụ na ndị ha na-etinye n'ụlọ ha bụ ndị nwere ebe doro anya ha sì, ma nwekwa ihe doro anya ha na-arụ, na-abụghị ndị na-etinye aka n'ihe arụrụala ọbụla, ma ọ bụ ndị obibi ndụ ha na-adabachaghị adaba, n'ihi na gọọmenti agaghị egbu ogè ịkụtù ụlọ ọbụla ndị dị otu ahụ nọ na ya were akụ akụmakụ n'ụdị ọbụla.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ gara n'ihu mee ka a mara na otu nzuzo abụrụkwala otu n'ime ihe ndị na-eweta ala adịghị mma ugbua, kwuo na otu pụrụ iche e guzòbere maka nke ahụ amalitela ibu agha megide ya bụ ajọ ọnọdụ, ma dụkwazie ndị ntorobịa na steeti ahụ ka ha zèéré ma kwụsị itinye aka n'ihe ọbụla bụ mpụ na arụrụ ala, maka na onye ọbụla e nwetara ga-eji anya ya abụọ wee hụ ntị ya na-ejighị ènyò.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onyeisi ndị uwe ojii na steeti ahụ, bụ maazị Mustapha Danduara mere ka a mara nke a n'isi ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe ojii dị n'Amawbịa, oge ọ na-akpụgharị ya bụ nwa amadi, tinyere ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ a nwụchikọrọ maka itinye aka n'arụrụala dị iche iche, dịka otu nzuzo, izu ohi na ịtọrọ mmadụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nwata nwoke ahụ aha ya bụ Chigbo Aniegbu, onye a maara dịka Transformer gbàrà ahọ iri abụọ na asaa ma bụrụkwa onye e kwuru na o bụ onye Nimo, bụkwa obodo ya bụ nwa amadi e gburu egbu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka maazị Danduara siri kwuo, kemgbe ụbọchị ahụ e jiri gbuo maazị Igboka, bụ n'abalị iri na isii nke ọnwa Epure n'ahịa Oye Nimo, ndị uwe ojii steeti ahụ bagidere n'ịchụ nta ịnwụchikọọ ndị ahụ kpara ya bụ arụ, bụzị nke e siri na ya wee nwụchikọọ onye nke ahụ e jidegoro ugbua, o wee fọzie mmadụ atọ ndị ọzọ, bụ ndị e kwuru na ha nọ n'ọsọ ugbua. Mmadụ atọ ahụ ka ọ kpọpụtasịrị aha ha dịka: 'Smart'; Chukwunọnso (onye a maara dịka Nwa Samị), na Obinna Okafor, ma kwukwazie na, dịka aka na-achị steeti ahụ bụ gọvanọ Willie Obianọ siri kwuo, onye ga-agba àmà ga-enye aka n'ịnwụchikọ mmadụ atọ ahụ fọrọ afọ ka a ga-ebunye ogbe ego nde Naịra iri na ise (N15m), nke pụtara nde Naịra ise n'isi mmadụ ọbụla e jidere n'ime ha atọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka ọ na-akọwapụta na ndị ọrụ uwe ojii na steeti ahụ nwụchikọrọ ndị ọzọ a na-enyo ènyò na ha bụ ndị ohi, ndị otu nzuzo, ndị ntọrọ mmadụ na ndị omekoome ndị ọzọ, nke ọnụ ọgụgụ ha dị narị abụọ na iri isii na anọ (264) naanị n'ime ọnwa Epùrè; maazị Danduara kpụgharịkwara ụfọdụ n'ime ndị ahụ bụ ndị a nwchikọrọ nso nso a, nke gụnyere maazị Ikechukwu Emelie, onye a na-enyo ènyò na ọ bụ ya tọọrọ ma gbuo (n'ahọ 2014) maazị Iloanyụsị bụ nna onye òtù egwu bọọlụ 'Super Eagle' n'oge mbụ bụ maazị Chikelụ Iloanyụsị. Ya bụ nwa amadi ka e kwukwara na o siri n'ụlọ elu nwere òkpùkpù atọ wee wụtuo, ma buru ịgà n'aka rie mbọmbọ n'ahọ 2014.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị ọzọ gụnyere: Ugochukwu Nweke na Chijioke Okeh bụ ndị oji egbe ezú napụrụ ụkọchukwu Chukwunọnso Anọsike igwe omecha ncha, bụ lapụtọọpụ ya, na ọtụtụ ekwentị na Nnewi; Maazị Chidubem Umealụ gbara ahọ iri abụọ na asaa, ma bụrụkwa onye otu nzuzo ndị uwe ojii chọgharịbara kemgbe dịka onye a na-enyo na aka ya dị n'ụfọdụ ogbugbu e gbugoro ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ, site n'aka ndị otu nzuzo; tinyere ọtụtụ ndị btorobịa ndị ọzọ e jidere maka ihe dị iche iche.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na nzaghachi, maazị Chigbo Anịegbu kwetara na ya sonyeere ndị ahụ gbagburu maazị Igboka n'ụgbọala, ma gọọ agụgọ na ya esoghị gbagbuo ya, n'ihi na ya amaghị na ọ bụ ihe ha na-aga eme, wee sònyere ha n'ụgbọala.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'aka nke ya, Ikechukwu Emelie kwuru na ya bụ nwadibịa, ma kwuo na ọ bụghị ya tọọrọ ma ọ bụ gbagbuo maazị Iloanyụsị, kama na ọ bụ naanị ọgwụ ka ọ na-agwọrọ ndị mmadụ. O kwukwara na ọ bụ ụjọ maka igbu ya mere ya jiri si n'ụlọ elu ahụ wee wụpụ, ma were ọkpà zọọ onwe ya, n'ihi na ya ababeghị n'ogige ndị uwe ojii mbụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ihe ndị e nwekọtara n'aka ndị ahụ e jidere gụnyere nsụnsụ egbe, ogologo egbe, mgbọ, mmà, anyike, ekwentị, igwe omecha ncha bụ lapụtọọpụ, akpa igbó, tinyere ụfọdụ ihe ndị ọzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya dịka ọ na-agụpụta nke ahụ, maazị Danjuma Goje mere ka a mara na a makwasara ego dị ijeri Naịra iri iteghete (N90bn) n'elu ego ole onyeisi ala bụ maazị Mụhammadụ Buharị mapụtara ma hafèé n'aka ndị omebe iwu ahụ n'abalị iri na asatọ nke ọnwa Ekeresimeesi ahọ 2018 ka ha lebàrá ya anya. O kwuru na ego ahụ ha makwasara bụ iji wee gbòó nsogbu ajọ ọnọdụ nchekwa dị n'ala Nigeria ugbua, kwàlite ezi ọnọdụ obibi ndụ ndị omebe iwu, ma nyekwara steeti Zamfara aka.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ sị na ijeri Naịra iri abụọ na atọ na ụma iri isii na asatọ (N23.68bn) n'ime ego ahụ bụ nke a mapụtara iji kwụọ ndị omebe iwu na-apụ àpụ na ndị enyemaka ha ọkpụrụkpụ ego orubèèrè ha, bụ 'gratuity', ya na ịkwụ ndị omebe iwu na-abata abata àlàwi ha, tinyere ego a ga-eji mee mmemme nnabàta nke ndị ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu agba nke iteghete ala anyị. Ọ sị na a mapụtara ijeri Naịra iri (N10bn) maka steeti Zamfara, ebe e bulitekwara ọnụ ego a mapụtara maka nchekwa, n'ihi ajọ ọnụdụ nchekwa na-ebi ala Nigeria aka ọjọọ ugbua.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Maazị Goje gara n'ihu kwuo na ngalaba ọkụ latirik, ngalaba ọrụ na ngalaba ewumewu ụlọ ka a mapụtaara ego dị narị ijeri Naịra atọ na iri iteghete na anọ na, ụma iri iteghete na ótù (N394.91bn); mapụtara ngalaba njem otu narị ijeri Naịra na iri asaa na iteghete, na ụma iri atọ na asatọ (N179.38bn), ebe ngalaba nchekwa nwetara otu narị Ijeri Naịra na iri ise na iteghete, na ụma iri na atọ (N159.13bn).
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ sị na ngalaba na-ahụ maka ọrụ ugbo na mmepe ime obodo nwetara otu narị ijeri Naịra na asaa, na ụma iri abụọ na abụọ (N107. 22bn), nglaba Mmiri nweta ijeri Naịra iri iteghete na abụọ, na ụma iri na asatọ (N92.18bn).
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka o kwuru na ngalaba agụmakwụkwọ nwetara ijeri Naịra iri ise na asatọ, na ụma iri isii na iteghete (N58.69bn); ọ sịkwa na ngalaba ahụike nwetara ijeri Naịra iri ise na asaa na ụma iteghete (N33.15bn), isi ọchịchị ala anyị nweta ijeri Naịra iri atọ na atọ na ụma iri na ise (N33.15bn), ebe ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe metụtara Niger Delta, bụ ''Ministry of Niger Delta Affairs'' nwetara ijeri Naịra anọ na ụma ise.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ịgawanye n'ihu, o mere ka a mara na a mapụtara ijeri Naịra iri ise (N50bn) maka mgbata ọsọ pụrụ iche, bụ Special Intervention Programme (Capital), mapụta ijeri Naịra iri anọ na ise (N45bn) maka mgbata ọsọ enyemaka na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ mgbago ugwu ala anyị, bụ North East Intervention Fund ma mapụtakwa ijeri Naịra iri na ise (N15bn) maka ịkwụ ụgwọ e ji ụfọdụ ụlọ ọrụ ngo n'ime ala Nigeria.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na ntụnye nke ya, onyeisi ụlọ omebe iwu Sineeti, bụ maazị Bukọla Saraki kọwara ya bụ amụmà ego ọrụ dịka nke magburu onwe ya, ma kpọkuo onyeisi ala ka o binye aka na ya bụ akwụkwọ ozigbo ozigbo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Otu ọ dị, ndị ụlọ ọgbakọ nnọchi anya ebinyelarị aka na ya bụ amụmà ego ọrụ, ma nyekwa ya nkwàdo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O mere ka amata nke a n'ọgbakọ ndị isi omenala na mgbago ugwu ala mere na Tuzdee na Kaduna.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Adamu, n'okwu ya kwuru n'ọnụ ọgụgụ nke arụ ndị omekome kpara site na Jenụwarị were ruo Eprel, opekampe mmadụ narị isii na iri asatọ na ise bụ ndị a tọrọ n'ala anyị niile, ebe e gburu mmadụ iri asaa na iri isii na asaa site na mgbago ugwu ala anyị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka ọ na-akọwa ihe ndị butere ọnwụ ndị a, Adamu kwuru na ọ bụ na ọdịda anyanwụ mgbago ugwu ka ndị mmadụ kacha nwụ ebe mmadụ dị narị anọ na iri atọ na isii bụ ndị nwụrụ na ógbè ahụ; n'etiti mgbago ugwu, mmadụ narị abụọ na iri ise nwụrụ; ebe na mgbada ugwu ala anyị ka narị otu na iri atọ nwụrụ n'oge a.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O tinyere na Steeti Zamfara bụzi ebe ndị a lara ndụ ndị mmadụ dị narị abụọ na atọ n'iyi; na Kaduna ka mmadụ otu narị na iri na abụọ nwụrụ, ebe mmadụ iri iteghete bụ ndị e gburu na Steeti Benue.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka o kwuru, ọtụtụ n'ime ọnwụ ahụ dị na mgbago ugwu bụ site na mmekpa ahụ na ọgụ obodo na ibe ya na-alụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ebe o metụtara mmekpa ahụ, mmadụ otu narị na iri asaa na ise nwụrụ site na Jenụwarị were ruo Eprel nke afọ a ebe ọ bụ na Zamfara ka nke a kacha were mee site n'ọnwụ dị otu narị na anọ, Katsina Steeti na-eso ha site na mmadụ iri abụọ na otu ebe Steeti Sokoto bụ mmadụ iri na iteghete.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ebe ndị ntọrị mmadụ nọ, Onyeisi ndị Uweojii kwuru na mmadụ narị ise na iri anọ na isii ma ọ bụ pacenti iri asaa na iteghete n'ala anyị niile na mgbago ugwu ala anyị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwuru na ebe a kacha kpaa arụ a bụ na ọdịda anyanwụ mgbago ugwu ebe mmadụ dị narị atọ na iri isii na ise bụ ndị a tọrọ n'oge a.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'etiti mgbago ugwu, mmadụ dị otu narị na iri anọ na ise ka a tọrọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ dị mkpa ka ekwuo na Steeti Zamfara bụ ebe a kacha were tọrọ mmadụ ebe mmadụ narị abụọ na iri asatọ na otu sit n'aka ọrụ ndị omekome na steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na steeti Kogi, a tọrọ mmadụ dị iri isii na ise ebe mmadụ dị iri ise na otu ka a tọrọ na Steeti Naija.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ebe ndị oji egbe ezu nọ, Adamu kwuru na ezuru ohi ugboro narị abụọ na iri na abụọ gburugburu ala anyị n'ime oge a a na-atụle.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ gakwara n'ihu were kọwa na ohi ndị a bụ nke kachasị na mgbago ugwu site na ịdị otu narị na iri atọ ma ọ bụ pacenti dị iri ise na iteghete.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'etiti mgbago ugwu, izu ohi dị iri asatọ na otu ka ahụrụ ebe ọ bụ na ebe ahụ ka a kacha zuu ohi. Steeti Naija, Isi Obodo Alaanyị na Steeti Zamfara ka ohi ezuru ebe ahụ dị iri atọ na abụọ, iri abụọ na atọ na iri na asatọ dịka ha siri kwụrụ ma bụrụ zie ebe ndị ohi wuru ụlọ ha biri.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye isi ọchịchị obodo Ụkpọr, bụ maazị Emmanuel Nwachukwu mere ka a mara nke a n'okwu ọ gwara ndị nta akụkọ oge ọ na-edugharị ha n'ebe dị iche iche ọrụ na-aga n'ihu n'obodo ahụ n'okpuru atụmatụ Community Choose Your Project bụ amụmà gọvanọ si na ya wee na-enye obodo niile dị na steeti ahụ ego dị nde Naịra iri abụọ iji wee họrọ ma rụọ ihe dị ha mkpa.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O mere ka a mara na nke ahụ gosiri n'ezie na ya bụ gọvanọ ghọtara ihe ezi ọchịchị pụtara, ma ghọtakwa oke mkpa ọ dị inye obodo ohere ka ha were aka ha họrọ ihe kachara dị ha mkpa, bụ nke ọ kọwara dịka ụzọ kachara dị mfe isi kwàlite mmepe zuru òkè. O kwuru na oge ụfọdụ, ihe gọọmenti na-eji aka ya ahọrọ ma na-arụrụ ndị mmadụ anaghị enyecha ha obi ụtọ ma ọ bụ mịtá mkpụrụ a tụrụ anya, maka na, eleghị anya, ọ bụghị ya bụ ihe kachara dị ndị ahụ mkpa n'oge ahụ, nke pụtara na ha agaghị na-ahụtacha ya dịka ihe baara ha úrù, dịka o siri metụta nsogbu ha na-agabiga n'oge ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ihe metụtara iji ego ahụ gọọmenti nyere ya bụ obodo wee rụọ ọrụ, maazị Nwachakwu mere ka a mara na ha jiri agba nke mbụ nke nde Naịra iri abụọ ahụ wee rụọ agadaga ụlọ ahịa abụọ bụgbàdò ụlọ elu na nnukwu ahịa Afọ Ụkpọr, bụkwa nke rụchapụgoro. O kwukwara na agba nke abụọ nke ya bụ ego nke ha ji were arụgasị ọdụ gheere oghe na ya bụ ahịa, dịka ha chọpụtara na ụfọdụ ndị be ha nwere mmasị n'ụdị ọdụ ahịa ahụ karịa nke a na-akpọchisi àkpọchi. Ọ sịkwa na nke ahụ bụ nke ọrụ ga-akụrụ ọnụ na ya oge adịghị anya, n'ihi na nrụcha ya eruola ihe karịrị paseenti iri asatọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O, kwuru na ha na-ebu ụzọ kparịta ụka ma tụkọọ erò ọnụ dịka obodo tupuu ha ekpebie ihe kachara dị ha mkpa ha na-adị eji ego ahụ arụ, ma kwuo na ọ bụ otu ahụ ka ha ga-esikwa mee ya ma ọ bụrụ na ha rụchapụ ọrụ agba nke abụọ a ma natakwa ego maka agba nke atọ, iji hụ na ihe dị iche iche ha na-arụ na-abụ site na mmasị na nkwekọrịta ndị obodo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O tokwazịrị aka na-achị achị bụ Obianọ maka usoro o si ahazi ya bụ ihe na usoro obodo si abịa ewere ego ha, bụ nke o kwuru na ọ dịghị ihe nhịa ahụ ọbụla ha na-agabiga na ya, ma kwekwazie nkwa na ndị Ụkpọr ga-aga n'ihu n'ịdọnyere ya úkwù na inye ọchịchị ya nkwàdo, iji hụ na ọrụ ọma ahụ oji n'aka na steeti ahụ bụ nke ga-aga n'ihu otu o kwèsiri, ma na-amịtakwa mkpụrụ a tụrụ anya, ọbụnadị dịka o kwere nkwà na ha ga-agakwa n'ihu n'ichekwaba ihe niile gọọmenti na-arụnyesi na mpaghara ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ụbọchị dị otu a n'ala Naijiria, ndị ọlụ na-akwado gaa n'ámá egwuregwu na steeti ha dị iche iche ebe ha ga-anọ were mee mmemme a. Ha ga-akwụ na-ahịrị na-ahịrị dịka okpuru ọchịchị me obodo ha siri dị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ime mmemme a, onyeisi ndị ọlụ na steeti ahụ na aka na-achị steeti ahụ ga-agwa ndị ọlụ nọ na steeti ahụ okwu site na ito ha, inye ha ndụmọdụ, tinyere ihe nrita dị iche iche. Ịkụ ngazi n'eze na ọtụtụ ihe ịkpa ọchị na obi añụrị ndị ọzọ dịka egwu na ihe ngosi dị iche iche ga-eso.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na nke afọ a, onye mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ọlụ, Dọkịta Chris Ngige, toro ndị ọrụ maka ihe ndị ha n'etinye na mmepe obodo anyị. Ọ gakwara n'ihu were too ha maka ume ha niile.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ngige, n'okwu ya ụbọchị Tuzdee, sịrị na ọchịchị Muhammadu Buhari na-alụsi ọrụ ike iji were hụ na akwalitere ọnọdụ ndị ọrụ na ọnọdụ akụnụba.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka ọ siri kwuo, A na m egosi obi ụtọ m na ekele m na mmemme nke Ụbọchị Ndị Ọrụ nke Afọ Puku Abụọ na Iri na Iteghete. Isiokwu nke afọ a bụ Narị Afọ ọzọ iji chọọ ọrụ, nkwanyeugwu na iwu obodo na Naijiria sonyere ebumnobi na mbọ Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari na agba iji were kwalite ọnọdụ ndị ọrụ, ma were hafee ezi ọnọdụ akụnụba nke ga-eme nri abụrụzie atụrụ tawa n'obodo anyị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ihe mmemme nke afọ a jiri pụọ iche bụ maka ndakọrịta ọ dakọrịtara ya na mmemme nke otu narị afọ nke otu ndị ọrụ n'ụwa niile, nke Naijiria bụ obodo mbụ ha nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ afọ iri isii gara aga.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka m na-aja ụnụ ike maka ntachiobi ụnụ na ịbụ ndị ọrụ ala anyị na ihe niile ụnụ na-etinye maka mmepe obodo anyị, nke a bụ n'ihi Onyeisiala Naijiria na-akwado ndị ọrụ bụ onye a ga-ebugara ụkpa ekele.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ozi onye bụbu osote onyeisiala n'oge gara aga, Atiku Abubakar na Onyeisi Ụlọomeiwu ala anyị Bukola Saraki, ha tokwara ndị ọrụ maka mbọ ha na ụtụ ha na-atụnye n'ịhụ n'ọrụ mmepe na-aga n'ihu n'obodo anyị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Saraki n'okwu site n'aka onye ndụmọdụ ya pụrụ iche (n'ebe mgbasa ozi dị), Yusuph Olaniyonu, kwuru na ndị ọrụ n'obodo anyị kwesiri otuto maka ịbụ ezi ụmụ afọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwuru, O nweghị obodo ga-emepe ma ewezụga ndị ọrụ ume dị ma werekwa obi ha niile arụ ọrụ. Ọ bụ ihe dị mma ka ekwuo na ndị ọrụ bụ isi ihe ji akụnụba anyị, maka na o nweghị atụmatụ gọọmenti, agbanyeghị otu ọ dị, ga aga n'iru ma ewepu itinye uchu na nrụkọ ọrụ ọnụ nke ndị ọrụ bụ ndị ga-ahụ n'ihe gọọmenti kwuru bụ nke emere.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ebe mụ na ndị ọrụ na ndị isi ha kparịtaragoro ụka, a ga m ekwu n'ejighị egwu na ndị ọrụ obodo anyị bụ ndị kachasị mma na Afrịka.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya, Atiku kwuru na ndị ọrụ ga-ewulite ọnọdụ akụnụba juru eju.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye ahụ zọrọ ọkwa Onyeisiala na ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Peoples Democratic Party na ntụliaka gara aga kwuru, N'afọ ndị a, ọtụtụ otu ndị ọrụ na Naijiria arụọla ọrụ pụrụ iche n'etiti gọọmenti na ndị mmadụ, nke kachasi dị nso bụ na ganịganị ha kpọrọ maka ịkwalite ọnọdụ ụgwọ ọnwa opekatampe ruo puku narị naira iri atọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: A na m ekele otu ndị ọrụ maka ịnweta nke a ma kwenye na site n'ụdị itinye uchu a, ha ga-akwalitekwa ọnọdụ obibi ndị ọrụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ya bụ ile ọnọdụ ahụike n'efu, bụ nke a ga-eme izuụka abụọ, ga-agụnye ile ahụ, ịwa ahụ na inye ọgwụ dị iche iche maka ụdị ọya ọ bụla.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onyeisi Njem Nkwalite Ahụike a, Marnifield Nigeria, na onye na-ahụ maka ọganihu Ọnọdụ Ahụike n'efu nke ndị TEPNG, Dọkịta Akubuike Okara, bụ onye kwuru okwu na mmepe nke nkwalite ahụike ahụ n'efu, emere n'ụlọ ọgwụ izugbe dị na Erema, n'okpuru ọchịchị Ogba/Egbema/Ndoni, Steeti Rivas, kwuru na ụlọọrụ mmanụ ahụ jiri ọnọdụ ahụike ndị ọrụ ha, ezinaụlọ na ndị obodo ha nọ na be ha were kpọrọ mkpa.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwuru, N'ime abalị abụọ nke mmemme a, ndị ọrụ ahụike Marnifield ahụla mmadụ narị asatọ na iri. Ihe dịka mmadụ iri asatọ na isii ahụ adịghị bụ ndị a chọpụtara na a ga-awa ahụ, ebe iri abụọ na otu n'ime bụ ndị awagoro ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị na-ahụ maka anya ahụla mmadụ narị abụọ na iri isii na otu, na ugogbe eji agụ ihe dị narị abụọ na iri na otu bụ nke ekesarala ka e mechara nnyocha n'anya ndị ahụ. Anyị na-atụ anya na tupu mmemme a agwụ, ihe karịrị mmadụ puku ise bụ ndị a ga-ele ahụ site n'aka ndị ọrụ ahụike ụlọọrụ ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ma mbụ, osote onyeisi ụlọọrụ Total Exploration and Production Nigeria Limited, ngalaba Port Harcourt, Maazị François Le-Cocq, kwuru na ọ bụrụla omenala ka ụlọọrụ mmanụ ahụ na-aga n'iru ibu ụzọ n'ịkwalite ọnọdụ ahụike site n'ọtụtụ ọgbakọ dị iche iche.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Le-Cocq tinyere na ụlọọrụ ahụ emela ka obodo ahụ ha nọ na ya rita erere ahụ na obodo ndị gbara ha agbataobi site n'ọtụtụ ọgbakọ igbochi na ịgwọ ọnọdụ ahụike obodo ahụ site na ịgwa ọhaneze maka ibi ezi ndụ ahụike, ezi ụzọ iji zụlite nwa, ịkọwa maka ọrịa o biri àjà ọcha, ezi ọzụzụ nke ndị ọrụ ụlọọgwụ ime obodo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka ụlọọrụ, anyị kwenyere n'okwu ahụ zuru ọha ọnụ nke kwuru na,mmadụ nwere ahụike na-ewulite obodo nwere ego. Nkwenye a mere anyị na-aga n'ihu n'ọrụ njikọ ọnụ a iji were metụ ihe dị ndị mmadụ mkpa ma nyere ha aka igbochi na ịgwọ ụdị ọrịa dị iche iche site n'ịchịkọta ụdị ọgbakọ a na nke gọọmenti n'agbanyeghị aka mgba ha na enweta.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Anyị kwenyere na ọrụ a enyerela ọtụtụ mmadụ na ezinaụlọ aka, bụ ndị na-agaghị enwe ego ọnọdụ ahụike dị mma n'ụlọ ọgwụ nke onwe, karịsịa dịka ụlọ ọgwụ ndị gọọmenti nwere ọtụtụ ihe aka mgba chere ya na steeti anyị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya n'aha ndị ritara erere a, onyeisioche Mmepe Obodo Erema, Maazi Ben Chileke, toro nnukwu ụlọọrụ France ahụ maka iweta ezi ọnọdụ ahụike n'efu n'obodo ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ya bụ ọgbakọ nke onye nnukwu ụkọchukwu, Samuel Ezeofor, nọ n'isi ya, bụ nke were ọnọdụ na Ụlọụka Jemes dị Nsọ dị na Uga, n'okpuru ọchịchị Aguata, Steeti Anambra, site n'abalị iteghete nke ọnwa Mee were ruo n'abalị iri na abụọ nke ọnwa Mee.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ozi ya ka onye nnukwu ahụ gụpụtara ọtụtụ ọrụ nke dayọsis rụrụ ma nke ha ji n'aka, ihe iche aka mgba dị iche iche ha na-enwe bụ nke atụrụ arọ dị iche iche iji were hụ ụzọ a ga-eji dozie ya. Ọ rịọziri ndị otu Kraịst ka ha jisi ike n'ekpere na ị kwenye n'ike nke dị n'aha Jizọs pụrụ ịgbanwe ala anyị na steeti anyị n'agbanyeghị nrụrụaka na mago mago juru na ntụliaka gara aga.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ gara n'ihu kwuo na Onyeisiala na gọvanọ Anambra Steeti kwesịrị ịrịọ ụmụafọ mgbaghara maka ịgbarịpụ ha na ịgbapụta ha azụ site n'ụdị agwa ha kpara tupu na oge a na-eme ntụliaka a.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọtụtụ ihe ndị ọzọ pụtara ìhè n'ọgbakọ a gụnyere ekpere, ịmụ akwụkwọ nsọ, abụ olu ọma dị iche iche, ịkele Chineke, ịchụnta ego maka ọganihu dayọsis, ihe ngosi nke ndị otu Brigade ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwaanyị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nke a bụ nke e mere ka a mara site n'ọnụ onyeisi oche ọchịchị nchere ogè n'okpuru ọchịchị ahụ, bụ maazị Chieloka Okoye, oge ndị òtù ọrụ ahụ gara kpọtụrụ ya n'ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'Ụkpọr, bụ isi obodo okpuru ọchịchị Nnewi South.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya na ya bụ ọgbakọ, maazị Okoye mere ka a mara oke mkpà ọ dị ịhụ na e na-enwe njem siriri wèrèrè n'okporo ụzọ dịgasị iche iche, ya ezi nchekwa nke ndị na-agba n'okporo ụzọ na ndị ha bù n eme njèm, bụ nke o kwuru na a pụrụ ime ka ọ dị ìrè site n'inye ndị na-akwọ ụgbọala ezi nkuzi na ọzụzụ. Ọ kpọkuzịrị ndị òtù ọrụ ahụ ka a gaa n'ihu ịbagide na njem ịkọwaara na ịkụziri ndị na-ànyà ihe ọnyịnya ihe ha kwesiri ịma, iji wee belata ihe mberede okporo ụzọ na ihe ndị ọzọ yiri ya, ma kwekwazie nkwà inye ha nkwàdo n'ozuzu òkè n'imezùpùta nke ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na nzaghachi, onye duru ndị òtù ahụ wee bịa ya bụ njèm, bụ oriakụ Christy Ọbasị kelere maazị Okoye maka nnabata ya nakwa ezi atụmatụ ahụ, ọbụnadị dịka o kwere nkwà ịga n'ihu n'ijikọ aka ọnụ, ya na okpuru ọchịchị ahụ, iji hụ na ya bụ ezi ebumnobi bụ nke pụtara ihè ma mịtakwa mkpụrụ a tụrụ anya. O jikwazịrị ohere ahụ kpọkuo ma dụọ ndị na-akwọ ụgbọala na ihe ọnyịnya ndị ọzọ, ka ha zèéré ịgba oke ọsọ, ibū oke ibū, ịñụ mmanya na-aba n'anya tupu ha akwọba ụgbọala nakwa ihe ndị ọzọ dị iche iche na-ewèta ọka n'ọnụ ọgụgụ ihe mberede okporo ụzọ nakwa ọnwụ ike na-esòchi ya azụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Aka na-achị steeti Anambra, bụ gọvanọ Willie Obianọ mere ka a mara nke a n'Awka na mmemme ibinye aka n'akwụkwọ nkwekọrịta nghọta maka ime nke ahụ, bụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ Redivivus Industries Limited mere. O kwuru na ebumnobi nke ahụ bụ iji hụ na e nwere usoro kacha mma e si ejikwa àtịtị na ya bụ steeti, bụ nke ga-enyekwa aka n'ụzọ pụrụ iche n'ịkwàlite ezi ọnọdụ obibi ndụ ụmụafọ steeti ahụ, ya na ezi ọnọdụ gburugburu b ịgbà.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Gọvanọ Obianọ mekwara ka a mara na a ga-esitekwa na ya bụ ọmarịcha atụmatụ, bụ nke ga-egbu ọnụ ego ruru otu nde Dọlà na ụma otù, wee bàgide n'ịgbanwegharị na imepùtagharị atịtị na ihe ndị megasịrị mmebi ka bụrụzie ihe ga na-amụta ego.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka ya bụ nkwekọrịta e mere siri dị, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, bụ 'Redivivus Industries Limited' gà-ewère paseenti iri asaa na ise n'úrù ego a ga na-enweta site na ya bụ atụmatụ; steeti Anambra ga na-ewe paseenti iri abụọ na abụọ, ebe obodo a nọ na ya were eme ya bụ ihe ga na-ewe pasentị atọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ịkwado ya bụ atụmatụ kpọmkwem, gọvanọ Obianọ bìnyèrè aka n'akwụkwọ nkwekọrịta ahụ n'aha gọọmenti steeti Anambra, ebe onyeisi ụlọ ọrụ 'Redivivus Industries Limited', bụ maazị Emeka Ajekwu bìnyere aka n'aha ụlọ ọrụ ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Kuti gwara ndị ọrụ nta akụkọ na Wednezdee oge o mere nje m nleta n'ụzọ ahụ nke ụlọọrụ, Julius Berger, bụ ndị ji ọrụ okporo ụzọ ahụ iji were hụ na-arụchara ụzọ ahụ ngwa ngwa. Dịka ọ dị, anyị arụchala ihe dịka pacenti iri anọ, ka o kwuru.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwuru na Gọọmenti Etiti amakpụtala ọkpụrụkpụ ego n'akụkụ iji were hụ n'ego ọrụ ahụ agaghị abụ nsogbu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onyeisi ahụ, gosipụtara obi mwute ya gbasara enweghị ndidi nke ndị mmadụ na-aga n'ụzọ ahụ nke ọ kwuru ga-eme ka enwee nsogbu n'ụzọ ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka o siri kwuo, mmechi ụzọ ahụ nke ahụrụ n'okporo ụzọ ahụ n'ime izuụka gara aga, n'ebe kilomita iri na ise nke amara nke ọma dịka Okporo ụzọ MFM bụ n'ihi enweghị ndidi na nnupụisi.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Kuti kwuru, Ebe nke a bụ ebe ndị mmadụ kacha agba ma bụrụkwa ebe ọrụ na-aga ugbua. Anyị ghọtara na ọtụtụ ụmụafọ Naijiria na-aga ọrụ ha na azụmahịa ha mana ihe ànyị na-emegide bụ ka ndị mmadụ hapụ ịnya ụgbọala megide iwu okporo ụzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'agbanyeghị nke a, ebe a bụ ebe ọrụ na-aga n'ihu, ka mmadụ ghara ịgba ọsọ karịa kilomita otu narị na iri abụọ n'otu awa. Ọ bụrụ na ndị mmadụ na-agba nwayọọ ihe dịka kilomita iri ise, a gaghị enwe nsogbu ọ bụla.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onyeisi ụlọọrụ ndị ọrụ okporo ụzọ na Ogun State, Maazi Clement Oladele, kwuru na nnupụisi na arọ eji agba n'okporo ụzọ bụ nnukwu nsogbu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Akpa nri dị narị abụọ bụ nke ha bunyere ndị ekpenta ahụ ebe narị atọ ka ha kesakwara na Dakwa, nọ n'akụkụ Niger Steeti. E nwere ihe karịrị mmadụ narị ise bi n'obodo ndị ekpenta ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onyeisi Qatar Charity, Hamdi Elsayed, kwuru na akpa nri puku atọ bụ nke ha kesagoro na Naijiria, tinyere na otu akpa nri na-ada naira puku iri abụọ. O kwuru na ọlụ enyemaka nke otu ahụ akwụsịghị n'oge ebumọnụ a.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwuru, Anyị nụrụ arịrịọ nke ndị mmadụ bụ ndị nọ na mkpa : ya mere anyị jiri bịa k'anyị lelee ọnọdụ ha. Anyị nọ n'ọnwa ibu ọnụ mana anyị kpebiri Ikeda nri nye ha. Anyị ekesala akpa nri dị otu puku na Sokoto, na Kano, anyị kesara narị asaa. Ebe a, anyị na-enye akpa nri narị abụọ maka ndịbi n'obodo a na narị atọ maka ndị bi n'akụkụ Naija Steeti.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Anyị ga na aga n'ihu n'amụma na Yola n'izuụka na-abịa. Ihe dị na akpa ọ bụla bụ akpa osikapa dị kilogramme iri abụọ na asaa, agwa, spaghetti, mmanụ nri na tomato. Otu n'ime ha ka ọnụ ya bụ naira puku iri abụọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Emmanuel Menegbe, onye nnọchiteanya Onyeisi NOA, Garba Abari, kwuru na ụlọọrụ ahụ wetere enyemaka Mala ndị ahụ chọrọ enyemaka.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Anyị nyere ozi zuru okè na nkwado pụrụ iche iji were hụ na ha ruru ndị mmadụ. Anyị ahụla nkesa ha  na Naijiria, ya mere Naijiria ji ekele ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: DanMallam kwuru na onye nkuzi ahụ, Kelvin Izevbekhai, bụ onye e gburu mgbe ọ chọrọ ị gbapụ dịka akpọrọ ha na-aba n'ime ọhịa.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Akụkọ kọrọ na ndị ahụ ji egbe bụ ndị na-akpa mkpa mkpa n'akụkụ Okada dị n'ogologo ụzọ ahụ si Benin gaa Legọs. A matara na ndị ahụ ji egbe tọrọ Izevbekhai na ndị ọzọ nọ n'ụgbọala dịka ha na-eme njem.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọkwọ ụgbọala ahụ na mmadụ anọ ndị ọzọ bụ ndị nke gbapụrụ n'ime ọhịa mana otu onye n'ime ndị chọrọ ị gbapụ oge ahụ bụ onye agbagburu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị uwe ojii chụrụ ndị ntọ ahụ n'ime ọhịa mana nanị ndị mmadụ ahụ a tọrọla ka ha nwere ike ịchọta.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ sịrị na ndị uwe ojii na-alụsi ọlụ ike n'ụzọ ọhụrụ nke gụnyere iburu agha ahụ bujere ndị ntọ ahụ n'ime ọhịa, tinyekwa na ọ bụ ya bụ ụzọ ka mma iji were memilaa arụ a.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Okwu okwu nke mahadum ahụ, Maazi Jide Ilugbo, onye kwuru na ọ bụ eziokwu kọwara nke a dịka ihe jọgburu onwe ya. Ilugbo kwuru NA Izevbekhai bụ onye ewere mahadum ahụ na afọ 2016 n'ihi ọgụgụ isi ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwuru na ọ bụzi ihe egwu ịga nje m n'ụzọ Benin - Legọs maka ụdịrị mkpa mkpa ndị ohi na ndị ntọ na-akpa arụ n'ụzọ ahụ oge ọ bụla. O kwuru na ọ bụ ihe mwute na ọ danyere n'aka ndị omekome ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ime ụbọchị atọ gara aga, ụmụ akwụkwọ Mahadum Adekunle Ajasin, Akungba Akoko na Mahadum Nkà na Ụzụ Ondo Steeti, Okitipupa, bụ ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe megide ụgwọ akwụkwọ dị oké ọnụ nke gọọmenti steeti ahụ tinyere.
