text: Ọ bụ Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi na ịkụziri ọhaneze ihe ha kwesiri ịma na steeti Anambra, bụ Maazị C-Don Adịnụba nyèrè ya bụ nwa amadi otuto a n'isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'Awka, oge ndị òtù jikọtara ahụ ndị ntorobịa na-ede akwụkwọ n'ala Nigeria, bụ 'Society of Young Nigerian Writers', ngalaba ya nke steeti Anambra gàrà kpọtụrụ ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O mere ka a mara na Achebe, dịka ọkaibe ọ bụ, sitere n'akwụkwọ ya bụ 'Man of The People' wee buo amụma na a ga-enwe nsogbu igbusi mmadụ n'ala Nigeria, ma nwekwa nke abụọ ya ma ọ gachaa obere oge nke mbụ jiri mechaa; ihe ndị ahụ niile wee mezuo n'ahọ 1966 n'ala Nigeria.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O torò ya bụ agụnwoke dịka onye dere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ na-ewu èwù n'ogoogo mba ụwa, nke gụnyere 'Things Fall Apart,' bụ nke o dere oge ọ dị ahọ iri abụọ na isii ma bipụta ya oge ọ dị ahọ iri abụọ na asatọ, tinyere akwụkwọ ya ndị ọzọ, dịka 'Anthills of Savannah,' 'No Longer At Ease,' 'Arrow of God' na ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ o dèrè tupu laa mmụọ, ma kọwazie ya dịka odogwu nwoke steeti Anambra, Ndị Igbo na Ala Nigeria n'izugbe ji eme ọnụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Kọmishọna Adịnụba kwukwazịrị na o kwesiri nnọọ ka a gaa n'ihu ịkwanyere ya bụ nnukwu mmadụ ugwu ruuru ya, ọbụnadị ma ugbu a ọ lagoro mmụọ. Ọ kpọkukwara ma dụọ ndị ntorobịa ahụ na-eto eto ka ha gbadosie anya ike ma soro ezi nzọ-ụkwụ Ọkammụta Achebe dịka ihe nlere anya, dịka ọ bụ nwoke jụrụ ikwe ka e nwee ihe ọbụla jikọọrọ ya na ime mpụ ma ọ bụ ịkwàdo ihe ọjọọ, wee rukwaa n'ọnwụ ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na mbụ n'okwu ya, onye duru ndị ahụ wee bịa ya bụ ije, ma bụrụkwa onyeisi otu jikọtara ndị ntorobịa na-ede akwụkwọ n'ala Nigeria, ngalaba ya nke Anambra, bụ Maazị Izunna Okafor, kwuru na ọbịbịa ahụ ha bịara bụ iji kpọtụrụ ya bụ Komishọna nakwa ụlọ ọrụ ya maka nnukwu mmemme ha na-akwadobe ịchịkọba n'aha Ọkammụta Chinua Achebe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O mere ka a mara na ya bụ mmemme, bụ nke a kpọrọ 'Chinua Achebe Literary Festival' bụ nke ha si na ya wee na-akwanyere Achebe ùgwù, ma sịkwa na ha màlìtere ya n'ime ahọ anọ gara aga, bụ ahọ 2016, oge ha mere agba nke mbụ ya, ọbụnadị dịka o kwuru na nke ahụ amịtala nnọọ ọtụtụ ezi mkpụrụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka ọ na-ekwupụta na isiokwu mmemme omenahọ ahụ nke ahọ a dịka 'Intellectual and National Development: The Chinua Achebe Approach' nke pụtara, ma a sụgharịa ya 'Ndị Gụrụ Akwụkwọ Na Mmepe Obodo: Usoro Nke Chịnua Achebe'; Maazị Izunna gakwara n'ihu kọwaa na ya bụ mmemme nke ahọ a ga-ewerekwa ọnọdụ n'ụbọchị ahụ a mụrụ Achebe, bụ abalị iri na isii nke ọnwa Nọvemba n'ogige ọba akwụkwọ Kenneth Dike dị n'Awka, màlite n'elekere iri nke ụtụtụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ịkpọku gọọmenti steeti ahụ ka o mee aha Ọkammụta Chnụa Achebe ka ọ dị ọkpụtọrọkpụ, tupuu steeti ndị ọzọ eburu ụzọ mee nke ahụ; ya bụ onye ntorobịa nwetagoro ọtụtụ nkwanye ùgwù n'edemede jizịrị òhèrè ahụ wee rịọ Gọvanọ Obianọ ka o gùzobe onye enyemaka ma ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche ga-anọ n'agbata gọọmenti na ndị na-ede akwụkwọ na steeti ahụ, rịọ nkwàdo maka ihe mmemme ahụ, ma kpọkuokwa ọhaneze ka ha bịa were anya ha na ntị ha gbara ekeresimeesi n'ụbọchị mmemme ahụ, bụ nke ọtụtụ ndị dị iche iche na-ede akwụkwọ ga-esonye na ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ha bụ ụmụaka, nke gụnyere ụmụnwoke iteghete na ụmụnwaanyị asaa bụ ndị e tinyere n'otu ụlọakwụkwọ dị n'Awka, ebe ha màlitegoro isonye na mmụta na ihe dị iche iche a na-eme ebe ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya bànyere nke ahụ, Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ihe metụtara ndị nne na ụmụaka, bụ Nwaada Ndịdị Mezue kwùrù na nke ahụ dabàrà adabà n'ezi ebumnobi na mmasị ọchịchị Gọvanọ Willie Obianọ inye ụmụafọ steeti ahụ agụmakwụkwọ, na ịkwàlìtè ọnọdụ mmụta bụ ịgbà na ya bụ steeti.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O mere ka a mara na otu ahụ e siri bidoro ụmụakwụkwọ ahụ agụmakwụkwọ ga-enye aka mee ka ha na ụmụaka ndị ọzọ nà gburugburu ha na-enwe mmekọrịta, mee ka ha mesàpụ ahụ, ma kwàlitezie ọnọdụ mmụta na ọgụgụ isi ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka ọ na-akọwa na ụmụaka ahụ na agụmakwụkwọ ha ga-anọ n'okpurù nlekọta gọọmenti steeti ahụ, Nwaada Mezue gakwara n'ihu kwunwèé ezi njikere ọchịchị nọ ugbu a na ya bụ steeti dị ịkwàlìté ngalaba mmụta, ọnọdụ obibi ndụ ụmụafọ steeti ahụ, nakwa ngalaba niile nke ya bụ steeti, ọbụnadị dịka ọ dụrụ ụmụakwụkwọ ahụ ka ha tinyesie uchu ike n'agụmakwụkwọ ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onyeisi otu egwu bọọlụ ahụ bụ Azubuike Okechukwu na ọgbaniihu Taiwo Awoniyi bụ ndị esoghị otu egwu bọọlụ Naijiria na erubeghị afọ iri abụọ na atọ iji gbapụta isi ha na iko ha buru n'afọ 2015 na mba Senegal, dịka otu egwu bọọlụ ha na mba Yuropu ekweghị ahapụ ha maka asọmpi ahụ. Kama a na-ele anya na mmadụ abụọ ndị a ga-esonyere ndị otu ha tupu ụbọchị Tuzdee ha ga-ezute Zambia.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Naijiria, bụ ndị bu ya bụ Iko a na-azọ, gbara ọnyụpa n'aka mba Cote d'Ivoire ka ejiri otu ọkpụ asataghị chaa were merie ha n'ehihie Saturday. Silas Gnaka nyere ya bụ goolu site na adọba agba penariti na nkeji iri isii na asatọ ngwangwa ndị Naịjirịa fọrọ nanị mmadụ iri dịka Ilisa Ndah nwetara akwụkwọ edo edo nke abụọ ka ọgbatụsiri Youssouf Dao nke ojiri pụọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Naijiria gbara mbọ ka ha sata goolu ahụ mana oge gbanarịrị ha. Ha na-elezi anya imeri asọmpi abụọ fọdụrụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Naijiria ga-ebido asọmpi itozu maka ịsonye na AFCON ga-adị na Cameroon n'afọ 2021 site na ị nabata ndị egwu bọọlụ mba Benin Republic a na-akpọ Uze na Ámá egwuregwu Godswill Akpabio dị na Uyo na Wednezdee. Dịka ha na ndị Benin kwatụsịrị, Ugo ala anyị ga-efepụ gawa Maseru ụbọchị Friday maka asọmpi ha na Aguiyi nke Lesotho na Ámá egwuregwu Maseru-Setsoto ụbọchị ụka.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Naijiria zuru okè n'egwu dịka Ahmed Musa nwere ihe mmerụ ahụ bụ onye dị mma ugbua tinyere ndị na-agba n'azụ - Omeruo, Abdullahi Shehu na Bryan Idowu, tinyere ọgba n'etiti Mikel Agụ. Kalu, bụ onye na-agba na mba France echighatala ka o soghị gbaa asọmpi enyi na enyi nke Naijiria na Brazil.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Daniel Akpeyi bụ onye akpọrọ kamgbe Naijiria gbachara AFCON 2019 na Ijipt, Oche goolu nke mbụ Francis Uzoho bụ onye agaghị eso n'ọtụtụ asọmpi maka ihe mmerụ ahụ o nwere na asọmpi Naijiria na Brazil.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Issa Sy nke Senegal bụ onye CAF wepụtara ga-egbu pịpịrọ na asọmpi ahụ ga-adị n'etiti Naijiria na Benin Republic na Uyo. Nouha Bangoura, El Hadji Abdoul Aziz Gueye na Fatou Thioune bụ ndị ga-enyere ya aka.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O nweghị ihe gbara ọkpụrụkpụ pụtara ihe gbasara nzukọ ha na abụghị nanị onyonyo nke sitere n'ụlọ Onyeisiala pụta.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Anyị ga-amata na Onyeisiala bụ onye nke hapụrụ Naijiria kamgbe mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri abụọ na asatọ nke ọnwa Ọkụtoba dịka o pụrụ nje m ụzọ abụọ. O buru ụzọ gaa Saudi Arabia, ebe ọ nọ maka ọgbakọ nzukọ Future Investment Initiative Forum, ma were site n'ebe ahụ gawa njem nke abụọ nke bụ nke ya onwe ya na mba UK n'abalị abụọ nke ọnwa Nọvemba.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onyeisiala bụ onye a na-atụ anya ma ọ ga-abata na abalị iri na asaa nke ọnwa Nọvemba.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onyeisi na-ahụ maka Mmepe Akụnụba, nke Ụlọakụ ahụ kachasị, Dọkịta Mudashir Olaitan, bụ onye mere ka amata nkea. Ọ gakwara n'ihu were kwuo n'ụlọ akụ ahụ dị njikere ị kwado ndị nwere ezi atụmatụ ọrụ n'ala anyị site na amụma Ego Mmepe maka Ụlọ ọrụ ndị pegasịrị mpe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka o kwupụtara na Naijiria bụ ndị nke otu narị na otu n'etiti otu narị na iri atọ na asaa mba ndị ọzọ na ndepụta mba ụwa maka ụlọ ọrụ, Olaitan kwuziri nkea mere ka agbapụ ya ọsọ bụ mmepe nke ụlọ ọrụ ndị pegasịrị mpe n'ebe ọrụ ugbo dị. O kwụpụtara nkea ụbọchị Satọdee na Lagos nkụzi dị na mmemme nzukọ na ncheta afọ iri atọ na otu nke ndị pụtara na Mahadum Lagos Steeti University na afọ 1988.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Adebisi Adedeji bụ onye nọchitere anya Olaitan na nkụzi ahụ isiokwu ya bụ, Ị kwado Ohere dị Iche Iche Maka Ndị Na-Ebido Ọrụ nke Ha site na Atụmatụ Gọọmenti. O kwuru, Anyị nwere ezi atụmatụ iji were kwado Ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka Ibido Ọrụ onwe, akpọrọ Nigeria Sovereign Investment Authority n'olu bekee, n'ebe ọ gbasara ego maka igote ihe ndị a ga-eji emepụta fetịlaịza NPK. Onye isi oche ọgbakọ ahụ bụ, Musiliu Obanikoro, kwukwa na ọ dị mkpa ka a kụziere ndị na-ebido ọrụ nke ha akwụkwọ nke ọma ije were mee nke ọma.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwuru, Ụlọọrụ ahụ chọpụtara ụlọ ngwaahịa nke dị n'ebe ndị mmadụ bi n'ụzọ Igboamaeze, Awada Obosi, Onitsha, Anambra Steeti, bụ ebe edebere ọgwụ adịgboroja dị iche iche. Katọn ruru otu narị na iteghete nke ọtụtụ ngwa ahịa dịka ọgwụ Lincocin, Artesunate, Augumentin, Panadol Extra, Cafcol 250mg capsules, Busoopan, Laridox, mkpụrụọgwụ Postinor 2, Coartem 20/120, Lofnac (Diclofenac Sodium) na Aldomet bụzi nke ụlọọrụ ahụ kpọchikọrọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Anyi gara n'ihu jidekwa otu nnukwu ụgbọala bu ọgwụ adịgboroja dị iche iche aga Kano. Ngwa ahịa ahụ ruru nde naira isii n'ọnụ ahịa ya. Ụlọọrụ ahụ emebikwala ọtụtụ ọgwụ adịgboroja na ihe ndị eji arụ ọrụ n'ụlọọgwụ nke adịgboroja ijere naira atọ na nde narị abụọ (n'ime afọ abụọ gara aga). Site na nrụkọ ọrụ ọnụ ụlọọrụ ahụ na nke na-ahụ maka ị tụbata ahịa n'ala anyị (Nigeria Customs Service), ha ebidola mmebi ngwaahịa ndị ahụ akpọchiri maka erughị ka achọrọ, ọkachasị Tramadol.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Adeyeye nọrọziri oge ahụ were kpọkue Gọọmenti Etiti ka ha leba anya n'ụgwọ ọnwa nke ndị ọrụ NAFDAC, n'ihi ihe ka n'ọnụ ọgụgụ n'ime ha enweghị ike ịkwụ ụgwọ ụlọ maka ezi ebe obibi na Lagos. O kwuru na otu nwa nwaanyị nke otu onye onye ọrụ ụlọọrụ ahụ bụ onye ndị ahụ ụlọọrụ NAFDAC mebiri ngwaahịa adịgborija ha tọrọ; mana ọ bụ onye e mechara hapụ. Ọ rịọkwara ka ewulite ọnọdụ ego ịkwado ọrụ ụlọọrụ ahụ ka ha were nwee ike rụọ ọrụ ka o siri kwesi ma zọpụtakwa ndụ site n'ịchụ ọgwụ na akọrọngwa adịgboroja ọsọ ụkwụ eru ala n'ala anyị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'agbanyeghị na Patson Daka bu ụzọ nye goolu na nkeji iri na abụọ, mana Orji Okonkwo sara ya bụ goolu na nkeji iri na isii.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Kelechi Nwakali mezuru goolu ahụ abụọ site na adoba abụọ, free kick, dị egwu na nkeji iri isii na ise; ebe Taiwo Awoniyi jiri goolu nke atọ were mechie okwu dịka oge na-akụzi kwarapụ kwarapụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mmeri a meziri Naijiria jiri bụrụ ndị nke abụọ dịka ha si kwụrụ n'ogogo otu B site n'akara atọ ha nwere ugbua, ma wulite mmụọ ha n'olile anya ịnweta akwụkwọ Olympics afọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: South Africa bụ ndị nke mbụ ugbua site na akara anọ dịka ha na ndị Zambia gbachara onye laba onye laba na iji otu ọkpụ asataghị otu merie Ivory Coast.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị egwu bọọlụ Naijiria na-erubeghị afọ iri abụọ na atọ ka e meriri na asọmpi mbụ ha na ndị Ivory Coast sọrọ na Satọdee.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nwaada Ebhomielen Ofure Mary sitere na ngalaba sayensị ìgwè computa mere ihe ịtụnanaya site n'iji akara 7.0 CPGA pụta na mahadum ahụ. N'okwu ya, ọ rịọrọ ndị otu ya ka ha gosi ume ha ebe ọ bụla ha hụrụ onwe ya, sị n'ụwa ejighị onye ọ bụla ụgwọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onyeisi mahadum ahụ, Ọkammụta Idowu Olayinka, nọrọ ogige ezumezu International Conference Center nke ya bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ, were kwuo n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na-eme mmemme ahụ na ezi mmepe o wetara.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya, Ụmụ akwụkwọ dị narị abụọ na iri anọ na otu (241) n'ọgụgụ jiri kụlasị mbụ were pụta. Ngalaba sayensị nwere ụmụ akwụkwọ kacha dị iri anọ na isii (46), ebe ngalaba ọrụ ugbo na ọhịa na ngalaba nkà na ụzụ nwere mmadụ iri atọ na asatọ (38) na iri abụọ na asaa (27). Ị kọwa ka ụmụ akwụkwọ siri mee gosiri na pacenti 3.38 na pacenti 27.61 nke ụmụ akwụkwọ ndị gụchara jiri kụlasị mbụ na kụlasị abụọ (ogogo nke mbụ) were pụta.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka ọ na-anata ya bụ nturuugo, Eghegha ka ozi kwuru na ọ sịrị na ọ bụ nnukwu ihe ọñụ ịmata na Ikuku Udo bụ ndị e tụnyere ugo dịka ụlọọrụ ọkaibe nke afọ a. Obi jupụtara m n'ọñụ, na ndị ọrụ niile nke Ikuku Udo, ịmata na Ikuku Udo, Ụgbọelu njem kachasị na Ọdịda Anyanwụ Africa, bụ nke etunyere ugo ụbọchị taa dịka ụgbọelu njem nke tụnyere nnukwu ụtụ n'otito Ụlọọrụ Njem Elu Naijiria.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Eghegha tinyere na ụgbọelu njem ahụ ga-aga n'ihu n'ịchake site n'ịhụ na ha nyere ndị njem ha ezi nchekwa na njem elu kachasị. Ọ gara n'ihu were kwuo n'afọ ise nke ụgbọelu njem nwere ọtụtụ ihe aka mgba maka kwuo na site na njikọ aka ọnụ na ịhụ ụzọ nke ndị isi mere ụgbọelu ahụ jiri enweta ọtụtụ mmeri.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nturuugo a, bụ nke Ụlọọrụ Mgbasa Ozi Akwụkwọ dị na Lagos chịkọbara, bụ nke onyeisi oche mmemme ahụ, bụ Ọkammụta Anya O. Anya tunyere, site na enyemaka Chief Marc Wabara na Oriaku Priscilla Oti.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya na mmemme ahụ, onyeisi NLN, bụ Ọkammụta Lenrie O. Aịna kwụrụ na ya bụ atụmatụ nkwalite agụmakwụkwọ bụ nke weere ọnọdụ na steeti niile dị n'ala Nigeria, ma sịkwa na ebumnobi ya bụ ime ka ọhaneze ghọta mkpà ịgụ akwụkwọ dị, ya na ikesàrà ụmụ mmadụ ihe dị iche iche e ji akwàlite mmụta, site na njikọ aka nke òtù dị iche iche nakwa ndị ọzọ e ji okwu ha agba ìzù.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka ọ na-akọwa na atụmatụ ahụ nke ahọ a wèèrè ọnọdụ n'ụfọdụ obodo mepetụrụ emepe n'ala Nigeria; Ọkammụta Aịna, nke ọ bụ osote ya, bụ Oriakụ Gloria Okeagụ nọchitere anya ya na mmemme ahụ, kwùrù na ánaghị agụ akwụkwọ oge niile na-eme ka mmadụ bụrụ ìtì bọrịbọ ma nọrọkwa n'ọnọdụ ihe ízè ndụ na onye ụwa na-atụ n'ọnụ, ọbụnadị dịka ọ dụzịrị ndị ahụ bịara ya bụ mmemme ka ha malite ụbọchị ahụ gụsibe akwụkwọ ike ma werekwa mmụta kpọrọ ihe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na mbụ n'okwu ya, onyeisi ngalaba ọba akwụkwọ ala Nigeria dị n'Enugu, bụ Oriakụ Neboh Rachael Ify kwùrù na e guzobere ya bụ atụmatụ iji kwalite mmụta n'ogoogo ndụ mmadụ ọbụla, n'agbànyèghị ahọ ole onye dị, ọkwa onye ji maọbụ ihe onye na-arụ; ma kwuo na nke ahụ na-enyekwa aka n'ụzọ pụrụ iche ime ka mmadụ pụọ n'ọnọdụ ihe ízè ndụ, ndaghachi azụ, ụbịam, ụbụrụ mkpọchi nakwa ihe ndị ọzọ dị otu ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka ọ na-akọrọ ha akụkọ ọgbụgba ama ihe ịgụsi akwụkwọ ike mègòrò na ndụ ya, onyeisi ọba akwụkwọ steeti Anambra, bụ Dọkịta Nkechi Udeze gwàrà ndị bịara mmemme ahụ, nke ọ ka n'ọnụ ọgụgụ n'ime ha bụ ndị okenye, ka ha gharakwa ikwe ka ihe ọbụla mee ha ka ha kwụsị ịgụ akwụkwọ maọbụ hụtaba ịgụ akwụkwọ dịka ihe dịịrị naanị ụmakwụkwọ, ụmụaka na ndị ntorobịa. O mere ka a mara na ịgụ akwụkwọ bụ ihe dịịrị onye ọbụla, n'ihi ọtụtụ urù nke ahụ na-eweta, n'agbanyeghị ahọ ole onye dị; ma chètàkwara ha na ọ bụ ụbọchị mmadụ kwụsịrị ịgụ akwụkwọ ka ụbụrụ na-amàlitere ịkpọchi.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na nzaghachi na ozi ekele ya, eze ọdịnala Ebenebe, bụ Igwe Chris E. Nnaegbuna (JP) kèlèrè ndị ahụ maka iburu ya bụ oke mmemme nke ahọ a wee bịa obodo ahụ, ma kelekwa aka na-achị steeti Anambra, bụ Gọvanọ Obianọ maka ezi agbambọ ya n'ịkwàlìtè ezi ọnọdụ mmụta na steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ kpọkùzịkwàrà ndị bịara ya bụ mmemme nakwa ọhaneze ka ha were nkuzi dị iche iche e neyere na ya bụ ọgbakọ wee kpọrọ ihe, site n'ịmalitezị ugbua gụba akwụkwọ oge ọbụla, iji wee rite úrù so ya, ma sikwa n'ụzọ dị otu ahụ gbanahị ọghọm dị iche iche dị na mmadụ agụghị akwụkwọ were apụta.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị ọzọ kwuru okwu na mmemme ahụ gụnyèrè Onowu Ebenebe, bụ Maazị Joe Nwegwu, nakwa onyeisi ọchịchị obodo ahụ, bụ Maazị Paul Nnatụ, nke ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ, bụ Maazị Charles Onyebụchi nọchitere anya ya, tinyere ndị ọzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: A nọrọ na ya bụ mmemme wee gbaa egwu ọdịnala dị iche iche, mee ihe ngosi, ma gbapekwa obere igbé ọba akwụkwọ ọhụụ, bụ nke akwụkwọ ọgụgụ dị iche iche jupụtàrà n'ime ya, ma bụrụkwa nke e nyefèrè ndị Ebenebe site n'aka ọba akwụkwọ ala Nigeria.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Isiokwu mmemme ọgbakọ nkwàlite agụmakwụkwọ nke ahọ a bụ (ma a tụgharịa ya) Agụmakwụkwọ: Akụrụngwa Ịkwàlite Ndị O Nweghị Ka Ọ Hà Ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya na mmemme ahụ, Gọvanọ Obianọ kewèrè nkwà na ọchịchị ya ga-aga n'ihu ịtụpụta na ịbàgide n'ọmarịcha atụmatụ dị iche iche ga-akwàlite ezi ọnọdụ obibi ndụ Ndị Anambra, nakwa agamnihu nke mmepe steeti ahụ n'izugbe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Gọvanọ Obianọ, nke onye nọchitere anya ya bụ osote ya, bụ Dọkịta Nkem Okeke kpọkuru ụmụafọ steeti ahụ nọgasị n'ebe dị iche iche ka ha gaa n'ihu inye ọchịchị nọ ugbua na steeti ahụ nkwàdo iji kwụdosie ike n'ezi ọrụ dị iche iche o ji n'aka, bụ nke o kwùrù na mpụta ihe ya emetụtala ngalaba niile nke steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka ọ na-echètara ha na ọ bụ akụ ruo ụlọ, a mara onye kpara ya, aka na-achị achị bụ Obianọ jikwara ohere ahụ wee dụọ ndị ahụ nà ndị Anambra bigasị n'ebe ndị ọzọ dị iche iche ka ha welataruo àkụ ha ụlọ, site n'iwunye akụnụba ha, ụlọ mmepụta ngwọ ahịa, ụlọ ọrụ, nakwa ihe mwunye ndị ọzọ dị iche iche n'ime steeti Anambra, iji kwalite ọnọdụ akpa ego nà mmepe steeti ahụ, ma kewàpụtakwara ụmụnne ha bụ ndị ntorobịa Anambra ohère ọrụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O mekwara ka ha mara na steeti ahụ bụzịkwa steeti kachara wee nwee ezi nchekwa na ezi ọnọdụ dị làrịị maka iwunye akụnụba n'ala Nigeria gbaa gburugburu, ọbụnadị dịka ọ tòkwàzịrị ha maka ịchịkọba ya bụ oke ihe mmemme, bụ nke o kwuru na ọ ga-enye aka ịkwàlitè omenala Igbo ma mekwa ka ụmụaka steeti Anambra bi n'ebe ahụ mara omenala ebe ha sì.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na mbụ n'okwu ya, onyeisi òtù ASTPA, bụ Maazị Ezennia Iwenofu mere ka a mara mmemme ahụ bụ nke a màlitere n'ahọ 2003, ma bụrụkwa nke a na-eme kwà ahọ abụọ ọbụla, ọbụnadị dịka ọ kọwara ya dịka mmemme ha sì na ya were akwàlite ịma mma nke ọnatarachi, njirimara, na omenala Ndị Igbo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: A nọrọ na ya bụ mmemme, nke isiokwu ya n'ahọ a bụ Igwè Bụ Ike wee gbaa egwu ọdịnala ma mekwa ọtụtụ ihe ngosi dị iche iche e jiri mara ndị Igbo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mmemme ịgbape atụmatụ ahụ bụ nke weere ọnọdụ n'Ajalị bụ isi obodo okpuru ọchịchị Orumba North, ma bụrụkwa nke dọtara ndị ji ọkwa ọchịchị, ndị nnọchi anya òtù ahụ, nakwa ụmụafọ obodo ndị ahụ ya bụ nsogbu oke ala na-adapụta n'etiti ha; ma ndị Anambra, ma ndị Enugu. Okpuru ọchịchị ndị ahụ ya bụ nsogbu oke ala metụtàra gụnyèrè 'Awka North' na 'Orumba North' nke steeti Anambra, na Eziagu na 'Oji-river' nke steeti Enugu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya na mmemme ahụ, onye jigodi ọkwa dịka onyeisi ụlọ ọrụ NBC, bụ Maazị Adamu Adaji mere ka a mara mkpebi na ezi njikere ya bụ ụlọ ọrụ dị iwèta nsogbu ókè ala ahụ n'isi njedobe na n'ụzọ nwa mmụọ emegbula nwa mmadụ, ma nwa mmadụ emegbula nwa mmụọ, ọbụnadị dịka ọ kpọkùrù steeti abụọ ahụ ka ha jikọọ aka ọnụ iji mee ka nke ahụ mịta ezi mkpụrụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ dụkwàzịrị ndị ịkpa oke ala ahụ dị n'aka ka ha were ọgụgụ isi na ọzụzụ e nyere ha wee rụọ ọrụ ahụ nke ọma na otu o kwèsiri, iji mee ka e wèta ọnọdụ udo ga-adị ọkpụtọrọkpụ n'etiti obodo ndị ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na ntụnye nke ya, osote aka na-achị steeti Anambra, bụ Dọkịta Nkem Okeke chetààrà ndị ahụ bịara ya bụ njem udo na steeeti Anambra na Enugu bụ nwanne, ma kọwaa mkpà ọ dị na ha bụ steeti na ndị nke ahụ metụtàrà jikọrọ aka ọnụ ma nabàta mkpebi na ọrụ ndị òtù ahụ n'obi ọcha, ọbụnadị dịka ọ dụkwàrà ha ka ha were eziokwu na ikpe nkwụmọtọ wee bàgide na ya bụ ọrụ, n'ihi na ihe nke ụwa bụ naanị nwa mgbe ntà ka ọ na-adị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Osote aka na-achị steeti Enugu, bụ Oriakụ Cecelia Ezeilo kọrọ akụkọ ntọala bànyere otu steeti abụọ ahụ siri bụrụ ótù, wee ruo mgbe e kewàrà ha n'ahọ 1991 iji mee ka gọọmenti dị ụmụ mmadụ nso, ma rịọkwazie ndị ahụ ka ha ghara ikwe ka ọ bụrụ nsogbu ókè àla ga-etisà ha abụọ maọbụ mebie ịdịnotu ha dịbara kemgbe okike ụwa.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na nzaghachi ha n'ótù n'ótù, onyeisioche nchere oge n'okpuru ọchịchị 'Orumba North' bụ Maazị Obinna Ikwueto, na ògbò ya nke Oji River, bụ Maazị Harrison Okeke, kèlèrè gọọmenti etiti maka nzọpụ ụkwụ ya n'iwèta nsogbu ahụ n'isi njedobe, ma kwekwazie nkwà na ha ga-ejikọ aka ọnụ, ime ka ya bụ nrọ bụrụ nke pụtara ìhè.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ dị ncheta na ụlọ ọrụ NBC ekpeela ikpe bànyere nsogbu ókè àlà ahụ nke mbụ n'ahọ 1999, kpee ya nke abụọ n'ahọ 2015, kpee ya nke atọ n'ọnwa Septemba ahọ 2018, ma kpekwazie ya nke ikpeazụ n'ọnwa Juunu ahọ a, bụ ebe a nọrọ wee kpebie na-aga abàgide n'ọrụ mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri atọ, nke obodo ndị ya bụ ihe metụtara gà-esònye na ya, iji wee kpaa oke ala ahụ n'udo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya na mmemme ahụ, bụ nke weere ọnọdụ n'Ụmụnze, bụ isi obodo okpuru ọchịchị ahụ; onyeisioche òtù ahụ na steeti Anambea, bụ Maazị Damain Okeke-Ogene mere ka a mara na onye Igbo ọbụla, site n'ọmụmụ ya, bụ onye otù Ọhaneze Ndị Igbo, ma kpọkuzie Ndị Igbo ka ha na-akwàdo ma na-esonyesi ike n'atụmatụ, mmemme, na ihe dị iche iche òtù ahụ na-abàgide, n'ihi na ọ bụ ya bụ otu kachasị elu jikọtara Ndị Igbo ọnụ n'ụwa gbaa gbùrugburu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwàrà arịrị maka ọtụtụ òtù dị iche iche na-esèlitesi isi ugbua n'aha Ndị Igbo, bụ nke ebumnobi ha dịgasị iche iche, ma kwuo na nke ahụ so n'ótù ihe na-echere Ndị Igbo aka mgba n'inweta ihe na-achọ na ihe ruuru ha n'ala Nigeria.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ gazịrị n'ihu kpọkuo òtù ndọrọ-ndọrọ ọchịchị dị iche iche na steeti ahụ ka ha rube isi nyegara otu ahụ e si ebugharị ọkwa Gọvanọ n'ọgbọ nta nkwàdo atọ e nwere na steeti ahụ, n'ihi úrù dị iche iche nke ahụ ga-ewèta, ọ kachasị n'ịkwàlite ezi ọchịchị na usoro ime nwata ka e mèrè ibe ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu nke ya oge ọ na-anabàta ndị ahụ n'isi ụlọ ọrụ ya, onyeisi oche nchere ogè okpuru ọchịchị 'Orumba South' bụ Ọkaiwu Raymond Onyegu kpokùrù Ndị Igbo ka ha ghọta na òtù ahụ bụ isi otu jikọrọ ha niile ọnụ, ọbụnadị dịka ọ kpọkùrù ndị nne na nna ka ha na-akụnye njirimara, omenala na mkpụrụ ọma ndị Igbo n'ime ụmụaka ha, malite n'ogè ha dị na nwata.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na nzaghachi na n'ozi ekele ya n'aha ndị òtù ahụ e guzòbèrè ọhụụ na ya bụ okpuru ọchịchị, onyeisioche ya, bụ Maazị Gilbert Olumba kwèrè nkwà iji obi ga niile, ogè ha na ọgụgụ isi ha wee jeere ụmụafọ Igbo na ala Nigeria ozi dịka o siri kwesi, ọbụnadị dịka o mekwara ka a mara na ya bụ òrù chọrọ ụgbọala, isi ụlọ ọrụ, nakwa ego, iji wee bàgide ma rụọ ọrụ nke ọma.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mmemme ịgbape atụmatụ ahụ bụ nke weere ọnọdụ na mpaghara Upper Iweka dị n'Ọnịtsha, ma bụrụkwa nke isiokwu ya bụ Road Safety Is a State Of Mind, Road Traffic Crash Is An Absence Of Mind, Stay Alert, Stay Alive nke pụtara Iji Awele Bụ Ịdị Úchuú, Ihe Mberede Okporo Ụzọ bụ Mkpafù Uchè; Mụrụ Anya, Dịkwa Ndụ
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ya bụ nnukwu mmemme dọtàra ndị òtù ọrụ nchekwa dị iche iche, tinyere aka na-achị steeti Anambra, bụ Gọvanọ Willie Obianọ, nke onye nọchitere anya ya bụ osote ya Dọkịta Nkem Okeke.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na mbụ n'ozi nnọọ ya, onyeisi ụlọ ọrụ FRSC na steeti Anambra, bụ Maazị Andrew Kumapayị kwuru na ọ bụ ihe doro anya na oge ọnwa mba na-abụkarị oge ọnụ ọgụgụ ihe mberede okporo ụzọ jì abawanya ụba, nakwa mgbe a gbakata a kwụrụ na-adịkarị n'okporo ụzọ dị iche iche, n'ihi mmemme na ọtụtụ njem na-ewere ọnọdụ oge ahụ; bụzị nke mere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ jiri gbapee ya bụ atụmatụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na ntụnye nke ya n'ebe ahụ, onyeisi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'ala Nigeria, bụ Maazị Boboye FRSC kwuùru na ya bụ ụlọ ọrụ ga-anwụchikọ ma kpọchie mmọnwụ ọbụla ga-ewèta ihe mberede okporo ụzọ maọbụ a agbakata akwụrụ (n'ụdị ọbụla) n'ogè ekeresimeesi a.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Maazị Oyeyemi, nke ọ bụ osote onyeisi na-elekọta mpaghara nke ise, na Benin, bụ Maazị Keyinde Adeleye nọchitère anya ya, mèrè ka a mara na nnyocha e mègòrò na-egosi na mmọnwụ ewètela ọtụtụ ihe mberede n'okporo ụzọ dị iche iche n'ime ahọ ole na ole gara aga, ma kwuo na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ agaghị anabàtazị ụdị ihe ahụ ọzọ malitezie ugbua gaba, n'agbanyeghị na ha bụkwa ụlọ ọrụ na-asọpụrụ ma na-àkwàlite omenala na ọdịbendị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O jikwàzịrị ohèrè ahụ dụọ ndị na-akwọ ụgbọala aka na ntị ka ha ghara ịgba ọnwụ-ọnwụ maọbụ wère anya mmanya wee na-akwọ ụgbọala, n'ihi na onye ọbụla e jidere na nke ahụ ga-eji anya ya wee hụ ntị ya n'ejighị ènyò.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: A nọrọ na mmemme ahụ wee gbaa egwu ọdịnala dị iche iche, mee ihe ngosi, ma bụkwazie abụ site n'aka ndị otu ahọ efe àlà nna ha na steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onyeisi Ngalaba Ọrụ Ugbo na Mmepe Ime Obodo nke Gọọmenti Etiti, Mustapha Shehuri, kwupụtara atụmatụ gọọmenti nkea iji wee mmadụ puku iri asaa na ise n'ọrụ na Maiduguri, Borno Steeti, oge o mere njem nleta akọrọngwa nke Ngalaba Gọọmenti Etiti na-ahụ maka Ọrụ Ugbo na Mmepe Ime Obodo n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ mgbago ugwu ala anyị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Shehuri kwuru na ngalaba gọọmenti etiti ahụ dị njikere ịnye ụsa gbasara ọtụtụ ihe ichere aka mgba dịrị ọrụ ugbo dịka ike ọ natara n'aka onyeisiala si dị. O gara n'ihu kwuo na-agbanyeghị ọtụtụ ihe ndaghachi azụ n'ebe nchekwa dị, oge dị mma na-echighata azụ nwayọọ, na ugbu a, ọrụ ugbo enyela ụmụ afọ na-eto eto Naijiria karịrị pacenti iri isii ọrụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'agbanyeghị na ọgbanihu Stéphane Sessègnon mepere inye goolu na nkeji ise, ọgbanihu ndị Lille, Victor Osimhen, sara goolu ahụ site na-adoba agbaa penariti dịka agba nke mbụ na abịa na njedebe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka ebidosịrị agba nke abụọ, ọgbanihu nke otu egwu bọọlụ Bordeaux Samuel Kalu, gara n'ihu were nye Naijiria mmeri na nkeji iri isii na atọ dịka goolu ya nwetara akara atọ niile Naijiria chọrọ n'asọmpi otu L ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ugo Naijiria ga-aga n'ihu na asọmpi maka it ozu ịsonye AFCON 2021 ụbọchị ụka oge ha na mba Lesotho ga-ezute n'amaegwuregwu Setsoto dị na Maseru.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Naijiria bụzi ndị mbụ ugbua n'otu L site na akara atọ dịka mba Sierra Leone na Lesotho gbara onwe ha otu ọkpụ, otu ọkpụ na Freetown. Kwame Quee na-agba bọọlụ na mba Iceland nyere goolu ndị Sierra Leone n'amaegwuregwu mmadụ anọghị na nkeji iri isii na iteghete.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onyeisi otu egwu bọọlụ mba Lesotho bụ onye nke a chụpụrụ ka o nwetachara akwụkwọ edo edo nke abụọ na nkeji iri asatọ na atọ, ebe George Kweke Davies nwetara akwụkwọ ọbara ọbara maka ịlụghachi ọgụ. Ndị ọbịa ahụ gbalisiri ike nweta otu akara na nkeji nke atọ oge etinyere etinye site n'aka Thobanston Jane.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'asọmpi ndị ọzọ, Guinea Bissau jiri ọkpụ atọ asataghị otu merie Eswatini na otu I, mba Rịpọbụliki Etiti Afrika meriri Burundi site n'inye ha ọkpụ abụọ asataghị otu, ebe Malawi zọrọ isi onwe ya ma merie mba South Africa site na inye ha otu ọkpụ. N'ebe nke ọzọ, Cameroon na Cape Verde gbara onwe ha onye laba onye laba n'otu F, ebe Namibia gosiri Chad ike ha site n'iji ọkpụ abụọ asatara otu were merie ha n'otu A.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwuru na nchọpụta ha chọpụtara ebe ahụ akọrọ ọgwụ ike hemp bụ ihe ịtụzi aka n'ọtụtụ ndị na-akọ ọrụ ugbo na steeti ahụ bụ ọgwụ ike hemp ka ha na-akọ. Onyeisi ahụ kwuru na ụlọọrụ ahụ anwụchiela mmadụ ise dịka o siri gbatakwụrụ a na-enyo enyo n'aka ha dị na ubi ahụ, tinyere na nchọpụta ka na-aga n'ihu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Igwenagu kwuru na ụlọọrụ ahụ abụghị nanị imebi ubi akọrọ ọgwụ ike Indian hemp ka ọ na-arụ, kama ha dịkwa njikere imemila ire ya bụ ọgwụ ike na ịkwụsị ụzọ dị iche iche na-ekwesịghị ekwesị esi eji ya bụ ọgwụ ike n'ebe o pekarịsịrị mpe. Ọ kpọkuru ndị isi obodo dị iche iche ka ha ghara inye ala ha maka ịkọ ụdịrị ihe a amachiri amachi.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị nwe ala ahụ esighị na obodo ahụ, mana ọ bụ onyeisi obodo ahụ bụ ihe nyere ha ikike ịkọ ihe na ya bụ ala. Ọ bụrụ na ndị obodo ajụ ịnye ụdị mmadụ a ala ha, ha agaghị enweta ala ebe ha ga-akọ ọgwụ ike ọzọ, nke ga-eme ka ha hapụ izu ahịa na-adịghị mma, dịka okwu ya siri dị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onyeisi NDLEA ahụ rịọziri ọhaneze steeti ahụ ka ha gaa metụrụ ụlọọrụ ahụ oge ọ bụla ha chọpụtara na ubi a na-akọ ọgwụ ike Indian hemp na ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ụbọchị Naijiria chọrọ nanị otu goolu iji were gosi Amaglugglug nkarị, were nweta ohere n'agba anọ ikpeazụ, n'agbanyeghị mpụtara asọmpi nke ọzọ dị n'etiti Ivory Coast na Zambia, Ugo Olympic dara akwụkwọ elelere ha dịka ha enweghị ike were ohere niile ha nwetara n'asọmpi ahụ nye otu goolu ahụ na-ese okwu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mpụtara asọmpi ahụ gosiri na ha ji akara anọ were bụrụ ndị nke atọ n'otu B, na-eso Ivory Coast bụ ndị ji akara isii na Saụt Afrịka nwere akara ise, nke mere ha ji pụọ n'iso zọọ ohere maka ịsonye na egwuregwu Olympic ụmụ nwoke n'afọ na-abịa na Tokyo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka o mere n'afọ 2011, Ugo Naijiria erubeghị afọ iri abụọ na atọ bụ ndị pụrụ n'asọmpi a n'agba nke mbụ, dịka emerichara ha n'asọmpi nke mbụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nke a sonyere ọdịda ndị otu egwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwaanyị Naijiria dara dịka ha enweghị ike ị nweta akwụkwọ Olympic nke ha na nke otu egwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwoke na-erughị afọ iri na asaa na Brazil dịka ha pụrụ na agba nke iri na isii n'aka mba Netherlands.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka ọ na-ekwu okwu maka ọdịda ahụ, Onyeisi Otu Egwu Bọọlụ Naijiria, Amaju Pinnick, kwuru n'ọdịda nke Ugo Olympic bịara ka ihe ịtụnanya. Site na nrụkọ ọrụ Ngalaba Gọọmenti Etiti na-ahụ maka Egwuregwu, anyị nyere otu egwu bọọlụ ahụ ihe niile ha chọrọ iji mee nke ọma. Erughị agba nke na-eso nke ikpeazụ ma tozukwa ịsonye na Olympics bụ ihe akpataoyi, dịka ọ dị n'okwu ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Anyị ga-echeta n'afọ atọ gara aga, egwuregwu bọọlụ nwetara nanị ihe olu Olympics Naijiria jiri were lata na Brazil. Echiche anyị bụ na otu egwu bọọlụ a ga-etozu maka Tokyo, gaa ebe ahụ ma tunye anyị ugo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị isi NECO gara n'ihu chụọ mmadụ ndị a, dịka o siri dị n'ozi ha wepụtara site n'aka onyeisi Mgbasa Ozi na Mmekọrịta Ọhaneze ụlọọrụ ahụ, Azeez Sani, n'ụbọchị Fraịdee, ka ha natachara ozi maka nnyochaa asambodo nke otu kọmitii na-ahazi ihe nyochara. Kọmitii ahụ kpọrọ ndị ahụ o metụtara were gbaa ha ajụjụ ọnụ gbasara asambodo ha ji arụ ọrụ. Ụfọdụ n'ime ha kwupụtara n'asambodo ha bụ nke adịgboroja.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụlọọrụ ahụ kwuru na ọchụchụ ahụ bụ nke mbụ ọtụtụ nnyocha nke asambodo na-aga n'ihu n'ụlọọrụ ahụ. Dịka ọ dị n'ozi ha, kọmitii ahụ kpọtụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị ahụ ndị ọrụ ji asambodo ha nke mere ka kporokpoto gbaa n'ihu ehi maka ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị a gọnarịrị ha na ha amaghị ndị ha bụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Sani kwuru, Ndị isi ụlọọrụ ahụ nyochara nchọpụta ahụ nke ọma tupu ha ebinye aka ka a chụọ ndị ọrụ ndị ahụ o metụtara.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mmeri nke Lyon bụ ihe pụrụ iche dịka otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọzọ na-achụpụ PDP n'ọkwá gọvanọ steeti ahụ kamgbe Naijiria chighara azụ n'ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya n'afọ 1999. Onye na-akpọ mpụtara ntụliaka na steeti ahụ, Ọkammụta Faraday Orumwense, kwuru na Lyon nwetara ntụliaka dị puku narị atọ na iri ise na abụọ, narị ise na iri ise na abụọ (352,552) were merie Diri, onye nwetara ntụliaka dị puku otu narị na iri anọ na atọ, otu narị na iri asaa na abụọ (143,172).
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Lyon nwetara mmeri na okpuru ọchịchị ime obodo isii n'ime asatọ dịka ụlọọrụ ntụliaka dị n'aka n'ala ànyị, INEC, sịrị kpọpụta na Ụlọ Mgbasa ozi Ọkammụta Mahmood Yakubu dị na Yenagoa, isi obodo steeti ahụ. Okpuru ọchịchị ime obodo ahụ gụnyere Brass, Nembe, Ogbia, Southern Ijaw, Ekeremor na Yenagoa, ebe PDP meriri na okpuru ọchịchị Sagbama na Kolokuma/Opokuma.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka Lyon na otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị APC nke Bayelsa na-enwe añụrị, otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị APC na Kogi steeti na onye zọrọ ha ọkwa gọvanọ, Gọvanọ Yahaya Bello, ga-echere elekere iri nke ụtụtụ ụbọchị taa maka ịkpọpụta mpụtara ikpeazụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nke a bụ maka INEC bugharịrị mkpọpụta mpụtara ntụliaka nke gọvanọ ahụ were ruo ụbọchị Mọndee. Onye mkpọpụta mpụtara ntụliaka ahụ na steeti Kogi, Ọkammụta Ibrahim Umar, kwuru na ọ dị mkpa ka ebugharịa ya maka INEC ka na-eche mpụtara ntụliaka sitere na okpuru ọchịchị Ibaji na Lokoja ebe nke Dekina nwere obere ihe mgbagwoju anya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mana tupu ebugharịa mkpọpụta ahụ, ụlọọrụ ntụliaka dị n'aka akpọpụtala mpụtara okpuru ọchịchị ime obodo iri na asatọ n'ime iri abụọ na otu. N'ime iri na asatọ ahụ akpọrọla, Bello na-emeri na okpuru ọchịchị ime obodo iri ebe onye na-esote ya, Musa Wada nke PDP, nwetara mmeri na okpuru ọchịchị ime asatọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Masoabi Nkoto buru ụzọ jee chọọ okwu oge o nyere goolu mbụ nke ndị Lesotho na nkeji iri na otu. Nke a kpọtere Ugo Naijiria n'ụra ha jiri were iwe kụziwere Lesotho egwu ọkpa. Oche goolu mba Lesotho chere adọba agbaa William Ekong site na yadi iri abụọ na anọ tupu Alex Iwobi asaa goolu ndị Lesotho buru nye na nkeji iri abụọ na isii.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na nkeji iri atọ na isii, Chukwueze maliri elu n'etiti ọgba n'azụ abụọ ndi dịka Ugo were isi manye goolu abụọ nke ndị Naịjirịa site na bọọlụ nke Osimhen gbara ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'agba nke abụọ, Osimhen nyere goolu nke atọ na nkeji nke iri asaa na anọ dịka ọgba n'azụ Ola Aina gbara ya bọọlụ na nkeji nke iri asaa na anọ. Dịka ike ka na-arụ ha afọ, Ahmed Musa, onyeisi otu egwu bọọlụ Naijiria gbafuru ezigbo ohere Victor Osimhen nyere ya na nkeji nke iri asatọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nwaamadị na-agbara ndị Lille nke France n'ihu mezuru goolu Naijiria anọ site na ọmarịcha bọọlụ Ramon Azeez ewebatara ewebata gbara ya nke o jiri gbaka netị na nkeji iri asatọ na anọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Chidozie Awaziem nyere goolu onwe mere ya bụ asọmpi jiri bie na ọkpụ goolu anọ asatara nanị abụọ ebe mmiri Agụiyi Lesotho riri ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Site na mmeri a, bụ nke abụọ na Ntozu Iko Mba Afrịka, Naijiria enwetala aka isii na goolu isii mere ha jiri bụrụ ndị nke mbụ na otu L, site na asọmpi abụọ ha gbara.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụlọọrụ ahụ ntụliaka dị n'aka sị na ọ ka na-eche mpụtara nke si okpuru ọchịchị ime obodo Lokoja na Ibaji, tinyere nke Dekina nwere ihe mgbagwoju anya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka a kpọpụtachara mpụtara ntụliaka n'isi ụlọọrụ INEC na Lokoja ụbọchị Mọndee, onye mkpọpụta, Ọkammụta Ibrahim Umar, kwuru na Bello nwetara ntụliaka dị puku narị anọ na isii na narị abụọ na iri abụọ na abụọ (406,222) were merie onye na-esote ya bụ Musa Wada, bụ onye nwetara ntụliaka dị puku otu narị na iri asatọ na iteghete na narị asaa na anọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Umar kwuru, Bello, ebe o nwetara ntụliaka kachasị bụ onye meriri na ntụliaka ahụ were bụrụ onye akpọ gbachiri. Bello nwetara mmeri na okpuru ọchịchị ime obodo iri na abụọ n'ime iri abụọ na otu nke gụnyere Lokoja, Ibaji, Adavi, Okehi, Okene, Kabba Bunu, Ogori Magongo, Koton Karfi, Mopa Muro, Ajaokuta na Olamaboro. L Mana dịka akpọpụtachara mpụtara ahụ, onye nnọchiteanya PDP ekweghị etinye akara ya na mpụtara ahụ INEC kpọpụtara. Otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ahụ nọrọ ụbọchị ụka wepụ onwe ha n'ihe mpụtara sitere Awada, nke ọ sịrị na ndị agboro APC wakporo ndị mmadụ bịara ibinye aka n'akwụkwọ, na ọtụtụ ihe ọgbaghara mere na steeti ahụ gbaa gburugburu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Fadahunsi nọrọ oge a na-eme mgbagha na arọ ahụ Sinatọ Chukwuka Utazi tụpụtara na mkpa ọ dị ịhụ na Naijiria memilara nsogbu ọkụ latiriki, rịọrọ Ụlọ Omeiwu ka ha machie ịtụbata ìgwè na-enye ọkụ latiriki maka afọ ise mana ndị otu ya ekweteghị n'ihe o kwuru were mechie atụmatụ ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị Sinatọ ndị ọzọ jụwapụrụ isi na atụmatụ ahụ nke ha gosiri oge Onyeisi Ụlọ Omeiwu ahụ, Ahmed Lawan, chọrọ ịmata uche ndị Ụlọ Omeiwu site n'ịnụ olu ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụlọ Omeiwu ahụ, kama ịmachi ibubata ìgwè na-enye ọkụ latiriki, kpọkuru Kọmitii na-ahụ maka Ọkụ ka o mee nnyocha maka ọrụ ndị ụlọọrụ na-enye ọkụ n'ala gbaa gburugburu iji were chọpụta ihe iche aka mgba na nsogbu nke mere na ọkụ anaghị adị oge ọ bụla n'ala ànyị bụ Naijiria.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya oge ọ na-enye ndị ahụ ya bụ akwụkwọ ndọrọ ego, aka na-achị achị bụ Gọvanọ Willie Obianọ mere ka a mara na ọ bụ gọọmenti steeti ahụ wepụtara ya bụ ego ka e kesàára ndị ahụ, na-agbanyeghị ụka onye na-aga, otu ndọrọ-ndọrọ onye nọ na ya, maọbụ àgbụrụ onye sì.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwuru na ebumnobi nke ahụ bụ iji nyere ndị ahụ aka ịmalitekwa ndụ ha ọzọ, dịka ọkụ gbarikọchara ebe ha na-azụ ahịa, ngwọahịa ha nakwa ihe ha nwère n'ọdụ ahịa ahụ. O kwekwazịrị nkwà na gọọmenti na-agbasi mbọ ike ịhụ na ụdị ọdachi dị otu ahụ adapụtaghị ọzọ na ya bụ ahịa maọbụ na mpaghara ebe ọbụla na steeti ahụ, site n'ọtụtụ atụmatụ dị iche iche e tinyegoro n'ọrụ ugbua banyere nke ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ dị ncheta na ka ọnwa Ọktoba dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri na isi, nnukwu ajọ ọkụ ọgbụgba dabìdòrò ahịa Ọchanja dị n'Ọnịtsha wee gbaa ya bụ ahịa pịataa, merụọ ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ ahụ, ma wètakwa ọnwụ mmadụ isii, nke gụnyere otu nwaanyị na nwa ya. Ndị ya bụ ajọ ọnọdụ metụrara karịrị narị asaa n'ọnụ ọgụgụ, ebe ọdụ ahịa o metụtara dị otu narị na iri asaa na isii.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị ga-eri ndị ahụ nwụrụ anwụ ékpé ka e nyègasịrị otu nde naịra, ma nye mmadụ abụọ gbajiri ụkwụ narị puku naịra ise n'otu n'otu, kwụkwazie ụgwọ e jiri nye ha ọgwụgwọ n'ụlọ ọgwụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'akụkọ dịkwa ka ibè ya, Gọvanọ Obianọ gàkwàzịrị akwamozu nwaanyị ahụ na nwa ya ọkụ ahụ gbàgbùrù otu ụbọchị ahụ, bụ ndị a kààrà ụka akwamozu n'ụlọụka 'Joseph's Catholic Church' dị n'Awka Etiti' Ya bụ nwaanyị, bụ Oriakụ Ifeọma Obi, ka e kwùrù na ọ gbàrà ahọ iri atọ na anọ, ebe nwa ya nwoke ahụ dị naanị ọnwa asatọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwuchukwu ya na ya bụ mmemme, Ọzilarị Bishọọpụ nke ụka Katọliiki na Dayọsiisi Ọnịtsha, bụ Bishọọpụ Dennis Isizọ chetaara ndị mmadụ na onye ọbụla bụ ọbịa n'ụwa, ma dụkwazie ha ka ha were nkenke ogè ha nwèrè n'ụwa wee jeere Chineke na mmadụ ozi ma chọọkwa alaeze eligwe, n'ihi na ụwa bụ naanị nwa mgbe ntà ka ọ na-adị. O kpekwazịrị ka mkpụrụ obi ya bụ nwaanyị na nwa ya nwoke zuo ike na ndokwa.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nke a bụ nke pụtara ìhè ọzọ na nso-nso a, dịka ndị uwe ojii steeti ahụ nwụchikọrọ mmadụ anọ a na-enyo ènyò na ha bụ ndị ohi, ndị na-atọrọ mmadụ nakwa ndị na-akwasò nwaanyị iko n'ike.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nke a bụ nke e mere ka ụwa mara site n'ozi a kụpụrụ nso-nso a site n'aka onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta ọhaneze na ndị uwe ojii na steeti ahụ, bụ Maazị Harụna Mọhammed, n'aha onyeisi ndị uwe ojii na ya bụ steeti, bụ Maazị John Abang.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka ya bụ ozi siri kọwaa, ndị òtù ọrụ ahụ pụrụ iche ná-ebu agha megide ohi, bụ 'Special Anti Robbery Squad (SARS)' nwụchikọrọ otu Maazị Collins Ọkpala gbara ahọ iri abụọ na ise; Maazị Chịmụanya Nwachukwu gbara ahọ iri abụọ, Maazị Kenechukwu Anyasị gbara ahọ iri abụọ na atọ, tinyere Maazị Pascal Ogbuagụ gbara ahọ iri abụọ na abụọ n'Ọzụbụlụ dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Ekwusigo nke steeti Anambra.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị omekoome atọ a ka e kwùrù na ha dakpòro otu nwa agbọghọ gbara ahọ iri abụọ na ótù, pụnara ya ihe niile o ji, ma rie ya 'ọkọmbọ' n'ike.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị ahụ ka e kwùrù na ha serekwàrà ònyòyóò ebe nwata nwaanyị ahụ gbà ọtọ oge ahụ ha na-amazụrị ya, ma gwa ya na ọ ga-akwụ ha otu nde nàrị ma, e meghị ma ya, ha agbaa ya bụ onyoonyoo n'anwụ wee mebie aha ya. Otu ọ dị, ndị a, bụ ajọ nkịta ji isi anya ọkụ kwètàra n'eziokwu sị na ha mèrè ya bụ ihe; ma, ndị uwe ojii anapụtakwala ha onyonyoo ahụ, ebe ha bụzịkwa ndị a ga-akpụpụ ụlọ ikpe oge adịghị anya, ka e were usoro iwu wee gwọọ ha ji mmanụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onyeisi ndị uwe ojii, bụ Maazị John Abang kwere nkwà na ndị uwe ojii steeti ga-aga n'ihu ịhụ na e nwere ezi ọnọdụ nchekwa na steeti ahụ, ọ kachasị n'oge mmemme ekeresimeesi a.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O tokwazịrị aka na-achị steeti ahụ, bụ Gọvanọ Obianọ maka nkwàdo ya nye ndị ọrụ nchekwa na steeti ahụ, ma kpọkuziekwa ọhaneze ka ha na-enye ndị ọrụ ncheka ozi banyere ije maọbụ onye ọbụla a na-enyo ènyò na mpaghara ha, iji nyere ha aka n'ọrụ ha, n'ihi na ha bụ ndị ọrụ nchekwa agaghị abụ ọnọ n'ụlọ mara ihe zụrụ n'ahịa maọbụ ọnọ na ndò ahụ ọnwa, nke na ha ga-amacha maọbụ hụchaa ihe niile.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ dị ncheta na ya bụ àkwà ngafè, nke ọtụtụ ụkwụ na-aga na ya kwa ụbọchị, bụ nke otu nnukwu ụgbọala suru n'ime ọnwa gara, we sugọọ ya, nke mezịrị ka ọ bụrụ ọnyà ọnwụ nyere si na ya agafe ụzọ awara awara ahụ, bụ nke mekawazịrị ka gọọmenti steeti ahụ mechigodi ya ma dozigharịa ya, iji gbanahị ihe égwù, ihe ọdachi maọbụ ihe mberede.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka ọ na-agbapegharị ya bụ àkwà, Gọvanọ Willie Obianọ mere ka a mara na ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ ngo Julius Berger ka e nyèrè ya bụ ọrụ, iji rụọ ya n'ogoogo dị elu, maka oke mpà ya bụ àkwà dị nyere ndụ mmadụ, ọbụnadị dịka o nyèkwàzịrị ndị na-aga na ya bụ àkwà owuwe anya na ọ nọrọla n'ezi ọnọdụ siri ike ma dịkwa mma ụkwụ ịga ya ugbu a.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Gọvanọ, onye ọ bụ ya na ụfọdụ ndị isi ọchịchị steeti ahụ sòro wee gaa ya bụ njèm, nyekwazịrị ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-ahụ maka njem awele na steeti ahụ ka ha nwụchie ma onye ọkwọ ụgbọala ọbụla bufèrè ibu ókè na mpaghara ụzọ ọbụla na steeti ahụ n'ihi na ihe dị otu ahụ só ewèta àlà adịghị mma n'okporo ụzọ dị iche iche steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'akụkụ nkè ya Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ọrụ na steeti ahụ, bụ Maazị Marcel Ifejiọfọr kọwara na ya bụ àkwà nke ogoogo ya site n'elu ala rùrù mità ise na ụma ise, nwètara ezigbo mmerụ ahụ oge ahụ ụgbọala ahụ sùrù ya, nke na nọmìrì n'ihe ruru sentimità iri atọ, bụzị nke mere e jiri mechie ma rụgharịa ya, ka ọ nọrọkwa n'egwu ọzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ kpọkuzịkwàrà ma dọọ ndị na-akwọ ụgbọala aka na ntị, ka ha zèéré ibu oke ibu, iji gbanahị imebisi okporo ụzọ ma ọ bụ iwèta ihe mberede, ọ kachasị ugbu a oge mmemme ekeresimeesi na-akpụdòbe nso.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ya bụ òkù bụ nke a kpọrọ dịka isi ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka gburugburù na steeti ahụ, bagidèrè na amụmà inye nkuzi na ibu agha megide ịga mposi aghara aghara, bụ ozi nke ha bùru wee gagharịa n'ọtụtụ mpaghara ebe dị iche iche na steeti ahụ. Ndị dị iche iche sonyere na ya bụ atụmatụ nkuzi gụnyèrè ndị sitere ụlọ ọrụ ihe bànyere mkpocha na nzàcha dị n'aka na steeti ahụ, bụ ndị a maara dịka 'Anambra State Waste Management Agency (ASWAMA)'; ndị sitere ụlọ ọrụ ọrụ 'Operation Clean and Healthy Anambra' a màara dịka Ọcha Brigade; ndị ji otu ahọ efe àlà nna ha, tinyere ọtụtụ òtù ọrụ ndị ọzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya bànyere nke ahụ, nnukwu onye enyemaka pụrụ ichè nye Gọvanọ n'ihe gbasaara ijikwa àtịtị, bụ oriakụ Florence Ọraedum, kọwara na isi sekpụ ntị n'amụmà inye nkuzi ahụ bụ ime ka ndị Anambra mara bànyere ọtụtụ ihe egwù dị iche iche dị n'ịga mposi aghara aghara na ebe ekwesighị ekwesi, ọbụnadị dịka ọ kpọkùrù ha ka ha sonyesie ike n'ezi ebumnobi nke ọchịchị nọ ugbu a na steeti ahụ ime Anambra ka ọ bụrụ eji ama àtụ nakwa steeti kachasị adị ọcha n'ala Nigeria.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na ntụnye nke ha n'ótù n'ótù, nnukwu onye enyemaka pụrụ ichè nyere Gọvanọ n'ihe gbasaara gburugburu, ịchọ gburugburu mma nakwa ọnọdụ ihu eligwe, bụ Oriakụ Chinwe Anịemena, na onye enyemaka pụrụ iche nye Gọvanọ n'ihe gbasaara gburugburu, bụ Maazị Francis Ịgwah kọwara atụmatụ ahụ dịka nke magburu onwe ya, ma kpọkùo Ndị Anambra ka ha sonyesie ike n'atụmatụ 'Dobe Anambra Ọcha', dụọkwa ha ka ha kwụsị ịga mposi n'ebe ezighị ezi n'ihi ihe so ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Otu onye solitere n'ọkwa n'isi ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka gburugburu, bụ Oriakụ Ngọzị Anyaragbu kelere ndị dị iche iche sonyere na ya bụ amụmà nkuzi, ma kwezie nkwà na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ga-aga n'ihu n'ịgbasawànye ya bụ ozi. Ọ màkwàzịrị ọkwà na onye ọbụla e jidere ebe ọ na-arụ arụrụ nsị ka a ga-akpụpụ ụlọ ikpe ma were usoro iwu nyụchaa ha anya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụbọchị ịga mposi na mba ụwa, bụ ụbọchị pụrụ iche òtù mba ụwa weputàrà iji merùbe ịga mposi, ma lebakwaa anya n'ihe dị iche iche metụtara ịga mposi dịka ọ dị na mba ụwà, ya na otu a ga esi mee ka ọ kawanye mma. Ọ dị nchèta na nnyocha ndị WHO mèrè n'ahọ a na-egosi na mmadụ karịrị ijeri anọ na mba ụwà bì na gburugburu ruru unyi, ebe mmadụ karịrị narị ndè isii na puku iri asaa na atọ ka na-arụ arụrụ nsị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Isiokwu mmemme ụbọchị ebe aa na-aga mposi nke ahọ a bụ Leaving No One Behind nke pụtara, ma a tụgharị ya, N'agbahàpụghị Onye Ọbụla.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Mmemme ibunye ya bụ ụlọ ọrụ akụrụngwa ahụ bụ nke e mere nso-nso a, ma bụrụkwa nke weere ọnọdụ n'obi gọọmenti dị n'Awka bụ isi obodo steeti ahụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya oge ọ na-enyefè ihe bdị ahụ n'aka ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, osote aka na-achị steeti Anambra, bụ Dọkịta Nkem Okeke mere ka a mara na ebumnobi gọọmenti jiri bunyekwuo ụlọ ọrụ ahụ akụrụngwa ọhụrụ ahụ bụ iji kwàlite ọrụ ha nakwa iji kwalitekwuo usoro ikpofù ahịhịa na adịmọcha na gburugburu nke steeti ahụ n'izugbe.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka ọ na-eto ha banyere ezi ọrụ ha na steeti ahụ, ọ nọkwàzịrị n'oge ahụ kpọkuo ma dụọ ụmụafọ steeti Anambra ka ha were adịmọcha kpọrọ ihe ma zèéré ikpofù unyi maọbụ ahịhịa aghara-aghara nà n'ebe adịghị mma, n'ihi na nke ahụ na-emetọ ma na-emebìsi gburugburù, tinyekwuoro na ọ ewèta mgbasàwanye nke ọrịa na efe èfè ajọ ọnọdụ ahụike, nakwa ajọ ọdachi ndị ọzọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na nzaghàchi oge ọ na-anabàta akụrụngwa ndị ahụ, onyeisi ụlọ ọrụ ASWAMA, bụ Maazị Amaechi Akaọra kwupụtàrà na nke ahụ ga-akwàlitekwu ma nyekwara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ aka n'ọrụ mkpocha nà nzacha ya n'ebe ọ pụrụ ichè, n'ihi na o meela ka ọnụ ọgụgụ akụrụngwa na ụgbọala ha ji arụ ọrụ bawanyekwuo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O jikwàzịrị ohère ahụ rịọ Ndị Anambra ka ha nye aka na ya bụ mbọ a na-agba ịkwàdo ọrụ adịmọcha na steeti ahụ, site n'ịdị na-atụ ụtụ mkpocha na nzàcha ha ogè na otu o kwèsìrì, ya na ịdị na-erubere iwu na-echekwa gburugburu isi oge niile, n'ihi na onye ọbụla nupùrù isi wee nye nke ahụ ka a ga-anwụchikọ ma taa yq ahụhụ dịka ọ dị n'usoro iwu.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nkea bụ nchọpụta dị egwu iji hụ na ndị chọrọ ọgwụ ahụ maka igbochie na ịgwọ ya bụ ọrịa nwetara ya, ma zọta ndụ ha, dịka Dọkịta Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, bụ Onyeisi WHO kwuru. Afọ ise gara aga, anyị nọ n'aka Chukwu n'ebe ọrịa ahụ dị maka enweghị ọgwụ dị ma ọ bụ nke mgbochi. Mana dịka nkwado na ọtụtụ nyochaa gara, Ebola bụ ọrịa enwere ike igbochi ma gwọkwaa.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọgwụ Ebola ahụ hụ nke a na-agba agba, Ervebo, bụ nke Merck, amara dịka MSD na mba ndị ọzọ abụghị US na Canada, rụpụtara. Ngalaba WHO Ndụmọdụ dị n'aka egosila na ya bụ ọgwụ na-egbochi ndị mmadụ n'ebe nje Ebola ahụ bụ Zaire dị, ma bụrụ nke ọ kwadoro maka iji chụọ ọrịa Ebola ọsọ ụkwụ eru ala.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Anyị ga-echeta na n'afọ 2014, ya bụ ọrịa kpara ajọ ike n'ala anyị bụ Naijiria na ọtụtụ mba ndị ọzọ, nke mere onye ọ bụla ụra aga n'anya, mee nwa na-ézé nne ya, enyi na-agbara enyi ya ọsọ. Nke a bụ oge otu nwoke si mba Liberia were buru ọrịa ahụ bata Naijiria. Ụfọdụ ndị mmadụ nwụrụ maka ọrịa ahụ nke gụnyere otu dọkịta nwaanyị na Abuja.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ dụrụ ndị omeiwu etiti ala anyị ka ha kwanyere otu ụmụ Naijiria si ahụ ya bụ iwu ugwu. O nwebeghị oge m nụrụ na gọọmenti pụtara kwuo na ọ kwadoro ọnwụ maka okwu ịkpọ asị. E kwenyere m na Ụlọ Omeiwu ga-ezukọ iji nụ uche ụmụ Naijiria n'iwu ahụ, ka ewere soro ụzọ iwu kwadoro maka ime iwu, ka ewere nweta uche ụmụ Naijiria ọ bụghị nanị nke ndị gọvanọ n'ebe iwu ahụ dị. Ha kwesịrị ịsọpụrụ uche ụmụ Naijiria n'ụzọ ọ bụla iwu ọhụrụ ahụ na-aga tupu etinye ya n'iwu ala anyị ma ọ bụ kachapụ ya, ka Tambuwal kwuru.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Kamgbe Iwu gbasara okwu ịkpọ asị ahụ pụtara, ụmụ Naijiria bụzi ndị na-agụ okwu ọnụ tupu ha ekwuo karịsịa n'ebe o metụtara ọchịchị ala anyị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Aka na-achị Anambra Steeti, Willie Obiano, nọrọ ụbọchị Wednezdee wee were nde otu narị naira were tie ndị ahụ ọkụ ahụ metụtara aka n'obi. Ọtụtụ ndị gwara ha okwu rịọrọ ha ka ghara ile anya n'ego enyere ya maka o nweghị ole pere mpe ma ọ bụ buo ibu iji kwụghachi ihe ha gbara ọkụ. A gbara ha ume ka ha tinye okwukwe ha n'ebe Chineke nọ bụ onye nanị ya pụrụ ị kasị ha obi.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya, Odeakwụkwọ Kọmitii Gọvanọ maka Ọkụ Ochanja, bụkwa onyeisi Ụlọọrụ Ọsọ Enyemaka Anambra Steeti, Maazi CY Agupugo, gwara gọvanọ na kọmitii ahụ tinyere anya na mmiri were nyochaa ma zute ndị niile ọkụ ahụ metụtara were nweta mmadụ narị isii na iri isii na atọ. O kwuru na ọkụ ahụ gburu mmadụ isii ebe ọtụtụ ndị bụ ndị nọ n'ụlọ ọgwụ enweta ọgwụgwọ. O kelere aka na-achị steeti ahụ maka imezu nkwa ya ikwado ụlọọrụ na-emenyu ọkụ n'ahịa ahụ site n'inye ha ngwa ọrụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'otu aka ahụ, onyeisi ndị na-azụ ahịa, Ojukwu kelere gọvanọ ahụ maka enyemaka ya tupu Ekeresimesi eruo dịka o kwere ná nkwa. Ọ rụtụkwara aka ná Ngalaba Steeti ahụ na-ahụ maka ọrụ na-eleta ọrụ ụzọ bara n'ahịa ahụ na nkwa ya na ụzọ niile banyere ahịa ahụ bụ nke ga-adị mma.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya, gọvanọ nọrọ oge ahụ were gosi nwute ya nye ndị ahụ ọkụ ahụ metụtara. Na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri na isii, afọ 2019, nnukwu ọdachi dachibidoro anyị. Nnukwu ọkụ wakporo anyị were gbuo mmadụ isii na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ nọ n'ụlọ ọgwụ. Anyị akwụọla ụgwọ ụlọ ọgwụ ndị nọ n'ụlọ ọgwụ. Maka mmadụ isii nwụrụ anwụ, anyị ga-enye ezinaụlọ ha ego gbara ọkpụrụkpụ. Mana n'ehihie, a ga m enye ihe karịrị nde otu narị naira. Ọ dị mkpa k'anyị mata n'etiti mmadụ narị isii na iri isii na atọ n'ime ụnụ, anyị anaghị akpa oké ọ bụla. N'agbanyeghị steeti gị ma ọ bụ agbụrụ gị, ọ bụrụ na ngwaahịa gị so ná nke ọkụ gbara, ị ga-enweta ego nke gị, Obiano kwuru.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Gọvanọ ahụ gakwara n'ihu were kwuo na o nweghị ego ole buru ibu iji wepụ nwute nke ihe ọkụ ahụ gbara mana ihe gọọmenti mere bụ iti ha aka n'obi ma si ha ka ha tinye olileanya ha na Chineke maka ọ bụ nanị ya pụrụ iwepu nwute ha kpam kpam. Gọvanọ ahụ kwukwara na ndị niile nwetara mmerụ ahụ ga-enweta narị naira puku ise n'isi onye ọ bụla na-etinyeghị ụgwọ ụlọ ọgwụ ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ị ga-echeta na Gọvanọ Obiano nọrọ n'oge ụtụtụ soro ná nkwanye ùgwù ikpeazụ nke Oriaku Deborah Obi, bụ nwaanyị ọkụ gbara ya na nwa ya nwoke ebe ọ rịọrọ Chineke ka o nye mkpụrụobi ha ezumike na ndụ ebighị ebi.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'akụkụ nke ọzọ, ndị Ụkọchukwu ụka catholic bụkwa ndị zutere ndị ahụ ọkụ ahụ metụtakwara. Ha jiri ego karịrị nde naira iri abụọ na ise were kpere ndị ahụ ekpere ma kpokue Olisa ka ọ kasie ha ndị niile nke ahụ metụrụ obi. Mmadụ ndị ozi dịka aka chiburu Anambra Steeti n'oge mbụ, Maazi Pita Obi, Sinatọ Ifeanyi Ụba, nwa afọ Anambra na-eme ihe onyonyo, Zubby Michael, bụkwa ndị soro tie ndị ahụ aka n'obi.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nwata akwụkwọ nke si Ụlọakwụkwọ APT Scholars Universal College, Ota, Oluwatobi Ojo, gbara onye nke mbụ n'aha Ogun site n'ịnweta aka iri asatọ, ebe Mbazu Justice sitere Ụlọakwụkwọ Sekọndịrị CSMT Staff, Abakiliki dị na Ebonyi Steeti, gbara onye nke abụọ site n'akara iri asaa na ụma o nwere. Nwachukwu Ugochukwu si Ụlọakwụkwọ Dority International, Aba, Abia State, gbaziri onye nke atọ site n'akara iri asaa.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onyeisi Ụlọọrụ NNPC, Malam Mele Kyari, kwuru na ụlọọrụ ahụ ga-aga n'ihu ịtụnye ụtụ nke nke ha n'ebe mmepe na ọganihu nke ngalaba akwụkwọ, iji were hụ na Naijiria dị ukwu. Ọ gbakwụnyere na asọmpi a bụ otu n'ime ụzọ ụlọọrụ ahụ si agba mbụ ị kwado iwulite obodo anyị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ịwulite obodo na-aga n'ihu gụnyere ịchọpụta na ịhazi akara aka. Dịka ụlọọrụ, anyị na-agba mbọ ịchọpụta ndị a oge ha dị na nwata ma nyere ha aka iwulite ya nke ọma, ka o kwuru.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka ọ dị, onyeisi otu Dangote, Alhaji Aliko Dangote, rịọrọ ụmụ akwụkwọ ahụ ka ha tinye ume ha niile n'ihe ọ bụla ha na-eme na ndụ a dịka ndị ndu nke echi. O gara n'ihu kelee NNPC n'atụmatụ ha tinyere na ọ ga-enye aka iwulite ọtụtụ ndị sayensị n'ala anyị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka ọ na-ekwu n'aha ndị niile sonyere na asọmpi ahụ, Ojo kelere ụlọọrụ NNPC maka atụmatụ a ma kelekwaa ndị nkụzi ya na nne na nna ya maka nkwado ha. Anam ekele NNPC maka ohere a na atụmatụ dịka nkea. Asọmpi a emela kam gụsie akwụkwọ ike. Obi bụ m sọ añụrị na abụ m onye meriri na asọmpi. A ba-ekelekwa ndị nkụzi, nne na nna m na ndị chịkọbara ya. N'ihi asọmpi a, obi kara m aka na-aga m eme nke ọma n'ule m niile.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ụlọọrụ ahụ, na ngụpụta ya, kwuru na asọmpi ahụ bidoro na ime obodo nke okpuru ọchịchị ime obodo narị asaa na iri asaa na anọ enwere n'ala ànyị, ebe mmadụ atọ kacha mma gara n'ogogo steeti.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ogogo steeti, onye kachasị mee nke ọma bụ onye gara na ngalaba akụkụ ala anyị, ebe onye meriri n'ogogo a bụ onye nwetara ego maka agụmakwụkwụ dị otu narị puku naira, ka o kwuru.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O gakwara n'ihu were kwuo na steeti dị na ngalaba akụkụ ala anyị dị iche zutere n'oge dị iche were sọkọrịta mpi n'etiti onwe ha iji were mata mmadụ atọ kacha mma ga-anọchite anya ha n'agba nke ikpeazụ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye meriri ritara ịgụ akwụkwọ n'efu ruo mahadum nke ọnụ ego ya bụ puku narị naira atọ kwa afọ akwụkwọ ọ bụla, ebe onye nke abụọ na nke atọ ritara puku narị naira abụọ na iri ise na puku narị naira abụọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Steeti iri na asatọ sonyere n'agba nke ikpeazụ ebe steeti atọ nọchitere anya ngalaba ọchịchị akụkụ ọ bụla n'ala ànyị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị egwu bọọlụ ndia akpọrọ soronyere Ugo Ukwu Naijiria na asọmpi Iko Mba Afrịka nke afọ 2019 agbara na Ijipt n'ime afọ a. Ugo Naijiria nwetara ọla nchara oge ha jiri otu ọkpụ asataghị chaa merie mba Tunisia n'amaegwuregwu Al-Salam, dị na Cairo. N'ihi ụdị egwu ọkpa ha gbara, ha nwere ike idebanye aha na ncheta AFCON dịka ọ dị ugbua.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye na-agba n'ihu nke otu egwu bọọlụ Shanghai Shenhua bụ Ighalo kwụpụtara iche na Ijipt n'ihi na ọ jighị anya ahụ ebe ọnụ goolu dị mere o ji agbanye goolu elu na ala. Nkea nyere ya nturu ugo dịka onye kachasị nye goolu na asọmpi Iko mba Afrịka nke afọ a site na goolu ise o nyere nke ritara ya akpụkpọ ụkwụ ọlaedo tupu ọ kwụsị ịgba bọọlụ n'obodo Naijiria.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Onye ọzọ na-agbakwara Leicester n'etiti, Ndidi, bụ akpọọ a zaa oge ọ bụla otu egwu bọọlụ ya na mba ofesi na Naijiria kpọkuru ya ebe ọ na-eme ihe ike. Ọgba n'etiti ndị Everton, Alex Iwobi na oche goolu ndị AC Omonia Uzoho bụ ndị sonyere Ugo Naijiria na Ijipt nwere olileanya na ha ga-esonye na mmadụ iri na otu ikpeazụ. Mmadụ iri na otu kacha agba CAF bụ ndị a ga-akpọpụta na mmemme n'abalị asaa nke ọnwa Jenụwarị, 2020.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Aha Ndị Niile Ahọpụtara
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị Oche Goolu: Moez Ben Cherifia , Yassine Bonnou, Mohamed El Shenaway, Sylvain Gbohouo, Rais M ’ bolhi, Edouard Mendy , Richard Ofori , Andre Onana , Denis Onyango , Francis Uzoho
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị Na-agba N'azụ: Youcef Atal, Serge Aurier, Mehdi Benatia , Ahmed El - Mohammadi, Lamine Gassama, Faouzi Ghoulam, Achraf Hakimi, Ahmed Hegazi, Kalidou Koulibaly , Christian Luyindama , Issa Mandi, Joel Matip, Noussair Mazraoui , Yassine Meriah , Youssouf Sabaly
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị Na-agba N'etiti: Andre- Frank Anguissa , Ismael Bennacer , Sofiane Feghouli , Idrissa Gueye , Tarek Hamed , Alex Iwobi , Wahbi Khazri , Naby Keita , Franck Kessie , Wilfried Ndidi , Riyad Mahrez, Thomas Partey , Mubarak Wakaso , Victor Wanyama , Hakim Ziyech
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ndị Na-agba N'ihu: Pierre Emerick Aubameyang , Jordan Ayew , Anis Badri , Cedric Bakambu , Youcef Belaili , Baghdad Bounedjah , Odion Ighalo , Sadio Mane , Moussa Marega , Mbaye Niang , Nicolas Pepe , Mohamed Salah , Islam Slimani, Percy Tau , Wilfried Zaha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ooni bụ onye kwuru nkea na nsonso a n'emume Eri nke Enugwu Aguleri, Anambra Steeti mere ụbọchị Satọdee. Onye eze ahụ, bụ onye Asoya nke Ile Isoya Ife, Oba Murainu Adebanjo, nọchitere anya ya, kwuru na obi bụ ya sọ añụrị ịsonye na mmemme ahụ, ebe ọ kọwara Ndị Igbo dịka nnukwu mba.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ihe gbasara ọnọdụ udo ala anyị na-amasị m maka ọ ga-eweta udo ma wepụtakwa nke kachasị mma n'ime ndị mmadụ nke ga-apụta ìhè na ọganihu ala anyị, ebe ezi nchekwa na obi añụrị ndị mmadụ ga-abụ ihe akwadoro nke ọma.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na mmemme ahụ, Onyeisi Ọhaneze Ndị Igbo, Nna Nwodo, kwuru na alaeze Eri emela ụmụ Igbo eze site na mmemme ahụ. Ọ kọwara ọbịabịa eze ọdịnala, Ooni nke Ife, dịka ezi mmekọrịta ga-eweta udo nke gafere Niger site n'akụkụ ọdịnala.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Eze Chukwuemeka Eri kwuru na mmemme ahụ bụ oge ndị Igbo ji abịakọrịta ọnụ iji were cheta nna nna ha, bụ Eri, nke bụ ebe Igbo siri pụta, onye siri na Israel were bịa biri na Aguleri were mụbaa.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nzukọ ahụ kpọkukwara mba ndị ọzọ ka ha na mba ndị gbara ha okirikiri kparịta ụka gbasara ihe ha ma ka ewere wulite ezi ọnọdụ nchekwa n'okèala obodo na ibe ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Nkea bụ ihe pụtara ìhè na ọzụzụ maka okeala nke otu nzukọ Afrịka chịkọbara maka mba ọdịda anyanwụ Afrịka were ọnọdụ n'isi obodo Naijiria, Abuja.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ozi nke sitere n'aka nzukọ ahụ ụbọchị Fraịdee na ngwụcha ọgbakọ ha nwere rịọrọ obodo ndị so nzukọ mba Afrịka ka ha leba anya na mmekọrịta nke otu ndị na-ahụ ma na-ahazi okwu gbasara okèala.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Dịka ozi ahụ siri dị, Mba ndị soro na Nzukọ Afrịka ga-ahazi ụzọ kacha mma ma wulite ezi nchekwa n'ebe oke ala ha dị.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ya bụ mmemme wèèrè ọnọdụ n'ama egwuregwu ala anyị dị na Surulere, Lagos ma bụrụ nke isi okwu ya pụtàrà Ọrụ Aka Na Nkwalite Ụlọ Mmepụta Ngwọ Ahịa na Gburugburu Azụmahịa Na-Agbanwe Agbanwè ma a tụgharịa ya.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'ozi mmalite ya, onyeisi oche mmemme ahụ, bụ Maazị Ben Ndị Obi kọwapụtara mkpà ọ dị na Ndị Igbo jikọtara onwe ha maka ọganihu tọrọ àtọ, ọ kachasị n'ụwa a na-eme ntụgharị. Ka ọ na-echètara ndị bịara ya bụ mmemme na ọ na-abụkwanụ akụ ruo ụlọ, a mara onye kpara ya; Maazị Obi kpọkuzịrị ụmụafọ Anambra na ndị Igbo n'izugbe ka ha na-ewelaru akụ ha ụlọ ma na-ewunyekwa ihe mwunye na steeti ha.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Na mbụ n'ozi nnọọ ya, onye ndu òtù ahụ, bụ Maazị Vincent Osakwe kwuru na mmemme ahụ hibèrè isi n'ịkwàlite omenala Igbo na ọdịmma Anambra, ma rịọkwazie ndị nne na nna bịara ya bụ mmemme ka ha gbasiekwa mbọ ike n'ịkụziri ụmụ ha asụsụ na omenala Igbo, iji hụ na nke ahụ anwụghị maọbụ fuo, dịka e buru n'amụma.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: A nọrọ na ya bụ mmemme wee tie mmanwụ, gbaa egwu ọdịnala ma mekwa ọtụtụ ihe ngosi dị iche iche e jiri mara ndị Igbo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ya bụ mmemme nke were otu izu-ụka bụ nke ha jiri ihe mmemme dị iche iche wee merùbe, ma bụrụkwa nke a nọrọ na ya wee nye nkuzi ma gagharịakwa n'ụfọdụ ụlọ ọrụ na n'ebe ndị ọzọ dị iche iche n'ịkọwara ndị mmadụ urù ọba akwụkwọ bàrà na ndụ mmadụ nà na mmepe obodo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: N'okwu ya oge ọ na-anabàta ndị ahụ n'isi ụlọ ọrụ ya, onyeisi ọba akwụkwọ mahadum Nnamdị Azikiwe dị n'Awka, bụ Ọkammụta Obiọra Nwosu kọwara oba akwụkwọ dịka ụlọ mmụta nakwa ebe nchekwa ozi, ma kwuokwa na ọba akwụkwọ nwèrè ọrụ pụrụ iche dịịrị ya n'ịkwàlite mmepe tọrọ àtọ n'obodo.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ọ gbara akaebe na gọọmenti etiti na-agbasi mbọ ike n'ịkwàlite ọba akwụkwọ na ọrụ dịịrị ya n'ala Nigeria, sịkwa na Gọvanọ Obianọ na-emekwa otu ihe ahụ, bụ nke o kwùrù na o meela ka ọba akwụkwọ kwụdosie ike n'ịrụ ọrụ ya otu o kwesiri, ma kelekwazie ha maka ezi nkwàdo ha na ịdị uchu n'ihe metụtara ịkwàlite ọba akwụkwọ.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: Ka ọ na-akọwàpụta isiokwu mmemme ahụ nke ahọ a dịka Library Services For Sustainable Development In Nigeria, nke pụtara Ọba Akwụkwọ Ịrụ Ọrụ Maka Mmepe Ala Nigeria (ma a tụgharịa ya); onyeisi ọba akwụkwọ steeti Anambra, bụ Dọkịta Nkechi Udeze mere ka a mara na izu-ụka ọba akwụkwọ bụ izu-ụka pụrụ iche a mapụtara maka imerùbè ọba akwụkwọ na ịkuziri ọhaneze urù ọba akwụkwọ bàrà, kwà ahọ ọbụla.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.

text: O kwuru na ọba akwụkwọ, dịka ụlọ mmụta, na-eme ka ndị mmadụ nweta ozi nwere ike inyere ha aka iji chekwaba, gbakwụnyekwuo ma kwalite ihe ha mụtara, ihe ha mepụtara nakwa ihe ha mààrà, n'ihi na, dịka o siri kwuo, ụwa na-eme ntụgharị, nke mezịrị o jiri dị mkpà na mmadụ ọbụla ga na-agụsi akwụkwọ ike ma na-amụtakwa ihe ọhụrụ, iji hụ na ụwà agbanahịghị ya n'ọsọ, n'ihi mgbanwè.
label: igbo

citation.title: Igbo-English Machine Translation: An Evaluation Benchmark
citation.author: Ignatius Ezeani et al.
